Summary: The staff is great! The renovated rooms are awesome. Very clean hotel. I stay at Marriott, Hilton and IHG hotels. This Best Western was extremely better than those other brands and definitelyexceeded my expectations. Free Breakfast was definitely a plus. Pool is heated and warm. They also have a hottub. Definitely would come back next time I'm in the area. Directly across the street from the convention center and an easy 10 min walk to Disney with shuttles provided.
Manager Response: Dear Leonard, Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to leave us a review. We appreciate it and value our guest's feedback. We are pleased to see that you found our property clean and enjoyed our hot breakfast buffet and pool area. We do plan on updating both areas in the near future and it would be our pleasure to host you on your next visit.  Our Best, Kareena Alliss Sales coordinator

Summary Heading: Great Stay! Thank you Best Western
Summary: We enjoyed our stay at this Best Western. The breakfast was great with a lot of options. We stayed in a newly renovated suite (two queen & bunk beds). It was so nice and super spacious. We loved the two bathrooms as well. The staff were so sweet and helpful with every request we had and offered plenty of advice for success at the park. It was a nice, quiet hotel. The walk to Disneyland was a little further than we wanted with toddlers, but other than that it was amazing.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your five star rating about your stay in our spacious rooms!  We sure appreciate the kind words about our staff and our great breakfast!  That makes us so proud!    We look forward to seeing you back at Walt Disney's Original Theme Park!

Summary: Resv. said one price, Hotel charge a higher amount.  Also there was nothing said about a parking fee. Rooms clean, over all grounds were well keeped. Front in desk needs to know about the area and how to get around. Maps would be nice.
Manager Response: Dear Raymond,  Thank you for choosing our property for your stay as well as taking the time to leave a review. We value our guests feedback and always use it to address all areas of concern to assure that they are resolved. I can assure you that we take your feedback seriously and have taken steps to investigate and address them. We take pride in the service we provide to our guests and we hold ourselves to high standards to do our best to ensure all of our guests have a wonderful stay. We would love to have another opportunity to provide you with a superior experience and hope to see you again in the future.   Our Best, Kareena Alliss  Sales Coordinator

Summary Heading: Great stay for the overall price.
Summary: We decided to stay here for our kids first trip to Disneyland. Even though it was a little further away from the park than we would’ve liked to stay, there are a couple shuttle options that made it do-able. The stay were super friendly. My only complaints were that the water didn’t get hot enough and for me, the bed wasn’t comfortable (I have back issues, thus me needing hotter water). The kids like the bunk beds and it was pretty quiet during our stay.
Manager Response: Dear dcparkinsonsmith,  Thank you for staying with us and for leaving us a review. We love to hear feedback from our guests. We used the feedback to continually improve our service. I'm happy to see that you found our staff friendly. I appreciate your feedback regarding the water pressure and bed. We are looking into both issues to address them and assure that they are resolved. We have a lot of new and exciting enhancements coming to the property this year. We are in the process of renovating all of our guest rooms with a fresh new look. We're adding new beds, bedding, flooring, lighting, wall art, USB outlets and fully revamped bathrooms. We hope you have an opportunity to stay with us for your next visit to see all of our wonderful enhancements. Thank you again for choosing us as your preferred choice of accommodations. We hope to see you again soon.  My Best,  Jerry Simpkins General Manager

Summary: The walk to/from the parks was manageable the first couple of times but after long days at the park, we decided to Uber back and forth. The walk took about 15-20 minutes.  We are a large family (7) and appreciated that this hotel could accommodate us in one room.  We also appreciated the complimentary buffet breakfast. The options were great and it was the perfect way to start the day.  Finally, the kids really enjoyed their interactions with Robert.
Manager Response: Dear TravelBug6Alberta,  I would like to personally thank you for choosing our hotel for your preferred accommodations for your recent visit to the Anaheim Resort. I enjoy reading how our guests feel about their time with us. Our entire team is focused on providing the best service and accommodations that we possibly can. I'm happy to see that you were pleased with our convenient location. The Anaheim Resort Transit is the shuttle service that is a convenient way to get back and forth from the park to the hotel and of course many of our guest use Uber which is always available. Our family suite which accommodates up to 8 guests, is a perfect room to keep large families together in one suite instead of having to get separate rooms. We also have 2 other suites that can accommodate up to 6 guests and of course our standard rooms can sleep up to 4. We have a room type for all size families. It's super important to start start up the day with a hearty breakfast before a long fun filled day at the park. I'm happy that your family enjoyed our Hot Breakfast Buffet each morning during your stay. On behalf of Robert and the rest of our staff, I would like to thank you for staying with us and choosing us as your preferred place to stay during your recent trip. We hope to see you again for your next stay.  My Best,  Jerry Simpkins General Manager

Summary: We had a problem with our tire and the receptionist (Robert Brown) helped us like an entire hour trying to find a number which we could contact to get help. He even searched for different places we could go the next morning to fix it. He was very nice and kind.
Manager Response: Dear N7695Qmarianar,  Thank you for choosing us as your preferred accommodations during your recent stay. I'm pleased to see that Robert was able to assist you in resolving the problem you experienced. I'll be sure to let him know. I'm sure he'll be very excited to hear how pleased you were with his service. All of our Team Members are here to assist our guests in any way we can. It is our goal to ensure each and every guests has a comfortable and pleasant stay by providing the best service we possibly can. Thank you again for staying with us. We hope to see you again for your next visit.  Best,  Jerry Simpkins General Manager

Summary: Best Western Plus Raffles Inn & Suites Anaheim was such a great experience for me and my family. The staff was amazing, especially our great friend Edward. They were helpful and provided everything we needed for a comfortable stay. The breakfast provided was also amazing and we enjoyed having it as an option. We will definitely be staying here in the future.
Manager Response: Dear Nitatunuufi22,  Thank you for staying with us and for leaving us a review. We appreciate it. I'll be sure to let Edward know that you enjoyed his service and that you found him friendly. I'm sure Edward we be excited to hear the news. It makes me happy seeing that your family enjoyed our Hot breakfast buffet. It's the perfect way to get ready for a fun filled day at the parks. We can't wait to see you again for your next visit. Our team will be waiting with open arms.   Sincerely,  Jerry Simpkins General Manager

Summary: Room was clean, staff was helpful and breakfast was great! Paper thin walls and loud outdoor walkways made sleeping impossible! No towel hooks or rods in vanity area and terrible access to working outlets for device charging.  The two that worked were so loose an adapter wouldn’t stay connected. Not one USB outlet is available. Internet was spotty.  Ask for a remodeled room or we wouldn’t recommend staying here.
Manager Response: Dear Z8265FHbillw,  Thank you for staying with us and for leaving us a review. We appreciate your feedback and always use it to improve our service and accommodations. I would like to apologize for the issues that occurred during your stay. We are in the process of renovating all of our guest rooms. Our room enhancements will include sound proofing, new furniture, flooring, LED lighting, wallpaper, New outlets which will include USB connectors. We are also enhancing our bathrooms to include glass showers and adding additional towel bars and racks. We will have the remainder of our rooms completed shortly and would love the opportunity to have your family back to experience our comfortable and fresh new guest rooms. Thank you for staying with us. We'd love to have another opportunity to serve your family again.  My Best,  Jerry Simpkins General Manager

Summary: The family suite is huge, perfect for our family of 5. Beds were comfy and they provide a lot of pillows. Service at the front desk was good. They have breakfast, but not a lot of options. Just grab and go stuff mostly. But the price is great for what they provide!
Manager Response: Dear lainypooh79,  Thank your for staying with us and for leaving us  a review. We appreciate it. We love to receive feedback from our guests and use it to constantly improve our service and accommodations in any way we can to ensure all our guests have a pleasant and comfortable stay. I'm happy that your family enjoyed our family suite. This is the perfect suite to be able to have the entire family in one two bedroom suite instead of having 2 separate rooms. I apologize that our breakfast options were not as plentiful as expected. We do include in our breakfast items such as sausage, scrambled eggs,  potatoes, waffles, pancakes, biscuits and gravy, oatmeal,  as well as an assortment of cereal, breads, fruit, yogurt, juices, and other items. We are always looking to improve and will consider rotating in additional items to improve our options for our guests. Thank you for the feedback. We have a lot of exciting new amenities coming to the hotel and would love for you to see them for your next visit to the area. Thank you for staying with us and we hope to see you again in the near future.  My Best,  Jerry Simpkins General Manager

Summary: It felt like sleeping on a board. I had to use the couch cushions to actually get some sleep. My kids can sleep anywhere amd they said they were uncomfortable too. We stayed in a suite and it was nice to have the space for our larger party. The breakfast was good and had decent selections.
Manager Response: Thank you for the comments regarding your recent stay with us.  We are sorry that we were unable to meet your expectations during your stay. Guest satisfaction is something we strive for every day and your feedback is very much appreciated. Please know we use all feedback, both positive and constructive when reviewing the services and accommodations we provide to our guests.  If we can be of further assistance, please don't hesitate to let us know.

Summary: I really enjoyed my stay here. The room was clean, quiet, and nicely decorated. I appreciated having the double sinks in the bathroom. The staff was very kind and friendly. The free breakfast was delicious with great variety. The close proximity to the toy story parking lot shuttles made getting to Disneyland a breeze. Will stay again.
Manager Response: Dear jwC4196EZ,  Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to leave us a review. We appreciate your business and we always use our guest feedback to help us improve. I'm so excited to see that you found our rooms clean, quiet, and were pleased with the overall room. The double sinks in our guest rooms are definitely a plus when getting the family ready for a fun filled day at the parks. All of our Team Members are here to help in any way we can to assure that your stay is comfortable and relaxing. We hope to see you again for your next visit. Thank you again for staying with us.  My Best,  Jerry Simpkins General Manager

Summary: Great location to Disneyland.  We stayed in a two bedroom suite, it’s nice to have the kids have their own space.   Breakfast didn’t offer much of a variety, but they offered warm food.  Pool and hot tub were nice and clean
Manager Response: Dear AmyNT208,  Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to leave us a review. I'm happy that the kids enjoyed their own space in one of our two bedroom suites. The extra space is perfect for families and offers room for everyone to relax after a long exciting day. We appreciate your feedback about our hot breakfast buffet.  We are always looking for ways to improve our offerings. A hot breakfast is the perfect way to start a fun filled day. Thank you again for staying with us and we hope to see you again for your next visit.  Best,  Jerry Simpkins

Summary: A conveniently located hotel with great amenities. Shuttle service is within walking distance to Disneyland resort and so easy to use. Fitness center was clean. Some rooms are a bit dated but that didn’t bother us at all. Hotel staff was friendly and very accommodating, as we arrived early and were able to park!
Manager Response: Dear oliviaaj,  On behalf of the entire Best Western Plus Raffles team, I would like to thank you for staying with us. We know that there are many options for accommodations to choose from and we are happy that you chose us as your preferred place to stay while visiting the Anaheim Resort. We're pleased to see that you enjoyed your stay. Having wonderful guests such as you stay with us is the reason why we do what we do. We are here for you and all of our guests to ensure that we do our very best to provide the best service and accommodations that we can. We have many exciting enhancements coming to the property. We're in the process of completely reimagining our guest rooms, breakfast room, and exterior. We're excited about the improvements and hope that you come back and stay with us again to experience the new additions and tell us what you think. Thank you once again for staying with us.   My Best,  Jerry Simpkins General Manager

Summary: Absolutely disgusting hotel. Staff was horrible. Noisy room. Just the worst experience ever. Expedia description of the room was WAY off! The suite has bunk beds. For 6 adults?? WTH??? Not to mention roaches running all over the freaking room. Ugh just horrible, I couldn’t wait to leave. Far away from Disneyland, ART bus takes over 30 minutes to come??
Manager Response: Dear kellybadeker,  Thank you for staying with us. All of our staff are here to provide the best service and accommodations for all of our guests and when we we do not achieve our desired result we would like to offer our sincerest apologies. We value our guests feedback and always use it to address all areas of concern to assure that they are resolved. I can assure you that we take your feedback seriously and have taken steps to investigate and address them. We take pride in the service we provide to our guests and we hold ourselves to high standards to do our best to ensure all of our guests have a wonderful stay. We would love to have another opportunity to provide you a comfortable stay and hope to see you again in the future.  My Best,  Jerry Simpkins General Manager

Summary: Staff violated our privacy, for literally no reason, ruined my sister in laws groceries, limited breakfast options, ants were crawling into the door because there was no weather stripping. Sure it’s a cheaper hotel in the area, I guess you get what you pay for
Manager Response: Dear katelynnmariestay2022,  Thank you for staying with us. I apologize for not exceeding your expectation during your stay with us. Our goal is to provide the best service that we can to each our guests. I apologize that this is not what you experienced during your stay. We value your feedback and we will always listen to our guests to continue to improve our service and accommodations. We we would love to have another opportunity to see you again in the future to offer you the wonderful service and stay that we expect and strive to provide to all of our guests. Thank you for staying with us.   Sincerely,  Jerry Simpkins General Manager

Summary: We enjoyed our stay at this hotel. The beds were very comfortable, very happy that we had 2 bathrooms. Very close to Disneyland. The rooms were prefect for a family of 8. We will definitely be returning.
Manager Response: Dear Cynthis P,  Thank you for staying with us and for leaving us a review. It makes me smile when our guests tell us that they enjoyed their stay with us. Our staff takes pride in doing all that we can to make every guest stay relaxing, comfortable and memorable. I'm pleased to see that you enjoyed our Family Suite. The two bedrooms is a great way to keep large families together in one room instead of separate rooms and the  two bathrooms are perfect for getting everyone ready for a fun filled exiting day. I'm happy to see that you will be returning to stay with us for your next visit. We look forward to seeing you again. See you soon.   My Best,  Jerry Simpkins General Manager

Summary: Near to Disneyland. Room met our family need, 2 adults 2 teenagers and a 1 year old. Crib upon request. Carpet not so clean. Tear in the carpet. Breakfast buffet included that made it very convenient for my family.
Manager Response: Dear mzaloha66,  Thank you for staying with us and for leaving us a review. I'm happy that your family of 5 enjoyed our breakfast and that your received the crib as requested. Thank you for your feedback about the room. We are currently addressing this to assure it is resolved. We appreciate you choosing us as your preferred place to stay while visiting the Anaheim Resort. We hope to have the opportunity to serve you again for your next visit so we'll have another chance to assure that your stay is perfect.   My Best,  Jerry Simpkins General Manager

Summary: Hotel is within walking distance to Disneyland, Room was a good size  Great beds and super clean, Staff were friendly and very helpful, Grandson had hours of fun in the pool, Good Breakfast  every morning
Manager Response: Dear Colleen M,  Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to leave us a review. It was our pleasure to have the chance to be a part of your Disney experience. It made me smile when I read that your grandson had so much fun in our pool and that the family enjoyed our hot breakfast buffet. Thank you for staying with us and we look forward to seeing your again for your next visit.  My Best,  Jerry Simpkins General Manager

Summary: This hotel is located a block away from the Toy Story parking lot, which offers free continuous shuttle service to and from the Disneyland Resort. Free breakfast is included, beds are very comfortable, rooms are clean, and staff is very friendly and helpful! I always recommend this location to anyone planning a Disneyland Resort vacation!
Manager Response: Dear D8847WGmichellep,  Thank you for staying with us and for leaving us a review. We always listen to our guests and use your feedback to improve our service. I'm so pleased to see that your family had a great experience while staying with us. We're excited to see you again for your next visit. Thank you again for staying with us. See you soon.  Sincerely,  Jerry Simpkins General Manager

Summary Heading: A nice place to stay near Disneyland
Summary: The hotel is near Disneyland park's, you can go walking, also there are some restaurants to eat, is nice the room, clean and comfortable to rest. The breakfast is not complicated but helps to save some money. Is highly recommended to stay here. All the staff of the hotel Is very kind.
Manager Response: Dear Rafael Z,  Thank you for staying with us. We know that life is busy and would like to thank you for taking the time to leave us a review. We appreciate it. I'm happy that you found our staff pleasant and you enjoyed our hot breakfast buffet. It's the perfect way to start a long day at the parks. We're consistently updating our breakfast offerings and always rotate hot and delicious items for a nice variety for our guests to enjoy during their stay. Thank you again for choosing us as your preferred place to stay and we hope to see you again for your next visit.  Sincerely,  Jerry Simpkins General Manager

Summary: We booked for our trip to Disneyland it was a great location about a 20 min walk to park. Staff very friendly and helpful. Kids loved the pool.  Breakfast provided every morning with a good variety of options.
Manager Response: Dear susanwhitten33,  Thank you for staying with us and taking time our of your busy day to leave us a review. We love to receive feedback from our guests and always use it to continue to improve our service and accommodations. We're here to do our very best to do whatever we can to ensure our guests have a great stay. I'm glad to see that you enjoyed our hot breakfast buffet, found our staff friendly and that the kids had fun in our outdoor heated pool. We know that you have many options of accommodation to choose from while traveling and we want to thank you for choosing us. We can't wait to see you again for your next visit.  My Best,  Jerry Simpkins General Manager

Summary: Great, affordable stay for families visiting Disneyland. Free breakfast and 7 min walk to Toy Story shuttle which takes you directly to parks. Came back every afternoon for a pool, hot tub break. Staff were friendly and courteous. Quiet at night. We were on first floor so could hear people above us in the morning but... that actually got us up for Disney!
Manager Response: Dear tokyo2van,  Thank you for staying with us. I'm so happy to see that your family enjoyed your stay with us. We love to hear feedback from our guests. All of our staff are hear to do our very best to make sure that each of our guests have a comfortable and relaxing stay. We hope to see you again for your next visit. We'll be waiting for you with open arms.  My Best,  Jerry Simpkins General Manager

Summary: Hotel is clean, breakfast was varied, pool was small but fine for kids - we used it once. The biggest draw is the hotel is right next to the Toy Story parking lot so you can walk right to the busses there and hop on one to the park. One thing we weren’t told in advance - the hotel charges $15 a night for parking.
Manager Response: Dear trhornock,  Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to leave us a review. We appreciate it. I'm pleased to see that you found our hotel clean and enjoyed our hot breakfast buffet. I apologize that you were not aware of our parking fee prior to arrival. We work hard to assure that all fees are listed on all sites so that all of our guests are not surprised with unexpected fees when arriving. It is good to see that you enjoyed our location which is close to transportation to the park and also many restaurant options as well. Thank you for staying with us. We can't wait to see you again for your next visit to the park.  My Best,  Jerry Simpkins General Manager

Summary Heading: Would You Ask Your Elderly Parent to Sleep in a Bunk Bed?
Summary: I have been a long-time customer of Best Western and I was extremely disappointed with my stay at the Best Western Plus Raffles in Anaheim. I had booked a room with two double beds for 2 nights in June, well in advance of my stay, but when I checked in on Sept. 20, I was informed that my room was not available. I was given a “kids suite.” It had a queen-sized bed and 2 bunk beds. I tried several times unsuccessfully to get this changed. I am elderly and my daughter has a disability.  So, she got the bed and I got  a bunk bed during our stay. Another thing: There was no maid service. I put out the sign requesting service after the first night, but no one ever came to clean. As a result, I bumped my head 3 times remaking my bunk bed before going to sleep on the second night. This
Manager Response: Dear X3594UCjackk,  Thank you for staying with us and for leaving us a review. We always listen to our guests and continue to strive to improve our service and accommodations. I apologize for the experience you had during your stay. We will definitely work to assure that this does not happen again. I also apologize for your room not being serviced. We are informing our guests upon check-in that rooms are not serviced unless requested. I apologize if this was not conveyed to you. We would love to have the opportunity for you to stay with us again in the future so that we can have another opportunity to show you our excellent Customer Service that we expect and you deserve. Thank you for staying with us and I hope to see you again in the future.   Best,  Jerry Simpkins General Manager

Summary: The price was right for the area. The ART stopped right in front of the hotel. The pool & hot tub were awesome. There pool towels were very small & thin but did the job. Ice machine was on 2nd floor. There is an elevator.
Manager Response: Dear briteyez526,  Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to leave us a review. We love to hear what our guest think of their stay so that we can use the information to continue improving and offering fresh new offerings to our guests. I'm happy to see that you enjoyed your stay with us and that you were able to experience our spa and outdoor heated pool. After a long day at the park or a rest day in between visits, the pool and spa are a perfect way to spend a relaxing day. I would like to thank you again for staying with us. We're looking forward to seeing you again the next time you're in the area.  Sincerely,  Jerry Simpkins General Manager

Summary: Parking fees were not well advertised. Had a dispute that it was shown when I booked on BW.com. Had to dig for the info. Not very open, unexpected charges  Hotel is next to Toy Story Parking lot, we walked to the tram stop, went thru security and took bus into parks. It was nice and close.
Manager Response: Dear Albert L,  Thank you for staying with us and for leaving us a review. We appreciate your feedback and will use if to constantly improve our service and accommodations. Thank you for your feedback regarding our parking fee. I apologize that you were not aware of the fee prior to arrival. We definitely strive to assure that all fees are posted so that all of our guests are aware of all fees prior to booking. I hope that you consider staying with us for your next visit to the area. We would love to have the opportunity to serve you again.  My best,  Jerry Simpkins General Manager

Summary: We had a nice stay at Best Western Raffles.  They have a decent breakfast would have been much better if the gravy was thicker.  For the room 209 Wi-Fi was bad. ART bus pass run more often, but the OC bus pass is cheaper.  Bus 43
Manager Response: Dear Broshark62,  Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to leave us a review. We appreciate your feedback and will use it to constantly improve our service and accommodations. I'm happy to hear that you had a nice stay with us. Thanks for informing me about the breakfast. Our team works very hard to assure that our breakfast offerings are perfect for all of our guests each morning. I apologize that the wifi was not acceptable in your room. We will definitely locate the issue and get it resolved immediately. Thanks once again for you feedback. Please keep us in mind for your next visit. We'd love to have another opportunity to make sure your next stay is perfect.  Best,  Jerry Simpkins General Manager

Summary: I just checked out of the Best Western Plus Raffles Inn & Suites.  My honest opinion, stay somewhere else.  All of the hotels in this area are comparably priced.  They have much better/more updated rooms for the price.  The Hilton Doubletree and Hyatt are right next door.  I have checked the prices and they are comparable.  The Best Western Plus Raffles inn & Suites smells old and musty.  It has that old plumbing smell throughout the room, particularly in the bathroom.  The bathroom is very small and in desperate need of an update.  The tile on the back floor between the floor and wall is deteriorating.  I didn't try the breakfast, although a good option, because it was over at 9:30 am.  I know the Hyatt's breakfast is over at 11 AM.  After a long day at the park, its difficult
Manager Response: Dear A I,  Thank you for staying with us and for also taking the time to leave us a review. We appreciate your feedback and will use it to continue to improve our service and accommodations. I apologize that we weren't able to meet your expectations during your stay but we do appreciate your feedback. We are very excited to be in the process of renovating all of our guest rooms. Our new rooms will have new wallpaper, flooring, lighting, USB ports, bedding, and completely updated bathrooms.  We also have many enhancements coming to the exterior of the property as well including expanding our breakfast dining room to include an exterior patio area. We'll also be adding a firework viewing area near our pool as well as a patio area adjacent  to our lobby. We would love to have you stay with us again so that you can tell us what you think of all the enhancements. Once again, thank you for staying with us.   Best,  Jerry Simpkins General Manager

Summary: We stayed here as a family of 5 from the UK for 11 nights, was a little nervous reading some reviews but the hotel far exceeded our expectations.  We family room and the bunk beds were in a separate room which gave lots of space (corner room 239 above reception), room was clean and recently refurbished.  Positives which are not mentioned that should be are: - Sockets throughout the rooms had additional USB ports, this really helped when charging multiple devices after a day in the park - Towels are provided around the pool - Laundry was $4 per wash or dry (card only) and you could get detergent for $2 (coin only) - Ironing facilities in room - Hair dryer in room - Chilled water, coffee and fruit available in reception - You can see the Disney fireworks from the 3rd floor  -
Manager Response: Dear Rnew,  Thank you for staying with us and for leaving us a review. We appreciate your feedback and will use it to improve our service and accommodations. I'm happy to see that you enjoyed one of our newly renovated suites. Our two bedroom suites are the perfect room to be able to keep all of the family in one suite instead of being separated in to multiple rooms. We have many new enhancements coming to the property that we can't wait until they're completed. We're looking forward to seeing you again for your next visit and experience all that we have to offer our guests. I understand that there are many places to choose from when visiting the Anaheim Resort and I would like to thank you for choosing us.   We hope to see you soon.  My Best,  Jerry Simpkins General Manager

Summary: This hotel is a bit dates but the rooms were clean, comfortable and spacious and the staff were extremely friendly. Nice little outdoor pool to cool off in the afternoon. 20 minute walking to Disney and close to lots of restaurants and shops.
Manager Response: Dear Travel2765123,  I would like to thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to leave us a review. I'm happy to see that you enjoyed our service and clean and comfortable rooms. Thank you for your feedback. We are so excited to be in the process of renovating all of our guest rooms. Our newly enhanced rooms will have new flooring, lighting, bedding, furniture, artwork and bathrooms complete with glass showers. We hope you have the opportunity to stay with us again for your next visit. We'd love to hear about what you think of all our improvements. Thank you again for staying with us.   See you soon,  My Best,  Jerry Simpkins General Manager

Summary Heading: Horrible smelling room and dining area, dirty room
Summary: The room smells really bad, especially near the bathroom.  The room was dirty with hair found in the bathroom.  We stayed for several days and our room was never cleaned.  When I called the front desk to ask why, I was told someone told me cleaning is done only by request, this was news to me.  The front desk had pretty poor service and almost argued with me over the cleaning issue.  The breakfast area smelled of raw sewage and was dirty.  I asked for the manager and was told I will have to wait until tomorrow.  I emailed the address for the manager from the business card handed out in the lobby and it bounced back.  This business only survives due to the demand from Disneyland and as such does not care about their customers.  When I come back, I will happily pay more to stay
Manager Response: Dear 05229Mijamesg,  Thank you for staying with us and for leaving us a review. Your feedback is important to us and we will use it to continue to improve. I apologize for not meeting your expectations during your stay with us. We are investigating the concerns that you mentioned to assure that they are resolved. We pride ourselves on delivering superior customer care and I would like to apologize that this is not what you experienced during your stay. We are excited to be in the process of renovating all of our guest rooms. Each room will be fully renovated to include new flooring, Bedding, Lighting and completely redesigned bathrooms. We hope that you consider staying with us again so that we will have the opportunity to show you the superior customer care that we expect and that you deserve.  Sincerely,  Jerry S.

Summary: Went here but would not recommend this. The bathroom was so small you had to stand and close the door to use the toilet. The bathroom smelled so bad like sewer gas that we had to keep the door closed and hold your breath to use it.
Manager Response: Dear ronsH3252FU,  Thank you for staying with us and completing the review. We value your feedback and will use it to continue to improve. I would like to apologize for the issue that occurred during your stay. We are in the process of determining the cause and course of action to address the issue. Thank your for your feedback. We have a lot of fresh new improvements and enhancements coming to the hotel. We are in the process of renovating each of our guest rooms to include new carpet, tile, furniture, bedding, wallpaper, LED lighting and completely redesigned bathrooms. Please keep us in mind for your next trip. We'd love to get your thoughts on all of the exciting changes.   Best,  Jerry Simpkins General Manager

Summary: Very clean and easy to use hotel. We have 3 kids and it is tough to find a hotel big enough for all of us without renting 2 rooms. The value for this hotel is great , our room was clean and the staff was awesome. We stayed here so our kids could go to Disney. It is outdated but if it were up to date I am sure the price would be triple. If you like to eat healthy skip the breakfast. They do charge $15 for parking a night. It is all families there so lots of kids but super quiet at night.
Manager Response: Dear Traveler0227,  Thank you for staying with us and for leaving us a review. I'm happy to see that you enjoyed your stay with us during your trip to Disneyland. Our friendly staff is always here to assist in any way we can. Thank you for your feedback about our two bedroom suite. I'm pleased to see that the two rooms were perfect for your family and allowed for everyone to stay in one suite instead of two separate rooms. I'm also excited to inform you that we are in the process of renovating all of our guest rooms. Our new rooms will have new carpet, tile, furniture, bedding, wallpaper, LED lighting and completely redesigned bathrooms. We hope to see you again for your next trip to see all of the exciting enhancements coming to the property. Thank you again for staying with us.   My Best,  Jerry Simpkins General Manager

Summary: Our family of 5 (3 adults and 2 children) stayed 6 nights. Everything about this hotel was a positive experience. The front desk team (Edward Jean & Maria) were friendly and helpful and made check-in a breeze. I had trouble with the ART app for the shuttle to Disneyland and they even helped me set that up. Thank you!  We did not require daily housekeeping but we did ask for fresh towels quite often and the housekeeping staff was always friendly and happy to oblige.  There were maintenance people power washing the parking lot and painting. They clearly take pride in the property.    Our suite was nice and clean! The main room had a queen bed and a sofa sleeper while the separate room had a queen bed. Everything worked perfectly. The beds were comfy. We were happy to have both the
Manager Response: Dear Eoma,  Thank you for staying with us and for leaving us such a detailed review. We value your feedback and always listen to our guests so that we can continue to improve our service and accommodations. Edward and Maria are happy to see that you found them helpful and friendly. Please accept my thank you on their behalf. I'm also happy to hear that your requests were satisfied by our housekeeping staff when requested. All of our Team Members take pride in assuring that all of our guests needs are met. It's also good to see that you enjoyed our Hot Breakfast Buffet which is the perfect way for our guests to start every fun filled exciting day. Thank you again for staying with us. We hope to see you again for your next visit to the Anaheim Resort.  My Best,  Jerry Simpkins General Manager

Summary: We were very happy with this hotel.  The breakfast was good with many choices - with main courses that changed each day.  The rooms were clean with plenty of space for a family of 4 or 5.  Great staff too.  The walk to Disneyland is 15 to 20 minutes but buses are available nearby.
Manager Response: Dear aprylb2016,  Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to leave us a review. We do appreciate it. Our Team enjoy providing great customer service along with fresh, clean, and comfy rooms for all of our guests. I'm happy that you enjoyed our Hot Breakfast Buffet. It's the perfect way to start every fun and exiting day. Thank you for your feedback about our rooms. Our 3 different guest room suite options are perfect for any size family and we are just a short distance to the parks. I would like to thank you again for staying with us and we look forward to seeing you again for your next visit to the Anaheim Resort.  My Best, Jerry Simpkins General Manager

Summary Heading: Perfect stay for a large family
Summary: We are a family of 6, and in kost cases we need to get 2 rooms. But here we are able to get 1 room that has a separate room for my fiancé and myself,  while still keeping an eye on our kids. The staff is unbelievably nice and the food is lways fresh and delicious. The potatoes at breakfast are my favorite, they are always seasoned perfectly. There is a good variety of items to choose from, that satisfy our picky eaters to our autistic son. The rooms are always clean and we always enjoy our stay here.
Manager Response: Dear nicolefD9871XB,  Thank you for choosing the Best Western Plus Raffles Inn & Suites as your preferred hotel accommodations during your recent stay in the Anaheim Resort. I'm pleased to see that you enjoyed your stay with us in one of our popular suites. Our suites are a great option for large families such as yours to enjoy together in one large suite and avoid having to stay in separate rooms. The second room is perfect for the kids and allows for everyone to have their own separate space. It's also good to see that you enjoyed our complimentary hot breakfast buffet. Our breakfast is the perfect way to start every fun and exciting day. We thank you again for staying with us and look forward to seeing you again for your next visit.   Sincerely,  Jerry Simpkins General Manager

Summary: The breakfast was nice the pool was fun. There is also a gym. The room was clean and bigger than I expected. The staff was also friendly. The hotel is very close by to Disneyland, so you could easily walk there.
Manager Response: Dear Lizetc389,  Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to complete the survey. We're delighted that you enjoyed our complimentary hot breakfast buffet. Our breakfast is the perfect way to start an exciting and fun day. Our gym is always available for guests to use along with all of our other hotel amenities. We hope to see you again in the future. Our Team Members are always happy to welcome our guests with kindness and smiles.  Sincerely,  Jerry Simpkins General Manager

Summary: If you are doing a Disney trip with children and need rest between park visits, you'll like the kids suites layout!  It's unfortunate that the bathroom is off the kids' room, and there's only a desk-- no table.  But otherwise this is an awesome layout that even has a lock on the parents' side of the dividing door, if you're worried about keeping little ones in an area you have kid-proofed.  If you book soon enough, you'll probably also save some money over the hotels right across from the park.  The free breakfast is also great-- definite time and money saver!  The people at the front desk were really lovely and helpful!  Location is a bit of a downer-- it is better than some that are farther away, and you can walk to the park.  But it's far enough that you won't want to walk
Manager Response: Dear Travelling_mom_12345,  Thank you for taking the time to leave us such a detailed review. We do appreciate your feedback to help us continue to improve our service and accommodations. I'm happy so see that you enjoyed our Kid's suite. This is one of our most popular suites. Kid's love the bunk beds and parents love the separation so that the kids can have their space along with the parents. Our complimentary hot breakfast buffet is the perfect way to start the morning before a fun and exciting day at the park and our staff is always here to help in any way we can to assist our guests and ensure that their stay is comfortable and welcoming. Thank you for the feedback about the shuttle service. The Anaheim Resort Transit do have some requirements that guests may have to deal with however it is great to have the shuttle buses as an option, specifically for getting guests to and from the park. We would like to thank you for choosing us as your preferred place to stay during your visit and we can't wait to see you and your family again in the future.  My best,  Jerry Simpkins General Manager

Summary: Just stayed here for 4 days , had a great stay. Rooms are a little outdated, but still nice. Front desk was excellent, Eder was very nice and helpful. Also had a handsome face. All in all was a very nice stay and will stay again next year.
Manager Response: Dear AnnaeG6885WG,  Thank you for sharing your recent experience at our hotel. I am happy to hear that you found our staff pleasant. Eder will be happy to hear that you enjoyed his service. I appreciate your comments about the rooms being outdated. We are excited to be in the process of upgrading all of our guest rooms during the next few months. Our rooms will be upgraded with new flooring, LED lighting, furniture, bedding, wallpaper, artwork, along with newly designed bathrooms complete with glass showers. We're excited for all the new changes coming to the hotel and we look forward to seeing what you think about them when you return next year. Thank you again for staying with us. We'll see you again soon.  Sincerely,  Jerry S. General Manager

Summary Heading: Still has life, but is tired and worn
Summary: The hotel is an older model, rooms were clean, but need deep cleaning and updating.  They were renovating rooms while we were there, but thankfully working only during the day so not a bother.  Pool was good.  Breakfast was a typical buffet with no changes.  Overall it works if your just looking for simple and just using it to sleep.
Manager Response: Dear Compton612,  Thank you for providing us feedback about your recent stay with us. I'm happy to hear that you found our rooms clean and I appreciate your comments about the rooms needing updating. As you stated you noticed during your stay, we are currently in the process of renovating all of our guest rooms. We have many exciting additions coming to our rooms including lighting, flooring, wall art, furniture, bedding, and completely revamped bathrooms. I'm happy to hear we succeeded in not disturbing you while you were staying with us. We're also in the process of revamping our breakfast offerings to include some fresh new items that will be rotating on three new menus. We hope you have the opportunity to come back and enjoy our fresh new breakfast menu and new and improved guest rooms.   All the Best,  Jerry S. General Manager

Summary: Left something expensive at this hotel. After I left they confirmed they found the left item in my room and would ship it to me if i sent them a prepaid shipping label. Instead they said they shipped it but never did because it only says label created and nothing else. it’s been weeks. they insist they shipped it weeks ago but can’t tell me why there is no activity on the shipping label and they aren’t willing to help at all. Definitely not a trustworthy hotel. Will definitely never stay here again and will tell everyone I know to never stay here.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  On behalf of our entire team, I would like to apologize for not exceeding your expectations. We strive to assure that each of our guests stay is perfect and we will do everything possible to assure that we continue to improve everyday.  Our management Team is still researching to determine the location of the item that was left behind. We will do everything possible to assure that you receive the item as soon as possible.   Sincerely,  Jerry & the Best Western Raffles Team

Summary: Staff are very nice and friendly. Unfortunately the rooms are not what the pictures shows, the actual rooms are super outdated. Our room was a suite 2 rooms 2 queen beds, the kids stayed in the private room, husband and i stayed on the other room. Our legs were being eaten alive by some type of bugs on the first night.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  I'm happy to hear that our Team Members were able to help to make your stay enjoyable.  Our Team Members are always here to assist in any way we can.   On behalf of our entire team, I would like to apologize for not exceeding your expectations. We strive to assure that each of our guests stay is perfect and we will do everything possible to assure that we continue to improve everyday. We work very hard to provide the best service and accommodations that we can offer for all of our guests.  We hope that you can return to see all of the amazing enhancements once our interior and exterior property renovations are complete.   Your satisfaction is important to us and we will be using the feedback you gave us to implement improvements to ensure we offer a better experience for guests in the future.   I hope that you will consider staying with us again so that we can have another chance to provide you with a superior experience.   Sincerely,  Jerry & the Best Western Raffles Team

Summary: Clean rooms with very friendly staff. Great amenities.  Easy access to local attractions excellent local transit system. The building was dated but very well maintained and clean.  Very good value for money. I would definitely recommend the facility and would definitely stay with my family again. Thank you again for a great stay.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  We hope you will come back and see us again soon. We're so excited to hear that your family enjoyed your stay with us and we value your feedback. You are helping us deliver a superior experience for you and other guests in the future. We can't wait to see you again for your next visit.  Sincerely,  Jerry & the Best Western Raffles Team

Summary: The original listing didn’t list the extras that the room comes with. To our surprise the room had two individual restrooms and showers in the family suite. A lot of shops were within walking distance. It was also a nice walk to and from Disneyland. Great customer service! All team members were very kind & helpful.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  We're so excited to hear that your family enjoyed your stay with us in our Deluxe Family Suite. This is our most popular suite and is great for families. The two bathrooms come in handy when getting ready for an exciting day at the Theme Parks.   Your business is very important to us and we value your feedback. By telling us what you liked about your stay and how we can improve, you are helping us deliver a superior experience for you and other guests in the future. We hope you will come back and see us again soon.  Sincerely,  Jerry & the Best Western Raffles Team

Summary: I stayed at the Best Western Plus Raffles Inn and Suites for three nights for a Disneyland trip. Since we spend all day and night at Disney I don’t require much. I prefer a family suite for our teen boys, walking distance, and breakfast included. I fully expect to pay inflated prices when traveling to Disney, however I feel as though I paid entirely too much for our stay.   Pros:  1. The staff was incredibly friendly. They greeted us with a smile and had a first aid kit when we were in need of a late night bandaid. Additionally, when I called about other guests smoking (in front of a no-smoking sign) they quickly went to investigate. They were also helpful in shipping a forgotten pillow.   2. The breakfast was fine. It was a standard Best Western free breakfast. I never expect
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  I'm happy to hear that you enjoyed our staff. Our Team Members are always here to help in any way we can.  On behalf of our entire team, I would like to apologize for not exceeding your expectations.   We work very hard to provide the best service and accommodations that we can offer for all of our guests.  We're excited to complete our interior and exterior property renovation and hope that you can return to see all of the amazing enhancements.   Your satisfaction is important to us and we will be using the feedback you gave us to implement improvements to ensure we offer a better experience for guests in the future.   I hope that you will consider staying with us again so that we can have another chance to provide you with a superior experience.   Sincerely,  Jerry & the Best Western Raffles Team

Summary: This hotel exceeded my expectations.  The room was very spacious and was able to comfortably accommodate my family of 5.  Their breakfast each morning was delicious and just what we needed to start our day at the parks.  Close to the Toy Story lot and was easy to take the free shuttle there or walk.  With our kids the walking was a little too much so we did the shuttle.  The pool was nice and always clean.  The staff was very friendly and always helpful.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  It is our pleasure to be your to be your home away from home during your visit to the Disneyland Resort. We take pride in assuring that our hotel is always clean and comfortable, our breakfast is hot and tasty,  and our service is always above and beyond. Our pool and hot tub is relaxing after a long day at Disneyland or great to hang out at in between visits to the park. Please come back and see us again and give us another chance to wow you with our amenities and superior customer service.  Best,  Jerry and the Best Western Team

Summary: This location is amazing! Only a quick 20 minute walk to Disneyland. The staff here is incredibly kind, and this place by far has the best breakfast buffet! Pool is just the right size and rooms are extremely comfy.Will definitely be back!
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for saying that our staff is amazing and I'm sure I can speak for our staff in saying that we all feel the same about you. Amazing guests such as you are the reason why we enjoy being in hospitality. Thanks for staying with us and we can't wait to see you again for your next visit.    Best,  Jerry and the Best Western Team

Summary: Stayed in the largest room with 2 bathrooms. Rooms were outdated but comfortable . AC worked , rooms were cleaned everyday . Hot breakfast served was delish . Staff were kind . Kids loved the pool and hot tub . Location was great …
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  We're excited to hear that you enjoyed our Hot Breakfast Buffet and your stay in our Family Suite. Our pool and hot tub are always family favorites, so we are happy to see that your kids enjoyed them as well. Our staff is always searching for opportunities to bring a smile to our guests faces. I apologize that you did not receive a renovated room, however, we are working towards the completion of the remaining guest rooms and anticipate that they will be done very soon. We look forward to seeing you and your family for your next visit to the Disneyland Resort.   Best,  Jerry and the Best Western Team

Summary: The staff was top notch and the breakfast was great for a family of 5 before heading to Disneyland. We got an older room but it was good for the 4 nights we were there. I know there were renovated rooms, however, we just happen not to get one.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  We are delighted that our staff was able to provide the excellent Customer Service that we strive to provide for each and every guest. All of Team Members try their very best to ensure that all of our guests have a pleasant stay and create memorable experiences. I apologize for you not getting a renovated room, however, we are working towards the completion of the remaining guest rooms and will be done very soon. We look forward to seeing you and your family for your next visit to the Disneyland Resort.   Best,  Jerry and the Best Western Team

Summary: We always chose this hotel when coming to Disneyland. It’s conveniently located, clean, affordable, and the staff is welcoming. I like the separate bedroom which allows multiple people to share a room. Will definitely continue to stay here in the future!
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you so much for your feedback. We are delighted to hear that you have stayed with us multiple times and have always enjoyed your stay. We look forward to seeing you again the next time you visit the Disneyland Resort and will continue to assure that you always enjoy our fresh and clean guest rooms for each each and every visit. We appreciate your loyalty to our Best Western brand and hope to see you again to celebrate our new look and the Magic of Disney!    Best,  Jerry and the Best Western Team

Summary: I am surprised this hotel gets good reviews. It’s very run down, beds are uncomfortable, linens are cheap and thin, ac unit is extremely loud yet ineffective, even the mini fridge woke us up. I only slept 4 hours the first night. It was so uncomfortable that we checked out and rebooked ourselves at the courtyard Marriott across the street. Maybe my standards are too high… but I expected a “good neighbor” hotel to be better than this. If you’re literally just going to sleep here after long days at Disney and you don’t mind noise and an uncomfortable mattress then this place might work for you. The employee working at the front desk when we checked in was very nice.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you so much for your honest review. We appreciate you staying with us and we hope you return and allow us another chance to better serve you. Our apologies things weren't perfect but we are so excited for you to see the incredible transformation our guest rooms are getting as well as the exterior of the hotel.  We know you will enjoy the fresh and clean guest room upgrades along with vibrant colors, new furniture, new carpet. We appreciate your loyalty to our Best Western brand and hope to see you again to celebrate our new look and the Magic of Disney!    Best,  Jerry and the Best Western Team

Summary Heading: Great value for price; pack a sound machine
Summary: We got a great price on a 1 bedroom suite. The room was spacious, with plenty of storage, mini fridge (no freezer) and microwave. The layout was great for a family traveling with small children, who needed an earlier bedtime than the adults. However, there is very little soundproofing. We could hear people outside our room at all times of the day and night. Highly recommend bringing a sound machine.  The pool was heated and hot tub was decently warm. Breakfast was standard fair- eggs, sausage, yogurt, muffins, waffle irons, cereal.  We were there for a Disney trip. It was a quick 7 minute walk to the Toy Story Lot security line, or a 15-20 minute walk to the Harbor entrance.  Overall, tons of space for the price and easy access to Disney, but I’d probably bring my own breakfast
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your feedback. We're happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay during your Disneyland trip.  We are excited to complete our guest room renovations where we will be adding numerous upgrades including sound proofing materials. We hope you come back and see all of the enhancements that next time you visit the Disneyland Resort.   Best,  Jerry and the Best Western Team

Summary: The room was extremely old and run down. Floors were peeling up. Bathroom door wouldn’t shut because it was coming off the hinges. It needs to be updated badly. We knew going here that was a little bit older hotel but we just didn’t expect the room to be in that bad of shape.  Front desk was very nice and helpful and courteous. They were very friendly there. It was nice having the option for breakfast. Location was great. Short walk to toy story parking lot that took us to Disney every day
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your honest feedback about your visit.  I am happy to hear that our Front Desk Staff was pleasant and able to assist you throughout your stay. Our apologies regarding the room accommodations.  We appreciate you staying with us and hope you return to see our guest room improvements including new carpet, new furniture, new beds and more!        Best,  Jerry and the Best Western Raffles Team

Summary Heading: ok but Bring your own pillows and plan on eating elswhere
Summary: Typical Lipstick on a pig renovation. Cheaply done. try and get a room on the third floor as the floor creaking is insanely loud. Staff is amazing. they charge for parking which is the norm for the area.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank your for your honest feedback regarding your recent visit. I apologize that our breakfast was not enjoyable. We are constantly updating on our offerings to assure we have a variety of items to enjoy. I apologize for the noise you experienced during your stay with us. We are addressing this as we continue with our interior and exterior renovation. Our goal is to assure that each guest is content and happy while staying with us.  I hope you come back to see our guest room upgrades and hotel improvements.  Thank you for taking the time to start the new year with us!      Best,  Jerry and the Best Western Raffles Anaheim Team

Summary: We had a great stay. Room was a comfortable and large size for our family. Close to the Toy Story Parking Lot.  Breakfast was great especially compared to other options (during pandemic). Will definitely have on our list for future trips
Manager Response: Thanks for your feedback regarding your recent visit.  We are appreciate you complementing us on our Family Suite and great location.  We're also happy you enjoyed our Hot Breakfast Buffet. We hope to see you and your family again during your next trip to Disneyland. Thanks again for staying with us.

Summary Heading: Economical and Close to Disney Shuttle
Summary: Two night stay in a 2- bedroom suite w/ 4 adults and 3 children.    Cons:  Rooms are really only meant for sleeping as there is no communal area for take-out eating and lounging.    Carpeted floors were incredibly dirty (left the children's freshly showered feet grimey and disgusting).    Shower ceiling showed previous water damage (maybe mold?) that was attempted to be fixed.    Pillows were oddly shapped squares that were incredibly uncomfortable.  Room smelled musty and old. Had to go buy an air freshener and leave the windows open while we went to Disneyland.   Pros:  Value pricing  Close to Disneyland Parking Lot and Shuttle  Close to restaurants, bar, and Target.  EXCELLENT Customer Service.
Manager Response: Thanks for your honest feedback regarding your recent visit.  We are appreciate you complementing us on our great location and great value.  I hope you come back to see our guest room upgrades and hotel improvements.  Thank you for taking the time to start the new year with us!

Summary: dont think it qualifies as a suite, room was tiny. Said it holds 6...thats a stretch. Once the sofa couch was pulled out, there wasnt room between it and the bunkbeds to walk, family had to crawl over the sofa bed to use restroom etc. . Breakfast was identically the same every single day and there were bugs in the restroom.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your honest review about your recent visit.  I'm sorry the 2 bedroom suite wasn't to your liking but i'm pleased to say we have other suite options that I know you will enjoy as they offer more space for larger families.  It's our 2 bedroom 2 bathroom family suite that sleeps 8 gives our guests another bathroom, another tv, and another vanity area all to themselves.  I look forward to your return so you can try out this amazing room type on your next trip to Disney.

Summary: For the price we paid, I hoped for much more. The layout of the kids suite is awful. The bathroom is in the kids/bunk bed portion, and is impossible to use the toilet/sink/shower without waking up kids. Not ideal for a family! The extra space is nice. Breakfast is bland and simply put something in our tummies to start the day. The breakfast staff was quick to replace items and help where needed. The pool is not heated, to the sad dismay of my excited children. We ended up in an outdated room, where you can tell it has been cleaned, but still very worn and dirty. There was a serious lack of outlets, and the ones that were there were in very inconvenient places. (Some rooms are remodeled, I can’t speak to the quality of those). The rooms are not soundproof, and we were woken up
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us.  Our apologies things weren't perfect for your stay as we'd hoped.  We sure appreciate your kind words about our friendly staff and complimentary breakfast!  As we navigate our new normal of keeping our business open during covid, we appreciate your patience and understanding while we re-fresh our rooms.  We are excited for every guest to see our new look and we hope you give our hotel another try and see why it's so special!  Happy Holidays!

Summary Heading: Best price to save money for treats at Disneyland
Summary: Best price so you can save money for treats at Disneyland! Great service. Room was clean and updated. Breakfast is pretty darn good. They have the same items everyday but at least it is free and gets you going for the day. It is a little far to walk to Disneyland. But we either walked to the Toy Story parking lot and took the shuttle or called for a lyft. Both options very convenient and easy. We have stayed at this property several times. We will continue to stay. Beds are comfortable. Pretty quiet hotel. We really did enjoy our stay!
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your great feedback about your recent visit!  We sure appreciate you mentioning what a great value our hotel is and how convenient our location is for guests to enjoy all the resort has to offer.  The best compliment we can get from a guest is when they come back and return to the Hotel  Thank you!  Cant wait to see you again for 2022!

Summary: The check in/out process was fast and smooth. No lines at breakfast, there was a lot fresh made food, enough for everybody, coffees in cups to go, fruit, etc.  The rooms and bathroom are small, but with enough beds for everybody, they even provided a crib at no cost. The heater/AC works pretty good. We had 2 units in our 2 bedroom suite, so you can even have the bedrooms' at different temperatures..  We did about 20 minutes walking (with a double stroller) to Disney ticket entrance, very easy walk in the morning. We did took an uber at the end of the day, it was only about $9  The rooms are not fancy, it definitely needs an upgrade, but for the price, its worth it.   Very nice staff, no complains.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your great review and 5 star rating!  We sure enjoy celebrating the Holidays with our guests and we are glad you found the value and convenience of staying here!  It means a lot that you enjoyed all of our yummy breakfast items  and you had a quick check-in process so you could immediately start your Disney experience.  Thanks for the tips to future guests on how convenient it is to walk from here to the Theme Parks as well as other ways to get around.  We look forward to seeing you again so you can enjoy our room upgrades happening now!

Summary Heading: we will be going back.. soon!
Summary: Ver comfortable and cleanly room. Staff were excellent. The room was very spacious. Very close to Disneyland and shopping as well as dining. I would definitely recommend this Hotel and will be returning very soon.
Manager Response: Happy Holidays!  Thank you so much for staying with us to celebrate and enjoy the magic of Disney!  We sure appreciate you taking a moment to let us know you had a great stay.  We are so proud of this Hotel and I'm so glad you enjoyed the spacious rooms, and our great location.  I have shared your information with the staff so they can share in the excitement of being acknowledged for great service!  We look forward to seeing you back!

Summary: My family and I stayed December 4th through the 8th 2021. Is the room was clean and fairly spacious as there were 6 of us 5 adults 1 preteen. You have to call down daily to have your room made up due to covid restrictions unfortunately they is the they did miss our room one day. They offered a free hot breakfast starting at 6:30 AM we were only able to make this once as we were going to the parks at that time the rest of the time. The staff was friendly and efficient, when we arrived the refrigerator in our room was not operating I called the front dis all the front desk and they had someone there within 5 minutes, while he was there he noticed we were missing a remote and brought us a new one. All in all A good motel at a reasonable price close to Disneyland. Would stay again
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us!  We are thrilled you had a great time and you found the value our unique hotel offers.  We look forward to your return as we always enjoy seeing familiar faces returning to come back and relax and create more memories and enjoy Disney fun!  Happy Holidays!

Summary: We just spent 6 nights at this great hotel. We have a large family and it's hard to find an affordable hotel near the parks that sleeps 8.  Before we even got there Shawn was a huge help moving our reservation a day and making sure we got the same rate we originally booked at.The family suite was perfect for us. It was clean, spacious, modern and comfortable. The 2 bathrooms were a huge help trying to get 6 kids ready for bed. The breakfast room had plenty of seating and there was always plenty of food and variety.  I loved that they switched the breakfast out daily  so it wasn't always the same. The proximity to Disney parking made getting to the park super easy.  I think we have found our go to hotel when we visit.
Manager Response: WOW!  We couldn't get a better testimony from a guest if we tried!  This is wonderful Doug-thank you!   After staying with us 6 nights in the biggest suite we have, you are the perfect person to spread the word about what families can expect when they arrive here.  It was my pleasure to help you guys with reservation changes and to be able to start off your stay feeling relaxed and excited about being at the Disneyland Resort!   I'm so glad you enjoyed our renovated rooms and our breakfast room.  Simple touches that are important to us like switching up the food options in our breakfast room are so important and I'm thankful you noticed!  We cant wait to see you all back here for more memories!  Happy Holidays!

Summary: This is my second time staying at this hotel and love it. This time I stayed with my whole family(total of 8). Loved the space in the rooms, breakfast was a complete. And able to walk to disney parks.  Will be coming back
Manager Response: We cant wait for your return!  Happy Holidays and Thank you so much for this review.  when a guest returns here, it's the highest form of compliment we can get so-Thank you!  I'm so glad you enjoyed the family suite and all 8 of you enjoyed the Magic of Disney and the resort in general.  This makes our day each time a guest says they will come back!  Here's to more Disney magic in 2022!

Summary Heading: Friendly staff and clean rooms! Easy check in and out process as well.  Close to parks and stores! Easy access and parki
Summary: Friendly staff and clean rooms! Easy check in and out process as well.  Close to parks and stores! Easy access and parking. Left an item in the room and it was found my staff! They held it for me to go pick up.
Manager Response: Thank you for this great review!   We sure appreciate you visiting us during one of the most magical times of the year and for complementing us on the easy check-in and out process.  Providing our guests with great customer service is what we do and we sure appreciate you taking the time to mention it!   l look forward to you coming back to see us and to enjoy the Magic of Disney!

Summary Heading: No security and not clean rooms
Summary: No security we had a random guy come in property knocking on every door and windows, yelling going up and down ladders crazy, no police. Room floors were very dirty walking bare foot would live your feet black.
Manager Response: Happy Holidays and thank you for your honest feedback about your visit.  Our apologies some unexpected things happened while you were here.   I'm so glad to know this matter was handled quickly and safely.  We sure appreciate you staying with us and hope you return to see our guest room improvements including new carpet, new furniture, new beds and more!

Summary: Very nice clean breakfast was great and there’s an art bus stop right in front great location would definitely use again.  Breakfast was nice they had several different options We traveled with a family of six the room was a great option two bathrooms two queen beds bunk beds and a pull out couch we fit very nicely
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your great review about our breakfast!  We sure appreciate it and look forward to you coming back to enjoy our hotel amenities! Thank you for complementing us on our hot breakfast and our spacious suite!   It means so much to us that you took time out of your busy schedule to let us know you had a great time!  Happy Holidays and we look forward to seeing you back!

Summary: Excellent location and price. Second time this year the family books this hotel. The parking is good. Breakfast was a great morning starter. Staff from the front desk to the breakfast area were great.
Manager Response: Happy Holidays and thank you for this great review!  We sure appreciate you visiting us during one of the most magical times of the year and l look forward to you coming back every time your family needs some Disney fun!  Thank you for being a return guest.  It means everything to us and it's our highest compliment from a guest!!

Summary: I confirmed there would be shuttle service to Disney as I am disabled. Never was I told it is the OC public transportation. Waited for the ART bus at the bus stop while some guy slept on the bench. Out of 4 rides, 2 were an hr or more late & 1 quit operating, forcing me to walk 1 mile at midnight with a baby. Hotel and staff were great! Clean rooms, excellent customer service. Just wish they were forthcoming about the shuttle. That was a deciding factor for me & would have been helpful to know it wasn't a door to gate van service.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for staying with us and we appreciate your kind words about our great service and clean rooms!  I'm so sorry there was some confusion with the shuttle service going to and from Disneyland . I know the resort shuttle company has been doing their very best to navigate all guests from our Hotels to and from the Disneyland Theme Parks safely and as efficient as possible.    We look forward to your return!

Summary Heading: Not our best experience at BW
Summary: We have stayed at this property before, but this experience was far from meeting BW standards. Upon check-in we should’ve been told the property was under construction. We were never notified. I get it’s a tough time to get staff but we were told upon check-in if we needed housekeeping to call the front desk before 0830 and we could get service. I called front desk informed  me that they were short staffed and I could at least get trash emptied and new towels. Neither of those things occurred. I went down and got my own towels and trash liners. I had to leave towels and trash outside my room. If this was the intended Protocol guest need to be notified. I would’ve like to have had my room cleaned at least once during a 5 night stay. The breakfast is very limited get there at 0630
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us.  Our apologies things weren't perfect for your stay as we'd hoped.  As we navigate our new normal of keeping our business open during covid, we appreciate your patience and understanding.  We certainly hope you give our hotel another try and see why it's so special!

Summary: This best western was great. The staff was very helpful.  The rooms were extremely clean. The breakfast had a large variety to choose from. The hot tub and pool were great. Disneyland is in walking distance and there is also a bus stop right in front of you use the ART shuttle system.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your great review!  We sure appreciate it and look forward to you coming back to enjoy our great location again!  Thank you for commenting on our yummy breakfast and our heated pool and hot tub!  I'm so glad you took a moment to enjoy it!  Looking forward to seeing you back!

Summary Heading: Flies in room and musky odor
Summary: Upon arrival i smelt a bad musky smell and I found 5 flies in bathroom area so I killed them thinking no big deal. We left the room for a couple of hours and came back to find over 30 flies all over the room. I called front desk to complain and they sent a maintenance person to come check it out, he came with a bottle of raid which I told him don’t spray since I have kids in the room with me. Front desk was able to move me in to another room which was way better but I had to move all our luggage’s and items in the middle of the night. I would not stay again at this hotel or recommend. I am very upset and disappointed with this hotel.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for staying with us during the holidays!  Our apologies for not exceeding your expectations.  Your satisfaction is important to us and I'm so glad we were able to immediately move you to a room that you could be comfortable in.  We will be using the feedback you gave us to implement improvements to ensure we offer a better experience for every guest as we navigate thru covid.  guests in the future. I hope that you will consider staying with us again so that we can have another chance to provide you with a superior experience.

Summary: The hotel was very close to Disneyland like a 20 minute walk . But a shuttle picks you up right in front of hotel . The hotel was nice beds were comfortable . The breakfast was very good just wish they had bacon and potatoes and maybe a sugar free yogurt. But it was good waffles eggs sausage different breads and cereal and coffee juices it was good .. the pool is heated which the kids  loved . The staff was very helpful and nice . The manager was awesome very nice . Definitely will stay here again
Manager Response: Wow!  This review made my day!  It's always such a treat to get to know the families staying here on a personal level and helping you all create special memories!   It means so much that you enjoyed the value of our location and our yummy breakfast.   What I love most about your review is this hotel has now become your "home away from home" anytime you visit Walt Disney's Original Theme Park!   Thanks for complementing our team!

Summary: My husband and I had 4 kids with us. We stayed in the 2 bedroom suite and had plenty of room. The kids really enjoyed the pool and hot tub. The breakfast was fantastic as well and with the hours open they could straggle in when they woke up instead of rushing to get something.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your five star rating about your stay in our spacious rooms! We sure appreciate the kind words about our breakfast and pool and Jacuzzi.  We look forward to seeing you back at the Happiest Place On Earth!

Summary: Bathroom had no fan and was tiny.  It was also very dirty and their were bugs!  Beds were not comfortable and continental breakfast was not available, instead we received a bag of frozen burritos and a box of orange juice.  Best part of this was the orange juice tasted good.  Staff was accommodating and refunded our money so we could move motels.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your honest review and your 1 out of 5 star rating. We appreciate you staying with us and we apologize things weren't perfect with your stay.  We are so excited for every guest to enjoy the re-opening of our breakfast room in September!  We know everyone loves Best Western Waffles, eggs and breakfast potatoes just to name a few items and we are getting ready!  We are also transforming our guest rooms as well and hope you come back and  celebrate our new look and the Magic of Disney!

Summary: Our stay was nice. Staff was extremely friendly and helpful. Room was very clean just a little outdated. But worth the price. Nice location to Disney and lots of places to eat within walking distance. Would definitely stay here again worth the family.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your five star rating about your stay in our spacious rooms! We sure appreciate the kind words about our staff and great service!  That makes us so proud!   We love to hear from our guests that they enjoyed the resort and all of the great places to walk to and  experience just minutes from our Hotel.  We look forward to seeing you back at Walt Disney's Original Theme Park!

Summary: A whole bunch of the hotel was under renovation. Reading the previous reviews, their breakfast room was still under renovation. Seems the hotel has no interest in bringing it back. Rooms were nice, elevator needed some work… very run down. Very limited parking so you better pray you get a spot. FYI: bring your own pillow. The pillows at the hotel are subpar at best
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your honest 3 star rating! It helps us so much when we receive guest feedback and we are so excited for you all to see our new breakfast room and guest rooms!
