Even during the midst of covid 2020, our Hotel remained committed to slowly and carefully get  our rooms refreshed and clean to welcome you back.       We look forward to you staying with us every time you visit the Happiest Place On Earth!

Summary Heading: Our room was perfect for my family of 7. My next trip, I am asking for the exact same room!
Summary: There was enough towels for all 7 of us. Two bathrooms in our room was monumental, it saved so much time. The room was overly spacious and comfortable. Looking forward to our next stay! The hotel manager Shawn was great, she understands Customer Service.
Manager Response: Wow!  This review made my day!  It's always such a treat to get to know the families staying here on a personal level and helping you all create special memories!   It means so much that you enjoyed the value of our unique suites with 2 bathrooms.   What I love most about your review is this hotel has now become your "home away from home" anytime you visit Walt Disney's Original Theme Park!  Cant wait to welcome you all back again!!

Summary: I decided to rent a room with a pool for my granddaughters birthday. She loves to swim however nobody slept the first night because the noise was so bad from upstairs occupants which lasted late and started again very early. We did complain that nigh6 and next morning. The floors and rugs were filthy and there was nobody to clean them. I purchased a mop and cleaned myself. We didn't even sleep there 2nd night because we needed sleep, we went home early.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your honest feedback about your recent visit.  I apologize things weren't perfect with regard to the guest room and the noise from other excited guests.  After being closed for more than a year during the covid crisis, we are slowly working our way back and appreciate you staying here.  We are thrilled to be refreshing all rooms with new carpet, furnishings and more!  We would love for you to see the overall value in this Hotels spacious 2 bedroom suites and great service.  We hope you come back and enjoy the Magic of the Disneyland Resort!

Summary Heading: good amount of beds for good price
Summary: Overall:  I would stay here again, but I would look for other places first and have this as a good stand by option.    Other info: There is a $15 per day parking fee that was not listed.  This was fine but should be listed. They have 1 ice machine which is on the second floor for A LOT of rooms.  The ice machine gets empty really fast. Close to everything but requires a bit of walking.  Many stores just down the block (long block).  Close to Disneyland but just far enough to not like it after a tiring day.  It's about a 20 minute walk. Did not have the hot breakfast back yet.  It was a togo back with water, fruit, chewy bar and a bottle water.  Pros: I primarily choose this option due to the bed spacing.  We were trying to fit 5 people and my kids were old enough to want their
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your honest feedback about your recent visit.  That was some great information about your experience and we sure hope you allow us to better serve you so that your next visit will be amazing for the entire family!  I'm so glad you enjoyed the spacious suite and I apologize things weren't perfect with regard to the guest room.  After being closed for more than a year during the covid crisis, we certainly hope you will return during the holidays to see our newly renovated guest rooms including new bathrooms with modern accent tile, and a brand new breakfast room for you to feel safe, and enjoy!  We want you to see the overall value in this Hotel and we look forward to providing you with an amazing experience.

Summary: Floor was very dirty and there was duct tape in the shower.  Part of the shower curtain was cut off with scissors.  There was no soap dish in the shower or towel bars near the sinks.  Towels did not smell fresh.  Decor was dark and outdated.  Very disappointing for a Best Western.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your honest feedback about your recent visit.  After being closed for more than a year, we along with so many other businesses are trying to navigate our "new " normal and proudly re-open our doors to welcome guests back!  My apologies things weren't perfect for you.  We certainly hope you will return during the holidays to see our newly renovated guest rooms including brand new lamps with modern lamp shades, new carpet, new furniture, new bathrooms with modern accent tile, new guest room Disney artwork and so much more!  We look forward to providing you with an amazing experience in the future.

Summary: I highly recommend this hotel for anyone with family looking for a safe spacious room at a reasonable price. The staff is very helpful and friendly. I wouldn’t hesitate to stay there again in my next visit.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your five star rating about your stay in our spacious rooms! We sure appreciate the kind words about our staff!   We cant wait to see you back at the Happiest Place On Earth!

Summary: We needed a hotel room to be able to house my family with having a bit of privacy without having to spend a lot. Once we found this hotel for the price and with the amenities we wanted we booked! I couldn't have asked for a better room. Each area was very spacious and we were able to relax. My favorite was the shower head since I am very tall, can't get that everywhere.
Manager Response: This is a great review!  Thanks so much for your 5 star rating along with your great feedback!  It means so much to us that you took a moment to acknowledge our amazing value and spacious guest rooms.  We sure appreciate you and look forward to you staying with us again every time you visit the Happiest Place On Earth!  P.S.  I'm so glad you enjoyed the relaxing shower head!

Summary Heading: Would be perfect without parking fee
Summary: Everything is acceptable except the parking fee. The kid’s room in family suite needs more lighting, the sofa bed is too soft. Very good location  We would probably return here for our next trips or recommend to others if BW won’t charge for the parking
Manager Response: Wow!  Thanks so much for your 4 star rating! It means so much to us that you took a moment to let us know you enjoy staying in our spacious family suites with 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms!  We look forward to you coming back for more Disney magic!

Summary: Convenient  location, close to Disney. Free upgraded room. The room was not cleaned very well with sticky counters, and dusty ledges. Slow draining tub and sink, dated decor. Friendly staff. Missing linens. If you’re ok to ask for these things to be fixed, would be fine. But my family just dealt with it, it was only one night.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your honest 3 star rating! It means so much to us that you took a moment to acknowledge our great location.   We apologize your visit wasn't perfect for you as we always strive for that but we sure are working hard during this covid crisis to provide and safe, clean and friendly property for you all to enjoy!  We hope you will allow us a chance to better serve you and comeback to enjoy all of the Hotel upgrades we are doing!  We look forward to you staying with us every time you visit the Happiest Place On Earth!

Summary: We book the room because it had bunk beds for our 2 boys in a separate room with a door between our room. Can’t bear it for the price I paid. Definitely will book again for our next trip to Disneyland
Manager Response: Wow!  Thanks so much for your 5 star rating! It means so much to us that you took a moment to acknowledge our amazing guest rooms and a great stay!  We sure appreciate you and look forward to you staying with us again every time you visit the Happiest Place On Earth!

Summary: The hotel was clean and roomy. The young man who checked us in was very helpful and friendly.  He made our experience start off very happy and was a welcome addition to our stay. I wish I knew his name to give him proper credit!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and complementing us on our clean and comfy rooms!  We certainly appreciate you taking a moment to acknowledge our staff and we look forward to your return in the future!

Summary: Needed to get away so found this place and upon arrival the manager checked us in and he was awesome great place to stay and great customer service very clean rooms property just an overall place to be
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and complementing us on our great customer service!  ! We value your feedback and we are so glad you stayed here to relax and getaway!   We certainly appreciate your business during the covid-19 crisis and we look forward to your return in the future!

Summary: We arrived a little early and were able to check in, front desk staff were friendly and efficient, however we were given room keys written On our keys was the wrong room number so they didn’t work, got the correct room number, entered room it was very dark, lamp shades were  dingy and out dated, room smelled of mildew, although clean, we booked a kids room with a queen bed and bunk beds. The bed was not a queen but a double and the bunk bed ladder was wobbly. Once entered the room and closed door behind us, we forgot something in the car and when exiting the room the door handle came off and we noticed the latched lock was broken. I immediately went to the front desk and they gave us a different room. This room was much better, although same  lamp shades and the bed was a king.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your honest feedback about your recent visit.  After being closed for more than a year, we along with so many other businesses are trying to navigate our "new " normal and proudly re-open our doors to welcome guests back!  My apologies things weren't perfect for you.  We certainly hope you will return during the holidays to see our newly renovated guest rooms including brand new lamps with modern lamp shades, new carpet, new furniture, new bathrooms with modern accent tile, new guest room Disney artwork and so much more!  We look forward to providing you with an amazing experience in the future.

Summary: The manager there is absolutely an exceptional person he goes above and beyond to make you feel as if you're welcomed there. The rest of his staff are also extremely nice people. It's very quiet there very clean.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your 5 star rating! It means so much to us that you took a moment to acknowledge our great service!  We sure appreciate you and look forward to you staying with us again while you visit the Happiest Place On Earth!

Summary: The hotel and room were clean, room was spacious, quiet, everything worked, good location (right across the street from Disney), employees were great! Grab and go breakfast was a little funky but blame that on Rona. Great experience!
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your 5 star rating! We sure appreciate you and the kind words about your visit!  It means alot to us as we've been shut down for the last year and we are so grateful you chose this Hotel to visit and to be one of our first guests we've welcomed back!  We cant wait to see you back at the Happiest Place On Earth!

Summary: Some of the family members hadn't been at Disney so we decided to go for two days, we chose stay at best western plus raffles in & suites, because it's 2 blocks away from Disney and staying at this place was awesome.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your 5 star rating! We are so glad you were happy with your visit and you enjoyed Disney!    Thank you for staying with us while visiting Walt Disney's Original Theme Park!

Summary: We booked a 2 room suite for our family of 6 everyone loved their time here. We came back to our room having been cleaned and tidied to a high standard. She even took the time to playfully place our children stuffed animals around their bunk bed and our kids loved it! Location was just a little too far from Disneyland for our younger kids to walk but we bought our bus tickets from the front office and there is a bus stop just outside their location. It takes about 5 minutes to get to Disneyland and about 10 minutes to get back Front desk was polite and helpful. Breakfast had good options and was free. My kids loved that they had a large TV in one part of the breakfast area playing Disney Jr. Shows. Kids had a good time. Would definitely stay again!
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your 5 star rating! We are so glad you were happy with your visit and you enjoyed our amazing bunk bed suites!  We sure appreciate you complementing our front desk team and our housekeeping team on their great service.  Our staff works hard to make sure every guest feels welcomed!  Thank you for staying with us while visiting Walt Disney's Original Theme Park!

Summary: Great location even walking distance to Disney  They have a heated pool so bring your swim suit!! AND hot breakfast included.. the room was clean and big.  We had a fridge and microwave... the place was quiet and a great value for the price
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your 5 star rating and great feedback about the heated pool and spa!  We are so glad you were happy with your visit and we hope you return to stay in one of our spacious brand newly renovated guest rooms!  I'm so glad you enjoyed our room amenities  such as frig and microwave!  We want to make sure every guest feels welcomed and that you have all the comforts of home while you're here.  Thank you for acknowledging us on our friendly service as its our highest compliment we can receive from a guest.  Thank you for staying with us while visiting Walt Disney's Original Theme Park!

Summary: Bunk beds were great for older kids who don’t want to share a bed. Breakfast was really good, lots of options and plenty of food. Beds were comfortable and rooms were clean. Pool was a great place to relax between trips to Disneyland. Staff was so accommodating!
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your 5 star rating! We are so glad you were happy with your visit and our great suites!   Our staff works hard to make sure every guest feels welcomed and special and we thank you for complementing us on our service. Thank you for staying with us while visiting Walt Disney's Original Theme Park!

Summary: 1 mile from the parks and downtown Disney. Excellent breakfast choices for even a picky 6 year old. Pool was clean and HEATED.... my daughter's favorite amenity! Service was excellent!! Definitely recommend staying here!
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your "awesome" review!  We are so glad you stayed with us and we got the approval from a very smart 6 year old that he loved our breakfast!  That's what we love to hear and we are looking forward to your return!  Yes, the pool is heated and feels amazing after along day at Disneyland!  We are looking forward to seeing you back relaxing here and creating great family memories while at the Happiest Place On Earth!

Summary Heading: Good value for the money paid
Summary: Since we knew all we would be doing was sleeping and grabbing breakfast before being gone from 7am to 11pm, this was a great hotel.  We parked for $15 and walked the 5 mins to the Disney parking lot where we grabbed the free shuttle to the front gates.  This was very convenient as they ran all the time between 6am and midnight.  Breakfast was very good although always busy and extremely tight.  Weekends full of kids.  Parking was difficult at times.  They don't seem to restrict numbers to what space they have so we were frequently doubleparked or in spaces that didn't exist.  We found the room sticky on doors, on top of furniture.  Otherwise, friendly staff, comfortable beds.  Loved that the double sinks were sep from shower and toilet.  Meant no one had to wait.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your 3 star rating and great feedback about the guest room and breakfast.  We are so excited to read this review as we love our groups!  Thank you for complementing our friendly staff and for your patience when our Hotel is sold out and has a lot of activity as we celebrate all the of the new things happening at Disney this year!  We look forward to you coming back to stay with us as you enjoy more Disney magic!

Summary Heading: Great stay at BW Raffles Inn & Suites
Summary: We were happy overall with this hotel, though it was further to Disneyland that we would have liked (About a 25 minute walk - Next time we will book closer to the park.) It is on the ART shuttle so it was super convenient to hop on the bus, though the bus wasn't always there every 20 minutes as advertised. Our room was dated but another room we saw had been nicely updated. The staff are very friendly and overall we had a great experience.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your 4 star rating! We are so glad you were happy with your visit and we hope you return to stay in one of our spacious brand new guest rooms!  Our staff works hard to make sure every guest feels welcomed and special and we thank you for complementing us on our service.  Thank you for staying with us while visiting Walt Disney's Original Theme Park!

Summary: Enjoyed our stay here in the larger suite room with my family. Staff is super friendly and very accommodating. The walk to Disneyland is about a mile but we had children as young as 3 that walked it every day with little complaint and no troubles. Breakfast is a nice full breakfast with some variety. My kids really enjoyed breakfast, I got a little bored with it after a few days as nothing really changes, but they do have some great options for a "free" breakfast. Room was clean with fridge and microwave making other quick meals easy. No troubles during our 9 night stay here.
Manager Response: What a fantastic review! thank you so much for taking the time to tell us how much you loved you stay in our most popular room type-our family suite!  I'm thrilled we met and exceeded your expectations! it means so much! We appreciate your comments about our breakfast and the great room amenities such as frig and microwave.  We look forward to you returning here for years to come and create some great memories.

Summary: Great stay for 8 nights. So close for Disney parks. Walk to the Toy Story parking lot and get the shuttle bus to the gates for free. Breakfast room could get crowded, there seemed to be cheerleading groups in there most morning running amok. The breakfast choices were good though, my kids loved the waffle maker.  Slept so well. Room was good and very quiet on 3rd floor. Air con was great. Not sure what the valet parker does as you self park. He always had his head down in his phone.
Manager Response: What a great vacation-8 nights!!!   Wow.  Thanks so much for your kind words about our Hotel and our great location!  I'm so glad your kids enjoyed our waffle maker machines!!  We appreciate your comments about our relaxing guest rooms and that you slept so well on the 3rd floor.  Thank you for the feedback about our valet, we will make sure we share that with company's Owner.  We look forward to you returning here for years to come and create some great memories.

Summary Heading: Good stay for Disney for three days
Summary: Nice hotel for us visiting Disney. Bus stop right outside which collects you for Disney and takes you straight into the park. Very convenient. Three of us (husband, 9 year old and myself) slept well but that might have been down to the fact that we were so tired about being at Disney. Room was clean and modern. No USB which was a shame as essential almost for us travellers. Coffee machine, microwave, fridge and chest of drawers, TV, hairdryer and good shower. Room was small but adequate for our needs and we hardly spent any time in it as we were too busy at Disney. There are shops and restaurants just outside the hotel so plenty to do. Breakfast was one of the best for the hotels we had stayed in. Lots of variety and the staff did well to keep the place tidy and clean. Got very
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your kind words about our Hotel and our great location! We appreciate your loyalty to our Best Western brand and we thank you for taking the time to tell us how much you enjoyed our guest rooms and great location!  We look forward to you returning here for years to come and create some great memories.

Summary: The space was nice for larger families but it needs a lot of updating on the interiors. Beds were comfortable but the pull out sofa beds were not for adults at least. The kids slept fine. Service was good.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your honest review and your 2 out of 5 star rating. We sure appreciate you staying with us and we hope you return and allow us another chance to better serve you. Our apologies things weren't perfect but we are so excited for you to see the incredible transformation our guest rooms are getting as well as the exterior of the hotel.  We know you will enjoy the fresh and clean guest room upgrades along with vibrant colors, new furniture, new carpet, and an amazing firework viewing area at the front of the hotel!  We appreciate your loyalty to our Best Western brand and hope to see you again to celebrate our new look and the Magic of Disney!

Summary: I’m a fan of Best Westerns so I thought this visit I’d give Raffles a try. Nice staff, clean room, comfy bed and a decent breakfast with hot and cold options.  My only grievances were that there was no safe and periodically my fridge made a sound like a DVD player trying to load an incompatible disk.  It was also about a block further from the park as I would have liked. The morning stroll was a fine 17 min walk but at the end of the day... not so much.  I discovered you can take the Toy Story bus to the lot but you still have to walk across the lot. It saved a bit of walking but added another 5 min overall.  If you have either the stamina or the time to take the ART Transit, this is a perfectly fine hotel.  And the price was reasonable.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your 4 star rating! We sure appreciate your comments about our friendly staff, great breakfast and our clean rooms. We certainly hope you stay here with us each time your travels bring you back to the Disneyland Resort!  Looking forward to seeing you back at the Happiest Place On Earth!

Summary Heading: Great room, good location, great breakfast
Summary: My family stayed in a corner room, and the room was very big.  The breakfast was great, with a good variety of things that my kids loved.  You have to pay for parking, but this is common with all hotels in this area. The kids also enjoyed the pool and hot tub.
Manager Response: We love our corner rooms!!  Thanks so much for your kind words about our Hotel and our great location! We appreciate your loyalty to our Best Western brand and we thank you for taking the time to tell us how you enjoyed our pool and hot tub.  We look forward to you returning here for years to come and create some great memories.

Summary Heading: Perfectly great lower cost option when easy access to convention center
Summary: This hotel met and exceeded my expectations.  It was considerably less than other suite (two bedroom) options I looked into but it did not lack in any areas.  The room was clean and smelled good.  The breakfast was perfectly good and conventiently located.  There were many options so I did not have to eat the same thing for three mornings.  Everything around the hotel was easy to get to by foot.  No complaints at all.
Manager Response: What a fantastic review!  thank you so much for taking the time to tell us hoe much you loved you stay and that we met and exceeded your expectations!  it means so much!  We appreciate your loyalty to our band and we thank you for taking the time to tell us how you enjoyed our spacious suites and great breakfast!  I appreciate you mentioning the breakfast in your review. We look forward to you returning here for years to come and create some great memories.

Summary: The building is older which means you'll hear every noise someone makes, car doors shutting, people walking by or above your room, people talking next door to your room, cleaning staff knocking on doors, the list goes on. Beds are also small and the pillows are 4 squares, they looked for like decorative ones than bed.  We arrived before our check-in which was fine because the front desk allowed us to leave our bags and said they'd be in our rooms once we came back. We arrived back tot he hotel around 1am and when going to the front desk there wasn't anyone there. About a minute later a gentleman came running in and scrambled to take his sweatshirt off. He gave us our room key and when getting to the room the bags were not there.  I called the front desk twice and got no answer.
Manager Response: We always appreciate when guests provide honest feedback about their experience. I hope you will return to this hotel and allow us another opportunity to show off our friendly staff, upgraded rooms and hotel improvements. Our apologies about things no being perfect for your visit.  It's always our hope that every guest will have a great time while visiting the resort and create some great memories while here.  We have shared your feedback with the entire team and we are hopeful now that we've spoken with you personally and cleared up some confusion about your initial visit that you will return for a "re-do"!  We are thrilled for you to enjoy new beds, new furniture, new mattresses, new Disney artwork, new bathrooms with modern accent tile, and much more! We are excited to sprinkle pixie dust throughout our Hotel and bring you better value and more comfort! We hope you return for more Disney magic!

Summary: We stayed at this hotel on a recent trip to Anaheim mainly as it’s close to Disneyland   We had issues when we booked (using Agoda) as we paid for a 2 bedroom but got assigned a family room which wasn’t appropriate, however as this was Agoda fault the hotel would not allow us to swap rooms, even though we PAID for the 2 bedroom. I found this very rude, we didn’t ask to cancel (no cancellations allowed). We followed up the coating with Agoda. Apart from that .........  The location is perfect, you can walk the few blocks to the parks or get a bus that was around $6 each per day and you could come and go as much as you like.   The hotel itself is hit and miss, some things were nice, other things were bad   The rooms were fine, nothing too fancy - we initially were in a family/kids
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your honest 3 out of 5 star rating. We sure appreciate you staying with us and we hope you return and allow us another chance to better serve you. Our apologies things weren't perfect with regard to your booking thru Agoda.  We sure enjoyed your feedback about our great location and friendly staff.  We appreciate your loyalty to our Best Western brand.

Summary: This hotel really needs an upgrade. It is okay offers a mediocre breakfast that suffices but is not very tasty. Really close to Disney Land and Convention Center. Staff are friendly, room is clean but does have stains on the rug and bed spread. For the money, not sure that there are maybe better options.
Manager Response: Thanks for your honest 3 star rating. Our apologies your visit wasn't perfect as we'd hoped.  While I'm thrilled you enjoyed our great location to the Disneyland theme Parks and the Anaheim Convention Center, I want you to know you can look forward to some pretty amazing upgrades coming to each guest room!  We are currently installing brand new furniture, new beds, new carpet, new bathrooms with modern accent tile, and new Disney artwork. For our breakfast room expansion we are proud to offer our guests a new waffle station, comfortable and modern seating inside our completely renovated breakfast room along with a newly built outdoor seating area! We would love for you to experience it. We want every guest to see the value in our Hotel and we sure appreciate you staying with us. l look forward to seeing you back at our Hotel while visiting the Happiest Place On Earth!

Summary: Clean rooms, large breakfast area, awesome pool and hottub. Everyone was friendly and the housekeeping staff were sweet and I felt went the extra mile. I would recommend this hotel to everyone. Great value.
Manager Response: What a wonderful review! Thank you so much for the 5 stars!  We appreciate you taking the time to compliment  our friendly staff and for mentioning our great housekeeping team that always goes the extra mile!  We look forward to you returning here for years to come and spreading the word about our Hotel!  We love our return guests and look forward to you coming back to stay with us while visiting the Home of Walt Disney's Original Theme Park!

Summary: I got an awesome deal staying here in a two room suite that sleeps 6. This was perfect for my family of 5. The first room was for the parents and the second for the kids with a door to separate. Each room had AC and TV. This location has free breakfast and WiFi. I was not there to visit Disneyland like everyone else, but Disneyland was walking distance at a block and half away. This location is almost directly across the main entrance for the Anaheim Convention Center, definitely walking distance as well as several restaurants. Overall this place is really affordable for families. the only downside I had was the mattress for the Queen bed my Wife and I slept on, it dipped in the middle so it made for a uncomfortable sleep. the kids all said their beds were fine though.
Manager Response: Happy New Year!  Thank you so much for your kind words about our Hotel and our great location!  We appreciate your loyalty to our band and we thank you for taking the time to tell us how you enjoyed our complimentary Wi-Fi, and our spacious suite!  Our location is great for visiting the Disney Theme Parks and the Anaheim Convention Center and I appreciate you mentioning that in your review. We look forward to you returning here for years to come and create some great memories.

Summary: Great stay. A little dated but clean and excellent value. Suite with two rooms was almost half price of room with two queens closer to the park. Bus pass was excellent with great service and bus stop was right in front of hotel.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your 5 star rating! We are so glad you were happy with your visit and we look forward to your return! Our staff works hard to make sure every guest feels welcomed and special and we thank you for complementing our spacious suites.  We want you to have a great stay while visiting the home of Walt Disney's Original Theme Park! Looking forward to seeing you at the Happiest Place On Earth!

Summary Heading: great place to stay with your family
Summary: breakfast was good and plentiful - rooms were large and clean - two bathrooms was a godsend - only critique is I wish it were closer to Disney because the shuttle was a pain.  Front office was especially kind and considerate.  The hot tub was HOT
Manager Response: Happy New Year!  I'm so glad you enjoyed your visit and enjoyed our spacious 2 bedroom Suites along with the best part of the room...the 2 bathrooms!!  Thank you for complementing our hot breakfast buffet and our HOT tub!  We want to make sure you can sit back, relax and enjoy your time here enjoying all of our Hotel amenities.  We look forward to your return.   Looking forward to you creating more magic at the Happiest Place On Earth!

Summary Heading: Good Disney hotel on a budget
Summary: This is a good hotel option if you're doing Disneyland on a budget - especially with multiple kids.   We had three kids, two adults and the room with the separate bedroom with bunk beds worked perfectly.   Included breakfast was good with plenty of options: Baked goods, breakfast sandwiches, waffles, fruit, yoghurt, granola, juices etc.   Staff were friendly and helpful.  Free shuttle bus one block down inside the large Toy Story parking lot.   Average pool but it's open late which is nice for a quick cool off swim after a long day at Disneyland.  Basic gym but can manage a quick workout in it.  Not located super close to Disneyland but easily accessible with the shuttle from Toy Story Lot.   We booked this hotel for the whole week and then splurged on two nights at the
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your 4 star rating! I love this review as you list some great tips and feedback for future guests on how convenient this Hotel location is!     Thank you for complementing our hot breakfast buffet and the great value families can enjoy while relaxing in our spacious 2 bedroom suites.  We love our return guests and cant wait to see you back! Looking forward to you creating more magic at the Happiest Place On Earth!

Summary: We like to stay here because it is close to Disneyland but away from the crowds across the street from Disneyland. The price is good and the staff are very friendly. The rooms are a nice size and clean,
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your 4 star rating! Please come back and join us for more Disney magic and to see our amazing guest room upgrades! Thanks so much for complementing us on our great location, and our great value.  We love our return guests and cant wait to see you back! Looking forward to seeing you at the Happiest Place On Earth!

Summary: We weren't informed of parking costs and there wasn't any other option to park our car, the beds were so uncomfortable as were the pillows the noise was terrible. They put a smoking spot right next to the kids suites so we smelled smoke all night there was people smoking weed constantly and would come through the air conditioner it was absolutely terrible and we will not be back the price for 3 night was almost $1,000.00. I looked for another hotel but there wasn't any able to accommodate my family of 6. We travel alot and we wanted this to be a magical family trip to Disneyland and are so disappointed.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your honest review and rating. Our apologies your stay wasn't perfect as we expect each guest to have a great time filled with Disney memories while visiting southern California!  It's important to us that every web site our guests use to book a room here clearly outline all costs associated with your visit including the parking fees.  We want it to be easy to locate on the web site so you have a clear understanding, as we do not engage inn hidden fees.  We are proud to be part of the Best Western brand as they're honest and families can trust and rely on us for upfront costs and information.  Our goal is to get a perfect 5 star rating from every guest.  We have 5 different room types here and I hope you return to try another option that might better suit your family.  We would love to have you back and help us celebrate the exciting changes happening over here as we upgrade our guest rooms with items such as new beds, new carpet, sound proof windows, new bathrooms, new furniture, new Disney artwork along with a beautiful upgrade to the Hotel Exterior!   We wish you a Happy New Year!

Summary: This hotel had the thinnest walls I have ever experienced in a hotel. We could hear the people above us, next to us, and everyone walking in front of our room. I didn't sleep at all! If the baby nextdoor wasn't crying, someone was stomping upstairs,  or at 5am suitcases were rolling past the window and children were hollering at each other.  Additionally,  I booked a "2 bedroom suite" but upon entering the room I notice there is a bed as soon as I open the door. I'm thinking I am getting 2 full bedrooms.  No! We got one bed in the common area, and one "bedroom" with the bathroom inside. My experience did not meet my expectations.  I was extremely disappointed.  The room was old, the bunk beds were sticky on the rails. I will not be booking at this hotel anytime in he future.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your honest 1 star rating. Our apologies about the noise issue.  We want every guest to relax and enjoy the magic of Disney while visiting.  We are excited to welcome you back to show you what a great Hotel this is!  We are doing some amazing  hotel upgrades to the guest rooms, breakfast area and overall look and feel of the Hotel.  We are currently installing brand new furniture, new beds, new bathrooms with modern accent tile, new Disney artwork.  For our breakfast room expansion we are proud to offer our guests a new waffle station, comfortable and  modern seating inside our completely renovated breakfast room along with a newly built outdoor seating area! We would love for you to experience it. We want every guest to see the value in our Hotel and we sure appreciate you staying with us. l look forward to seeing you back at the Happiest Place On Earth!

Summary: Staff excellent!! Breakfast was great also, but coffee cups too small  Parking is monitored by security which was very comforting to family. Short distance from Disneyland  I will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: What a wonderful review! Thank you so much! We appreciate your loyalty to our band and we Thank you for staying with us! it means so much that you took the time to compliment our friendly staff.  We will make sure to acknowledge them.  Our location is great for visiting the Disney Theme Parks and the Anaheim Convention Center and I appreciate you mentioning that in your review.  We look forward to you returning here for years to come and create memories with your family and friends that will last a lifetime! Happy New Year!

Summary: I have stayed in a lot of hotels in my life but i can't remember one with such friendly and attentive staff as here. The hotel is starting to show it's age but the excellent performance of the staff makes up for the rough edges. The hotel is very clean. It offers several different room configurations which makes traveling with children much easier. We totalled ten and having bunk beds for the kids and a separate room for the adults was good. Some have mentioned the noise from carts on the walk way outside the rooms and it is loud but the staff doesn't run carts after dark, the noise is from other guests. The breakfast area is a  little cramped for this large of a facility, but the staff keeps it stocked, and very clean, the ladies working it were always smiling and greeted
Manager Response: Wow!!  This is the kind of review we work hard for!!  Thanks so much for your kind words about our friendly staff.  We sure appreciate you taking the time to mention our great service and clean rooms!  We are so proud of the variety of room types we offer and I hope you return to see all of our Hotel improvements.  IT means a lot for our return guests to visit us and feel welcome each time !  We know you have a lot of choices when traveling and we thank you for choosing us!  We look forward to you coming back for more Disney magic! Happy new Year!

Summary: We had the family suite which is a 2 queen bedded room with bathroom the 2 basin sink was located outside of the toilet and tub area which is so nice. The second room separated by a shuttered door was not completely noise proof has a pull out sofa bed with bunk beds another exact type bathroom. Having two bathrooms was just wonderful. Each room has a TV the main bedroom has a small fridge and microwave.  Breakfast is served daily from 6:30am to 9:30am has everything you need to get started,  The gal that worked in the breakfast room was very friendly kept the area clean and always greeted us with a Good Morning and a smile wish I got her name.  We took the Toy Story bus to and from the parks daily the buses moved quickly even when the lines were long it was very efficient. The
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your great review! This was detailed and it had so much great information!  I couldn't have said it any better myself when describing the area.  We sure appreciate you taking the time to mention our great service and great location! We sure appreciate you for taking the time to let us know you enjoyed our hot breakfast buffet as well! We look forward to you coming back for more Disney magic! Happy new Year!

Summary: This hotel has hot breakfast offering and family suites with bunk beds which is great for kids. It's a 20-25 minute walk to the park or 5-10 minutes to the Toy Story parking lot where you can catch a free shuttle into the park.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your 5 star rating and for complementing us on our spacious suites and great location!  I'm so glad our guests can enjoy the beautiful southern California weather and walk to the Disney Theme Parks or quickly hop on the shuttle and get dropped off right in front of Disneyland.   Please come back and join us for more Disney magic and to see our amazing guest room upgrades! Looking forward to seeing you at the Happiest Place On Earth!

Summary: Nice location, heated pool, hot tub, very friendly staff. Breakfast was good,however if  your staying more than 2 days the hotel does not change the variety of the breakfast and it gets old eating the same thing.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your great review!  We sure appreciate you taking the time to mention our great service and great location! We sure appreciate you for taking the time to let us know you enjoyed our hot breakfast buffet!   We look forward to you coming back for more Disney magic! Happy new Year!

Summary: For our family this hotel is excellent. This is our second time we stay at this hotel and we are very satisfied. The guy in the front watching out for your safety to the ladies cleaning your room! Profesional working people! Thank you to all the staff.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your awesome 5 star rating and for taking the time to mention our great service  We absolutely love our return guests and we look forward to you coming back for more Disney magic!  We appreciate your business.

Summary Heading: BE VERY CAREFUL BEFORE YOU STAY AT THIS HOTEL!!!!
Summary: ABSOLUTELY PATHETIC!!!!!!!!!!!! Pillows were shockingly hard!!!!  Beds were like a piece of timber, rather than a bed. IT WAS SO BAD I LEFT AFTER 1 NIGHT, EVEN THOUGH I HAD PAID FOR 1. Staff didn't care at all!!!!!!
Manager Response: We sure appreciate your honest feedback about your experience. Our apologies your stay was not what you'd hoped.  We certainly hope each guest that stays here is happy and relaxed. We hope you will return to the hotel and allow us another chance to better serve you. We are committed to giving each guest amazing value and a great stay while visiting the Disneyland Resort! We are proud to be upgrading every guest room with new beds, new furniture, new mattresses, new Disney artwork, new bathrooms with modern accent tile, sound proof walls and windows and so much more! We also hope you return to enjoy our brand new breakfast room expansion with outdoor seating and an amazing "firework viewing area" every guest will surely enjoy!

Summary: Hotel is within walking distance of Disneyland. While it is a bit older the property and room were very clean. The staff from the front desk to the breakfast staff were terrific and happy to help in anyway.  The pool is small but again well maintained.  One drawback was that sound from other rooms came through into our room. Certainly a place I would go back to
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your awesome 4 star rating and for taking the time to mention our great service and great location! We sure appreciate you for taking the time to let us know you enjoyed our hot breakfast buffet as well as our breakfast team!  We look forward to you coming back for more Disney magic! We appreciate your business.

Summary: People were friendly, however, didn’t get the room that my parents booked, they paid for 4 nights, we will only be staying here one night and will be leaving to another hotel in the morning. the bunk beds (which we shouldn’t have had) are like sleeping on a plank of wood, so I had to sleep on the fold out couch (mind you, fold out couches shouldn’t be more comfortable than an actual bed), it isn’t very comfortable either though. The bathroom is tiny, the rooms are tiny. You can hear everything outside: People in the walkway, traffic, etc. I found another hotel, which is cheaper than this one and is much nicer, rooms are nicer, hotel is nicer, everything is nicer and my parents will pay much less. Please save your money and stay elsewhere.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your honest review and rating. It's always our hope guests leave here feeling good about our great location and friendly staff.  We hope you return and allow us another chance to better serve you and see our guest room upgrades such as new beds, new carpet, sound proof windows are being installed as I write this, new bathrooms, new furniture, new Disney artwork along with a beautiful upgrade to the Hotel Exterior!    We look forward to your return to see our new look and for a better experience!

Summary: Perfect for the price and exceptionally caring staff. Please note that there can be noise in the hallways which are on the exterior. Also beware that Google Maps directs you to an address around the corner. The fitness center could use better ventilation. There was ZERO option to open the windows. I made do by propping the outside door open with a big physio ball.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your detailed review of our Hotel!  This is great information!  We are celebrating your   comments about our caring staff!  We hope you return to see our Hotel upgrades and improvements such as brand new sound proof windows, brand new Hotel exterior upgrade such as new walkways (so it's nice and quiet) a fresh coat of paint for a new-modern look, and an amazing breakfast room expansion just to name a few!  We sure appreciate you for taking the time to let us know you enjoyed your visit and we look forward to you coming back for more Disney magic!

Summary: Hotel location is close to Disneyland. Staff is very efficient and Breakfast has good selection we loved it. We are more likely to come back to Disney and will use your services again. Thank you hotel team !!!! Keep up the good work !!
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your awesome 5 star rating and for taking the time to mention our great service!  That is our highest compliment and we thank you!  We sure appreciate you for taking the time to let us know you enjoyed our hot breakfast buffet and your visit and we look forward to you coming back for more Disney magic! Thanks for complementing our pool and spa! We love our return guests and appreciate your business.

Summary Heading: Great place to stay for Disneyland!
Summary: Pros: Great place to stay.  We were in a family suite... everyone had a bed to sleep in (6 people total) Rooms were always clean and tidy.  Maids did a great job taking care of our stuffed animals and dolls :)  Kitchen staff did an amazing job. Hot breakfast that tasted great.  Short walk to Toy Story Parking lot for Disneyland shuttle.  Heated pool!!  Friendly staff.   Cons:  Rooms showed some wear and tear (but they were clean so it didn't bother me).  Beds and pillows were a little hard and uncomfortable - but not a big deal.  The pro's definitely outweigh the cons.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your great feedback about your recent visit and you're 5 star rating!  We sure appreciate it.   It makes us so proud to hear our guests say how much fun they had while staying here and how they enjoyed our spacious and clean rooms.  Please come back and see our guest room upgrades as well as our breakfast room expansion!  We are excited for you to join us for more Disney magic back at the Happiest Place On Earth!

Summary: The staff are very courteous and go above and beyond to make your stay the most comfortable. I do wish the breakfast had a little variation considering we were there for 7 days but it was good, hot and plentiful. I have stayed here twice and will definitely stay again for our next Disneyland stay.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your 5 star rating! We sure appreciate your comments about our great service, and we love having our return guests come back for more Disney magic!  We are so proud of our great location and we are so thrilled you had a magical time! We look forward to seeing you all back at the Happiest Place On Earth!

Summary: Great Stay at a Great Hotel. Clean. Staff were friendly. Breakfast was good. We enjoyed the heated pool. Hotel is kid friendly. We will definitely stay again. Hotel is close to Disneyland. Close to eateries.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your 5 star rating! We sure appreciate your comments about our breakfast, our relaxing heated pool & spa.   We are so proud of our great location and we are so thrilled you had a magical time!  We look forward to seeing you all back at the Happiest Place On Earth!

Summary: Other than a desperate need of a remodel the stay was pleasant. The price was standard for Disney area however the rooms are extremely out of date and have holes in the floor under the carpet and electrical issues.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your honest 3 out of 5 star rating. We sure appreciate you staying with us and we hope you return and allow us another chance to better serve you. Our apologies things weren't perfect but we are here to make it right! We hope you return to see our guest room upgrades such as new beds, new carpet, new bathrooms, new furniture, new Disney artwork along with a beautiful upgrade to the Exterior! We look forward to your return to see our new look and for a better experience!

Summary: Hotel was clean, easy check-in and very friendly and helpful staff. Easy access to shuttle to get to the park, breakfast was included as well. Perfect stay for what we needed would recommend to anyone looking for someplace to stay near Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your great 5 star rating!  Thanks so much for letting us know you love our location, great breakfast, and helpful friendly staff.  Please come back and join us for more Disney magic at the Happiest Place On Earth!

Summary Heading: Great hotel, great price, great staff
Summary: Travelled with my young son to Disneyland. The hotel is close but I still took the shuttle bus which was cheap and only about 40 metres from the property.   All staff were very helpful. Rooms, breakfast and pool were very clean.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your 5 star rating! We sure appreciate your comments about our great location and most of all for complementing our friendly staff! We look forward to seeing you and your son back at the Happiest Place On Earth!

Summary: We've stayed here 2 years in a row for BlizzCon at the Anaheim Convention centre.  The location is excellent, staff always helpful and friendly, breakfast is good if a limited buffet, rooms are clean and in the process of being refurbished.  If you get a new room, you'll pleased, the old ones are lookit being v.tired.  But still an excellent stay.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your 5 star rating! We love to hear our Convention Attendees are coming back and enjoying everything the hotel has to offer including our great location across the street from the Convention Center and our clean rooms.  Thank you for being a valued return guest.  Please come back and see all of our upgrades to our guest rooms and our Hotel!  We look forward to your return for more Disney magic!!

Summary Heading: it was ok for the money
Summary: away from disney  so it wasnt crowded on streets parking was a problem at night  if you want a bed and a shower this is the place to stay   nothing that bad at all  breakfast was just ok  nothing over the top  just to get by to get you thru the morrning
Manager Response: Thank you for providing feedback regarding your recent stay at our property.   Your business is very important to us and we value your feedback. By telling us what you liked about your stay and how we can improve, you are helping us deliver a superior experience for you and other guests in the future.  Thanks for your feedback on our great location and complementing our breakfast.    We hope you will come back and see us again soon.

Summary: Great stay and very friendly staff.  Great value and really not that far away from Disney Parks with easy transportation options.  Great breakfast and plenty to choose from.  I would stay again on our next trip.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your 5 star rating! We sure appreciate your comments about our great location and most of all for complementing our friendly staff! We look forward to seeing you back at the Happiest Place On Earth!

Summary Heading: Good stay for family if room fits all
Summary: Our family of 6 booked a family room over 5 months prior but upon arrival were told room unavailable (We noticed next day it had over 8 guests in it) and were given two separate standard rooms (2 beds in each). As expected the 2 youngest fought all night in same bed but reception said they could not help, not even a single bed mattress to put on floor, and suggested several pillows....hmmm, no thanks. Anyway all other was very good especially the free breakfast. Rooms very clean and staff nice, great locale 20min walk to Disneyland or $2 Art shuttle bus out front.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your honest 3 star rating! We sure appreciate your comments about our clean rooms and great location.  We are so glad you enjoyed our breakfast and hope you return to enjoy our spacious suites and create more memories at the Happiest Place On Earth!

Summary: I stayed here for 2-nights while visiting a trade show at the Anaheim Convention Center. I was so disappointed in how dirty and run down the room was, even through I was told that I had been 'upgraded' to a kids suite. The carpets were stained, bathroom filthy and bed had one sheet and a thin blanket with an air conditioner that wouldn't turn off and fridge that buzzed all night long.i was on the second floor and could hear every step from the room above me.  Its definitely not worth $400 + a night, and I will never stay here again.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your honest review and rating. We sure appreciate our Convention attendees who stay with us and we apologize your stay wasn't perfect.  It's always our hope guests leave here feeling good about our great location right across the street from the convention center and our complimentary hot breakfast buffet.   We hope you return and allow us another chance to better serve you and see our guest room upgrades such as new beds, new carpet, new bathrooms, new furniture, new Disney artwork along with a beautiful upgrade to the Hotel Exterior! We look forward to your return to see our new look and for a better experience!

Summary Heading: Our family of 5 loved the hotel! Will book again.
Summary: Our family of five loved all the comfy beds. We loved the location to Disneyland and the breakfast options. The checkout was super fast and the gal at the counter when checking in was super nice and friendly. They offered us snacks and water upon arrival. We arrived too early to check into our room but they assigned us a parking pass and we were able to leave the car in the parking lot and head to the park. Great stay!
Manager Response: We cant wait to have you stay with us again for more Magical Disney memories with your family. Thanks for mentioning our great location and great service. We are so glad you enjoyed our complimentary hot breakfast buffet and comfy suites!  Come back and see us at the Happiest Place On Earth!

Summary: This hotel was great. Michael at the front desk was awesome. The room was perfect for our family of 5. I wish it would have been closer to the park, but the distance to the Toy Story Lot was not too bad.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your 5 star rating! We love to hear when a team members stands out and provides great service!  Thank you for complementing our team member!  I'm so glad our suite was comfortable and spacious for you.  We look forward to your return for more Disney magic!!

Summary: It was an overall great experience at this hotel. The staff is friendly, the rooms are clean and spacious. The parking and breakfast are free so it saves you some money. The ladies from the breakfast areas are very hard workers and maintained  the breakfast area  well stalked. We had a junior suite large queen size bed and two bunk beds, and a sofa bed. The sofa bed and the bunk beds were a  little hard to sleep on. So my suggestion would be for them to update those beds.  It is a mile away from the entrance to the parks so be prepared to walk before and after your time at the park. Overall I would stay again as everything was ready for me when I got there.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your 4 star rating! We love first timers staying here and we sure appreciate your business.   Thank you for complementing us on our great team! We are so glad you enjoyed your spacious suite and we look forward to your return for more Disney magic!!

Summary: I loved this place and booked it for our trip to Disneyland. I loved that their breakfast had a lot of choices for my picky eaters. We didnt have to go and spend extra money on breakfast atleast. The staff was awesome and very helpful. Their beds were a little hard for me since i have back problems.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your great feedback. We are so glad you stayed with us and had a great time!  Thanks for your 5 star rating! We sure appreciate it and look forward to seeing you back here at the Happiest Place On Earth.

Summary: Everyone was very helpful and friendly.  Good place to stay.  Waling distance to the Disney resort.  The housekeeping crew and the breakfast crew are excellent.  Quick to answer aquestions and to be of service.  Will probably stay again.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your 5 star rating! We are so happy you took the time to comment on our great service from the entire front desk, and housekeeping team.   I'm glad you found value in our close location to the Disneyland Theme Parks!  We look forward to seeing you back at the Happiest Place On Earth!

Summary: The two-room hotel room with bunk beds worked great for our family! It was close enough to walk or catch the free Disney shuttle from the Toy Story lot. (Note that the time it takes to walk was the same as taking the bus, just less walking.)
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your great feedback.  Thanks for your 4 out of 5 star rating! We sure appreciate it and look forward to seeing you back here at the Happiest Place On Earth.

Summary: Highly recommend! Clean updated hotel. Staff was friendly and welcoming. The breakfast had a large selection to choose from. We will definitely be staying here on our next trip to Disneyland. we would recommend to friends.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your 5 star rating! We are so glad you had a wonderful experience. We take such pride in our Hotel and we are thrilled you were able to relax and enjoy the Magic of a Honeymoon at Disney! We look forward to seeing you back at the Happiest Place On Earth for many years to come!

Summary Heading: Close to Toy Story lot (free ride to Disney)
Summary: I didnt expect anything spectacular from best western. It far exceeded my expectations. Rooms were clean. Checkin and check out fast and easy. Breakfast was normal breakfast selections you would expect: cereal, yogurt,waffles frozen sausage and potatoes...pastries.  It was enough to get my family of 6 to lunch.  The best part for me was the location close to toy story lot that allowed us a free and east ride to disney
Manager Response: Thank You so much for staying with us and we are so excited you had a "magical" time! We sure appreciate your comments about your fun experience, great service from everyone on our team and best of all our great location!  We are thrilled everything worked out well for you and we look forward to being your "home away from home" when visiting the Anaheim Resort!

Summary: We initially had a hiccup checking in.  I had initially booked via Booking.com but when I found a lower price thru Agoda I cancelled Booking.com.  However, when we got to the hotel reception told us we had instead cancelled Agoda and kept Booking.  That was not true.  We had both confirmation of cancellation thru Booking and confirmation of subsequent booking thru Agoda. The issue was that the hotel was going to give us a smaller room than what we had expected thru Agoda.   Long and short they did not have a confirmation thru Agoda even though we did and we brought along the confirmation.  In the end, Marie, the lady in charge at the time finally conceded we were at their mercy.  Afterall, we have no control over communication between the hotel and Agoda.  When we get a
Manager Response: Thank You so much for taking the time to give us this great feedback about your visit!  It's so good to hear that our team provided great customer service when changes happened with your room booking.  I'm so excited you had a "magical" time and enjoyed the great location and the ease in which you can get to and from the Disneyland Theme Parks from the Hotel!  We look forward to you returning to see us while visiting us at the Happiest Place On Earth!

Summary: We have stayed at this hotel twice in the last 6 months. The decor is dated but the rooms are exceptionally clean and well maintained. The staff are friendly and knowledgeable about the area. The free breakfast offers a wide variety of hot and cold food choices. Excellent location if you are visiting Disneyland. Hotel is right on the ART shuttle bus route. Hotel sells the shuttle bus passes.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your great 5 star rating and for being one of our valued return guests!  We love to see families and friends coming back to enjoy the Hotel every time your travels bring you back to Anaheim!  THANK YOU!   I'm so glad you enjoyed our great customer service and our complimentary breakfast.  We love to hear this type of great feedback and we will acknowledge the entire team!  We appreciate your loyalty to our brand and look forward to seeing you back at the Happiest Place On Earth!

Summary: Went to Disneyland all day. Called around 7pm for 1am check in. Valet parking during day but we just parked in disability spot for night. Checkin was easy. Got points vice present for Diamond. Too late to enjoy goodies. If hungry before hand at 130am their is Denny's and Carl's Jr drivethru that are very close. You can see them at intersection of hotel. Got to room on third floor and air conditioning cooled room off quick. Their is elevators for the electric scooter and others. Ice next to elevators and you can fill your hydro thermoses. If you use fan next to vent it works better. Shower drained well and toilet is power flush. Shower head worked well. Bed was okay for the price. It has out door pool that kids enjoyed. Microwave and mini refrigerator in room. Check out was 11
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your 4 star rating! We are so glad you had a wonderful experience. We take such pride in our Hotel and we are thrilled you were able to relax and enjoy the Magic of Disney! We look forward to seeing you back at the Happiest Place On Earth!

Summary: I'm not one to complain (ha!) but my hotel stay in Anaheim wasn't AWFUL but...  ... for some reason I was put in a room beside the laundry on one side, a room where the cleaners fold stuff on the other and the elevator and ice machine directly across. Why is this a room you'd put people in? The bed was lovely. Perfect to eat a full pizza in. But it's a cube with banging and noise engulfing it.   I bought ear plugs after getting woken up at 5:30am to a very loud hilarious story in Spanish happened directly outside my door, which helped but... God damn.   I was going to try to get my room switched last night but I was too tired. I'm not picky when it comes to hotels, the when the only purpose for then is to sleep and you can't?   Anyway, if you stay at a Best Western in Anaheim,
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your honest feedback about your visit.  We certainly apologize you stay wasn't perfect with regard to the noise and we hope you return to allow us a chance to better serve you.  It's always our hope that guests give us this great feedback so we can help create a better stay for you.  It's our goal that if something isn't right with your stay, we will make it right!   We are making some great upgrades to the hotel currently such as sound proof windows, new furniture and new beds.  We certainly hope you return in the future to the Happiest Place On Earth and see our new look!

Summary: They charge for everything. Including parking at the hotel you just paid to stay at. So you are nickel and dimed for everything. There is breakfast, which isn't too bad, and has plenty of options. Some staff were great, others not so much. And they were not very helpful with reservation problems. And the cancelling fees are outrageous if something happens or comes up! Overall, wouldn't stay there again or recommend to a friend. Hope your stay is better!
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your honest 3 out of 5 star rating. We sure appreciate you staying with us and we hope you return and allow us another chance to better serve you. Our apologies things weren't perfect but we are here to make it right! We hope you return to see our guest room upgrades such as new beds, new carpet, new bathrooms, new furniture, new Disney artwork along with a beautiful upgrade to the Exterior! We look forward to your return to see our new look and for a better experience!

Summary: Staying here at the moment. Great place to stay, walking distance to Disneyland, or Uber or take ART. Staff have been lovely, so happy and you always get a happy greeting. Beds and pillows are comfy, can't complain about anything really. A nice relaxing atmosphere. Breakfast is more than ample, everything that you need really.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your awesome 5 star rating! We sure appreciate it and we look forward to your return. We sure appreciate you complementing us on our great service!  We sure appreciate you taking the time to let us know you enjoyed our great location and the breakfast.  Please come back and see us for more Disney magic!

Summary: This hotel was perfect for our group! The add-on room with bunkbeds was perfect for the 8 of us. It was close to Disneyland and in a great location. Breakfast was amazing and not your typical "continental" fare. Great variety and good quality. Staff was on point and did everything great.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your 5 star rating! We are so excited to read this review as we love our groups! Thank you for complementing our amazing family suites and our breakfast!   We want you to feel warm and welcomed as soon as you arrive to our great location here at the Disneyland Resort!  We look forward to you coming back for more Disney magic!

Summary: I went with my young daughter and we absolutely loved staying at the hotel. It was a bit of a walk to Disneyland, but we made it happen and we had such a blast. The complementary breakfast was good and we loved the pool. The staff was great and helpful. Our room was lovely!
Manager Response: Wow! We love hearing about families who've stayed with us and created magical memories while here!  Thanks so much for letting us know how much you enjoyed your visit-especially our breakfast, heated pool & spa, and our friendly staff!  I hope you return for more fun and to see our Hotel upgrades such as our firework viewing area and brand new breakfast room with outdoor seating coming soon!

Summary: First time here, will consider again when in the area. Felt safe, alot going on around shops, restaurants. Easy access to and from the freeway. Really liked the two room suite, kids enjoyed it also. Parking secure👍
Manager Response: Thank You so much for staying with us! We sure appreciate your feedback about your great visit! We are proud of our great service, We certainly appreciate your loyalty to our brand.  We hope you come back and see us to celebrate the Magic of Star Wars Land and all Disney has to offer!

Summary: We chose the hotel because òf the family suite layout - we have 2 teenage boys so the typical layout of 2 double beds in USA is not suitable for us.  The location is great - not quite close enough to walk to Disney but we sinply ordered uber each day. Rooms a little dated - clean but the carpet felt a little damp. Maybe it had been washed. Beds ok - not luxurious but not uncomfortable. Main problem is walls quite thin and you can hear people walking about in other rooms. Very good breakfast included - large selection of food with plenty of tables. Plenty of parking but approx $15 per night. Overall it was good and I would recommend if you need the suite layout.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your 4 star rating! We sure appreciate you and we look forward to your return.  We are so excited for you to see our Hotel upgrades to our guest rooms and Exterior of the Hotel.  We sure appreciate you taking the time to let us know you enjoyed the breakfast and our spacious suites.  Please come back and see us for more Disney magic!

Summary: Hotel is clean and was conveniently located within walking distance to Disneyland (our destination). You are charged for parking daily unless you are a rewards member, other than that everything was good!
Manager Response: Thank You so much for staying with us! We sure appreciate your feedback about our great location!  We hope you come back and see us to celebrate the Magic of Star Wars Land and all Disney has to offer!

Summary: Hotel was clean and a great location to walk to Disney. Staff was polite and easy to deal with. Would recommend for families as the suites had plenty of room and everything was well cleaned and maintained.
Manager Response: Wow!  A 3 week road trip!  You guys know how to travel!  This review means a lot because as a guest who stays at a lot of Hotels you know exactly what you want and we are so grateful you chose us!  Thanks for complementing our great location to the Disneyland Theme Parks and our amazing staff!  I hope you return to see our Hotel upgrades and for more Disney magic!

Summary: The front desk staff when checking us in was amazing and personable. The room was ok. It was a little claustrophobic since it never got any direct sunlight. It is older and could use a little sprucing up. The parking lot isnt large enough for all of the rooms which kinda sucks. But, it was right next to the toy story lot so all we had to do was walk 5 minutes and we got free transportation to the Disneyland park. In a nutshell I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your 4 star rating!  We are so excited to read this review as you complemented us on a great check in!  We want you to feel warm and welcomed as soon as you  arrive!  We sure appreciate you taking the time to let us know you enjoyed our great location and we look forward to you coming back for more Disney magic!

Summary Heading: Well Trained Staff and perfect location
Summary: I had zero complaints with this Best Western Location.   the staff is well trained and friendly and willing to help with any concerns.  there is a manager that is on site during the day (unlike the Ontario California Convention Center location).  I am a Diamond Select Member and I can say that this Best Western is a good choice to stay at.
Manager Response: Thank You so much for staying with us! What a great review!  We sure appreciate your feedback about your great visit! We are proud of our great service, We certainly appreciate your loyalty to our brand by being a Diamond Select member!  Wow!  We hope you come back and see us to celebrate the Magic of Star Wars Land and all Disney has to offer!

Summary: An average to nice hotel. It's in a pretty cramped/busy part of town and difficult to get in and out of. But it's a good location if going to Disneyland or some of the other parks. The rooms were nice enough and good variety on the breakfast.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your 3 star rating and great feedback! We sure appreciate you for taking the time to let us know you enjoyed your visit and we look forward to you coming back for more Disney magic! Thanks for complementing our spacious rooms.  I hope you return to see it and for more Disney magic at the Happiest Place On Earth!

Summary: Pay a little more and stay at the Best West Plus Pavilion...terrible customer service, they state on their website that you get one car with a parking pass but additional vehicles MAY be extra.  The rooms are small and it is not as close to Disneyland as it appears.  I tried calling customer service directly at the hotel and was places on hold for 8 minutes, when I asked about the parking he put me back on hold...I just hung up. NOT WORTH THE SAVINGS...
Manager Response: We always appreciate when guests provide honest feedback about their experience. I hope you will return to this hotel and allow us another opportunity to show off our friendly staff, upgraded rooms and hotel improvements. We are thrilled for all our guests to enjoy new beds, new furniture, new mattresses, new Disney artwork, new bathrooms with modern accent tile, and much more! We are excited to sprinkle pixie dust throughout our Hotel and bring you better value and more comfort!  We hope you return for more Disney magic!

Summary: Messed up our reservation but did rectify it after we all were about to find a new hotel. Room 238 is in poor shape and smoking area is directly below causing smoke odors to float into the room. Our other 2 rooms were very decent. Staff were very friendly
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your great 4 star rating! We love hearing about how our staff hears about something not going right with a guests visit and we jump into action to fix it!  Thank for taking a minute to acknowledge us.  We look forward to seeing you back and enjoying more Disney magic!!

Summary: Great rooms for large groups, our church youth group going to Disney was our purpose, and it was a perfect place for this.  Great breakfast, and wonderful pool and hot tub.  We appreciated the hospitality and nearness to Disney.
Manager Response: We love our group business!  Thanks so much for your great 4 star rating! We love hearing about how our large families and groups love this Hotel!  Thank for taking a minute to acknowledge us. We hope you return to see our guest room upgrades that includes new outlets and USB plugs in every room, new beds, new bathrooms with modern accent tile, new carpet, new sound proof windows and walls, new Disney artwork, and more! We are also excited about our new look to the exterior of the property as well with new paint, lush landscaping with beautiful palm tress, and more! We look forward to seeing you back and enjoying more Disney magic!!

Summary: It was our first time staying in the hotel. It's clean, the families are good sized and has the amenities all being shared.   My only disappointment was breakfast. We are a family of 6 and 1 day we had breakfast because every other day there was two or three people sitting at a table of six. And having 4 kids under 12.... Patience is not a virtue of a hungry child.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your awesome 3 star rating and great feedback! We sure appreciate you for taking the time to let us know you enjoyed your visit and we look forward to you coming back for more Disney magic! Thanks for complementing our spacious rooms, and we apologize about the breakfast room seating.  I'm excited to say we are renovating and improving our breakfast room with a modern look, more seating inside as well as brand new outdoor seating.  I hope you return to see it and for more Disney magic at the Happiest Place On Earth!

Summary Heading: Good place for a hot breakfast near Disneyland
Summary: Good place close to everything, including the Disney parking lot. From here you can take the shuttle to the parks and save the walking if you want to.  Food was ok for a quick hot breakfast, and the area is clean.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your 5 star rating! We sure appreciate your comments about our great location and complementing our cleanliness.  We look forward to seeing you back at the Happiest Place On Earth!

Summary: This is just a quick walk from Disneyland or by taking the shuttle in the nearby parking walk. You can also watch the fireworks from the third floor balcony. If you reserve a suite, make sure you get the room you reserve as it can really impact the sleeping arrangements. Also, if you have a young child, they might not have a crib, even if you request one months in advance so I would suggest bringing your own pack n play.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your 3 star rating! We sure appreciate you. We look forward to seeing you back at the Happiest Place On Earth!

Summary Heading: I don’t suggest you stay unless you want to get locked in your room
Summary: Just checked in and door handle completely fell off locking us in the room! Instead of getting us a new room we had to wait for the maintenance person to TRY to fix the door and he didn’t have the right screw and TEMPORARILY FIXED IT.  They said it was Newly renovated but false advertisement everything is old and disgusting!
Manager Response: Thanks for staying with us.  We sure appreciate your honest feedback about your recent visit and we apologize your stay wasn't perfect.  We want each guest to feel appreciated and they got great value with their guest room.  We know things happen and we look forward to those moments to make things right with our guests so you can have a great stay here at the Happiest Place On Earth!  We hope you return to enjoy our guest room upgrades which includes new furnishings, new carpet, new bathrooms and more along with an amazing breakfast room expansion! We are constantly making changes and improving the value of our Hotel for our guests. We appreciate your business and hope we see you again to earn back your trust and for more Disney magic!

Summary Heading: Decent place to stay near Disneyland
Summary: We spent a week while visiting Disneyland, Universal Studios and family.  The family room we rented for the 5 of us was roomy and clean.  The beds were comfortable.  The room was quiet despite being next to the commercial laundry.  There was a $15 charge to keep a car parked in the lot.  The property is about a mile from the entrance to the Disney parks.  We opted to buy tickets for the bus service which are available to purchase at the hotel office.  This is a great convenience as walking a mile at the end of a long day at the parks would be uncomfortable.  The bench at the bus stop was occupied in the morning and evening by the same homeless man.  Seemed to be his spot and he bothered no one.  The breakfast served is about what one can expect and was satisfactory.  The pool
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your awesome 4 star rating and great feedback! We sure appreciate you for taking the time to let us know you enjoyed your visit and we look forward to you coming back for more Disney magic!  Thanks for complementing our pool and spa!  We look forward to seeing you back at the Happiest Place On Earth!

Summary Heading: You Get What You Pay For
Summary: Our room floors were filthy, making our feet black immediately. Our tub was clogged and even though they were supposed to fix it, it remained clogged for our entire stay.
