They also accidentally checked us out and deactivated our room keys so I had to stand outside the room in the heat, with my baby, for 30 mins while my husband waited in their slow front desk line just to get it fixed. I also had rowdy upstairs neighbors, there didn't seem to be a curfew.
Manager Response: We sure appreciate your honest feedback about your recent visit and we apologize your stay wasn't perfect as that's always our goal.  We hope you return to enjoy our guest room upgrades which includes new furnishings, new carpet, new bathrooms and more along with an amazing breakfast room expansion!  We are constantly making changes and improving the value of our Hotel for our guests.  We appreciate your business and hope we see you again to earn back your trust and for more Disney magic!

Summary: We had trouble finding a family suite in our price range. Best Western always follows through.  Parking can get cramped, but they have a valet guy to move cars around for you. The breakfast is really good. Lots of variety and the area is kept clean. It can get busy, but it’s open for about 3 hours.  We did have very heavy footed people above us. Management did let them know and it was quiet. If you are a light sleeper like me, request a 3rd floor room. If you are going to Disneyland, this place is very close.  All in all, we had a good stay. Our room was clean and we all had space to claim during our stay.  We would stay again, but I’d request a 3rd floor room.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your 4 star rating! We sure appreciate you. We look forward to seeing you back at the Happiest Place On Earth!

Summary: We researched hotels for months and the ratings and reviews all led us to this hotel! The staff was friendly and helpful. The rooms were clean and  newer. The rates were very affordable and the complimentary breakfast was good. Located along the ART bus route which makes getting around town and to & from the parks. If we ever get back to California, we will be staying here again! Thank you to all the staff for making our stay so magical!
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your awesome 5 star rating! We sure appreciate you for taking the time to compliment us on our great rates and breakfast. We look forward to seeing you back at the Happiest Place On Earth!

Summary: Very accommodating good stay good breakfast rooms could use some updates but stay was more than satisfactory. We use this hotel again.  The hotel is convenient and the service to Disneyland is excellent right outside the hotel.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your great 5 star rating!  We sure appreciate you staying with us and we are so glad you enjoyed your Disney visit.  Thanks for complementing us on our great location!  We hope you return to see our new look!  We are improving things in every guest room and our Exterior as well.  We look forward to seeing you back at the Happiest Place On Earth!

Summary: Maids were smoking on property. It's supposed to be completely smoke free. Also, we tried to checkout early because we didn't realize how far Universal studios was to us, but we were flatly denied a refund for 2 nights by management. It's also a noisy hotel. Lots of families with kids that aren't supervised. All in all, it's a very no frills hotel.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your honest 2 of out 5 star rating.  We sure appreciate you staying with us and we hope you return and allow us another chance to better serve you.  Our apologies things weren't perfect but we are here to make it right!  We hope you return to see our guest room upgrades such as new beds, new carpet, new bathrooms, new furniture, new Disney artwork along with a beautiful upgrade to the Exterior!  You will be able to enjoy more outdoor seating, a brand new expanded breakfast room and best of all...a Disney firework viewing area!  We look forward to your return to see our new look!

Summary Heading: Great Family Suite for a Great Price
Summary: The hotel rooms were very large and accomadated the 7 of us just fine. The kids had their own room with bunk beds and a fold out couch. The adults had 2 queen beds.  And having 2 bathrooms was a bonus. Beds were comfy, but pillows could have been better.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your great 4 out of 5 star rating! We sure appreciate you staying with us and we are so glad you enjoyed the spacious family suite!  You're right, the 2 bathrooms are amazing!  We look forward to seeing you back at the Happiest Place On Earth!

Summary: I’m a Best Western Diamond Member & was looking for a fair price around the Disneyland area.  Hard to find in Summer time.  But this is it!!  Warm Breakfast with offerings that are a appealing for all ages.  You are able to purchase your Disneyland tickets @ this Inn.  Pleasant Front Desk.  Better price then most area hotels that are this nice.
Manager Response: What a great review!  We sure appreciate you taking the time to post about your great experience here at our Disneyland Hotel!  We sure appreciate your loyalty to our brand and this Hotel. We look forward to seeing you EVERY time your travels bring you back to Anaheim.  We are proud to offer you great value for the guest rooms and Theme Park tickets and great service!  Thanks so much for your great 4 star rating and we can't wait to see you again at the Happiest Place On Earth!

Summary: Raffles best western was a great fit for our family! I will start my review with the few things we didn't love. the rooms were a little outdated and the breakfast area was small. That is it for the negative. We loved the layout of our room. My husband and I took a queen bed. The kids all slept on the pullout bed next to us and grandma had a little separate room with a queen bed all to herself! It was perfect! It was also cleaned really well, but keep in mind it is an older hotel. It was so nice to come back from Disneyland and have our beds made and fresh towels. It always felt good! (random fact but the pillows were a little small) Overall it was great for us!
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your great 4 out of 5 star rating! We sure appreciate you and we are so glad you enjoyed the suite and grandma was comfortable!  We look forward to seeing you back at the Happiest Place On Earth!

Summary: This place was great. It is really close to Disneyland. Just blocks over. The front desk was quick to check us in and was very welcoming with fruits and water amenities. They give excellent discounts and the hot breakfast included was delicious. They had eggs white & scrambled, make your own waffles, fruits, yogurt, cereals, pancakes, english muffins and toast, milk, juice and coffee available, very filling for a free breakfast.  Washer and dryer on property and lots of vending machines.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your great 5 star rating! We sure appreciate you and the great feedback about our friendly front desk team and our fantastic breakfast!  Thanks for taking time to share your experience and we look forward to seeing you back at the Happiest Place On Earth!

Summary: Motel Is good located in walking distance to Convention Center and Disney parks. Rooms are outdated and very basic. Not much comfortable. Breakfast offers lot of sweet Food, and some eggs. Basic as well.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback regarding your recent stay. We sure appreciate you staying with us and we look forward to your next visit to the Disneyland Resort!

Summary Heading: The option of suites, reasonable price, and location make this average hotel worth staying in.
Summary: We stayed in room 226 for three nights.  We chose the hotel because of its proximity to Disneyland, its price and the fact that we could book a suite (2 bedrooms with 2 bathrooms) for ourselves and a couple of our grown children.  (Our daughter and young family stayed in a room down the hall from us in another suite).  The hotel wraps around the parking lot, but there is one elevator.   Make sure to get room near to elevator if it’s not on the first floor.  A/C didn’t work well (unit in main room took 2 days to get room to temp and unit in small 2nd room could only stay on for a few hours, and then it would re-set itself to 85 degrees.  The rooms were decent sizes and clean, though they weren't updated any time recently, and the lighting was insufficient.  Bathroom counters with
Manager Response: Wow!  Now this is detailed feedback about your recent visit!  We sure appreciate you for staying with us and we are so glad you enjoyed it!  I know you all created some great memories while visiting us here at the Disneyland Resort! Thank you for complementing us on our great breakfast options and our spacious suites! We look forward to your return to see our Hotel upgrades such as new carpet, new beds, new furniture, new sound proof wall and windows, new bathrooms with modern accent tile, and much more! We appreciate your business and can't wait for your return.

Summary Heading: Good for the purpose I needed it
Summary: The rooms were clean and comfortable. The only plug in which was the lamp did not work, and parking is very tough even with the valet. The night time valet was way nicer than the day time. Front desk has minimal hospitality. Breakfast was decent for being for free.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your honest feedback and review about your recent visit.  We sure appreciate the compliments about our clean and comfy rooms.  We are excited to be upgrading our rooms with more amenities for our guests to really enjoy the Magic of Disney such as more outlets and USB ports in every guest room along with new furniture, new carpet, new  bathrooms and more!  We look forward to seeing you back at the Happiest Place On Earth!

Summary: We had a room that didn’t appear to have any updates and it was definitely dated and the carpet had seen better days. The room was clean though and it appears they are still in the process of updating rooms. Maybe once all of the rooms are updated, things will be better. They don’t provide much for bedding and we could have used a blanket for each of the beds. Beds were not very comfortable.  All of the staff were very friendly and helpful. The breakfast had a great variety of options, more than the usual waffles and pastry. The breakfast room was pretty small and can get crowded fast. It’s about a block or so from the toy story parking lot so you could walk to the lot and catch the shuttle bus to the park for free. We opted for an Uber and it was $6 for our family of 3. If you
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your feedback regarding your recent visit!  We sure appreciate you staying with us and complementing our friendly team and our filling hot breakfast!  You're correct, we are currently upgrading each room and cannot wait for every guest to enjoy the finished product soon!  We are also sprinkling "pixie dust" to expand our breakfast room for more seating, and upgrading the look of our Hotel exterior!  We look forward to your return for more great service and a brand new Hotel!

Summary: I checked in at 10 pm after driving 3 hours. Check in was easy and fast. Got to my room and everything seemed fine. After 10 minutes i went to use the restroom and looked up. Wet used towels were hanging all over the shower. So I started to look at the room. Both trash cans full. Cheese crackers left thru out the room on the floor. I called the front desk and they sent maintenance to check the room. He   Apologized  Took the towels and trash out and brought clean towels. Told me the front desk would call me soon. They didn’t. I had to go in the next morning and was told they were sorry they would reverse my parking fee. 15 a night. I said ok. When checking out I asked if the parking fee was waived and nope it wasn’t with no notes. So I had to explain what happened again and they
Manager Response: Thanks so much for staying with us and providing honest feedback about your visit.  We appreciate your business and while I wish your first impression into your guest room was perfect, I'm thrilled to know the team acted quickly to fix any situation that might've come up!  We are all about making our guests feel welcome and happy and we continue that level of customer service each day you're here!  We hope you come back and see all our Hotel upgrades to the guest rooms and overall Hotel Exterior.  We are looking forward to every guest enjoying a new, modern yet Disney themed Hotel with lush palm trees throughout to welcome you to sunny southern California!  We cant wait to see you back at the Happiest Place On Earth!

Summary Heading: Great location, terrible internet, and AMAZING POOL
Summary: This is one of the best hotels near Disneyland for the service and price.  Most of the rooms have been renovated and were really nice.  We stayed in a kids suite and loved being able to separate us from the kids after long days at Disney.  The internet was not great.  It took forever just to load emails and if you are trying to stream any content, forget about it!  The location is awesome as its just around the corner from the Toy Story shuttle for a free lift to the park.  The breakfast has a good variety and was tasty.  The only concern is while it states it is open until 9:30, you need to get there by 9:00 as they start taking food away and by 9:30 there is only fruit left.  Probably the best part of this hotel was the pool.  A hot tub is a must after walking all day in
Manager Response: Thank You for staying with us!  What a great review with some real honest feedback about our heated pool and spa other guests would love to know!  I'm so glad you took a moment to enjoy the spa and really make the most out of your visit to the Happiest Place On Earth!    Thanks for commenting on our great location and our breakfast!  We cant wait for your Anaheim tradition to continue and you come back to see us again with your whole family!  Thank you for the loyalty to our brand and this Hotel!  See you real soon!

Summary: I stayed during my trip to Disneyland, the walking distance is about 15min walk. I’d recommend an Uber. But the stay was amazing; the breakfast was so good. It was so clean and amazing customer service at check in. I would definitely book with Best western again.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your great 5 star rating! We are so glad you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast and your overall visit!  We love to hear this from every guest and it means so much you took the time to comment on our great customer service! We appreciate your loyalty to our brand and look forward to seeing you back at the Happiest Place On Earth!

Summary: For the cost, this was a great location, within walking distance to the park.  Clean rooms, friendly and helpful staff and great place to stay for our family of 6.  The sleep quality was low only because I could hear families coming and going throughout the night.  Probably not the fault of the hotel,  but still disturbing.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your great 4 star rating! We sure appreciate the kind words about our friendly staff and great location!  We appreciate your loyalty to our brand and look forward to seeing you back at the Happiest Place On Earth!

Summary: Overall not bad for the price, but my check in experience was subpar. They said I had a 3pm guaranteed check in time and at 3pm they said it would be a half hour longer. They did not seem to care about the fact I had kids with me we arrived at 10 am and patiently waited till 3 before I asked about our room.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your honest feedback about your recent visit.  It is our hope every guest feels appreciated and excited to start their Disney journey as soon as they get here!  We share in the excitement with you and our apologies that wasn't conveyed properly.  We certainly hope you enjoyed the newly renovated room you stayed in and we look forward to seeing you back to show you why this Hotel is so special!  We cant wait to see you again at the Happiest Place On Earth!

Summary: Stayed at raffles for a Disney trip, clean place, nice and friendly, and a 5 min walk to the toy story lot for the Disney shuttles... free continental breakfast every morning... would definitely stay there again
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your great feedback about your recent visit to our Hotel!  We are so happy to hear our great location, clean rooms and great breakfast added to you all having an amazing stay!  We sure appreciate your loyalty to our brand.    We look forward to being your "Home Away from Home" anytime your travels lead you back to the Home of Walt Disney's Original Theme Park!

Summary: Toy story tram is just a block away which is very convenient; we decided to walk to Disney twice and it was only about a 10-15 walk.  Breakfast had a decent variety.  We had a suite which was perfect for our family.  The extra room is private, has its own TV and its own climate control.  The fold out sleeper was sufficiently comfortable.  The room was clean and had a microwave, refrigerator and nice toiletries.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your great 5 star rating!  We love hearing about our guests enjoying the great location of our Hotel to the Disney Toy Story tram.  Thanks for complementing our breakfast and our spacious suites.  We look forward to seeing you back to enjoy the Magic of Disney and the opening of Star War's Land!

Summary: This hotel is almost right next door to the Toy Story lot. So you can walk to the parking lot and take the free tram to the park.   The motel is old and quite dated. However, the beds were not uncomfortable, the AC in the room works, and so does the hot tub (we snuck in after "closing time" to ease our aching legs and backs after a full day in the park).   The staff was INCREDIBLY friendly and helpful. We drove an electric vehicle and they moved their own cars to allow me to park next to an outlet so that I could charge during our stay. They also helped with arranging pickup of a gift for a local friend. Anything we needed they worked with us to supply. Really wonderful staff.   I would totally stay here again.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your great 4 star rating! We love hearing about how our teams great customer service helped provide an amazing stay for families visiting the Disneyland Resort!  Thank for taking a minute to acknowledge us.  We hope you return to see our guest room upgrades that includes new outlets and USB plugs in every room, new beds, new bathrooms with modern accent tile, new carpet, new sound proof windows and walls, new Disney artwork, and more!  We are also enjoying a fresh exterior renovation with new paint, lush landscaping with beautiful palm tress, and more! We look forward to seeing you back and enjoying more Disney magic!!

Summary: The  hotel was located in a perfect place for Vidcon which we attended.  Walk to Disneyland wasn't bad but  taking the transportation was much better.  Rooms were very dated and OK, but to be honest could use  some much needed updating.  Staff was  very nice but my interactions with them  were  very llimited
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your honest 3 star rating! We love our Convention attendees are we are so excited you chose to stay with us. It's always nice when we hear guests say: "I cant believe how close you are to the Convention center"! We hope you return to see our guest room upgrades that includes custom wallpaper, new beds, new carpet, new sound proof windows and walls, new Disney artwork, and more.  We are also looking forward to you enjoying a fresh Hotel exterior renovation with new paint, lush landscaping with beautiful palm trees, and more! We look forward to seeing you back and enjoying more Disney magic!!

Summary: Breakfast had lots of different choices, and the staff were so friendly. Our housekeeper left beautifully folded towels in the shape of flowers 💐 😊. The staff were super helpful and couldn’t do enough. Very close to toy story parking lot for Disneyland to get a shuttle to the parks and plenty of places to eat within walking distance too.
Manager Response: THANK YOU!! What a great review. Our entire team here works so hard to make sure every guest feels special and welcome! I'm so glad to hear you acknowledge our housekeepers and breakfast team!  Thanks so much for staying here and I'm so glad you enjoyed the spacious rooms an our great location!  Come back and stay with us for more Disney fun!  !

Summary Heading: Great for the price and location
Summary: I recently stayed at this hotel for a little staycation and due to my own mess up on booking a room I arrived unknowing that I had booked a king bed when I needed two queen beds. The manager at the front desk was right away very empathetic and helped me to the best of his abilities to find me a room there, butnthey were completely booked. He helped me then get ahold of Hotels.com to find a another room in the area that could accommodate us, I was on the line trying to work out this mishap when hotels hung up on me, but During my call the staff had been working the whole time To find me a room as well. They ended up finding a room that the persons credit card did not go thru and saved our night! They were so gracious and helpful!
Manager Response: This review means a lot!!  Thank you so much.  This is a great customer service experience and we get to hear directly from the guest!  I love it!  Whether you meant to stay here or not, (Smile)- I'm so glad you did and it worked out so you could see yourself what makes this Hotel so special!  I hope this will continue to be your home away from home anytime you visit the Disneyland Resort!  Come back and see us at the Happiest Place On Earth!

Summary: Breakfast was awful! Room had divots in the floor under carpet ..painful if you step in one. Fan loud woke everyone up at night, no off switch except turning off light too. Beds uncomfortable. Loud!!!
Manager Response: We sure appreciate your honest feedback about your experience.  We certainly wish each guest that stays here is happy and relaxed.  We hope you will return to the hotel and allow us another chance to better serve you. We are committed to giving each guest amazing value and a great stay while visiting the Disneyland Resort!  We are proud to be upgrading every guest room with new beds, new furniture, new mattresses, new Disney artwork, new bathrooms with modern accent tile, sound proof walls and windows and so much more!  We also hope you return to enjoy our brand new breakfast room expansion with outdoor seating and an amazing "firework viewing area" every guest will surely enjoy!    We look forward to seeing you back!

Summary: This was an excellent place to stay with our two young grandsons; close enough to Disneyland to walk and enjoy the sights.  The staff was excellent!  The free breakfast was ok; could have been fresher (but it was free so you can't expect gourmet).
Manager Response: We cant wait to have you stay with us again for more Magical Disney memories with your grandkids.  Thanks for mentioning our great location and great service.  We are so glad you enjoyed our complimentary hot breakfast buffet! Come back and see us at the Happiest Place On Earth!

Summary: We stayed here four nights, for our disney land vacation. We were very impressed with how close and convienet our stay was. Disney Land settle are one block away. Directly across the street from Ruth's Chris and Morton's restaurant. It's a prim location for convienet stores. Room was very clean. Bathroom very clean!!! We loved the breakfast, lots of variety and quality food.
Manager Response: We cant wait to have you stay with us again for more Magical Disney memories!  Thanks for mentioning our great location and clean rooms!  We are so glad you enjoyed our complimentary hot breakfast buffet! We make sure there's plenty of choices for everyone before they start a long, exciting day exploring the Resort!   Come back and see us at the Happiest Place On Earth!

Summary: Took my grandkids to Disneyland for their belated Christmas, birthdays and spring break.  Arranged my stay thru RCI and the location was great.  Within walking distance of a drug store, several decent priced restaurants and Disney - however I bought the bus pass for our 3 days as this old women would have never been able to make the walk back after we were all day in the park!  The swimming pool and hot tub were great and the kids had a blast while Grandma sat and soaked up the sun and rested. The breakfast buffet was great and since I have dietary restrictions, I found several things I could eat so we didn't have to eat anyplace else.   I had a squeaky front door and the stopper on our bathroom door had fallen off along with the drain stop in the sink broken.  I reported it one
Manager Response: Thank you so much for this great review!! What better gift for the grandkids than a visit to the Happiest Place On Earth!  We sure appreciate being a part of these special memories and I'm so glad you enjoyed our great location, pool and spa, and of course our complimentary hot breakfast!  It means so much to us that our guests feel welcome! I'm so glad you enjoyed the ease in which you can get to the Disneyland Theme Parks from here. We are looking forward to seeing you back again for more fun and more memories!

Summary: Proximity to Disneyland, easy to find, plenty of parking, amenable and helpful support staff. Delightful stay! Can't really say enough to fill 200 characters but it was awesome, it was great, it was fun!
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your 5 star rating! We love and appreciate our Veterans! Thank you for your service and for staying here! We are so glad you enjoyed your room and stay and our great service. We look forward to your return for more Disney magic!!

Summary Heading: Exceptional stay for our family vacation!
Summary: We had a wonderful time! Check-in and check-out was very easy! The room was very cleaned and cleaned each day! The breakfast was great everyone have full stomachs before an adventurous day out, even picky eaters! The housekeeper's did something fun with my kids stuffed animals and blankets each day! The pool and hot tub were relaxing! We are excited to stay again and refer them to anyone!!
Manager Response: Thank You so much for your 5 star rating!  We are grateful you stayed with us and we are so excited you had a "magical" time!  We sure appreciate your comments about our great breakfast, clean rooms, and great service.   I'm really happy you took some time and relaxed in our hot tub!  We cannot wait for your return!

Summary: In a hotel-laden area surrounding Disneyland and the Anaheim Convention Center, here is a gem. Moderately-priced and including a fine hot breakfast experience, this clean motel is worth the stay. I will be back when next I am in Anaheim.
Manager Response: We cant wait to have you stay with us again!  What a great review!  You're so right, we are "hidden gem" with an amazing breakfast and great staff!  Thanks for your 4 out of 5 star rating!  We sure appreciate it and look forward to seeing you back here at the Happiest Place On Earth!

Summary: The room pictured is NOT what you get. They are very old outdated, small crammed rooms. There are NO electric sockets to plug in your phones or other electric devices. The bunk beds are very uncomfortable. You can hear next door and upstairs neighbors very loudly and the water from the other showers and very loud bangs when people close there doors. It woke us up in a scare several times throughout the night and in the mornings. There is only one elevator which was very far from our room and we had two small children with strollers and bags which made it a very inconvenient task every time.  The workers are all very nice and the breakfast were the only two things good about this hotel. We would NOT reccomend staying here. For the price you can get a nicer newer hotel down the
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your honest feedback about your recent visit. I really hope you will allow us another opportunity to better serve you as we are sprinkling "pixie dust" all around the Hotel to bring our guests improvements and upgrades that you will absolutely love!  We already have a great location as well as amazing service and breakfast and I'm so glad you enjoyed all of that first hand!  We are giving our guests new furniture, new carpet, new bathrooms with modern accent tile, new Disney artwork, sound proof walls and windows, and that's' just for starters!  We appreciate every guest that stays here as we know you have a lot of Hotel choices. We want to help you relax and get excited about the Magic of Disney as soon as you arrive!  We look forward to seeing you again.

Summary Heading: Great Location, Good Value, Wonderful Service
Summary: Stayed with the family one night. They offer veteran’s discount so our room was very affordable and accommodated the family just fine (3 adults/4 children). Room was very clean and included extra pillows, blankets, and towels so we didn’t have to request additional.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your 5 star rating! We love and appreciate our Veterans!  Thank you for your service and for staying here!  We are so glad you enjoyed your room and  stay and our great service. We look forward to your return for more Disney magic!!

Summary: This hotel has everything you need for a fun family stay at Disneyland! Not to far from the park not to mention I loved having the valet to make sure vehicles who were staying at the hotel stayed in the parking lot. The hotel was very clean. Breakfast was great! Absolutely loved the kids suite! Worked so well for my family and I! We will definitely be staying again!
Manager Response: Thank You so much for staying with us and we are so excited you had a "magical" time!  We sure appreciate your comments about your fun experience, great valet service, and clean Hotel.   We are so glad you enjoyed our bunk bed suite and we cannot wait for your return!

Summary: Great layout for grandma & grandpa plus me and the kiddo to all have our space and a gathering place too. Breakfast was sufficient and pleased everyone. Shuttle to Disneyland picked up right in front ($5 all day).
Manager Response: Thank You so much for staying with us! We sure appreciate your feedback about your great visit and we are so glad grandma and grandpa had a great time!  That's what it's all about-family memories!  We are proud of our spacious rooms and great location within the resort. We hope you return for more Disney magic! Come back and see us at the Happiest Place On Earth!

Summary: Overall great experience! Would definitely recommend. Rooms were spacious and breakfast was great. The only thing is parking is too tight. Location is pretty good too. Only thing was first night when we were trying to sleep people were outside drinking and you could hear everything I had to call to complain and after that everything was okay. Other than that great experience.  We will be staying here again.
Manager Response: Thank You so much for staying with us!   We sure appreciate your feedback about your great visit!   We are proud of our spacious rooms and great location within the resort.  We hope you return for more Disney magic! Come back and see us to celebrate the Disney opening of the brand new Star Wars Land!!

Summary: Great hotel for families visiting Disneyland. Clean and friendly. Heated pool was a bonus!  A bit of a walk to the parks but not horrible. Staff was very friendly and the breakfast was perfect for our family. We will defiantly stay here again.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your honest feedback and perfect 5 star rating! We sure appreciate you staying with us and I'm so glad you enjoyed our heated pool and spa and our clean rooms!  We are proud of our great location, and friendly staff and we hope you return for more Disney magic! Come back and see us to celebrate the Disney opening of the brand new Star Wars Land!!

Summary Heading: Great place to stay when going to Disneyland.
Summary: The rooms are nice and the beds are Comfortable. The Breakfast is excellent. Parking is free. The toy story parking lot has a free shuttle to Disneyland. You can just walk to it and skip paying for parking.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your amazing 5 star rating!  We are so glad you enjoyed our comfortable rooms and our filling complimentary hot breakfast!  We look forward to your return for more Disney magic!! Come back and see us for the Star Wars Grand Opening!  We are waiting for you!

Summary: My family I recently stayed in a 2-bedroom suite here. The rooms were great and the staff was very friendly and efficient. We enjoyed the complementary breakfast and short distance to Disneyland. There is an ART tram stop right in front of the hotel and the hotel sold tickets in the lobby. Overall we had a great stay here, I would stay again.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the great feedback! I know you all made some great memories while visiting us here at the Disneyland Resort! Thank you for complementing us on our great breakfast options and our spacious suites! We look forward to your return to see our Hotel upgrades such as new carpet, new beds, new furniture, new sound proof wall and windows, new bathrooms with modern accent tile, and much more! We appreciate your business and can't wait for your return.

Summary Heading: Very well maintained clean large rooms
Summary: I was pleasantly surprised by the size of our room and cleanliness. We walked over to the Toy Story parking lot and used the shuttle for free which was a great option but the shuttle at the hotel was also inexpensive if you choose not to do that.  The front desk was very helpful and nice when we had questions.  Breakfast was good and they have many options! It was a great stay and I'd definitely come back!
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your 4 star rating. We love when guests get excited about our spacious Suites and great location for enjoying a nice walk or catching a quick shuttle ride to get to Disney's Main entrance!  We are so glad you chose our Hotel to stay and we look forward to you returning!  Thanks for mentioning our great breakfast and friendly service!  See you real soon!

Summary Heading: My expectations were low but Raffles exceeded but I was expecting
Summary: Best Western is not my chain or hotels by choice but finding a hotel in Anaheim at the time of the exhibition I was attending is near enough impossible and this looked like the best choice I had as it was walking distance from the exhibition centre. I asked on arrival if they had any renovated rooms and they had one to give me.  The room has two double beds in two separate rooms, perfect for families with a fridge an microwave too, there are no other kitchen facilities but that really wasn't what I was looking for. The room was clean and the town and shower were fine.  The linens weren't the best but this was only a Best Western.  I wasn't used to a "Motel" style hotel with the doors outside so it was quite loud with people sometimes running past. I didn't really communicate
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your honest feedback and 3 star rating! We sure appreciate you staying with us and giving us a try.  I'm so glad you enjoyed and were pleasantly surprised!  We are proud of our clean rooms and friendly staff and we hope you return for more Disney magic!  Come back and see us to celebrate the Disney opening of the brand new Star Wars Land!!

Summary: With a big family I love the family suite. It is 2 rooms they've made into one, which means 2 bathrooms. I had a room with wood floors which I loved it felt so clean. The breakfast here is so good. Lots of options and Its all good. It's a bit far for walking to the park, but we ended up walking a few times because the ART bus wasn't coming as often as it was supposed to, and the walk wasn't too bad. We also rode the toy story shuttle buses a couple times and that was nice. it's super close to the hotel. about a quarter mile/4 minute walk. The rooms aren't very sound proof so just be prepared for that. I have stayed here 2 times now and I would stay here again for sure because of the friendly staff, clean rooms, options for getting to and from the park, and the awesome breakfast.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your 4 star rating! We sure appreciate your kind words about our great location and friendly staff. I'm so glad you enjoyed our spacious 2 bedroom 2 bath family suite!  You're right, it's a great room!  I look forward to you coming back to the Hotel and creating more Disney Magic! We are thrilled for you to see our Hotel upgrades happening this year such as sound proof walls and windows, new furniture, new bathrooms with modern accent tile, new Disney artwork and custom wallpaper, and much more in every room!   We are looking forward to seeing you back this summer for the opening of the brand new Star Wars Land!!

Summary: We stayed here for my parent's 50th wedding anniversary, along with going to Disneyland.  We were a group of 20.  The rooms were spacious and just what we needed. The breakfast was tasty! There was a convenient shuttle to the park. We would definitely come back!
Manager Response: Thanks so much for letting us celebrate with you!  We are so glad you stayed here and we sure appreciate the kind words about our breakfast and our great location!  We look forward to having you all back here to see our Hotel upgrades to our guest rooms, our Exterior, and most of all to continue to celebrate all off life's "Magical" milestones here at the Happiest Place On Earth!

Summary: Room was nice and hot breakfast was great! I highly recommend for families especially if you're visiting Disneyland. I've been wanting to try this hotel for years and I wasn't disappointed. I'll stay here again!
Manager Response: We loved reading this review!  Thanks so much for the great advice to other families out there seeking a Hotel with spacious rooms, and great service!  WE love that you were pleasantly surprised and we cannot wait for you to come back and enjoy the Magic of Disney as we prepare to celebrate the grand opening of Star Wars land!    !

Summary: Rooms were nice and clean. Breakfast was great had loys to choose. The only problem is the thin walls, you could hear everyting outside as if your window was open. Other then the noise the stay was good.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your honest 3 star rating! We sure appreciate your kind words about our clean rooms and great breakfast!  We apologize for the area noise and hope you come back for more fun and great memories!   We appreciate your loyalty to our brand.

Summary: Very convenient to Disneyland,  the hotel was clean, good breakfast and friendly staff.  Could use some remodelling but everything worked fine and was clean.  Did not like having to pay $15.00 per night to park though.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your 4 star rating! We sure appreciate your kind words about our great location and friendly staff.  I look forward to you coming back to the Hotel and creating more Disney Magic! See you for the opening of the brand new Star Wars Land!!

Summary: We made a last minute change to our plans to stay here in late December 2018 while we visited Disneyland with our 9 month old and ten year old. The crib provided was an old metal cot which was noisy and rattled every time my baby moved. It also hurt him when he would roll over as the sides were metal and much smaller than a normal size cot you’d have at home. A porta cot would have been much better rather than their crib.   The microwave was super small so the steriliser did not fit and I had to find another way to sterilise his bottles - i.e. use boiling water from the kettle we packed.   We were on the second floor (three on total) and it was noisy as hell. We could hear every movement from the rooms above us, which some nights were still up around midnight doing god knows
Manager Response: We always appreciate when guests provide honest feedback about their experience.  Thanks for staying with us while you enjoyed the Magic of Disney.  I hope you will return to the hotel and allow us another opportunity to show you our upgraded rooms and hotel improvements such as new beds, new furniture, new mattresses, new Disney artwork, new bathrooms, and we are really excited for you to enjoy our brand new breakfast room expansion!  More seats, more room, more variety!

Summary Heading: Clean spacious room close to Disneyland
Summary: Place was full of families which is a great place sign if you have kids of your own. So close to Disneyland that you can see the fireworks show every night from your room. Rooms were clean and spacious. Shops nice and close just up the road if you need to pick up a few things. A great stay!
Manager Response: Thanks so much for noticing we are a family Hotel!  We want every family to visit and get ready to enjoy the Magic of Disney!  Thank you for staying with us and I'm so glad you enjoyed the clean and spacious rooms as well as our great location!  We cant wait to see you back for your next adventure and to watch the fireworks with us right from your room!

Summary: This place charges $15 a day to park in the hotel lot you stay in.. The  walk to Disneyland took forever they claim its 15 minutes but it's an easy 20+. The beds are as hard as the floor. With the paper thin walls you can hear everything. Breafast was nice but very repeditive. Heated pool was nice . Guest services was nive.
Manager Response: We always appreciate when guests provide honest feedback about their experience.  Thanks for complementing us on our breakfast items as we work hard to give our guests variety and good food.  I hope you will return to the hotel and allow us another opportunity to show you our upgraded rooms and hotel improvements.  We are thrilled for all our guests to enjoy new beds, new furniture, new mattresses, new Disney artwork, new bathrooms with modern accent tile, and much more!  We wish you a Happy New Year and hope you return for more Disney magic!

Summary: Stayed for our Disneyland trip... rooms were very good, and fit all of us ... Had NOISY people above us, and the staff was very kind and moved us to a different room, and the front desk was always friendly... Would recommend this hotel for a family....
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your 4 star rating! We sure appreciate your kind words about our "family friendly" Hotel!  That's a great way to describe this property and we are so glad you enjoyed our great service while visiting!   I will make sure the front desk is acknowledged.  I look forward to you coming back to the Hotel and creating more Disney Magic!  See you for the opening of the brand new Star Wars Land!!

Summary Heading: Great Location for Disneyland and Excellent Family Suites
Summary: Stayed five nights in January 2019 with my daughter and two grandchildren.  We had a family suite (two rooms, five beds) which is ideal for families.  Each room has a full bathroom (bath/shower), flat screen TV and individual heating/air conditioning controls. The rooms are reasonably large with the room with 2 queen beds also having a microwave, small fridge and a small table with two chairs. One small negative, there is no in-room safe.  A standard buffet breakfast is included which has the usual selection of hot and cold items.  The dining area is really too small for the number of rooms in the hotel, although you are allowed to take food back to your room.  There is an outdoor heated pool and hot tub which kids will enjoy.  Paid offstreet parking is available.  DISNEYLAND
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your 4 star rating. We sure appreciate the kind words about our Hotel suites and I'm so glad you were able to spend that precious time with your grandkids right here at our property.  Thanks for the great tip about the different ways guests can get to the Disneyland Theme Parks!  We cant wait for your return to celebrate more Disney Magic!

Summary Heading: Best service anywhere, best breakfast anywhere
Summary: We had a wonderful suite, with bunkbeds that the children loved, and a roomy two-queen bed space.  The breakfast was the best I've ever seen in a hotel.  Each staff member we saw was friendly and eager to please.  The shuttle leaves for Disneyland from right outside the front door, and takes 5-10 minutes to get there.  We left the car at the hotel and took the shuttle, avoiding the long lines for shuttles from Disneyland parking.  The price was very reasonable. The swimming pool and hot tub were an added pleasure, and that area was very well-kept.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your 5 star rating. Happy New Year! We sure appreciate the kind words about our Hotel and spacious suites and amazing breakfast!  It means so much that you took the time to compliment the staff-it means so much to us and is our highest compliment.  We hope you will stay with us each time your travels bring you back to the Happiest Place On Earth! We look forward to your return!

Summary: We stayed 4 nights at the BW & Raffles on Harbor blvd. and had a very positive experience! Due to recent mobility issues, we had more contact with the front desk than we usually do at hotels and were pleasantly surprised at the high level of courtesy, service, and enthusiasm of the front desk staff and the housekeeping staff!The handicap room was clean, spacious, and right next to the elevator. The only complaint we would have is that there was no safety bar inside the tub/shower, a necessity for most with mobility problems. When we asked for something, it came promptly. We asked for the room to be cleaned while we were in it, no problem! The front desk offered to help with transportation arrangements and even called our room to ask if we needed anything! Such good service!
Manager Response: Wow!!  This is an amazing review!   Thanks so much for your 5 star rating. Happy New Year! I'm so proud of the team here and the great service we provide!  Thanks for acknowledging us.  I'm so glad your family created some "Magical" memories while in town.  We hope you will stay with us each time your travels bring you back to the Happiest Place On Earth! We look forward to your return!

Summary Heading: Nice hotel with everything you need
Summary: Stayed 8 nights at the Raffles inn on our Disney vacation. Although we didn’t have a renovated room it was nice to have heaps of space for us and our 2 teens who had their own space in a 2nd bedroom, which was equipped with bunk beds, their own bathroom and TV. Staff were always friendly and helpful and were always aiming to please. Only down sides of this hotel are that it can be a bit noisy with people bringing suitcases past your room (it’s tiled so it’s a bit noisy) as well as when guests run past your room (especially in the morning when excited children are preparing for a day at Disneyland !) also breakfast was hectic, it’s quite a small space and we found it tough to find a seat some days,as well as finding it difficult to move around other patrons. Apart from these
Manager Response: Wow-an 8 nighter!  Amazing!  I know you created some "magical" memories with your family!  We sure appreciate your business and great feedback about your stay.  This is great information for future guests.  Thank you for complementing us on our great location and our spacious 2 bedroom 2 bath suites!  We look forward to your return to see our Hotel upgrades such as new carpet, new beds, new furniture, new sound proof wall and windows, new bathrooms with modern accent tile, and much more! We appreciate your business and can't wait for your return. Happy New Year to your entire family!

Summary Heading: Quiet and a Quick Uber to the Park
Summary: Clean and quiet.  Nice breakfast spread in the morning before you hit the Park.  Bit far out to walk to Park, unless you want to add to your 18,000 steps in the Park.  But a  quick Uber ride gets you to 15-min Wait/Drop-off loop on S. Harbor.
Manager Response: Happy New Year and thanks so much for your 4 star rating and compliment about our breakfast.  We sure appreciate your kind words about our great location and pricing. Thanks for your great feedback about how quick and easy it is to get to the main entrance of Disneyland by UBER!  There's so many options for guests to move around the City and see all that the Disney resort has to offer.  I hope you will allow us another opportunity to better serve you and look forward to you coming back to the Hotel. We wish you a Magical Happy New Year!

Summary Heading: Great stay too far to walk daily yo disneyland
Summary: I’d stay again if this property was closer to Disneyland or they offered a free shuttle. Breakfast was amazing, many options to choose from. staff was kind & helpfull. Kids loved the pool. WIFI was quick.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your 5 star rating! We sure appreciate your kind words about our great breakfast, friendly staff and quick wi-fi. I look forward to you coming back to the Hotel. We have some amazing upgrades going on now that I know you will love when you return such as: new beds, new furniture, new carpet, new bathrooms with modern accent tile, sound proof walls and windows, new Disney artwork and more! We cant wait for you to return!  Happy New Year!

Summary: I walked into this best western looking for some advice on where I could find a rental car, (I was staying at a different best western location but this one was close to where I was walking) even though I was not a guest with them their front desk staff were amazing and so incredibly helpful. Jose in particular! He was so amazingly helpful in a rather stressful time. I will certainly be staying at this location on my next trip to the area just because of this service. We really can't thank Jose enough for the help that he provided us with today.
Manager Response: Wow!!!  What a review!  This is amazing!  We are serious about our customer service!  whether you're a guest here or not!  If you enter our lobby, we want to help with any question you may have!  Thank you for taking a moment to acknowledge Jose for a job Well done!  We are looking forward to you being a guest here and creating "magical" memories with your friends and family!  Thanks so much for your 5 star rating!  When you book here for your next trip to the Disneyland Resort, you can expect to see such new upgrades in our guest rooms such as:  new beds, new furniture, new carpet, new bathrooms with modern accent tile, several new outlets with USB ports, sound proof walls and windows, new Disney artwork and more! Happy New Year!

Summary: The staff at this hotel were very friendly and helpful. I would recommend this hotel if you have young children.  The downside for us was the noise! There are nice tiles outside on each level but when people pull their suitcases along it is SUPER Loud!! The cleaning staff drag their carts over the tiles which is even louder.   As for the rooms - we could hear the people above us walking around (thumping)earlier than we wanted to get up. The walls are so thin that if our neighbour had a shower I felt like they were in our room!! Our last night the neighbors checked in late and were super loud and woke us all up.   The furniture and decor was fine, but a little behind the times when it came to having plugs nearby to charge phones.
Manager Response: Thank you for your honest feedback about your recent stay with us here at the Disneyland Resort.  We sure appreciate your kind words about our friendly staff and we apologize everything wasn't perfect.  That is always our goal.  I look forward to you coming back to the Hotel as we have some amazing upgrades going on now that I know you will love such as: new beds, new furniture, new carpet, new bathrooms with modern accent tile, several new outlets with USB ports, sound proof walls and windows, new Disney artwork and more! We are also expanding our breakfast room and bringing our guests a "firework viewing area" complete with couches, bon fire pits and a replacing atmosphere to hear and see the "Magic of Disney's fireworks!"  We cant wait for you to return!

Summary: We were given a room that had an odor, but the staff was so helpful and was able to move us the next day.  We went to Disneyland and the staff moved all of our luggage (and the wine in the refrigerator)l. The hotel is about a mile from Disneyland, but there is a city bus that completes a run every 20 minutes.  The fair is $3 for adults, $1 for children and $1 for seniors.  We walked in the morning and took the bus back at night because we had so much fun (and walking) in the parks.  Their breakfast was good (waffles, pancakes, cereal, sausage, eggs, yogurt, pastries, oatmeal, fruit, etc.).  The hotel is older, but when we moved to the 2nd floor I was impressed with the room.  The beds are comfortable and there is a parking attendant watching the cars all night.  It’s a very nice
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your 5 star rating! We sure appreciate your kind words about our staff and the breakfast.  Most of all, you allowed us the opportunity to make things right during your visit.  We want every guest to know how important it is to us that if things aren't perfect-please tell us so we can fix it!  We know how hard you worked to bring your family here to the Happiest Place On Earth and I'm so glad you had a wonderful time!  I look forward to you coming back to the Hotel. We have some amazing upgrades going on now that I know you will love when you return such as: new beds, new furniture, new carpet, new bathrooms with modern accent tile, several new outlets with USB ports, sound proof walls and windows, new Disney artwork and more! We cant wait for you to return!

Summary: This hotel is great for the location, Room is new and clean. Rather not pay not for parks other then that it was a good stay. So Many restaurants in walking distance of the hotel. I would stay here again since it al close to the park
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your 3 star rating and for taking the time to compliment our newly renovated rooms and great location.  You're right, we have some great locations for food & fun all within walking distance and we appreciate you staying here with us.  We cant wait for your return for more Disney magic!

Summary: Best Western had so much to offer to our little family. We had a great breakfast each morning and the staff were very accommodating to our needs. The room we stayed in was a lot bigger than we had anticipated and that was a great surprise.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the great feedback!  I know you all made some great memories while visiting us here at the Disneyland Resort!  Thank you for complementing us on our great breakfast options and our spacious suites!  We look forward to your return to see our Hotel upgrades such as new carpet, new beds, new furniture, new sound proof wall and windows, new bathrooms with modern accent tile, and much more! We appreciate your business and can't wait for your return. Happy New Year to your entire family!

Summary: You get what you pay for. The room we stayed in was in desperate need of an update (carpet stained, floor uneven)... that said, it had hot water, decent continental breakfast,  and very friendly staff.  Located right on top of the bus route to Disneyland it provided a nice opportunity to ride the bus if you didn't feel like walking the mile down the road to the park. We did both.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the honest feedback about your recent visit to our Hotel. We are proud of the great customer service we give every guest and we sure appreciate you acknowledging them. Thank you for complementing us on our great breakfast options as we sure work hard to make sure you have a lot of options to start your day! I hope you had an amazing visit at the Happiest Place On Earth and we look forward to your return to see our Hotel upgrades such as new carpet, new beds, new furniture, new sound proof wall and windows, new bathroom with modern accent tile, and much more! We appreciate your business and can't wait for your return.

Summary: Very helpful...went out of their way to help us and be convenient. Friendly and willing to help in any situation.The staff kept the breakfast room supplied. Nothing ever empty or low. Greeted us in the morning. Always had a freshly made bed. Accomadated us when we ran out of coffee.
Manager Response: Thank you for the amazing 5 star rating!  That means so much to us!  We will share your feedback with the entire team.... We are proud of the great customer service we give every guest-especially in our breakfast room!  We know how important a "family meal"  together is.  I hope you return to see our Hotel upgrades such as new carpet, new beds, new furniture, new sound proof wall and windows, new bathroom with modern accent tile, and much more! We appreciate your business and can't wait for your return!

Summary: Went to diseyland  and stayed at best western  for a couple of nights.   Rooms were perfect fit for the family . Loved how there was a separate room. Only promblem was the smell when u first walk in room , maybe the carpet needs shampooing.   Overall  the room was great,   Breakfast  was excellent .  And so was the staff.   Yes i would rexommend this hotel and   stay there again  .
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the honest feedback about your recent visit to our Hotel. We are proud of the great customer service we give every guest! Thank you for complementing us on our great breakfast options!   I hope you had an amazing visit at the Happiest Place On Earth and we look forward to your return to see our Hotel upgrades such as new carpet, new beds, new furniture, new sound proof wall and windows, new bathroom with modern accent tile, and much more! We appreciate your business and can't wait for your return.

Summary: Terrible hotel and experience. We booked a room with bunk beds, but were told upon check in that all bunk bed rooms were occupied. No compensation or additional attempts to solve the problem were made. They did offer, after we had already unpacked, to move us to a bunk bed room that they magically found for two nights of our stay. However, we would need to move back to the other room mid-stay. We declined that option. The room was dirty and smelled like smoke. The hotel is extremely noisy with very thin walls. The free breakfast was almost inedible. I do not recommend anything about this hotel. When we complained about the bad service, no one offered any apologies.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your feedback about your recent visit.  I'm so glad to know after our research into the matter, our front desk team provided great service by extending an offer for a complimentary upgrade for two nights of your visit to our 2 bedroom family suite even though that isn't the room you booked.  We appreciate every guest that stays here as we know you have a lot of Hotel choices.  We want to help you relax and get excited about the Magic of Disney as soon as you arrive!    We hope you enjoyed the spacious 2 bedroom 1 bath Queen suite you originally booked and we would love for you to return to the hotel to see all our amazing upgrades happening!    Happy & Magical Holidays to you and yours!!

Summary Heading: Convienent to DL Toy story parking lot
Summary: We've stayed here several times since it's within walking distance to catch the shuttle in the toy story parking to DL. Saves $20 on parking!  They have a good selection for breakfast and it was well stocked.  Rooms are average but good enough for a comfortable night sleep.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the feedback about your recent visit to our Hotel. We are proud of our great location and we sure appreciate you being one of our very special "return" guests!  You coming back to stay with us is our highest compliment and we are grateful!  We are so glad you enjoyed our filling breakfast options and comfortable hotel. We appreciate your business and can't wait for your next visit!

Summary: The staff is amazing at this hotel. The distance to Disney is not to far by taking the ART buses.  The beds were not very comfortable but the breakfast is great. You get what you pay for in this hotel but they try really hard. Enjoy!
Manager Response: Than k you so much!!  I will make sure your great experience is shared with the entire team!  It means so much to us that our guests feel welcome!  I'm so glad you enjoyed the hot breakfast staff and the ease in which you can get to the Disneyland Theme Parks from here.  We are looking forward to seeing you back again for more fun and more memories!

Summary: We are just about done with our one-week stay at the Raffles Inn and we have enjoyed our stay so much. The staff here works so hard, are friendly and if you have an issue--they jump on it right away. The breakfast crew not only present a great breakfast, but they are cheerful and hard working. Jasmine never seems to stop working...always on top of the needs. happy and cheerful.
Manager Response: This is great feedback!  Wow!!! Thank you for complementing us on our great staff and filling breakfast! That means a lot that our guests enjoy our complimentary Hot breakfast before starting your day! I will make sure our entire team is acknowledged for the hard work and great customer service.  We are looking forward to seeing you back again for more fun and more memories!

Summary Heading: Great option for Disneyland and Anaheim area visitors
Summary: Very good and clean hotel close to Disneyland. Helpful and friendly staff particulary in parking lot and breakfast room. Nice breakfast options included in price. Parking is extra which was my only minus.Rooms are well maintained and odor free. Overall a great experience with my family.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the feedback about your recent visit to our Hotel.  We are proud of the great customer service we give every guest!  Thank you for complementing us on our filling breakfast options, clean hotel with an amazing location, and best of all-you had a great experience!  We will certainly acknowledge our entire team for a job well done!  We appreciate your business and can't wait for your return.

Summary: Good breakfast, close to the Disneyland shuttle and very friendly staff. Able to accommodate our need for a early check-in. Would definitely consider staying here again on another Disney trip due to the great price too.
Manager Response: Wow!!! Thank you for complementing us on our great breakfast!  That means a lot that our guests enjoy our complimentary Hot breakfast items that include healthy and yet satisfying options before starting your day!  I will make sure our entire team is acknowledged for the hard work and great customer service that's part of our daily life here.  We are looking forward to seeing you back again for more fun and more memories!

Summary: Love this hotel 2nd time staying here will highly recommend it. Staff is awesome and was very helpful. Breakfast was great. Pool was always clean and stock with towels. Room was very clean and had everything we needed housekeeping was great.
Manager Response: Thank you for your loyalty to this Hotel and for visiting us whenever your travels bring you to the Disneyland Resort!  Thanks for complementing our hard working staff by acknowledging the great service we strive to provide daily.  Your comments will be shared and celebrated with our entire team!  We are thrilled to be your "home away from home" while in Anaheim! Come back and see us real soon!

Summary: Love the room, we had a family suite for our family of 6. It worked great for us! Will definitely look into staying at this property again in the future. My only criticism is that there is a parking fee for your car. I didn’t know about it until I arrived for check in. Also there is no hotel shuttle to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your 5 out of 5 rating!  We are so appreciative you selected our Hotel to stay at and celebrate the "Magic of Disney!"  I'm glad you enjoyed our spacious 2 bedroom suites and we cant wait for your return to see all of our Hotel improvements such as: new beds, new carpet, new Disney artwork, new furniture, new sound proof windows and walls and more!   In the near future, we will be sprinkling "pixie dust" on our breakfast room and Hotel Exterior for an updated, amazing look and feel our guests will be proud ot call home while visiting the Resort!   We look forward to your return!

Summary Heading: Great place for our family of 5
Summary: Super friendly front desk and parking attendants, spacious room, fridge, microwave, and even welcome treats! Hot breakfast (what you’d expect with Best Western). Pool was small but sufficient, and not too much road noise (away from the highway). Would definitely book here again!
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your great review and honest feedback. We are proud to be a walking distance hotel to the Disneyland theme parks. We are also proud of the great customer service we provide to our guests and we thank you for complementing our great location, breakfast, and our amazing staff. We will acknowledge our front desk team as well as housekeeping, valet & maintenance for a job well done. We want you to know we appreciate your business and we can't wait for you to come back to the resort to see our upgrades such as: new beds, new carpet, new furniture in all rooms, new bathrooms with modern accent tile, new Disney artwork, new accent wallpaper in every room, new sound proof windows and walls, and more!

Summary Heading: Best hotel service we ever had
Summary: The service was outstanding. The best service from a hotel we’ve ever had. It’s an older hotel and the beds weren’t the best but we’ll definitely be coming back for all our Disney trips. You don’t get this type of service everywhere. The staff was genuinely nice and caring and went out of their way to help us.
Manager Response: Wow!!!  Now this is a great review!  We are so excited to see our customer service helped make your trip to the Anaheim Resort special!  This is our highest compliment we can get from a guest and we are so grateful.  I will make sure your comments are shared and celebrated with our entire team because everyone works so hard to make sure our guests realize how special they are.  We absolutely love when our guests come back to stay with us anytime your travels bring you to the Happiest Place On Earth!  We are thrilled for you to see our new look with items such as new carpet, new beds, new modern furniture, new bathrooms, new sound proof walls and windows and that's just the beginning!    We are thrilled to be your "home away from home" while in Anaheim!

Summary: Great very knowledgeable staff the gentleman in the parking area was amazing and very professional and also had a great sense of humor hotel was great rooms are perfect couldn't have been better at all!!!
Manager Response: THANK YOU!!  What a great review.  Our entire team here works so hard to make sure every guest feels special and welcome!  I'm so glad to hear you acknowledge that even our valet team joins us in providing great service!  Thanks so much for staying here and I'm so glad you enjoyed the spacious rooms!

Summary: This has been our go for to hotel for over 4 years we stay here annually for our trip to Disneyland and always given 5 stars. This last trip we went for just over a week and were excited for our usual stay but this time was disappointing. The pool was closed the whole time and we were not notified prior which sucked cuz with 3kids a pool in the hot weather is a huge selling feature. We were told they were going to set us up with another hotel to use the pool but that never happened. We had stuff go missing out our room on more than one occasion. Two things the cleaner had some how taken to laundry on separate occasions, I don't know how they grabbed them So we got them back. Another item was never found. Our keys stopped working a few times, there were jsut so many things that
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your honest feedback about your recent visit. Wow-you've been coming here and creating magical memories for 4 years!  THANK YOU!!  Your satisfaction is most important to us and I apologize your last stay wasn't perfect.  Our repeat guests are most important to us as we are grateful to you for making this your "home away from home" whenever you visit the Disneyland Resort.  Thank you for your business!  We hope to keep earning your trust and that you will return again to allow us a chance to make it a perfect getaway.  We are proud to be renovating and improving the Hotel-which is why the pool was out during your last visit.  The brand new sparkling pool is completed now and looks amazing!  It's waiting for you...We are also improving things by adding new beds, new bathrooms with modern accent tile, new furniture for all rooms, new Disney artwork, new carpet, new sound proof walls and windows, and much more! I look forward to seeing you back again to experience more Disney magic!

Summary: Before booking, we looked at pictures on the website of the rooms, room layout, and hotel. But what we didn't know is that only some of the rooms were renovated and looked like that. When we arrived, our room looked almost nothing like the room in the pictures we had seen. Our room was old, smelled like it was formerly a smoking room, and did not have the room perks like the one in the pictures. We traveled with others and it was not possible to switch rooms or hotels during our stay. In spite of the room condition, the staff here was fantastic! We were treated very nicely and were impressed with the work that they all did.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your review and feedback about our great service as that's the highest compliment we can get from a guest and we sure appreciate it!  We are proud to be sprinkling "pixie dust" throughout the Hotel and improving this wonderful property even more.  Upon your return you can expect to see changes in all guest rooms such as:  new beds, new carpet, new furniture in all rooms, new bathrooms with modern accent tile, new Disney artwork, new accent wallpaper in every room, new sound proof windows and walls, and more!  We hope you will allow us another opportunity to again provide great service along with a brand new upgraded Hotel your family and friends will enjoy for many years to come!

Summary: Our family stayed at this location on a vacation trip to Disneyland.  The staff was helpful, the breakfast was great with several menu options, the rooms were clean and the beds were comfortable.  The parking attendant/security was nice and did a great job.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your great review about your visit to the Happiest Place On Earth!  We sure appreciate it and look forward to your return. We are proud to be a walking distance hotel to the Disneyland theme parks. We are also proud of the great customer service we provide to our guests and we thank you for complementing our staff including our valet.  I'm also glad you enjoyed our complimentary HOT breakfast. We want you to know we appreciate your business and we can't wait for you to come back to the resort to see our upgrades.  I'm glad you enjoyed the brand new beds being placed in all rooms!   We look forward to your return for more Magical memories as Disneyland changes and improves the Theme Parks and we improve the look and feel of our Hotel along with them.

Summary: This hotel was a good value for staying close to Disney property. The hotel is undergoing renovation and will be really nice when completely done. Easy to get to, great speedy check in with the parking attendant and front desk staff. Room was very good for a family, we had bunk beds which worked great. Beds comfortable. Carpet, walls, furniture worn, but for the time spent in the room, was ok for what we needed, which was just really a comfortable bed. Prior to this hotel we stayed at a Hyatt the previous night, and didnt get sleep because the room was good but the bed sucked, so the bed at best western was all we really asked for! Breakfast was good enough to get you started for the day, would have liked them to switch up items but overall it was good. Bfast staff very
Manager Response: Thanks so much for staying with us and taking time to post this review.    Your feedback is appreciated with regard to mentioning easy access to the Disneyland Theme Parks by using the Toy Story shuttle or the ART shuttle.  We are thrilled everyone enjoyed the breakfast and our brand new comfortable beds!  We are working hard to provide our guetss with amazing service and a great quality, clean and friendly Hotel.   We hoep you return next time your travels bring oyu back to the Anaheim Resort so you can enjoy our room upgrades such as new bathrooms with modern accent tile, new furniture for all rooms, new Disney artwork, new sound proof walls & windows, and much more! We cant wait to see you for more Disney magic!!

Summary: The hotel is in a great location for visiting the Disneyland resort's.Rooms: They are in desperate need of renovations. The rooms are clean yet appear worn and dirty due to major repairs needed.Staff: Were alright. Didn't go out of their way to interact with customers. Overall: I have stayed here a few years prior to this visit and had a much better experience.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for staying with us and commenting on our great location.  We read your feedback about our guest rooms and I'm proud to say we are already renovating and improving our hotel to make it even better!   We are about what's taking place with such new items such as new beds, new bathrooms with modern accent tile, new furniture and custom wall paper for all guest rooms, new Disney artwork, new carpet, new sound proof walls and windows, more outlets in every room, and new lighting!  We look forward to your return to the Happiest Place On Earth!

Summary: The hotel was wonderful, easy access to Disneyland with the ART shuttle bus and breakfast was fast and good selection of food, tasted good, room was clean, bed and pillows were comfortable and spacious. Staff was very nice and helpful made the whole process easy.
Manager Response: This is the kind of review we love to get!  Thanks so much!  Your feedback is appreciated with regard to mentioning easy access to the Disneyland Theme Parks by using the ART shuttle and thanks for mentioning our amazing breakfast!   We are most excited you were able to see first hand how amazing our staff is here and we sure appreciate you taking the time to acknowledge them.   We look forward to you returning to celebrate more Disney Holidays with us and enjoy all of the exciting upgrades currently taking place such as new bathrooms with modern accent tile, new furniture for all rooms, new Disney artwork, new sound proof walls & windows, and much more!  We cant wait to see you for more Disney magic!!

Summary: Chose this hotel as close to Disney parks. Our room had been refurbished recently apparently, but for the life of me I couldn't see where! Old fashioned wallpaper, furniture and fittings and the nasty colour of the paint -just wow!!!! But the bedding, bathroom and sink area were clean and perfectly acceptable. Breakfast, included in the price, was excellent. Plenty of choice, hot tea and coffee and lots of tables, those kitchen ladies work hard. The pool and hot tub were clean and parking was never an issue. You're not going to spend much time here with plenty of attractions nearby so it's not a bad choice.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your honest feedback regarding your recent visit to the happiest place on earth! We are so proud to have a great location near the convention center and Disneyland Theme Parks and I’m so excited you found the value in that! There’s so much to see and do while visiting the resort and I’m glad you enjoyed the breakfast.  We are thrilled to be sprinkling pixie dust everywhere to bring you even more value with new carpet, new furniture, new bathrooms, new sound proof windows and walls, new Disney artwork & custom wallpaper, and more!

Summary Heading: Couldn't wait to write this one!
Summary: We booked our rooms at the last minute due to a change in our travel circumstances. What was expected to be a normal two-day stay turned out to be EXCEPTIONAL. I want to firstly give a shout out to Cruz Campbell and his team, Stephanie and Jose. From the bottom of our hearts, thank you for your flexibility and compassion. Thank you also for the comfortable stay as you knew we were starting to get homesick. We couldn't have picked a better place to tide us through our rough couple of days.  We liked that the inn was located a bit further from the crowd. The rooms and the property did not feel over-used or tired. It was also a lot quieter at night so easier to get some rest. Our rooms were spacious and we found that there was sufficient floor space and wall sockets for four
Manager Response: What a great review!  Thanks so much for your wonderful feedback regarding your recent visit to the Happiest Place on Earth!  I know traveling away from home can be stressful but I'm so glad you felt comfortable and welcomed here!  That's such a great compliment.  and we are so proud of our team members!  I will make sure they're acknowledged for a job well done.  We look forward to seeing you again to check out our new hotel room upgrades! We are thrilled to be sprinkling pixie dust everywhere to bring you even more value with new carpet, new furniture, new bathrooms, new sound proof windows and walls, new Disney artwork and more!

Summary: We stayed at this hotel for 9 nights, the price we paid to what we got was fantastic especially compared to other hotel/motels in the area. It’s about a 25min walk to the Disney entrance so maybe with little kids it may not be ideal, we didn’t visit Disney so it wasn’t an issue for us. Pool wasn’t working for half of our stay but we just did more shopping. The noise is an issue if your on the bottom floor you can hear upstairs walking, they definitely need to sound proof a bit better. Other then that issue and a few door issues we had over numerous days ( which they fixed immediately) we had a great stay! Would definitely recommend. The breakfast dosent change it’s the same every day which gets a bit boring especially after 10 days but we managed and it was free, so who can
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your great feedback about your recent experience with our Hotel. Wow-a 9 night stay!! thanks so much for making us your home away from home while visiting! I'm hopeful you will return to the property and see all of the exciting upgrades currently taking place such as new beds, new bathrooms with modern accent tile, new furniture for all rooms, new Disney artwork, new carpet, new sound proof walls and windows, and much more! Its important to us that our guests see the value in our hotel and the great customer service we provide. We are also proud to be renovating the breakfast room to offer more seating, and more items for you to enjoy! We hope you return to enjoy all of our upgrades and experience more Disney magic!

Summary: First time visitors to Anaheim. This was a great location, close to Disney & all the nearby restaurants.  The free breakfast exceeded our expectations too. Plenty to choose from & quite generous.  The pool & spa were great too.  Only negative for us was noise.
