The air con unit was loud & the walls must be very thin as we could hear every move from our upstairs neighbours. So when they woke, we woke.  All in all a good experience.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your great feedback about your recent experience with our Hotel. I'm hopeful you will return to the property and see all of the exciting upgrades currently taking place such as new beds, new bathrooms with modern accent tile, New furniture for all rooms, new Disney artwork, new carpet, new sound proof walls and windows, and much more! Its important to us that our guests see the value in our hotel and the great customer service we provide. We are also proud to be renovating the breakfast room to offer more seating, and more items for you to enjoy! We hope you return to enjoy all of our upgrades and experience more Disney magic!

Summary: Came here for a power ranger convention. Close to the convention center. Good pool. Nice room. Nothing crazy fancy but perfect for what i was looking for. Staff was great and the guy out front who checked you in before going inside was super friendly.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your great feedback about your recent experience with our Hotel during your Convention visit!  I'm hopeful you will return to the property and see all of the exciting upgrades currently taking place such as new beds, new bathrooms with modern accent tile, New furniture for all rooms, new Disney artwork, new carpet, new sound proof walls and windows, and much more! Its important to us that our guests see the value in our hotel and the great customer service we provide. We are so proud of our team here and our main goal is for you to have an amazing time! We hope you return to enjoy all of our upgrades and experience more Disney magic!

Summary: On harbor Blvd...mins from Disneyland.. walking distance is an option...Very reasonable on price /night.. highly recommend this hotel with larger families..They have queen siites.. family of 6 here very comfortable with refrigerator and microwave!
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your honest feedback about your recent experience with our Hotel. I'm hopeful you will return to the property and see all of the exciting upgrades currently taking place such as new beds, new bathrooms with modern accent tile, new furniture for all rooms, new Disney artwork, new carpet, new sound proof walls and windows, and much more! Its important to us that our guests see the value in our hotel and the great customer service we provide. We are so proud of our team here and our main goal is for you to have an amazing time! We hope you return to enjoy all of our upgrades and experience more Disney magic!

Summary: Parking is $15 Just FYIRoom 231 had lots of noise, carpets need cleaning badly, and beds are 1 bunkbed and 1 queen not three twins seperately as shown in pictures. Beds extremly firmTheir system was down for movies the entire nightStaff friendly
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your honest feedback about your recent experience with our Hotel. It's our main goal to do what we can to help you relax and enjoy your time here. I apologize your stay wasn't perfect.  I'm hopeful you will return to the property and allow us another opportunity to better serve you and see all of the exciting upgrades currently taking place such as new beds, new bathrooms with modern accent tile, new furniture for all rooms, new Disney artwork, new carpet, new sound proof walls and windows, and much more! Its important to us that our guests see the value in our hotel and the great customer service we provide. We are so proud of our team here and our main goal is for you to have an amazing time! We hope you return to enjoy all of our upgrades and experience more Disney magic!

Summary: Staff was professional and courteous. Breakfast was good. 2 Bedroom 2 Bath Suite accomodated my guests and I really well. Just a heads up there is a $15 parking fee. One great accomodation is that this hotel will allow you to park on-site the day of check-in prior to check-in time and will evn hold your luggage upon request.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your honest feedback about your recent experience with our Hotel. We sure appreciate it!  We are so glad you enjoyed our amazing 2 bedroom family suite!  Its the pride and joy of the hotel.  I'm hopeful you will return to the property and see all of the exciting upgrades currently taking place such as new beds, new bathrooms with modern accent tile, New furniture and custom wall paper for all guest rooms, new Disney artwork, new carpet, new sound proof walls and windows, new lighting and much more! Thank you for complementing the team on great customer service!  that's our highest compliment.  Come back and see us at the Happiest Place On Earth!

Summary: The staff is very friendly and helpful. The rooms are modern, very clean and nicely decorated. The appliances all worked well.  The breakfast was a wonderful varied selection of things to eat.  Overall it was a very nice experience.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your great feedback and 5 star rating about your recent experience with our Hotel. We take ride on our clean, Hotel and we want you to relax and enjoy your time here. I'm hopeful you will return to the property and see all of the exciting upgrades currently taking place such as new beds, new bathrooms with modern accent tile, New furniture and custom wall paper for all guest rooms, new Disney artwork, new carpet, new sound proof walls and windows, new lighting and much more! Its important to us that our guests see the value in our hotel and the great customer service we provide. We are also proud to be improving and renovating our breakfast room!  We will have more space and more food options for you.  We hope you return to enjoy all of our upgrades and experience more Disney magic!

Summary: Staff is very frendly, and rooms are very nice, and clean. Could not believe this is a 3 star hotel. Would stay here again. For the price you get more then you are expecting.  I do wish the pool was a bit bigger, can get over crowded but not the end of the world.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your honest feedback about your recent experience with our Hotel. We want you to relax and enjoy your time here and I'm so glad you enjoyed all the hotel has to offer.  I'm hopeful you will return to the property and see all of the exciting upgrades currently taking place such as new beds, new bathrooms with modern accent tile, New furniture and custom wall paper for all guest rooms, new Disney artwork, new carpet, new sound proof walls and windows, new lighting and much more! Its important to us that our guests see the value in our hotel and the great customer service we provide. We are also proud to be improving and renovating our breakfast room!  We will have more space and more food options for you.  We hope you return to enjoy all of our upgrades and experience more Disney magic!  Thanks for your honest comment about the pool-we appreciate it.

Summary: We arrived at the hotel on a Saturday ,at 16;45, where I reserved 2 weeks prior arrival and paid I full. The hotel overbooked and my room was given away??? I was left on the street with two young kids, searching for 4 hours where nothing was available all sold out!!! The manager was rude and didn’t care at all!! We were passing 2 days 1 night in Anaheim to visit the ducks of Anaheim and Disney downtown supper was planned,, all our plans got canceled as we had no where to stay!!!we left Anaheim at 21;00,, with crying kids, to a hôtel found in another city 45 min mon drive!!  This is unacceptable! I do not recommend! You cannot just cancel reservations without a reason????
Manager Response: First, I wanted to Thank You for the feedback provided about your recent stay here at Best Western Raffles Inn and Suites. It is feedback like yours that helps us become better and improve the stay of future guests.  I have reviewed your feedback and met with the front desk staff so everyone is updated on your experience.  I certainly want to find out some details on your booking experience as our main goal is for our guests to be able to book and confirm a reservation easily thru online methods, mobile, or phone.  We want it to be easy so we can provide our guests with a great experience while they visit the Happiest Place On Earth!    I hope you allow us another opportunity to better serve you and return to see our $2 million dollar Hotel transformation!  It includes new bedding, hard wood floors in selected rooms, Best of all, brand new room interiors which include all new furniture, Disney artwork, new beds, new carpet, a new lighting package, a modern color décor, as well as completely new bathroom tile and furnishings.     We are most excited to bring our guests a bigger breakfast room which includes outdoor patio seating and modern décor and furnishings.

Summary: We are a family of 4 and stayed in a family suite with my sister-in-law and niece. The suite was perfect as there is a door between the bunk room and additional bathroom from the room that had 2 queen beds. It allowed us visiting time but we were still able to maintain some privacy. The rooms were clean and the staff were super friendly and considerate at all times. The breakfast area was clean, well-stocked and had a great selection of items. We used the pool, fitness centre and laundry facilities and everything was clean and in working order while we were there. We spent some time at Disneyland and we walked a couple of times (we have older children) but primarily used the shuttle buses at the nearby Toy Story parking lot. There are shuttles leaving the parking lot constantly
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your great feedback about your recent experience with our Hotel. We want you to relax and enjoy your time here and I'm so glad you did!  Our 2 bedroom Suites are so special and I'm hopeful you will return to the property to see all of the exciting upgrades currently taking place such as new beds, new bathrooms with modern accent tile, New furniture and custom wall paper for all guest rooms, new Disney artwork, new carpet, new sound proof walls and windows, new lighting and much more! Its important to us that our guests see the value in our hotel and the great customer service we provide. We are also proud to be improving and renovating our breakfast room!  We will have more space and more food options for you.  We hope you return to enjoy all of our upgrades and experience more Disney magic!

Summary: This hotel has a lot of interesting room layouts which is really useful when you are going with a large group.  The staff here is super friendly but that is really the only saving grace of this hotel.  The rooms feel dirty and you can see a lot of issues that need fixing.  The lights on the walls didn't always turn on and they weren't screwed in very well as they moved side to side.  The wallpaper is falling off of the wall.  The shower head is coming away  from the wall.  Overall the room felt rundown and dirty.  Also, the free breakfast is the same every single day.  It doesn't taste that good and foods can be overcooked.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your honest feedback about your recent experience with our Hotel. We want you to relax and enjoy your time here. You deserve it! I'm hopeful you will return to the property and see all of the exciting upgrades currently taking place such as new beds, new bathrooms with modern accent tile, New furniture and custom wall paper for all guest rooms, new Disney artwork, new carpet, new sound proof walls and windows, new lighting and much more! Its important to us that our guests see the value in our hotel and the great customer service we provide. We are also proud to be improving and renovating our breakfast room!  We will have more space and more food options for you.  We hope you return to enjoy all of our upgrades and experience more Disney magic!

Summary: Awesome stay!  .Nice and cozy rooms. Clean and very well stocked.  Friendly staff. Walking distance to Disneyland. Breakfast was fantastic!  Such a variety.  I was amazed overall, how nice everything was, what you get for your money.  Great value!   I would so recommend a stay here..

We hope you return to enjoy all of our upgrades and experience more Disney magic! Thank You!

Summary: if you are planning a trip to Disneyland or any place around Anaheim I highly recomend staying at the Best Western Plus Raffles Inn & Suites.  The Staff are very friendly and accomodating.  They went out of their way to allow my daughters to leave their car at the hotel for a few hours so we could all go to Downtown Disney together (as I have a parking pass) to have dinner after we all had gone to the Angel game. My husband, grandson and myself were staying here for 2 nights but they just joined us for the game and dinner. Nice being able to have a full breakfast before heading to Disneyland saved us a lot of time and money not to have to go out some where and get breakfast.  I have a Disney Annual Pass so I would use this hotel again in the future when we come to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your great review and honest feedback. We sure appreciate it and look forward to your return. Summary: Booked this hotel, but had to cancel. Had a cancellation confirmation. When it would have came time for the reservation received no notice from Best Western, but did receive a fraud notice from my credit card company that my card was charged for the booking. Contacted BW and they put me through to the location. I explained what was going on, but the agent said nothing she could do. I asked to speak the manager, agent said manager not in. I asked for a call back and the agent said “yeah I’ll have the manager call back” then hung up on me. Never got a call. Was a BW member, but after this poor experience will NEVER STAY AT A BW AGAIN!
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your honest feedback about your recent experience with our Hotel.  Our apologies about the reservation issue. Summary: Great hotel near Disneyland. I always try and stay at a Best Western Plus whenever I get the chance. Their staff is always so nice and professional. Got a shuttle pass for a family of 4 for less than 20.00 and you can use it all day and takes you right to the front gates of Disneyland and California Adventure.

We are so glad you enjoyed the breakfast and our clean, comfortable rooms.

Summary: There are (at least) three Best Western hotels near Disneyland, this one is 3-4 very long blocks away. It also is priced accordingly and more quiet. Do your research. Parking was not an issue- the lot gets full but is organized. This hotel worked very well for us!

Summary: The staff was very friendly and helpful, the breakfast area got alittle crowded but the food was great, the room was very clean and even had towels in the shape of a dinosaur. It was a great hotel without costing a fortune!
Manager Response: Thanks so much for taking the time to acknowledge our hotel and our great staff with a 5 star rating! We hope you return for more Disney Magic here at the Happiest Place On Earth!

Summary: From the moment we arrived each staff member made us feel welcome. They were all very helpful and friendly! The breakfast was great and housekeeping did more than we expected. If you're planning a family trip to Disneyland, this is a great place to stay!!
Manager Response: Thanks so much for taking the time to acknowledge our hotel with a 5 star rating! We hope you return for more Disney Magic here at the Happiest Place On Earth!

Summary Heading: Cold Management and Front desk staff
Summary: Although the room was satisfactory, clean and spacious. I had to laugh about the height of the bathroom sink..very low assuming because of the family oriented location of Disney in close range and the stupid round pillow on the bed is unnecessary is not useful and it looks dumb...sorry interior decorators it's an environmentally impacted future landfill. Almost every-time I exited the room I smelled cigarette smoke. The breakfast was nothing but cheap quality food, the processed hockey puck shaped eggs tasted weird and chewy and the rest of the selection was of fattening processed white flour products(pancakes, waffles and such), and sugar laced cereals and lard made pastries. Explains why Americans are the fattest nation. Only one platter of fruit available such as the

Summary: I have been a fan of most Best Western properties. This one was one of my favorites, the staff was great! From housekeepers to front desk everyone I spoke with had a smile on their face and seemed to like their job. Parking lot can get busy but we never had a problem parking as needed. The breakfast was amazing and I went til 9:30 for us that like to sleep in late and go to Disney later in the day. Will highly recommend it as a place to stay and the bus stop for Disneyland is just down the road less than 100 yards. The only noise issue was the housekeepers cart sounded like a train and seemed like they started at 8 am.

Summary: Going to Disneyland is quite an expense so finding accommodations that don't break the bank is important. We were lucky to find this hotel! Six of us were in need of a room...3 children, 3 adults and we wanted to stay together. This hotel offers a suite - one main "typical" hotel room with an extra bedroom separated by an interior door. The main room had a queen bed and a sofa bed. The suite had a queen, two night stands, dresser and tv. Though this wasn't one of the updated rooms (they are currently renovating) it was in great shape and no complaints can be made. The beds were very comfortable, which is unusual in affordably priced hotels. We didn't spend much time in the room but the first night there we were able to look out the window and see the fireworks at Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your great review and honest feedback. We sure appreciate it and look forward to your return. Summary: We stayed May 28-June 1 2018. The hotel set up is nice, the size of the family suite was perfect (2 adults, 3 kids) although I do wish there was an extra half bathroom in the parent's room. The breakfast was the biggest I've seen for a free breakfast, which was a nice surprise.  The distance to the park was good. It was about a 15 minute walk, but you can easily catch a FREE ride on the Disney shuttle from the Toy Story parking lot just down the street. I was afraid a Disney castmember would turn us away but they were super friendly and inviting.  The hotel staff were nice enough but I didn't have much interaction with them.  I would recommend it to families needing more than 2 beds close to Disney.

Summary Heading: A Great Place To Stay and Affordable!
Summary: As we checked in they were very helpful and very kind! We went to our room and we were excited it was very roomy! we had all the room we needed! The continental breakfast was great and our little kids all filled  their bellies were full before hitting Disney! The pool was fun to relax in the hot tub was great and it was very well clean and plenty of towels! The place was very affordable for a for our family of 7! When we went to leave our car  was not working and a gentleman even came out to help us! They were very considerate ! it was a very nice place to stay! We will be staying there again next year!!

Summary: This was my family of 5 first trip to Disneyland and I am so happy we stayed at this property compared to some of the other Best Western's closer to Disneyland. Rooms are a little dated (carpet is very worn in room 222) but the breakfast is AMAZING (even my picky 2 year old had plenty to choose from) and the  room set up worked perfect for us. We walked to Disneyland and were able to leave our car at the hotel after checkout when we went to the park to avoid paying the high parking fee Disney charges. We will be back next year!

Summary: We mainly picked this motel due to it's closeness to Disney and for the area it was very reasonably  priced.  Room set up was good, having a bunk bed and separate kid's space.  Rooms could do with a bit of an update, but were comfortable enough.  Staff were friendly and helpful.  Breakfast was ok.  As a family we would consider stopping here again for the Disney factor.

Summary Heading: Wonder Place to Stay in Anahiem
Summary: Loved this stay in Anahiem at the Best Western. We travel to Anahiem about every two years and we have stayed in some beautiful places and enjoyed our time at Disneyland.   We were suprised by the quality of acomodation at the Best Western and its locality to Disneyland. It is an old establishment but a well maintained apartment close to the main facilities in Anahiem.  It is very suited for a family of two adults and two children. The rooms are beautiful, very simple, but very clean and well maintained. Turn down every day with sheets, great bathroom but only a shower and toilet but very spacious.  The usual for apartments refrigerator, coffee machine etc.  They have a a heated pool, well maintained and a spa, very relaxing after a day out.  Breakfast was included in the deal

Summary: While the hotel is a bit dated, it was still clean, beds were nice and the showers were great, good water pressure and plenty of hot water for me and my family.. The best part was the staff, very helpful and maid service was excellent! We had questions for the front desk several times throughout our stay and they were always eager to answer our questions. We would definitely stay here again.

The water pressure was low and lukewarm. I had a problem with the TV remote and the person that was sent to my room looked like a homeless person. I will NEVER return

Summary: Clean, older hotel, friendly and accommodating staff. Semi close to Disneyland. Disney shuttle pick up super close. Later flight, no problem.  They will store your bags and let you hang out at pool. They provide breakfast which was good.

Summary: My sister and her teenage daughter and me and my granddaughter had a two bedroom suite with one bathroom.  I thought the room was comfortable and clean.  The pool area was also kept up nicely.  The breakfast was good.  We arrived too early to check in but we got Disneyland tickets and shuttle tickets and left our car.  We asked about the shuttle and were not given any information about where to catch it in the park.  You have to wait at a certain spot depending on what hotel you are staying at.  Later when we came back to check in, a different woman behind the desk was much more informative and helpful.  I recommend Best Western Plus Raffles and would stay there again if I go back to Disneyland.

Summary: We recently stayed at the BW Raffles Inn for three nights. Our room had bunkbeds for the kids and their own room  with a couch and TV.  We walked back and forth to the park each day and it took about 15 minutes. The area felt very safe, even walking home after the park closed. There were always tons of other tourists around. There was a Target that we walked to ( about 15 minutes walk). We loaded up on snacks and lunch items to save a few bucks at the park. We Ubered back to the hotel and it was about $5. The breakfast was plentiful with the usual offerings of yogurt, bananas, apples, oranges, Chobani yogurt. muffins, donuts, cereal. juice, coffee, waffle bar, oatmeal, eggs, potatoes and sausage patties.  The hotel was quiet in the evening and loud in the mornings. It seemed

Summary Heading: Great first time visit to Disney Anaheim
Summary: Enjoyed our stay about a mile from Park. A little far for some but there is a shuttle available every twenty minutes. Parking is $15 extra but car saves money if you plan to travel outside of area.  Clean, comfortable and good breakfast.

Summary Heading: A good hotel, a good price, close to Disneyland

Summary: This is your typical American accommodation, a few blocks walk from Disneyland and close to restaurants and a CVS and Walgreens. However location was excellent, not too close to Disneyland so a little out of the craziness, about a 10-15 minute walk for us.

Summary: First time staying at this location. Great room with a reasonable cost.  We booked at the last minute and got a pretty good deal. The walk is a bit far when your feet hurt but we didn’t have any children in our group so it was fine.  Some family tools cabs back to the room.  Walking distance to restaurants and Starbucks.  They offer valet parking but seemed to have enough parking on the property.  Pool area was great for cooling down after a long day at the park. Breakfast was also pretty good for a continental breakfast. Saved our group quite a bit of money each day! Pretty close to the convention center as well.

We are also proud of the great customer service we provide to our guests and we thank you for complementing our great location, breakfast, and our amazing staff. We will acknowledge our front desk team as well as housekeeping and maintenance for a job well done. We want you to know we appreciate your business and we can't wait for you to come back to the resort to see our upgrades such as: new beds, new carpet, new furniture in all rooms, new bathrooms with modern accent tile, new Disney artwork, new accent wallpaper in every room, new sound proof windows and walls, and more!

Summary: 4 adults and 1 child stayed. It was great to have the separate bedroom for the couple with the 3 year old, and a queen bed outside for us (grandparents). Nice breakfast included. Comfortable for all. Small pool which we did not use, but kids were enjoying it.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your great feedback about your recent visit.  I’m so glad you enjoyed the rooms and our great location.   We always love when the grandparents can enjoy our spacious 2 bedroom suites with the rest of the family but still have your own  private room too!  We look forward to seeing you back for more Disney magic!

Summary: Although the rooms are clean and comfortable and it is walking distance to Disneyland, the budget accommodation comes at a cost.... your sleep! It is the noisiest complex we have stayed at.   Allowing loud guests to play loud music late at night, kids running along the verandas, banging doors against walls. Called the front desk and nothing was done. Had to put up with the noise until midnight while trying to settle my 1 year old who had woken up to the noise.  The car park is located in the middle of the complex and guests alarms beeping throughout the night.   Wouldn’t stay here again, and won’t recommend it for young families or people who like to sleep at night!
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your honest feedback regarding your recent visit. We sure appreciate you taking the time to acknowledge the value in our Hotel! I apologize about the noise you could hear from your room.   Your satisfaction is most important to us.  I'm hopeful you will return to the property and see all of the exciting upgrades currently taking place such as new bathrooms with modern accent tile, New furniture for all rooms, new Disney artwork, new sound proof walls and windows, and much more! Its important to us that our guests see the value in our hotel and we hope you return to enjoy it and for more Disney magic!

Summary: The staff was always friendly and helpful.  The location is great for the Convention Center and Disneyland.  It was a great value for your dollar.  Walking distance to restaurants and entertainment.  The room attendant was very nice and thorough.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your great feedback regarding your recent visit to the happiest place on earth!  We are so proud to have a great location near the convention center and Disneyland and I’m so excited you found the value in that!  There’s so much to see and do while visiting and I’m glad all team members were friendly and supportive while you relaxed and created some great memories!  We look forward to seeing you again to check out our new hotel room upgrades!  We are thrilled to be sprinkling pixie dust everywhere to bring you even more value with new carpet, new furniture, new bathrooms, new sound proof windows and walls, new Disney artwork and more!

Summary: We have stayed here 4 times over the last 3 years every time we go to disney land . It's conveniently located, about a 10/15 minute walk to the parks. The family rooms are great and practical the breakfast is delicious. They were doing renovations when we were there last but there was no noise that disrupted us. The pool is a huge hit with the kids. Last time we went was for our sons 10th birthday and they put balloons and cookies in the room for him. Was so appreciated. The staff are always friendly and helpful.
Manager Response: There’s nothing better than our repeat guests!  Your Business and loyalty is so appreciated and we can wait to welcome you back for the next adventure!  Make sure you keep getting excited about our hotel upgrades happening now so you can continue to get more value, more great service and a refreshed new hotel that will always be your home away from home when you visit Disneyland!  Thank you for your loyalty!

Summary: Convenient location to Disneyland (walked about 2 blocks to Toy Story Parking lot and took free Disney shuttle to park). Large selection (and clean) of items for breakfast. Great price: $120/night for 2 bedroom suite in early March 2018. Stayed three nights. Parking was $15/night, which seems typical for the area. Perfect amount of space for four adults and a toddler, if you are not planning on spending a lot of time in the room (rooms are on the smaller side). Rooms recently updated, appreciated the new flooring. Bed was comfortable, a little firmer than my liking, but slept soundly in quiet room. Crib provided by hotel for my toddler was clean. Housekeeping staff decorated my daughter's crib with our Disney items as a surprise. Was very nice, since hotel lacks Disney ambience
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your great review and honest feedback. We sure appreciate it and look forward to your return. We are proud to be a walking distance hotel to the Disneyland theme parks. We are also proud of the great customer service we provide to our guests and we thank you for complementing our great location, breakfast, and our amazing staff. We will acknowledge our front desk team as well as housekeeping and maintenance for a job well done. We want you to know we appreciate your business and we can't wait for you to come back to the resort to see our upgrades such as: new beds, new carpet, new furniture in all rooms, new bathrooms with modern accent tile, new Disney artwork, new accent wallpaper in every room, new sound proof windows and walls, and more!

Summary: Everything was great minus the comfort of the bed and pillows.  The breakfast was great and was pleased with the wide varity. We loved our large room!  I would definitely stay here again and recommend to friends and family.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your great review and honest feedback. We sure appreciate it and look forward to your return. We are proud to be a walking distance hotel to the Disneyland theme parks. We are also proud of the great customer service we provide to our guests and we thank you for complementing our great location, breakfast, and our amazing staff. We will acknowledge our front desk team as well as housekeeping and maintenance for a job well done. We want you to know we appreciate your business and we can't wait for you to come back to the resort to see our upgrades such as:  new beds, new carpet, new furniture in all rooms, new bathrooms with modern accent tile, new Disney artwork, new accent wallpaper in every room, new sound proof windows and walls, and more!

Summary: For my money and my needs this Best Western delivers everything I need, clean/comfortable room, easy walk to Convention Center and Disney, Great Breakfast, and a helpful, professional staff. A Value Proposition that I Value!!
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your great review and honest feedback. We sure appreciate it and look forward to your return. We are proud to be a walking distance hotel to the Disneyland theme parks. We are also proud of the great customer service we provide to our guests and we thank you for complementing our great location, clean rooms, and great staff. We will acknowledge our front desk team as well as housekeeping and maintenance for a job well done. We want you to know we appreciate your business and we can't wait for you to come back to the resort!

Summary: We stayed in the family suite and it was clean and spacious, perfect room for our family of 7. Free breakfast was okay and not a fan of the daily parking fee. Its about a mile walk to Disneyland. Staff was friendly and we will stay here again!
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your great review and honest feedback. We sure appreciate it and look forward to your return. We are proud to be a walking distance hotel to the Disneyland theme parks. We are also proud of the great customer service we provide to our guests and we thank you for complementing our family suite and great staff. We will acknowledge our front desk team as well as housekeeping and maintenance for a job well done. We want you to know we appreciate your business and we can't wait for you to come back to the resort!

Summary: Hotel is a little dated but all in all good! Room was clean and quiet at night. Staff was great and looked after us. 15 minute walk to Disney Main Gate, huge plus there if you don't have a car, even if you did the only thing the hotel charges daily for parking, less than Disney so its good. Pool and Hot Tub were clean. Breakfast OK busy first thing in morning seating is limited, we ate outside or took to room.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your great review and honest feedback.  We sure appreciate it and look forward to your return.  We are proud to be a walking distance hotel to the Disneyland theme parks.  We are also proud of the great customer service we provide to our guests and we thank you for complementing our clean pool and spa and great staff.   We will acknowledge our front desk team as well as housekeeping and maintenance for a job well done.  We want you to know we appreciate your business and we can't wait for you to come back to the resort!

Summary: Very clean, great staff, great amenities, delicious breakfast. Very close to Disneyland and the area was great. The lobby was very nice, and they also help us navigate Anaheim since it was our first time here.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your great feedback regarding your recent visit. We sure appreciate you taking the time to acknowledge our great staff and the value in staying at our Hotel!  I'm so glad you enjoyed the breakfast and our amenities.  I'm excited to say we hope you will return to the property and see all of the exciting upgrades currently taking place such as new bathrooms with modern accent tile, new furniture for all rooms, new Disney artwork, new sound proof walls & windows, and much more!  We cant wait to see you for more Disney magic!!

Summary: Perfect hotel for Disneyland. I loved the family suite with bunk beds. The extra room with bunk beds was perfect for my boys with a nice big TV. The pool and hot tub was clean and we enjoyed the apples and oranges in the lobby. Breakfast was fine but get there early because it is a small space which can get really busy. Beware they charge for parking, but it was worth it because we walked to Disneyland. The walk is about 20 minutes. I would return for our next trip to Disneyland. Thank You
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your great feedback regarding your recent visit. We sure appreciate you taking the time to acknowledge the value in our Hotel! I'm so glad you enjoyed the breakfast and great location.  I'm excited to say we hope your return to the property and see all of the exciting upgrades currently taking place such as new bathrooms with modern accent tile, new furniture for all rooms, new Disney artwork, new sound proof walls & windows, and much more!  We cant wait to see you for more Disney magic!!

Summary: We checked in on Saturday, Feb. 3rd.  We had a King Size bed....  1. They charge for parking, but do not have enough spots for all of their guests to park. They have a Valet and if you come in late you leave your car with him. People seem to park in areas where there are no parking spots, the hotel/valet does nothing & one has to maneuver around them.   2.  They spay some type of chemical air freshener in the Lobby & it got me choking... but there is no smoking.  Foul smelling air is foul smelling air no matter smoke or chemical laden air spritzer.  3.  We opened the door to our room and there was the toilet w/ the seat up!  the bathroom was so small that in order to close the door, one had to walk to the side of the toilet & close the door.  If you try to close the door while
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your honest feedback regarding your recent visit. We sure appreciate you taking the time to acknowledge the value in our Hotel! I apologize your stay wasn't perfect as our guest experience is what's most important to us! We took note of the comment regarding the isolated incident that occurred during your visit. This Hotel is such a great place to stay for groups, Convention attendees, families, or just simply folks from all walks of life who want to celebrate the Magic of Disney! The City of Anaheim prides itself on being one of the most beautiful, safe, and family friendly tourist destinations in the world! We are thrilled to mention this Hotel is sprinkling pixie dust everywhere as we enhance our already great property. Our guests can expect to relax in brand new beds covered in quality bed covers, new bathrooms with modern accent tile, new carpet, new furniture in all guest rooms, new sound proof walls and windows, and a new Hotel Exterior that will include an amazing firework viewing area!! We hope you return to enjoy all that Disneyland and our Hotel has to offer!

Summary: Great rooms and clean. We will be staying at this hotel again when we go back to Disneyland. Breakfast was great and check in and out was fast. The bus to Disneyland was right next to hotel that was great.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your great feedback.  We appreciate the kind words about our breakfast and great rooms.  We look forward to you coming back for more great memories!

Summary: This was out first time staying here....never again!!!! Breakfast was amazing probably the best thing the hotel offered l.  Upon check in I was charged am addition $140 for a 50 parking night and 20 a night room fee.i checked my reservation and nowhere on it did it state that anywhere.  After the first night we came back to the room and noticed beds were made but still the same bedding sheets and covers....I know hotels I've stayed in changed the bedding every single.day. our room did not look cleaned or vaccumed. Our room key was misplaced my husband went to get a new 9ne which the lady told him we only had the room 1 more night....false in my reservati9n confirmation we had the room for 4 nights and not 3 another mistake they made yet again. All hourse of the night were people
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your honest feedback regarding your recent visit. We sure appreciate you taking the time to acknowledge the value in our Hotel! I apologize your room wasn't perfect while you were visiting.  Your satisfaction is most important to us.  I'm excited to say we hope your return to the property and see all of the exciting upgrades currently taking place such as new bathrooms with modern accent tile, New furniture for all rooms, new Disney artwork, new sound proof walls and windows, and much more! Its important to us that our guests see the value in our hotel and we hope you return to enjoy it and for more Disney magic!

Summary: The staff overall was very kind. However, our room door was left open by the cleaning staff during our stay. Luckily nothing was missing, but this carelessness will make me think twice about returning
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your honest feedback regarding your recent visit. We sure appreciate you taking the time to acknowledge the value in our Hotel! I apologize for your stay wasn't perfect.  I'm excited to say we hope your return to the property and see all of the exciting upgrades currently taking place such as new bathrooms with modern accent tile, New furniture for all rooms, new Disney artwork, new sound proof walls and windows, and much more! Its important to us that our guests see the value in our hotel and we hope you return to enjoy it and for more Disney magic!

Summary: too much noises very early morning, and late at night. people feel they are in their own back yard. yelling non stop and running early morning and late night.  if you are with family and used to this. it is all good.  I travel for business and it was a good deal for the money but I have to move to another hotel due to the noises.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your honest feedback regarding your recent visit. We sure appreciate you taking the time to acknowledge the value in our Hotel! I apologize for the noise while you were visiting.  I'm excited to say we hope your return to the property and see all of the exciting upgrades currently taking place such as new bathrooms with modern accent tile, New furniture for all rooms, new Disney artwork, new sound proof walls and windows, and much more! Its important to us that our guests see the value in our hotel and we hope you return to enjoy it and for more Disney magic!

Summary: Was amazing. Room service was amazing thy cleaned really good. Great breakfast service and amazing rooms. I recommend this hotel because honestly it has an amazing happy vibe and the staff is willing to help if there is any problems.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your great review.  We sure appreciate it and look forward to your return.  I'm so glad you enjoyed our breakfast and our great service.  That's our highest compliment we can get from a guest!  We look forward to being your home away from home every time your travels bring you back to the happiest place on earth!

Summary Heading: Fantastic hotel. Great breakfast. Good location.
Summary: We had a great stay at the Best Western. Great room, delicious breakfast, and walking distance to Disney! We stayed in a family suite. It was nice for the kids to have their own room (that we could close a door to) and ya adults to have our room - with separate TVs even! Definitely would recommend.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for taking the time to post a review and mention our amazing family suite!   We sure appreciate you taking time to say you would recommend our hotel and that you enjoyed our breakfast and location.  We look forward to you coming back for more!

Summary Heading: Great location close to Disney parks
Summary: We had a nice stay at this property during a family trip to the nearby Disney parks. The hotel is conveniently located right next to a bus stop with frequent service to the parks. You can buy bus tickets at the hotel reception. The rooms are large and comfortable, and the breakfast has a variety of selections for different tastes. This hotel is a great value when visiting Disney on a budget
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your great review of our hotel.   We sure appreciate your loyalty to our brand and hope you return to see more Disney magic!  Thanks for acknowledging our spacious, clean rooms and great location!

Summary: We enjoyed our stay and overall the room types worked well for our The rooms met our party's needs but at some near future date I feel the property could undergo a big upgrade as the carpeting, furniture etc is a bit dated and worn looking.  Also, the property is not as close to the theme parks as they tout in their advertisements.
Manager Response: Thanks for your honest feedback about your recent visit.  We sure appreciate it and look forward to your return!   I wanted you to know we are our proud to be improving our hotel as we speak!  We are putting in new furniture in all guest rooms, new carpet, new sound proof windows and walls, new Disney artwork, and a fresh new look on the outside with a new modern paint color and tall, lush palm trees.  I hope you return for more fun soon!

Summary Heading: Great rooms, plus it's close to Disneyland
Summary: Our room was very clean and spacious.  Breakfast buffet is a plus! The hotel is very close to Disneyland, you could walk or call a car for less than $6 each way.  We opted for that option since Disney parking is $20 a day! There are decent restaurants in the area should you get tired of park food.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your great review.  We sure appreciate you staying with us!   I'm also proud to say when you return you will enjoy the many upgrades we are currently working on such as all brand New furniture, new bathrooms with modern accent tile, new carpet, new Disney artwork, new sound proof windows and more!

Summary Heading: Great Property! We only wish it was closer to Disneyland. :)
Summary: We have stayed here twice now, and this is a great place to stay when visiting Disney. The rooms are clean and the family suites are great when you need a little bit of space at the end of the day. Breakfast on site saves money at the park or restaurant and time when you're getting ready in the morning. They had cold cereal, oatmeal, waffles and pancakes, eggs, fresh fruit and yogurt. During the day they have ice water and fresh fruit in the lobby. The pool is heated!! And it's always clean with it's own bathroom. We have stayed here twice now. It's a great value for the money. The distance to the park is walkable, but not a great distance when you have tired kids and sore feet. The ART shuttle on this route was terrible when we did it last time. It was always late and crowded.
Manager Response: We are so happy your stayed with us! The 5 star rating is our highest honor! Thank you. Anytime a guest says they're coming back we get excited! That's means a job well done for my amazing team! Thanks for mentioning our great service and clean rooms. I will make sure to acknowledge the entire team as we look forward to your return. Keep coming back to see us and creating magical memories every time!

Summary: Everything about this place was exceptional, from caring and understanding staff at check in, through to check out.  Room itself was clean and well stocked, beds comfy, bathroom great size and water pressure was brilliant on the 3rd floor. Internet speed was the best I have ever experienced! Breakfast, lots of selections to choose from, something for even the most fussy eaters.  Parking was easy, and walking distance to Disney Parks, Food and Restaurants.  I will definitely be coming back to stay here!!
Manager Response: We are so happy your stayed with us!   The 5 star rating is our highest honor!  Thank you.  Anytime a guest says they're coming back we get excited!  That's means a job well done for my amazing team!  Thanks for mentioning our great service and clean rooms.  I will make sure to acknowledge the entire team as we look forward to your return.  Keep coming back to see us and creating magical memories every time!

Summary: I love this Hotel... second time staying here. I will pick this location every time i return to visit Disneyland or california Disney. The Suite we had was great and my kids really enjoyed the pool and hottub.
Manager Response: What an amazing review!  Thank you!  We neever get tired of hearing from guests who find the value in our spacious suites along with our great service and hotel amenities!   There's nothing better than our repeat guests who keep coming back for more fun and more memories!  We appreciate your loyalty to our brand.

Summary Heading: Best western plus raffles inn and suites
Summary: Recently stayed there for twelve nights accomadation in a two bedroom suite, excellent staff ,were very helpful and went above and beyond to ensure our stay was most enjoyable. Breakfast was ample with a choice of pancakes !waffles, eggs sausage muffins etc,.Great location for transport via the ART to Disneyland and California Adventure Park. Great location for restaurants and food options within walking distance.
Manager Response: Thanks for this great review! Wow!! You guys are special-a 12 nighter!  What great memories for your family.  We are so honored to have you here with us and enjoying our breakfast, great staff, and our spacious suites!   We sure appreciate it and look forward to your return.

Summary Heading: They took great care of us :)
Summary: We chose this hotel because of its proximity to Disneyland.  We walked to/from the park every day, and appreciated not having to pay to park at Disney.  We were pleased to see a bag of warm cookies waiting for us when we arrived -- when my husband asked if we could purchase more for the next night, they brought us more free of charge.  Also, when their employee, Rosie, helped us in the breakfast room and heard that it was our daughter's birthday, she arranged for balloons to be put in our room while we were at Disneyland.  They couldn't have been nicer to us!  Thank you for such a great experience!
Manager Response: Thanks for this great review and 4 star rating of your recent visit. We appreciate your loyalty to our brand and look forward to your next visit. There's nothing better than a guest who enjoys the great location we have here and of course our freshly baked cookies!  That's such a great compliment to us that you chose our Hotel to celebrate your daughter's birthday!  We hope you continue to stay here while you create magical memories with your loved ones for years to come! Thank you for choosing us!

Summary: We have four kids and it is difficult to find a hotel that can slee all of us without paying extra. This was great and the bed was very comfortable. My biggest issue was the coffee was terrible (I walked to the nearest Starbucks each morning) and they did not offer real half and half. Coffeemate and fake  butter are not my preferred condiments in the morning.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for bringing your family here to stay with us!  We sure appreciate it and I'm so glad you were able to enjoy our comfortable beds and spacious rooms. I hope you return to see our many hotel improvements taking place around the property including our guest rooms, exterior of hotel, and the breakfast room including some upgrades items!

Summary: Clean, comfortable, affordable.  Great breakfast, great staff.  ART shuttle access as well as ease of purchasing ART tickets at the hotel desk.  I have stayed here multiple times and will continue to on my future Disney trips.
Manager Response: Thanks for this great review of your recent visit.  We appreciate your loyalty to our brand and look forward to your next visit.  There's nothing better than our repeat guests!  That's such a great compliment to us that you continue to stay here while you create magical memories with your loved ones!  Thank you for choosing us!

Summary: Over all appearance of hotel was good but rooms need some up dating. Carpet worn, light coming off wall. Elevator wall panels were coming away from wall. Breakfast room was great. Selection was great.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your honest feedback about your recent visit. Thanks for acknowledging our great breakfast. We appreciate that. Our apologies your Stay wasn't perfect as that's always our goal. We always want our guests visit to be relaxing and memorable with excellent customer service and great rooms.  We hope you will return and give us another opportunity to better serve you with an upgraded brand new Hotel which includes new furniture, new carpet, new bathrooms with modern accent tile and more!

Summary: The Best Western Hotel Plus was great! 2 blocks away from Disneyland and very close by to great restaurants. Make sure to get the ART shuttle passes as the shuttles take you all major stops. The suite we had was very nice and roomy.
Manager Response: Thanks for the great review about our spacious suites!!  We sure appreciate you staying with us and we can't wait for your return.  We have some exciting hotel upgrades we are working on that I know you will enjoy and find great value in such as new furniture, New carpet, new bathrooms, new beds, and more!

Summary: A nice facility with close bus service to Disneyland and food locations in the area.  A good choice for families going to the parks as the costs are lower than hotels closer to the park and the low cost bus service is wonderful after a long day in the parks.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your kind words about our hotel and your recent visit.  We love when guests get the value of our hotel and really enjoy it. This is such a great hotel location and we are so glad you stayed with Us.  Thanks for your loyalty to the best western brand.  Happy holidays!

Summary: Very clean hotel. Rooms were nice. Wi-Fi not so great. Check-in and out was fast no issues. Staff service at night was lack there of no help was given when issue arose. Overall it was a good stay. Just don't leave items in your hotel room they may come up missing during cleaning
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your honest feedback about your recent visit. Thanks for acknowledging our clean hotel and nice rooms.  We appreciate that.  Our apologies your Stay wasn't perfect as that's always our goal.  We always want our guests visit to be relaxing and memorable with excellent customer service from everyone on our team.  We hope you will Return and give us another opportunity to better serve you with new furniture, new carpet, new bathrooms with modern accent tile and more!

Summary: Nice hotel, delicious complimentary breakfast with your stay. Parking could be difficult but staff was gracious and took care of it. Pricing was affordable considering it was during Thanksgiving weekend. Definitely recommend. Overall nice hotel.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your great review!  We sure appreciate it and can't wait for you to return and see all the hotel upgrades happening!  I'm so glad you enjoyed our many breakfast items each day and i thank you for mentioning the great service by the staff. Please come back and see our exterior  transformation with our new look of modern colors and lush landscaping!  We are also adding new furniture in rooms along with new carpet, new bathrooms, new beds, and more!

Summary: 2nd time staying at this facility. Great helpful staff both times.  Nice.  Helpful.  If you need to use pubic transportation or your own, they are very helpful.  Pleasant experience both times. Disneyland most recently & was great to use the bus, previous at the convention center.
Manager Response: Thanks for your honest feedback regarding your recent visit. We sure appreciate your loyalty to our best western brand and we are so glad you once again enjoyed our clean hotel and great location. I'm looking forward to your return so you can enjoy our property upgrades happening such as new carpet in all rooms as well as new furniture and new beds, new sound proof walls and windows, new custom hard wood floor designs in the rooms, new bathrooms with modern accent tile, and more! Happy holidays to you and yours! Thanks so much for complementing our friendly staff!

Summary: The hotel staff is excellent. The property is nicely maintained and easy location to Disneyland..bus ride 10min away. The hotel.room is in dire need of updates and more comfortable beds like many of the other Best Western properties are known for
Manager Response: Thanks for your honest feedback regarding your recent visit.  We sure appreciate your loyalty to our best western brand and we are so glad you enjoyed our clean hotel and gray location.  I'm looking forward to your return so you can enjoy our property upgrades happening such as new carpet in all rooms as well as new furniture and new beds, new sound proof walls and windows, new custom hard wood floor designs in the rooms, new bathrooms with modern accent tile, and more!  Happy holidays to you and yours!

Summary: Rooms were clean and updated. We had a kids suite with bunk beds. My kids loved it! There was a sleeper couch in case we needed it. Extra blanket and pillows in the closet. The staff was friendly and attentive. Location was perfect! Best deal in town! Wish we could have stayed longer. Will be our go to hotel whenever we visit family in LA not just Disneyland :)
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your review! We appreciate your loyalty to our brand and our Anaheim hotel. I'm glad you enjoyed our spacious 2 bedroom suites! They're a special find for larger families or those guests who just want to relax and have room to enjoy each other. We cant wait for your return to enjoy more Disneyland magic and that we will continue to be our home away from home.

Summary: Staff is amazing, you have great team, from front desk agents, housekeeping, breakfast attendants the rooms are fabulous they are great for families separate bedroom, the pool is amazing after long day just relax and also sit in the hot tub,   They treat us like family and for that we always give back great job
Manager Response: Wow!  Thank you for the highest compliment we can get- a job well done for the entire team!  We all work so hard to provide our guests with a magical experience that you will remember!  It's important you feel welcomed and you get great value for your hard earned money.  To relax in our pool and spa after a fun day at Disneyland just doesn't get any better than that!  I'm so glad you took advantage of our amenities and took some time to relax.  Our suites get so manly compliments!  Thank you for mentioning how much you enjoyed them.  So many Guests love them because they're spacious and accommodate all adults groups as well as kids.    I look forward to your return for many more memories and fun Times!  Thank you for your loyalty to this hotel and the best western brand!  Can't wait to see you again!

Summary: This was a nice simple hotel, not super fancy. It is two stories with the elevators on the exterior. I was particularly looking for a suite with 2 bathrooms. There aren't many available in the area, at least I couldn't find a big selection. It worked great and the value was very good considering it was a suite. The only negative, which is subjective, I didn't feel the beds were very comfortable. One more, if you're a light sleeper this may not be the hotel for you. Parking lot faces rooms in a u fashion... I woke up throughout the night with the surrounding noise.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your review! We appreciate your loyalty to our brand and our anaheim hotel. I'm glad you enjoyed our spacious 2 bedroom suites! They're a special find for larger families or those guests who just want to relax and have room to enjoy each other. What makes our family suite extra special are those 2 bathrooms-thank you for mentioning that. We hope you return for more Disneyland magic and that we can be our home away from home.

Summary: The hotel is within short walking distance from the Convention center. The staff is friendly and breakfast is included and better than what most other hotels at this price level offer. Nice to have a dip in the pool after a busy day.
Manager Response: We live our convention attendees!  Thank you for staying with us.  Being across the street from the convention center and walking distance to the Disneyland theme parks is a great location to be in and I'm so glad you enjoyed it.  We appreciate you taking a moment to acknowledge our friendly staff and the hearty breakfast buffet here-it's our highest compliment.  We hope you return to see our hotel improvements such as new room furniture, new sound proof windows, new bathrooms with modern accent tile, new Disney artwork, pool upgrades and much more!

Summary: This was my first time staying at this hotel, and I would definitely stay again.  The room was clean, very roomy for 6 adults, and the staff was friendly and very accommodating to our needs.  It was also close enough to the Toy Story Parking Lot to walk from our hotel to take the shuttle bus.  But if you wanted to drive, it's very easy to drive out of the hotel property right into the parking lot.
Manager Response: We are so glad to stayed with us!  Thanks for taking a minute to write a review on your experience in our spacious suites!  We always appreciate that.  Our friendly staff will always make you feel welcome you here and I will make sure they're acknowledged for that!  Our priority is to assist our guests in having a great experience while Visiting us at this great location. We look forward to being your home away from home every time you visit the happiest place on earth!

Summary: I dislike having to give a poor review.  I expected our experience to be so much better, especially for a Best western Plus property.  The rooms were not as clean as one would expect.  The staff were phenomenal though!!!
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your honest feedback regarding your recent visit.  We sure appreciate you taking the time to acknowledge the amazing staff we have here!  Im also excited to say we hope your return to the property and see all of the exciting upgrades currently taking place such as new bathrooms with modern accent tile, New furniture for all rooms, new Disney artwork, new sound proof walls and windows, and much more!  Its important to us that our guests see the value in our hotel and we hope you return to enjoy it and for more Disney magic!

Summary Heading: Great service and hotel.  staff was great at check-in as well on departure.
Summary: Love staying at Best Western's know the quality of service, know what to expect. Is a brand that I always recommend to friends and family. This time I use my reward points, this promotion is great! Join the club!
Manager Response: What an amazing review!  Thanks so much for your loyalty in visiting us whenever your travels bring you back to the happiest place on earth!  That is our highest compliment.  We look forward to creating more family memories for years to come!

Summary: My family of four stayed here during our oat recent Disneyland trip. The staff was wonderful, the rooms were clean and fresh, the complimentary breakfast was perfect, and it's in close proximity to the park. Great place. Will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your great review.  We sure appreciate your kind words about our great breakfast, clean rooms and friendly staff.  We hope you return to our hotel each time your travels bring you to anaheim.

Summary Heading: Great place for our family of 5
Summary: We stayed here for 4 nights from 4th November 2017 and we were so happy with the hotel. As a family of 5 the room had a seperate bedroom that could be shut off from parents that had bunk beds and a sofa bed. Bathroom shower was small, however adequate. Complimentary breakfast exceeded expectations with a huge choice of hot and cold foods. Only about a 15-20 min walk to Disneyland. Has onsite laundry also. Would recommend to others especially families.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your honest review and feedback. We are glad you enjoyed our great location and our value. We hope you return to see our improvements such as new carpet, new bathrooms, new furniture, new sound proof windows and walls, new Disney artwork and more! We want to be your home away from home EVERY time you visit the Happiest Place On Earth!

Summary: Good enough for the price i paid. We had 6 people in a suite for 5 nights at a total of $999 after taxes and fees (including parking fees of $15 a night per car). Its a 3/4 mile walk ti Disneyland. The free breakfast made everything worth it. The rooms were clean although a bit outdated and the workers were nice. Dont get your hopes up about using their movie rental service. It was $19 to rent a newer movie. Certainly Not amazing but good enough for the price.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your honest review and feedback. We are glad you enjoyed our great location and our value. We hope you return to see our improvements such as new carpet, new bathrooms, new furniture, new sound proof windows and walls, new Disney artwork and more! We want to be your home away from home EVERY time you visit the Happiest Place On Earth!

Summary Heading: They were very good to me
Summary: Every problem I had they fixed. Items we needed to mail home, laundry, directions, printing plane tickets, everything.  They had fruit available in the office any time for snacks, and nice cold water. It really seemed that they believe “the customer is always right.” I wish everyone was as nice.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your honest review and feedback. We are glad you enjoyed our great location and our value. I'm so glad to hear any issues that came up during your visit were quickly addressed.  We have an amazing team here and I thank you for acknowledging us!  We hope you return to see our improvements such as new carpet, new bathrooms, new furniture, new sound proof windows and walls, new Disney artwork and more! We hope you return and enjoy our new look and upgrades so we can be your home away from home EVERY time you visit the Happiest Place On Earth!

Summary: We booked this hotel to enjoy Disneyland. They had a great breakfast service   we took our food back to our room since their area was small.  You can catch a free shuttle just 2 blocks away at the toy story parking lot
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your honest review and feedback. We are glad you enjoyed our great location and our value. We hope you return to see our improvements such as new carpet, new bathrooms, new furniture, new sound proof windows and walls, new Disney artwork and more! We want to be your home away from home EVERY time you visit the Happiest Place On Earth!

Summary: Stayed here for 3 nights purely so we could go to Disneyland. The room was huge so fitted us (family of 4) in perfectly. Breakfast was good, nice selection although the dining area can get quite crowded. The pool was clean and warm. Shuttle bus to Disney stops just outside, then it is a 5  minute ride. Could easily walk but with 2 young kids it was a bit too far for us. Staff were very helpful when booking out shuttle tickets. Laundry facilities were great, you might need to wait for a machine as there are only a couple but thats not the end of the world. We would happily stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank toy so much for your review.  We sure appreciate it and we are so happy you enjoyed the breakfast and our spacious seuites.  I hope you created some magical memories while visiting Disneyland and we look forward to your return!

Summary: The beds were comfortable; the staff was polite; there was a terrific breakfast every morning; and the rooms were very clean. It was the perfect fit for my family during our first visit to Disneyland!
Manager Response: What a great review!  Thanks so much for your kind words about our entire team here.  I'm so glad you enjoyed the hot breakfast buffet and our clean rooms. We hope you continue to come back and stay with us for more magical memories at the Disneyland resort.

Summary: I would not stay here again. It was ok, the price was right, the location was good. The shower was broken in our room. We were only there 2 nights so I did not report it. I was not moving to a new room while trying to do Disney parks. It was obvious that the shower was very outdated. Room 312 I think, on the 3rd floor. there was no card for me to fill out in the room for maint. problems. I prepaid a month in advance. That did not help me get a room on the first floor. The shuttle to Disney was $5 pp, I will take Uber for everything in the future and not rely on shared shuttles. The free breakfast was not good and the coffee was just horrible. Food marts and restaurants within walking distance. Many hotels to chose from on this street. The room was clean and the bed was
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your honest review and feedback. We are glad you enjoyed our great location and our value.  We hope you return to see our improvements such as new carpet, new bathrooms, new furniture, new sound proof windows and walls, new Disney artwork and more! Our apologies your stay wasn't perfect but we hope you return and enjoy our new look and upgrades so we can be your home away from home EVERY time you visit the Happiest Place On Earth!

Summary: Desk personnel very helpful, beds too hard, location good. If you are in good shape convenient for walking to Disneyland, if not, not so much. Would of been nice to have a TV guide in the room so we knew what channels were which. Several restaurants within a 3 block area. Not thrilled with housekeeping but all other staff where great.2 1/2 stars.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your loyalty to our brand and our Hotel! We appreciate this honest review and feedback. We are so glad you enjoyed our great service! We hope you return to see our improvements such as new carpet, new bathrooms, new furniture, new sound proof windows and walls, new Disney artwork and more! We look forward to being your home away from home EVERY time you visit the Happiest Place On Earth!

Summary: Staff was AMAZING, breakfast was good close to Disneyland and Toy Story shuttle, literally a 5 minute walk . The only thing wrong beds need to be updated just a little uncomfortable after a long day at Disneyland
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your loyalty to our brand and our Hotel! We appreciate this honest review and feedback. We are so glad you enjoyed our great service! We hope you return to see our improvements such as new carpet, new bathrooms, new furniture ilcuding new beds , new sound proof windows and walls, new Disney artwork and more! We look forward to being your home away from home EVERY time you visit the Happiest Place On Earth!

Summary: Super clean and confotable rooms, walking distance from the convention center,close to restaurants, CVS,Walgreens and Disneyland,perfect location, I planning to stay with my family again next year for more nights. Only one thing I recomend to the management, 15.00 dollar per night for the parking is to much.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your loyalty to our brand and our Hotel! We appreciate this honest review and feedback form one of our Convention attendees.  We are so glad you enjoyed our great service! We hope you return to see our improvements such as new carpet, new bathrooms, new furniture, new sound proof windows and walls, new Disney artwork and more! We look forward to being your home away from home EVERY time you visit the Happiest Place On Earth or attend a Covnention!

Summary: Love staying here..the breakfast is great, the worker Araceli in the cafeteria was amazing! She always had a smile on her face and was helpful and kind!  I highly recommend this place it is very affordable too.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your loyalty to our brand and our Hotel! We appreciate this honest review and feedback. We are so glad you enjoyed our great service and our breakfast! We hope you return to see our improvements such as new carpet, new bathrooms, new furniture, new sound proof windows and walls, new Disney artwork and more! We look forward to being your home away from home EVERY time you visit the Happiest Place On Earth!

Summary Heading: Excellent place to stay at a reasonable cost.
Summary: Fairly close to a lot of restaurants as well as a Walgreens, CVS and Target. Within walking distance to the Disney parks. There is a shuttle service but the schedule of it seems hit and miss (not the hotel's fault as it is an independent company). Nice that it includes a free breakfast (and not just cereal and donuts). Staff helpful and always cheerful. Rooms remodeled since our last stay there just over a year ago.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your loyalty to our brand and our Hotel! We appreciate this honest review and feedback. We are so glad you enjoyed our great service! We hope you return to see our improvements such as new carpet, new bathrooms, new furniture, new sound proof windows and walls, new Disney artwork and more! We look forward to being your home away from home EVERY time you visit the Happiest Place On Earth!

Summary Heading: Very Nice Hotel for Disney Stay
Summary: This year we stayed off the Disney property but not far down the road.  It was about a 10 minute walk to to the Disneyland entrance, safe and secure even at night.  The hotel itself is pretty good and busy.  The room was big enough for the 5 of us, 2 adults and three kids aged 11 to 16.  We stayed for 8 nights.  Room was clean and it was quite.  It was a two room with the kids in one on bunks with their own TV and the front was another room with a double bed and a TV, fridge and coffee making facilities.  Parking is extra, to me only a money making exercise, and next time I will attempt to find a free parking site as I would prefer to spend the $20 a night parking on the kids.  Breakfast was included, a typical Amercan breakfast, typical I mean for a hotel.  The food was the
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your loyalty to our brand and our Hotel! We appreciate this honest review and feedback. We are so glad you enjoyed our spacious suites!  We hope you return to see our improvements such as new carpet, new bathrooms, new furniture, new sound proof windows and walls, new Disney artwork and more! We look forward to being your home away from home EVERY time you visit the Happiest Place On Earth!

Summary: Great spot for the price! Usually don't get this good unless I pay more than double the rate. Service was great, room was clean and had way more items (towels, toiletries, coffee) than most, and breakfast was great minus the sausage patties.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your loyalty to our brand and our Hotel! We appreciate this honest review and feedback. We are so glad you enjoyed our great service!  We hope you return to see our improvements such as new carpet, new bathrooms, new furniture, new sound proof windows and walls, new Disney artwork and more! We look forward to being your home away from home EVERY time you visit the Happiest Place On Earth!

Summary: We had a large group and we did the 2 bedroom/2 bathroom family room and it was great to have the extra bathroom with such a large group. (6 adults and and 2 toddlers). We had options to get to Disney; walk the 15 min, take the toy story shuttle 5 min walk, or use lyft/taxis and we used all 3.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your loyalty to our brand and our Hotel! We appreciate this honest review and feedback. We are so glad you enjoyed the breakfast and our spacious family suites!  Don't you just love that 2nd bathroom?!  It's awesome!  We hope you return to see our improvements such as new carpet, new bathrooms, new furniture, new sound proof windows and walls, new Disney artwork and more! We look forward to being your home away from home EVERY time you visit the Happiest Place On Earth!

Summary Heading: Best Western Raffles for the WIN!!!
Summary: This hotel was awesome for us! The sales rep that hooked us up with the room took really good care of us and the on-site staff delivered exactly what was promised. The room was really clean, the workout room was sufficient and the breakfast exceeded expectatjons. Two thumbs WAY UP!!!
Manager Response: We love your review!  Thanks so much for your loyalty to the brand and our Hotel! We appreciate this honest review and feedback. We are so glad you enjoyed the breakfast and our clean rooms! We hope you return to see our improvements such as new carpet, new bathrooms, new furniture, new sound proof windows and walls, new Disney artwork and more!  We look forward to being your home away from home EVERY time you visit the Happiest Place On EArth!

Summary: We really enjoyed our six night stay at Raffles. We had what seemed to be the standard suite option -  one Queen bed in the main area, and the second room with a bunk bed and pull out sofa. It was a bit snug for our family of five, but still a great value for number of beds - especially considering the price of suites in most resort area hotels. My parents were there with my teen brother and ended up in a HUGE suite - Rm. 330, with a large living area w/ Queen bed, chairs, and pull-out, kitchenette w/table, and a separate bedroom. If we return, this room type would definitely be my first choice, though I'm sure there are not nearly as many of these room types available! We actually ended up having our small wedding ceremony in their room - as it had ample space for an arch and
Manager Response: We are so glad you were our guest!   Thanks so much for selecting our hotel for your families special memories!  We are glad you enjoyed the suite and everyone had a great time!  We look forward to seeing you back again for more Disney magic!

Summary: Better room service would have been nice. Our room was not cleaned until the end of the day between 4:00 and 5:00?? Also we both feel we should have been given a choice of a handicap room or a non handicap room. When we went back to the office and requested a standard room we were told that wasn't going to happen. not cool Best Western not cool!
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your honest review and feedback. We always want our guests to have a great visit and we apologize that your stay wasn't perfect with regard to service.  We hope you can allow us another opportunity to better serve you and get excited about our new renovations. We are renovating our rooms with new carpet, new bathrooms, new furniture, new sound proof windows and walls, new Disney artwork and more!

Summary: This place has always gone above and beyond for my family during our stays. Best Western is wonderful. The staff is friendly and you get a lot for what you pay. Breakfast has many options but should include more Gluten Free options. Close to Toy-Story Shuttle for a free ride to the park.
Manager Response: We love our repeat guests!  Thanks so much for your loyalty to the brand and our Hotel!  We appreciate this honest review and feedback. We are so glad you enjoyed the breakfast and our clean rooms! We hope you return to see our improvements such as new carpet, new bathrooms, new furniture, new sound proof windows and walls, new Disney artwork and more!

Summary: Stayed in Sept 2017 with 3 kids. Room was great..ideal for our young family. The location is great, 10 minutes walk from Disney ($8 taxi ride back) Tons of restaurants and food outlets within easy walking distance. Breakfast does get busy but the outside eating area is usually vacant and is really pleasant. Kids go nuts for the waffle station. All the staff were very pleasant and helpful. Found the free access to computer and printer great for printing out passes, very helpful. Would be happy to stay here again.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your honest review and feedback. We are so glad you enjoyed the breakfast and our clean rooms! Your kids are right, the waffle station is amazing!  We hope you return to see our improvements such as new carpet, new bathrooms, new furniture, new sound proof windows and walls, new Disney artwork and more!

Summary: This was our 1st stay at Raffles. We had a family suite which included 2 bedroom, 2 bathrooms, 2 queen beds, a pull out sofa & bunk beds.
