The 2nd bedroom was a little smaller than I'd anticipated but had just enough room for my kiddos. the extra bathroom lighting was dim, my daughter had a hard time doing her make up in there. I also liked that there were hardwood floors vs carpet. Price for the family suite was definitely cheaper then getting 2 rooms to fit our whole family of 7. The breakfast has great variety, including make your own waffles, english muffins, scrambled egg patties & sausage patties (to make an egg mcmfuffin) & county style potatoes. Amongst many other traditional continental breakfast items. Only complaints about breakfast was the coffee was not very good &
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your review. We take such pride in our spacious suites and we are so thrilled you enjoyed them and our breakfast!  I'm proud to say we are upgrading our hotel rooms with new furniture, new carpet, new bathrooms, sound proof windows and flooring, new ACs in the 2nd rooms of all suites and more! We hope you return to enjoy all of these new items that are sure to enhance your visit and experience!

Summary: Raffle Inn and Suites met all the criteria we needed for our family.  The rooms were very comfortable, clean and well organized for all ages.  Substantial, well prepared breakfast. Nice pool. Well located in Anaheim.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your honest review and feedback. We are so glad you enjoyed the breakfast and our clean rooms! We hope you return to see our improvements such as new carpet, new bathrooms, new furniture, new sound proof windows and walls, new Disney artwork and more!

Summary Heading: If you can go somewhere else I would do it
Summary: Front desk staff is insanely rude breakfast is cold not enough seating and room smelled of urine. Not enough parking and they failed to tell you at check-in of all the additional fees included with your stay the hotels right next door offer parking with your reservation however this one year charge per night and parking is limited not a guaranteed spot what you find out after you pay for it
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your honest review and feedback.  We always want our guests to have a great visit and we apologize that your stay wasn't perfect with regard to the parking fees.  While it's a common fee here in the anaheim resort area, I understand you wanting to spend your hard earned money on your family!  We hope you can allow us another opportunity to better serve you and get excited about our new renovations.  We are renovating our rooms with. We carpet, new bathrooms, new furniture, new sound proof windows and walls, new Disney artwork and more!

Summary: Our family of 5 had a 2-bedroom suite which meant the kids were in a separate room & we could spread out. Plenty of room for 5 nights as we only needed the room for sleeping & showering. Breakfast was highly processed & sugary though. Hard to find any actual food apart from fruit & chipped potatoes. Even the yoghurt was sweetened. Tip - bring your own laundry powder to save $$ as wash = $2, dry = $2 & soap = $2
Manager Response: Thanks for your honest review and we look forward to your return we appreciate the honest feedback about our spacious suites and our breakfast.

Summary: After booking this hotel I was scared with what quality it would come, but it was fantastic! Adding the ART transportation to my vacation package was a great idea, there was an ART bus stop right outside the hotel! If visiting Disneyland, it wasn't too far too walk either.  Clean rooms, good wifi, great breakfast! 10/10
Manager Response: Thanks for the great feedback about your recent visit! I'm so glad you found the value in the quick and easy shuttle to and from the Disneyland theme parks! I'm also glad you found our customer service and clean rooms excellent! That's our highest compliment a gues could give us and we sure appreciate it! We look forward to your return!

Summary: This hotel was wonderful and when we checked in around 1 am after a full day of flying Jesus was very friendly and accommodating! The only issue we had was with the air conditioning unit. My mother and I slept in the room with the queen size and my cousin and grandmother slept in the room with the bunk beds. My mom and I were sweating and my cousin and grandmother were freezing. There was no way for the room with the queen size to cool down without the people in the other room freezing! Besides that our stay was lovely. I hope to stay here next time I have a destination in or near Anaheim! Thank you!
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your review.  We take such pride in our spacious suites and we are so thrilled you enjoyed them.  Our apologies about the ACs In the suite.  I'm proud to say we are upgrading our hotel rooms with new furniture, new carpet,new bathrooms, sound proof windows and flooring, new ACs in the 2nd rooms of all suites and more!   We hope you return to enjoy all of these new items that are sure to enhance your visit and experience!

Summary: This hotel was nice for a Best Western. It was nice, comfortable and the staff was really nice. We had a couple of additional requests and they were on it quickly. It would have been a long walk to Disneyland but we used the public transportation which dropped us off curb side. We would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thanks for the great feedback about your recent visit!  I'm so glad you found the value in the quick and easy shuttle to and from the Disneyland theme parks!   I'm also glad you found our customer service excellent!  That's our highest compliment a gues could give us and we sure appreciate it!  We look forward to your return!

Summary: Suites are excellent for family. Walking distance from Disneyland. Plenty of eateries near by. Although not flash, breakfasts were suitable. Reception staff were always very friendly and helpful. Rooms were clean. Would have no problems in recommending.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your great feedback. We sure appreciate you staying with us. We are hoping you return to see our great improvements happening such as new carpet in all rooms, new furniture, new Disney artwork, new bathrooms with modern accent tile, new sound proof windows and more! Thanks for your great comments on our location and great service!  We are looking forward to seeing you back to create more Disney magic!

Summary: If you have kids then do not get room 335, because it has a hole in the floor and your kids will trip on it.  The hotel is 1.1 mile away from the Disneyland main entrance, so do not be fooled by some of the front desk people when they say it is one block away, because there is a BW that is one block away and this one is not it.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your honest feedback. We sure appreciate you staying with us. We are hoping you return to see our great improvements happening such as new carpet in all rooms, new furniture, new Disney artwork, new bathrooms with modern accent tile, new sound proof windows and more! Looking forward to seeing you create more Disney magic!

Summary Heading: Outdated and in need of major updates!
Summary: We stayed at the hotel for a family Disneyland trip. The best thing about the hotel is the location and the shuttle outside the front. The hotel is extremely outdated. Many hotels in the area are similar in price and much nicer.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your honest feedback.  We sure appreciate you staying with us.  We are hoping you return to see our great improvements happening such as new carpet in all rooms, new furniture, new Disney artwork, new bathrooms with modern accent tile, new sound proof windows and more!   Thanks for your great comments on our location and shuttle options to Disneyland theme parks for those who choose not to walk.  Looking forward to seeing you create more Disney magic!

Summary: Great location to Disneyland, Knotts Berry Farm and other attractions.Restaurants were a short walk away, rooms were very clean and hotel staff were excellent.  Would definitely stay again if we were to return to the USA.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your honest feedback anout your recent visit.  We are so glad you enjoyed the clean rooms and great location!  Our highest compliment is our great customer service.  Thanks for taking the time to acknowledge the team!  We hope to see you back!

Summary: This was out first trip to Anaheim and we could not find fault with this accommodation. From the minute we arrived we were taken care of. The reception staff were fantastic, especially Suzy who assisted us and went above and beyond what we expected.   Suzy arranged all of our attraction tickets and gave us everything we needed. No questions went unanswered.  The rooms were immaculate, the pool and spa clean, laundry facilities and gym and well used by us. It is only about a 15 minute flat pleasant walk to Disney Land.  Highly recommended for families and couples AND breakfast is included.
Manager Response: Thanks for this great review! We sure appreciate you taking a moment to tell us how much you enjoyed your first visit to the Happiest Place On Earth!  Thank You!   I'm also glad you were able to enjoy our heated pool & spa, fitness center, and our free hot breakfast!  We will make sure to acknowledge our housekeeping staff and front desk staff.  Look forward to having you back!

Summary: Stayed oct 2-7 for Disney we were close everything was clean breakfast was awesome (minus the coffee) :) beds were a bit too soft for my liking but my husband thought they were fine. We always stay at a Best Western thank you!
Manager Response: Thanks for this great review! We sure appreciate you taking a moment to tell us how much you enjoyed your visit.  I'm so glad you enjoyed the hot breakfast buffet with so many options! We look forward to having you back!

Summary: The hotel rooms are clean and updated. It is located close to Disneyland. The breakfast was surprisingly good. It included hot items such as pancakes, made to order waffles, sausage and eggs. I was pleased with the value I received for the price I paid for the room.
Manager Response: Thanks for this great review!  We sure appreciate you taking a moment to tell us how much you enjoyed our hot breakfast buffet with so many options!  I'm also glad you were able to enjoy one of our newly renovated rooms!  We're working hard to improve the entire property and continue to help guests create magical memories when they visit.  Look forward to having you back!

Summary: Our Disney vacation.    This was our first say at this location and we were totally surprised how much we liked it. The staff were great and helped with any questions we had.  The breakfast offered right me off guard and loved the variety.   I would definitely be staying here again..
Manager Response: Thanks so much for taking the time to acknowledge our hotel and let us know about your great stay!  We sure appreciate the kind words about the staff-it is our highest compliment!  It means a lot to us and we look forward to your return!

Summary: Good stay! We had fun and was close to a shuttle. Our whole family was able to stay close together. Nice people! We enjoyed the hotel and the space. Bunk beds and crib avaialability. The pool was nice. Space was clean.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your great feedback!  We sure appreciate it.  We are so glad you enjoyed the pool and our clean rooms!  We love having families stay here and create memories to last a lifetime.  Thank you for your loyalty.

Summary: The bed was comfortable, internet had excellent speed and staff was professional. Liked the various breakfast options. Liked the easy access to the laundry room and elevators for easy access to the rooms & avoid stairs. However, cannot give it an excellent rating because when I tried to check out just after 5:30 AM, to beat some of the morning traffic, the doors that normally slide open when one walks close to it, to get to the front desk, did not slide open, suggesting the doors were closed/locked. However, I went back 1 hr later after breakfast and doors slid open as normal. Would recommend to anyone looking to check out early to discuss with the front desk ahead of time or see if there is an alternative way to get to the front desk during off-hours before 6 AM.
Manager Response: Thanks for this great review! We sure appreciate it and look forward to your return! We are so glad you enjoyed the experience of staying with us and we cant thank you enough for the kind words about our clean rooms and amenities. Our property is always open and available to all guests 24 hours a day and we are always ready to help in any way possible.  My hope is that each guest has a perfect stay and the service you get is amazing! We look forward to your return for more Disney magic and to enjoy our new rooms! We are renovating with new furniture, new bathrooms with modern accent tile, new carpet, new Disney artwork and more!

Summary Heading: Good price for a room at Disneyland
Summary: This hotel is located about a mile and a half from entrance to Disneyland BUT there is a ART bus stop right out front. Rooms are clean, maybe in need of a bit of updating, but suites for families, wonderful with bunk beds, cribs available. Nice/simple swimming pool and hot tub. Breakfast included! You have to pay for parking at the hotel which seemed weird to me, so if you drive that increases your per night stay!
Manager Response: Thanks for this great review! We sure appreciate it and look forward to your return! We are so glad you enjoyed the experience staying with us and we can thank you enough for the kind words about our clean rooms.  We look forward to your return for more Disney magic and to enjoy our new rooms!  We are renovating with new furniture, new bathrooms with modern accent tile, new carpet, new Disney artwork and more!

Summary: We stayed at the best western raffles for 1 week in september and loved it. . .it was a quick walk to the toy story shuttle to get to the disney parks (otherwise a 20 min walk). We were given a corner room on the 3rd floor and it couldnt have been better!! No one needed to walk past our rooms so it was SO quiet. Also the room was slightly different than online and had a large main room with bed, tv, fridge (quite roomy) and microwave and the bathroom was off that room. . .and then there was a door to where the sofa bed and bunkbed and other tv were. . .it was so great to not have the bathroom in the other room as my kids would fall asleep fast and we didnt need to disturb them. The breakfast was plentiful and the staff working in the breakfast room were amazing! They were
Manager Response: Thanks for this great review! We sure appreciate it and look forward to your return! We are so glad you enjoyed the experience staying with us and we can thank you enough for the kind words about the breakfast team and our clean rooms.  We look forward to your return for more Disney magic!

Summary: Thank you! We loved the appearance of the hotel and the no smoking signs everywhere. Breakfast was perfect and we like the outdoor seating option! Beds were comfy and great water pressure in the shower!
Manager Response: Thanks  for your great review and comments about our great breakfast and hotel appearance.  We work so hard to make sure all our great arrive to a clean, friendly hotel ready to help you create magical memories while visiting! Thanks for the compliment on the bedding too!  We appreciate it and look forward to your return.

Summary Heading: Good breakfast, nice clean rooms, close to Disneyland
Summary: This is a great place to stay if you want a clean room, good breakfast with variety, within a mile walking distance to Disneyland and very friendly staff. We took our family to Disneyland and stayed here two nights. We only had two complaints, which we feel can happen anywhere. One the people in the room next to us were extremely noisy and we could hear them all night yelling and banging things. (It was our fault for not reporting them) and secondly, the room smelled strong of cleaning chemicals-but we were glad it was clean. There were tons of towels, pillows, and blankets as well, which sometimes is rare. Very friendly staff! For the price, this is a great place to stay!
Manager Response: Thanks for this great review!  We sure appreciate it and look forward to your return!  We are so glad you enjoyed the experience staying with us and we look forward to your return for more Disney magic!

Summary: We stayed here for our 15th anniversary trip to Disney.  We stayed 4 nights, the staff was great!  The room was good, very clean,  the breakfast area had a good selection but was very busy late in the am, would recommend going earlier in the morning. The hotel is a short walk to the toy story lot and we caught the shuttle there.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your great review. I love that you celebrated such a great anniversary moment with us!  Congrats!  We sure appreciate you staying with us and enjoying the breakfast daily! I'm also proud to say when you return you will enjoy the many upgrades we are currently working on such as all brand New furniture, new bathrooms with modern accent tile, new carpet, new Disney artwork, new sound proof windows and more!

Summary: Our room was very comfortable for our family of 5. Breakfast was very nice. And the very short walk to ride the free bus from the Toy Story parking lot was a bonus. Overall very nice and we would definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your great review. I love you were so pleased with the suite!  We sure appreciate you staying with us! We love hearing about guests who enjoy our great location. I'm also proud to say when you return you will enjoy the many upgrades we are currently working on such as all brand New furniture, new bathrooms with modern accent tile, new carpet, new Disney artwork, new sound proof windows and more!

Summary: This is a magical experience. I hope everyone will get a chance to visit . The rooms are very nice and the breakfast was awesome . I can't wait to go back and stay longer oh and the bed was so nice great internet too ❤️
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your great review. I love it when guests are pleasantly surprised and excited once they see how special our Hotel really is! We sure appreciate you staying with us! We love hearing about guests who enjoy our breakfast and great location. I'm also proud to say when you return you will enjoy the many upgrades we are currently working on such as all brand New furniture, new bathrooms with modern accent tile, new carpet, new Disney artwork, new sound proof windows and more!

Summary: I was looking for a hotel close to Disneyland. I was hesitant because this "Raffles Inn" offers free breakfast and reasonable parking with THIS price? But I booked it because it's under BW name.  When I checked in and got into the room, I have to say it's really a pleasant surprise, everything surpasses my expectation! I even extended my stay for 3rd night by making another reservation. Disneyland parking lot is just north of the hotel, which saves you $20 ! (the hotel charges $12 for parking)
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your great review. I love it when guests are pleasantly surprised and excited once they see how special our Hotel really is!  We sure appreciate you staying with us!  We love hearing about guests who enjoy our breakfast and great location. I'm also proud to say when you return you will enjoy the many upgrades we are currently working on such as all brand New furniture, new bathrooms with modern accent tile, new carpet, new Disney artwork, new sound proof windows and more!

Summary: Due to mistake by me, I was expected to check in one day earlier. Clerk acted as if I had really messed up and she had to find a room for me.  Since I had paid for the room in January, I felt that my room should be kept for me.  After I said that I would gladly receive a refund if she couldn't find me a room, she became friendlier and found me a room.  Breakfast was pretty good, but instead of fresh scrabbled eggs, they had premade egg patties that weren't all that good.  Other Best Westerns have fresh scrabbled eggs.  One in Arlington, WA even had made to order eggs.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your honest feedback anout your recent visit.  We sure appreciate it.  I'm glad you enjoyed our location and the magic of the Disneyland resort.  I hope you return to see our hotel upgrades such as new furniture,  new carpet, new bathrooms with modern accent tile, new Disney artwork and more!

Summary: Hotel was conveniently located to Disney within walking distance. Very reasonable priced. We stayed 2 nights in the end after spending a whole day/night at Disney. Staff were excellent very friendly & helpful. Free wifi always a plus. Breakfast included was ok for the type of Inn couldn't complain really  Ideal for families  In need of a lick of paint or upgrade of decor & bathroom on small side but overall great experience
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your review and feedback about our value and customer service. We sure appreciate it and look forward to your return. We are so glad you appreciated the great location! We look forward to your return to see our upgrades such as new bathrooms with modern accent décor, new carpet, new Disney artwork and more!

Summary: Our stay was above average for this type of hotel.  Our stay was for the Half Marathon Weekend at Disneyland, and so we really just needed somewhere clean, with a good location. We were only in the room to sleep. Breakfast was decent, eggs, sausage, waffles, fruit, etc. the service from the staff was stellar, check in and check out were smooth. The beds were pretty uncomfortable but honestly not the worst I've ever slept in. Overall it was worth the money, and the great location to the parks and wonderful service make this a 4 star.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your great review. We sure appreciate you staying during the Disney Marathon!  We love hearing about guests who enjoy our great customer service and friendly staff. I'm also proud to say when you return you will enjoy the many upgrades we are currently working on such as all brand New furniture, new bathrooms with modern accent tile, new carpet, new Disney artwork, new sound proof windows and more!

Summary: We were looking for a quick easy room in area  the pool was small but nice rooms very clean wood floors     the tvs even had movies available I believe    we were able use the laundry room and get some laundry done
Manager Response: Thanks so much for this great review. We appreciate your feedback and we are so glad you enjoyed the amenities at the hotel such as laundry facilities and our hard wood floors in our clean rooms!  We look forward to your return for more Disney magic!

Summary: When we arrived, I was taken back a little by the rather outdated decor. However the breakfast and the oh so pleasant staff made up for it. I will certainly come back and the fact that the Hotel is literally in walking distance to Disneyland/Adventure land is certainly a huge plus ;) Thank you for a lovely experience and stay.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your great review.  We sure appreciate it!  We love hearing about guests who enjoy our great customer service and friendly staff.  I'm also proud to say when you return you will enjoy the many upgrades we are currently working on such as all brand  New furniture, new bathrooms with modern accent tile, new carpet, new Disney artwork, new sound proof windows and more!

Summary: This hotel was perfect for our Disneyland weekend. The rooms were clean and provided breakfast. The location was close to Disneyland and the transit was convenient. The pick up/drop off was right outside of the hotel. We would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your great review!  We sure appreciate it and look forward to your return.  We are so happy you enjoyed the clean rooms and great breakfast.   We see so proud of our close location to the Anaheim convention center and Disneyland theme parks.  We can't wait to share more Disney magic with you!

Summary: We just stayed at this hotel for four nights while we went to Disneyland. We did not have a single problem staying here. Rooms were very clean and housekeeping did an excellent job replenishing toiletries. They took the time to put our daughters stuffed animals into cute poses,which she enjoyed. We did not have an issue parking like some other guests that reviewed. They did charge for parking but I knew that going in so I budgeted accordingly. This hotel is a five minute walk  from the Toy Story parking lot where you can catch a shuttle to the park. Next time we go to Disneyland,we are definitely staying here!
Manager Response: This is a great review!  Thank you!  It is our pleasure to have you stay with us while you create special memories and I'm so glad you had a great time.  Thanks for complementing our amazing housekeeping team!  I will make sure to acknowledge the housekeeper.  We look forward to your return.

Summary: Compared to any hotel I've stayed at, this one tops the rest. It was a very comfortable stay. The pricing was very reasonable too. No complaints during our stay. We will definitely be staying here in the future.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for this great review!  We sure appreciate it and look forward to your return!  We are so glad you found the value in our property price wise as well as enjoying our great service.  This is our highest compliment.  We look forward to your return!

Summary: Enjoyed being close to Disneyland. Breakfast was good. We were in a two-bedroom suite but all of the air conditioning was in one room. Cold air was fed to the other room by a noisy fan in the common wall. Not ideal.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for this review and feedback. We sure appreciate it and look forward to your return. We are so glad you appreciated the great location!  We look forward to your return.

Summary: This hotel is very close to disney shuttle, has good breakfast, the staff is very helpful and go out of there way to help you. I forgot to get shuttle to airport and staff was able to get me a private shuttle with only 12 hours notice for a affordable price. 2nd time we've stayed this year and will be staying again next visit to disneyland.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for this review and great feedback.  We sure appreciate it and look forward to your return.  We are so glad you appreciated the great customer service we Provided and our great breakfast.  We look forward to your return.

Summary: Sleeps 8!  Great hot breakfast with eggs, potatoes, sausage, donuts, cereals, yogurt and fresh fruit.  Within walking distance to Disneyland, restaurants, Drugstores, etc. Clean room, second bedroom with sofa bed and bunk beds and second bathroom.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your great review about our family suites!   The 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms are amazing and families love them!!  We are so glad you we're able to create magical memories while visiting and look forward to your return.

Summary Heading: Great value and location, but be careful booking family suites
Summary: This hotel was great, beds were comfortable and the room was clean...carpet needs replacing was a little grimy.  Only about 10-15 minute walk to the Toy Story Parking for Disney, those shuttles run until about an hour after the park closes.  Beware though, we book a family suite and got a call the day of checkin stating that there was an unexpected "emergency" and the hotel was no longer able to accommodate us as the family suite wasn't available, the only thing they could do was split us into two non-adjoining rooms. For us this was something we could adapt to because we were 4 adults and 3 children, but if we had been one family of 2 adults and 5 kids the hotel expected us to to put young children in a room unattended.  Like I said we were able to adjust, but initially it was
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your amazing review! We are so glad you had a great stay and we look forward to your return.  I'm so happy you enjoyed the close location of the Toy Story  shuttle.  Thanks for your understanding on the room change as our main goal is to make sure our Hotel guests are happy and welcomed!  We hope you return to see our guest room improvements.  We are proud to be installing new bathrooms with modern accent tile, new carpet, new furniture, new Disney artwork, and more!     I will make sure you're comments are shared with the entire team! Thank you! We look forward to your return!

Summary: I was in town for a conference and this hotel is located walking distance from the conference center.  The staff are great.  THey went out of their way to make sure I understood evertything about my bill, about perks that were available and anything else I may have asked them.  We did not want housekeeping coming nto our room until after we were gone for the day.  We kept the Do not Disturb sign up.  The staff waited until we were gon to come in and maintain our room.  Even though it was after their cutoff time.  The room is typical.  The only issue with this hotel is that the parking spots are small.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your amazing review! We are so glad you had a great stay and we can't say how much it means to us they you mentioned our outstanding customer service and clean rooms. It's our highest compliment. I will make sure you're comments are shared with the entire team! Thank you! We look forward to your return!

Summary: We had an awesome stay!  Staff was very helpful!  Very good customer service!  Felt welcomed at all times.  Rooms were very clean and spacious!  The daily breakfast was good and filling.  Public transportation to Disneyland was just outside the hotel and dropped u off right at Disney.  Very convenient! Highly recommended!
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your amazing review!  We are so glad you had a great stay and we can't say how much it means to us they you mentioned our outstanding customer service and clean rooms.    It's our highest compliment.  I will make sure you're comments are shared with the entire team!  Thank you!  We look forward to your return!

Summary Heading: Love this hotel and hope to return again one day
Summary: We stayed here for the first time in August 2013 and again in June this year for 6 nights. We love everything about it: -The 2-room kids/family suites are great, well designed, spacious, clean and comfortable. Dual sinks outside the bathroom is a great idea and enables a family to get ready in the morning without everyone waiting for the one bathroom. I guess we were in one of the older rooms as the decor was a bit dated, but everything was clean and well maintained so that was no issue. We requested a room on the top floor (stairs don't worry us) in a quiet location and the staff obliged without issue. It was perfect. As our kids are older than our last stay our routine is a bit different; with going into the Disney parks in the afternoon, staying for the lovely warm evenings
Manager Response: What a great review!  Thanks so much!  We sure appreciate you and look forward to your return!  We are so glad you enjoyed the 2 bedroom suites and our breakfast!   We are so excited you returned to the property and look forward to you coming back and sharing in the magic of Disney again!

Summary: Rolling up to Best Western Plus Raffles after a long flight from New Zealand was a great experience. Our room was ready the people were both friendly and helpful. They provided great advice about Anaheim shopping and the best way to conquer Disneyland. The breakfast in the morning provided free of charge was what you would expect in the US. The kids loved it. Room was always cleaned and freshen each day which is awesome after a long day on your feet.  It is about a 15 minute walk to Disneyland and located near a number of restaurants. With the temperature being 37C the pool was just what the doctor ordered.
Manager Response: What a great review!   Thank you.  It's always great to exceed our guests expectations and I'm so glad you took the time to tell about your great experience.  We sure appreciate it and look forward to your return!

Summary: Worst customer service ever!! The front desk staff is extremely rude & they don't do their job correctly. Worst hotel to stay at. I will ever be staying here again. It's 15 min away from Disneyland walking distance but there is better hotels near by.
Manager Response: Thanks for your honest review. We apologize your experience here wasn't perfect as we always strive for each guest to feel welcomed and appreciated!   We know you have many choices when traveling and we always appreciate the loyalty to our best western brand.   We hope you allow us an opportunity to better serve you and find out some details on what happened during your visit that wasn't perfect.  We are all about fixing situations so our guests know we listen and take action. We want your guest experience to be friendly and relaxing so you can spend time creating magical memories!  We hope you allow us an opportunity to make things right.

Summary Heading: Beds were too firm for my liking
Summary: Breakfast was great! Rooms were recently remodeled and very nicely updated however the beds were way too firm. But I guess if you have a lot of guests sleeping on them they would get soft pretty fast..
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your review! We sure appreciate it and look forward to your return to see our new look! We are proud to be installing new carpet, new furniture, new Disney artwork, new hard wood floors, new bathrooms with modern accent tile, sound proof walls and new windows, new custom wallpaper throughout the room and more! I'm so glad you enjoyed the breakfast and our new rooms!  My apologies about the bed firmness.  Looking forward to seeing you again!

Summary: This hotel is wonderful was here to visit Disney. The hotel is pretty far from the hotel about 3 to 4 lights away, but there is a bus that could drop you off at the park for a fee. Staff is great and friendly. Rooms are spacious and breakfast room food is great.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your review! We sure appreciate it and look forward to your return to see our new look! We are proud to be installing new carpet, new furniture, new Disney artwork, new hard wood floors, new bathrooms with modern accent tile, sound proof walls and new windows, new custom wallpaper throughout the room and more! I'm so glad you enjoyed the friendly staff and our rooms. Looking forward to seeing you again!

Summary: This was a super great hotel, within walking distance to the theme parks.  It took about 15 minutes for our family to get to Disney.  The staff was very friendly and we would definitely stay again.  The room was great, as well as the other amenities.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for taking the time to comment on your great stay with us recently. We appreciate your kind words about our location and customer service!  I'm so glad you enjoyed the hotel and we look forward to seeing you back to create more magical memories!

Summary: Great location to Disneyland with city shuttle bus service. Basic older hotel with helpful staff. Breakfast was okay, had the same items everyday but a good variety.  Pool was a basic hotel pool but very clean.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for taking the time to comment on your great stay with us recently. We appreciate your kind words about our clean pool and location!  I'm so glad you enjoyed the hotel and we look forward to seeing you back to create more magical memories!

Summary: We stayed here for 3 nights in July in a suite with two rooms. The set out of the suite is fantastic. One room having a queen size bed and tv, microwave and refrigerator and the second room includes bunk beds, a sofa and large TV. Both rooms are very spacious and clean. I can't fault the customer service by staff. There is parking, laundry and small pool on site and the location is central. The only potential drawback to staying here could be noise. The hotel is only really truly quiet between 12.30am and 6.00am with guests walking past the room talking and housekeeping starting their duties quite early in the morning pushing their trolleys back and forth past the room. Having said that, we weren't bothered much by it.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for taking the time to comment on your great stay with us recently. We appreciate your kind words about our suites, and our friendly customer service!  I'm so glad you enjoyed the hotel and we look forward to seeing you back to create more magical memories!

Summary: They had bunk beds for the kids and a pullout bed. I loved it... and they helped me out with last minute change of plans. The valet was helpful and the breakfast was much better than expected. Outstanding
Manager Response: Thanks so much for taking the time to comment on your great stay with us recently. We appreciate your kind words about valet and our Suites!  I'm so glad you enjoyed the hotel and we look forward to seeing you back to create more magical memories!

Summary: i had no problems with the process, the a/c wasn't turning on and within 5 minutes of letting them know, they sent someone to the room and turned it on for us. The front desk was also very friendly and had great customer service
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your review! We sure appreciate it and look forward to your return to see our new look! We are proud to be installing new carpet, new furniture, new Disney artwork, new hard wood floors, new bathrooms with modern accent tile, new custom wallpaper throughout the room and more! I'm so glad you enjoyed the friendly staff and our location.   I'm also really glad we got your AC to work!  Looking forward to your return!

Summary Heading: 4 flights of stairs  are you kidding me
Summary: four flights of stairs with bad knees and being seniors was not pleasant.  the ac in the room never got it cool.  the place is pretty rough around the edges and everywhere else.  the breakfast is nasty..eggs are little dics of egg  prefer best western Stovall much mch more
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your honest review and feedback! We sure appreciate it and we will review your comments with the entire team.  We apologize your stay wasn't perfect.  We hope you return to give us another chance and to see our new look! We are proud to be installing new carpet, new furniture, new Disney artwork, new hard wood floors, new bathrooms with modern accent tile, new custom wallpaper throughout the room, new soundproof windows, and more!

Summary: We had a wonderful time at Disneyland on our vacation and the the hotel was fantastic, the staff was so nice and helpful at check in our  rooms were very clean and beds were very comfortable, breakfast was great and staff there were very nice also. We will stay at this hotel again
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your review! We sure appreciate it and look forward to your return to see our new look! We are proud to be installing new carpet, new furniture, new Disney artwork, new hard wood floors, new bathrooms with modern accent tile, new custom wallpaper throughout the room and more! I'm so glad you enjoyed the friendly staff and our location. Cant wait to see you again as you create more memories!

Summary: I bought a item at D23, 3 days later when it was time to pack up the car and the item was missing. Reported it to the hotel manager who told me they would report it to their insurance and file a report which I did. The next day the manager was to be there at 9 AM did not come in until 10 AM and I was told I had to file a police report, which I did and they would send it with the police report to insurance company. Let us take bet if I will ever hear from them again and the cost of missing items was around $300. Suggestion is to NOT stay at this hotel and stay some place you can trust.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your honest review.  We sure appreciate it and hope you return to give us another opportunity to better serve you.  My apologies your stay wasn't perfect. We want you to have great memories from your stay here and your D23 experience.  I will make sure the situation is followed up on so you feel comfortable we ha e done everything we can to make this right.

Summary: I chose Raffles because it included breakfast. It is fairly close to Disneyland and a great value hotel right across from the convention centre. The room was pleasant. The only downside was being on the third floor- when people walk by the room, you can feel the floor shake. In all, a good clean place for families to stay.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your review and 3 star rating! We sure appreciate it and we are so grateful you selected to stay here! We look forward to your return so you and the family can create more "Magical" memories. We also hope you return to see our new look! We are proud to be installing new carpet, new furniture, new Disney artwork, new hard wood floors, new bathrooms with modern accent tile, new custom wallpaper throughout the room and more! I'm so glad you enjoyed the breakfast and our location.

Summary: 4 adults and two small children enjoyed a family suite here in May 2017.  We loved our room, the size and configuration of the hotel, and used the pool nearly daily (5 day/5 night stay) with great delight!  We appreciated the laundry facility, and we were all thoroughly satisfied with breakfast - perhaps the most well-stocked, greatest variety complimentary breakfast buffet I have seen at a hotel!  Scrambled eggs,sausage patties and hard boiled eggs were standard, as well as waffles, AND MUCH more!  We appreciated the security provided by the entrance guard/parking assistant (one person -several functions).  We also appreciated the 24 hour availability of ice water and coffee, as well as apples (consistently) and cookies (sometimes) available as a courtesy in the lobby.  It was
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your amazing review and 5 star rating! We sure appreciate it and we are so grateful you selected to stay here!  We look forward to your return so you and the family can create more "Magical" memories.  We also hope you return to see our new look! We are proud to be installing new carpet, new furniture, new Disney artwork, new hard wood floors, new bathrooms with modern accent tile, new custom wallpaper throughout the room and more! I'm so glad you enjoyed the friendly staff and our location. I will make sure I acknowledge the entire team!  Your acknowledgement of our customer service is our highest compliment!  Thanks so much!

Summary: We wanted a location that would allow us to walk to Disneyland and the convention center. (If you don't mind about a mile walk to the park). This location is perfect. Very friendly staff, clean rooms, and the breakfast selections were great!! Honestly if you need a comfortable place, this is the location for you. Only thing I would say is that the coffee isn't very good, but that's just me I am particular about my coffee. :-)
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your amazing review and 5 star rating! We sure appreciate it and we are so grateful you selected to stay here! We look forward to your return so you and the family can create more "Magical" memories. We also hope you return to see our new look! We are proud to be installing new carpet, new furniture, new Disney artwork, new hard wood floors, new bathrooms with modern accent tile, new custom wallpaper throughout the room and more! I'm so glad you enjoyed the friendly staff and our location. I will make sure I acknowledge the entire team! Your acknowledgement of our customer service is our highest compliment! Thanks so much!  By the way, I love my coffee too!  Thanks for the feedback!

Summary Heading: Third time we have stayed here.
Summary: This is our third time staying here. Every time we go to Disneyland, we always stay at this hotel. We feel that it's the best value for the money in the area. It is about a 5 minute shuttle ride from Disneyland and the shuttle stop is right in front of the hotel. Best of all, the rooms are very very clean, and all the staff has always been very polite and helpful. We even got a call from the front desk staff asking us if there was anything we needed. Their buffet breakfast is awesome. They even have a couple of self serve waffle makers. We will continue to stay here every time we are in the area. We always have great experiences with Best Western!
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your honest review and 5 star rating! We sure appreciate it and look forward to your return to see our new look! We love our repeat guests! We are so glad you enjoyed our great location and our great customer service! We are proud to be installing new carpet, new furniture, new Disney artwork, new hard wood floors, new bathrooms with modern accent tile, new custom wallpaper throughout the room and more! Come back and see us for more "Magical" memories!

Summary: The people are very helpful and nice. The value of the room is great - and the breakfast is better than some other hotels. The pool was nice for the kids and the hotel staff was always there to give advise and help with any problem. We had 4 adults and 2 small kids and the suite was a good size.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your honest review and 5 star rating! We sure appreciate it and look forward to your return to see our new look! We love our repeat guests! We are so glad you enjoyed our great location and our great customer service! We are proud to be installing new carpet, new furniture, new Disney artwork, new hard wood floors, new bathrooms with modern accent tile, new custom wallpaper throughout the room and more! Come back and see us for more "Magical" memories!

Summary Heading: Nice Place to Stay with the Family
Summary: We booked the suite with the bunk beds.  Room was clean and spacious.  Staff was nice and helpful.  Breakfast was awesome!  We filled up so we didn't have to eat at Disneyland.  Overall, I think this hotel was a good value for the money and I would recommend it to others.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for this great review and 4 star rating! We sure appreciate it and look forward to your return! I'm so glad you enjoyed the breakfast and our great rooms.  I look forward to you creating more memories here at the happiest place on earth! We hope you come back to share more great memories with us!

Summary: This hotel is a very good place to stay as it is about a mile from Disneyland.  The staff is great and the breakfast food is very good.  The distance in walk for this 62 year old guy and wife in a scooter was tolerable considering the miles to be walked in the park.  It is best suited for a younger couple and kids. As for the maintenance guy, he helped us with an adjustment knob that was too tight on the scooter.  Once he got the wrench the knob it was freed up.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for this great review and 4 star rating! We sure appreciate it and look forward to your return! I'm so glad you enjoyed the breakfast and our great rooms.  I look forward to you creating more memories here at the happiest place on earth! We are proud to have a lot of options for guests who need assistance.  When possible, try and take the shuttle over to the theme park which easily accommodates shuttles and wheelchairs! That way you save all your scooter charge for the Disneyland Theme Parks! We will always help you come up with ways to enjoy the Magic of Disney!

Summary: This hotel is a very good place to stay when visiting Disneyland except for 1 thing. If you are over 60 and need a scooter or a wheel chair, then the mile walk is a little much.  A younger person and family would be best suited for that travel.  My scooter ran out of juice after a day at Disney and had to push it the last 150 yards. The maintenance guy came to our rescue with another issue with my scooter with an adjustment knob that was stuck.  All in All a very good place to stay and the breakfast was great
Manager Response: Thanks so much for this great review and 4 star rating! We sure appreciate it and look forward to your return! I'm so glad you enjoyed the breakfast and our great rooms.  I look forward to you creating more memories here at the happiest place on earth!  We are proud to have a lot of options for guests who need assistance.   When possible, try and take the shuttle over to the theme park which easily accommodates shuttles and wheelchairs!  That way you save all your scooter charge for the Disneyland Theme Parks!  We will always help you come up with ways to enjoy the Magic of Disney!

Summary Heading: Better than some, worse than some
Summary: Ok, so this hotel knows it's intended audience, and caters to it. The beds, linens, and floors were clean. Check. It has a complimentary breakfast, which had a lot of choices. Check. Within walking distance of Disney, kind of. Check. The downsides are: the building is simply old, and even though it's clearly maintained, it's loud. Loud doors, loud air units, loud outside noises. If you get a great rate on this place, go ahead and take it.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your honest feedback. We sure appreciate it and will be reviewing your comments with the entire team so we can continue to improve our product. We are proud to say we are installing new carpet, new furniture, new customer hard wood flooring, new bathrooms with modern accent tile, new Disney artwork, new soundproof windows, and more! We hope you return to give us another opportunity to better serve you.

Summary: Beds were horrible. Couldnt sleep. Asked for extra blankets for padding. Lots of noise from the parking lot. Door left open all day from the cleaning crew. Staff was very friendly and eager to help. They left yummy cookies on our first night.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your honest feedback. We sure appreciate it and will be reviewing your comments with the entire team so we can continue to improve our product. We are proud to say we are installing new carpet, new furniture, new customer hard wood flooring, new bathrooms with modern accent tile, new Disney artwork, new soundproof windows, new bedding, and more! We hope you return to give us another opportunity to better serve you.

Summary: My boyfriend and I loved the space here given the previous hotel in LA! The room was spotless and there were plenty of towels and toiletries! We had a family room with two TVs! Would really recommend the filling breakfast as well.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for this great review!  We sure appreciate it and look forward to your return!  I'm so glad you enjoyed the breakfast and our greet rooms.  I look forward to you creating more memories here at the happiest place on earth!

Summary Heading: Stay at the other Best Western not this one
Summary: If your a light sleeper don't stay here.  Hard mattresses, noisy balcony and the breakfast buffet is sad. The Embassy Suites still has the best breakfast buffet by far.  This Best Western isn't updated like the others we have stayed at.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your honest feedback and we apologize your stay wasn't perfect.  It is certainly our hope all guests find the value in our hotel.  We are proud to be installing new carpet, new furniture, new flooring, new sound proof windows, new custom hard wood floors, new bathrooms, new Disney artwork and more!  We ope in the coming months you will return to see more magic of Disney and see our new look!

Summary: Great breakfast spread, great friendly staff and hotel location.  But loud, can hear other guests walking in and out and past our zero privacy window. AC unit in room is too loud, unfortunately didn't drown outside noise just added to it making for a sleepless night.  We stayed at another hotel for exact same rate the next night and you can't begin to compare the quality between the two! The other one was far superior in every way.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your honest feedback.  We sure appreciate it and will be reviewing your comments with the entire team so we can continue to improve our product.  We are proud to say we are installing new carpet, new furniture, new customer hard wood flooring, new bathrooms with modern accent tile, new Disney artwork, new soundproof windows, and more!  We hope you return to give us another opportunity to bette serve you.

Summary: This hotel was very clean and the staff was extremely helpful. The breakfast was excellent and it was extremely easy to connect to the internet. When the front desk found out it was my daughters birthday she lad the staff leave some balloons and cookies for her
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your great review and 5 star rating!  That means so much for us.  We sure appreciate it and look forward to your return.  We are so glad you enjoyed all aspects of your visit from the wifi, breakfast, and of course clean rooms!  We hope your daughter had an amazing birthday and you come back to celebrate more!  We can start a tradition!

Summary: Right down the road from Disneyland! Nice staff, easy check in/out, clean rooms with lots of space and storage for everyone, exceptional breakfast.  Free parking, wifi and had guest laundry. Overall a great stay
Manager Response: Thanks so much for this great review!  We appreciate you and look forward to your return!  Thanks for complementing the staff, and our great location to the Disneyland theme parks!  Come back and see our new look!!

Summary: The hotel was alright nothing special. Parking was terrible and packed. The check in staff was not friendly or courteous. We were treated poorly on arrival. We felt like we were imposing on the check in clerk.  When we asked if we could use the restroom because my 3 year old granddaughter needed to go the clerk told that we could use the one in the pool area but the key card was only good for a couple of hours.  We asked for a first floor room because our son is a disable veteran and after waiting twice we were given a room on the 2nd floor.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your honest feedback about your recent visit to our property.  We appreciate your business and loyalty to our brand and we apologize your stay wasn't perfect from the time you arrived.  We are proud to be part of the Disney family and customer service is our greatest asset. I will be meeting with our entire front desk team to provide your feedback and we hope you would allow us another opportunity to better serve you.

Summary: great location to start an excursion to Disneyland.  The shuttle bus stop is right in front of the property.  The hotel staff was very friendly and accommodating - allowed us to park early and deposit our bags with the front desk, which they then took to our rooms at check in time, while we were still at Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your 5 star rating and great review!   We sure appreciate it!  We are so glad you enjoyed the value of our great location and appreciated our friendly customer service!  We look forward to your return here at the happiest place on earth!

Summary: The wife and I both agreed that this hotel did not live up to the Best Western plus label. It's an older property. And you can see that they really tried to fix it up. The outside looks good. but the room looks like what it is - a nice older property. Don't let my review cause you to avoid this hotel. It's an okay hotel. Just not a plus.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your honest review. We sure appreciate it and apologize your stay wasn't perfect. We hope to get another opportunity to better serve you. We are making a lot of room improvements that we're excited to share with our guests such as new flooring, new carpet, new furniture, new lamps, new bathrooms with modern accent tile, new Disney Artwork and more! Our team works so hard to make sure our guests have a "magical" experience even while we are freshening up our look!  We hope you will allow us another opportunity to better serve you!

Summary: This hotel was very affordable and I like the fact it had wooden flooring in the room instead of rugs. The location was not too far from Disneyland so we walked instead. The toy story parking was just around the corner so we walked from there when returning back to hotel. The parking lot was way packed and the breakfast was good enough for the family. Other than that I would come back again.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your great review and 5 star rating!! We appreciate you taking the time to acknowledge our great customer service, hot breakfast  and our brand new hard wood floors in our first floor rooms!  We love them too!  We look forward to your return at the Happiest Place On Earth!

Summary: Parking is terrible if you don't get in early.. They do have Valet but still ..  and 15.00 per night for parking?!?!?!   Room cost is already high. Location is perfect tho.. I guess that's what you are basically paying for. Near Disney, across the street from the Convention Center, walking distance to alot of places.  Overall, they're pretty good
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your great review and 4 star rating!! We appreciate you taking the time to acknowledge our great location and our customer service.  We apologize about the parking and hope that our valet system helps all guests as we welcome families from around the world.   We look forward to your return at the Happiest Place On Earth!

Summary: This hotel was WONDERFUL . Located practically steps from Disneyland . Clean, staff was very attentive . Pleasure to stay here .. the breakfast had an awesome selection and the staff Kept asking me if there was anything I needed !! I loved the attention and I hope to return soon !!
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your great review and 5 star rating!! We appreciate you taking the time to acknowledge our great customer service and clean rooms! It is our number 1 priority! We look forward to your return at the Happiest Place On Earth!  Our repeat guests mean alot to us as it's our highest compliment.

Summary: Good hotel, the onlything is you could here the noice from outside and next door room. But overall it was ok. I would stay again in the future with my family. It is very close to the parking of Disney and your taken to the main Disney park for free.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your review and 4 star rating!  We sure appreciate it and apologize for the noise outside your room.  We hope to get another opportunity to better serve you and thank you for being open to staying with us again.  We are so proud of our great location and the several different ways guests can arrive at the Theme Parks from here...  We are excited to be making a lot of room improvements that we're excited to share with our guests such as new flooring, new carpet, new furniture, new bathrooms with modern accent tile, new Disney Artwork and more!  Come back and see us.

Summary: WE enjoyed our stay. Beds were comfy. Outside a little outdated but overall we were very comfortable. Walking distance to shuttle for the Disneyland parks. Perfect! We would stay here again. The staff were extremely friendly.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your honest review. We sure appreciate it and apologize your stay wasn't perfect. We hope to get another opportunity to better serve you. We are making a lot of room improvements that we're excited to share with our guests such as new flooring, new carpet, new furniture, new bathrooms with modern accent tile, new Disney Artwork and more! We enjoy seeing all walks of life here creating magical memories here at the Happiest Place On Earth including families, school groups, Convention attendees, brides and grooms & more!

Summary: I was extremely impressed with the guest room with the bunk bed and pull out bed, we were a family of 8 traveling and to find a hotel that can accommodate all of us in one area together was difficult, so I was very happy that I was able to be in the room with all of my kids.
Manager Response: This is such a great review!! Thank you so much for the 4 stars! We sure appreciate your kind words about the great breakfast and our quick customer service! We love our location as it gives our guests options to get to and from the Disney theme Parks!  We look forward to your next visit.

Summary: had to redo this post because wont accept in caps. simple words now. roaches egg patty no parking no blankets dirty broken lamp from wall hanging and pool had bugs and do not rent from here go to portofino anahiem closer to Disneyland and same price beds are even better
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your honest review. We sure appreciate it and apologize your stay wasn't perfect. We hope to get another opportunity to better serve you. We are making a lot of room improvements that we're excited to share with our guests such as new flooring, new carpet, new furniture, new lamps, new bathrooms with modern accent tile, new Disney Artwork and more! We enjoy seeing all walks of life here creating magical memories here at the Happiest Place On Earth including families, school groups, Convention attendees, brides and grooms & more!

Summary: Not enough parking, we struggled almost everyday to find a parking spot . Also we stayed on the 2nd floor and woke up daily with the sound of footsteps from the 3rd floor. Otherwise breakfast was good and customer service was good. Really close to the park so that was a plus.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your great feedback.  We sure appreciate it and apologize for the parking and noise. We look forward to your return and opportunity to better serve you.

Summary: We really enjoyed ourselves.  Especially in the clean swimming pool.  Restaurants are in walking distance.  Our grand kids had an outstanding time and said they are ready to come again.  We discovered the other side of Disney Land, Disney California which had more rides and the food on the whole cost less on that side.  Our favorite rides was Guardian of the Gallaxcy and Car Race!
Manager Response: This is such a great review!! Thank you so much! We sure appreciate your kind words about the cleanliness of our property, great location, our sparkling clean pool, and our great customer service.  I'm so glad you enjoyed the brand new Guardians of the Galaxy and Car's land!   I agree they're both amazing! We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: They were quick to get us a crib when asked. Great breakfast. Walk to the "toy story" lot owned by disneyland and take their free shuttle. The hotel shuttle is always late and makes tons of stops in town.
Manager Response: This is such a great review!! Thank you so much for the 5 stars!  We sure appreciate your kind words about the great breakfast and our quick customer service!  We love our location as it gives our guests options to get to and from the Disney theme Parks!   We look forward to your next visit.

Summary: not a great experience; old motel (exterior doors); holes in carpet; air conditioning smelled; linens need replacement; noisy because it seems to be a favorite for school groups; staff was great - they just need a better facility
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your honest review. We sure appreciate it and apologize your stay wasn't perfect. We hope to get another opportunity to better serve you. We are making a lot of room improvements that we're excited to share with our guests such as new flooring, new carpet, new furniture, new bathrooms with modern accent tile, new Disney Artwork and more!  We enjoy seeing all walks of life here creating magical memories here at  the Happiest Place On Earth including families, school groups, Convention attendees, brides and grooms & more!

Summary: After a terrible experience in Santa Monica we decided to head to Anaheim 2 days early. We rung the hotel and asked if we could check in a couple of days early and they were very helpful. They made us a new reservation on Sunday to check in on Monday. We arrived at the hotel around 9am where the staff happily took our bags and stored them for us then told us where the kitchen was and to help our selfs to breakfast. The room was also really nice and great pool area !
Manager Response: Now this is a great review!  We are so glad you came early to stay with us and we were ready for you!   You enjoyed our great service and relaxing heated pool and spa!  We are glad you enjoyed our rooms and look forward to your return!

Summary: It was a great hotel to stay at we were very pleased on how they kept it clean and all were very friendly.When had questions they were all right there to help our family out I highly recommend this hotel if you want to enjoy a great stay .The pool was an extra we liked as well nice on a hot day.
Manager Response: This is such a great review!!  Thank you so much!  We sure appreicate your kind words about the cleanliness of our property and our great customer service. We look forward to your next visit starting off with a great time in the pool!!

Summary: First off i did not like the parking fee nor did i like the fact i couldnt bring my pet along for the vacation. Aside from that my experience was absolutely amazing thanks to the front desk fella chris i believe. He made my entire trip amazing when it started horribly, he was able to assist me with all the questions i had and he even remembered me mentioning my daughters birthday which my daughter was giggly about him knowing all day long. The room was spacious and beds comfy, the breakfast could use and upgrade. But i will deffinately be staying here next trip!
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your review.  We appreciate your honest feedback and look forward to your return!! My apologies about the parking fee.  We appreciate your kind words about our staff.

Summary: Our family has stayed at various Best Western hotels and we are usually very satisfied. This hotel has been our worst Best Western experience. The Plus  rating and nice online pictures of the kids suites led us decide on this  hotel for our Disneyland trip.  Upon arrival we realized this hotel should not be a Plus. The kids suite was very small and outdated and not what  we expected. The main bed for the parents was in the small front room upon entering, next to the front door and window so no privacy and can hear all exterior noise. The bathroom was so tiny it was hard to open and close the door while standing in front of the toilet. The kids room had a bunk bed and sofa bed but the room was so small when you open the sofa bed it's right up against the bunk bed with no space to
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your honest review.  We sure appreciate and apologize your stay wasn't perfect.  We hope to get another opportunity to better serve you.  We are making a lot of room improvements that we're excited to share with our guests such as new flooring, new carpet, new furniture, new bathrooms and more!

Summary Heading: Great stay for a large family
Summary: Great place, nice helpful staff, very good breakfast, hot tube was great. close to Disneyland. Staff was very friendly, and were able to answer all questions. breakfast was fresh, hot and plenty of it. the hot tube was a real relief at the end of a long day at disneyland. they offered a shuttle that we did not use. we were abel to either walk to Disneyland or the toy story parking lot and shuttle were very close and we used that. had a family of 9 staying in the family suite  and were quite comfortable.
Manager Response: What a great review!  Thank you so much for the kind words about our hotel service, great breakfast, great rooms and most of all...the hot tub!   This is a must have for a Disneyland property after a long day of walking!   Looking forward to your return!

Summary: Perfect Location and value for money.   Very Close to Disney land. Calm environment. Bunch of restaurants near by, Only sad thing is we need to pay for parking fee. if that is also covered it will be a superb deal
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your 5 star rating!  We sure appreciate it and look forward to your next visit with us!  We are so happy you enjoyed everything our hotel has to offer and we can't wait for you to come back and see even more magic of Disney!

Summary: Very poor accomodations, false images on booking website, didnt match our room. AC didnt function properly, leaky shower, stinky pull out couch, in room fridge not cold at all, this was worse than a motel 6....Go next door to Hilton Suites you will be happier.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your honest feedback.  We apologize your stay wasn't perfect and we hope you would allow us an opportunity to better serve you.  We are thrilled to be sprinkling pixie dust around the hotel and improving our property.  We are getting new bathrooms with new accent tile, new carpet, new Disney artwork, new furniture, new sound proof windows, and more!!

Summary: The only negative thing was the guests at the pool but someone from the hotel should have asked them to behave or leave pool area so others could enjoy it too. Rooms were clean but the bathroom was a little on the small side. Parking is bad and I don't think you should have to pay for parking
Manager Response: Thanks for your review and honest feedback.  We sure appreciate it and look forward to seeing you again here at the happiest place on earth!

Summary: Hotel was decent. Nothing spectacular. Looks like it needs some updates. Staff was friendly and helpful. Walking distance to Disneyland and restaurants.   Some noise late at night from other guests. All exterior doors and staircase to climb at night.
Manager Response: Thank you for this honest feedback about your recent visit.  We sure appreciate it and hope you return to see our improvements and upgrades.  We are thrilled to sprinkle pixie dust around the property and bring you new oversized headboards, New furniture,  new bathrooms with modern accent tile, new wallpaper decor and Disney artwork, new carpet, new flooring and more!   We appreciate your loyalty to our brand and look forward to seeing you!

Summary: It is a great hotel, everything was so much better than we expected, the staff was very kind and helpful, from the valet guy to the check in guy and the ladies serving breakfast, they all went out of their way to serve us, we appreciatte that very much. We would definitely come back
Manager Response: What a great review.  Thank you!  We always love when guests are pleasantly surprised by the quality of our hotel.  We look forward to having you come back to celebrate more memories with us!

Summary: The rooms are very clean. But the family suite was not what we had expected. The 2nd room has no windows or ac in it. You have to leave the door between the two rooms open for the ac to get into the other room. The floor above is very thin so if you have children jumping off the bed upstairs you can hear every foot step.
Manager Response: Thanks for staying with us during such an amazing time such as the Disney marathon.  Thanks for your comments about our clean rooms.  We apologize for the noise and hope you return for more fun!

Summary: The room was too small for the amount of family members I had indicated when making the reservation for this Suite.  Our room was rught next to the laundry  facility . The noise was unacceptable. The drain in the shower was not working propery  the tub woulld fill up with water while showering. Gone all day  at Disneyland came back tired,  late in the afternoon room had not been serviced had to leave again so it could be cleaned.   Not the stay I had expected or payed for.
Manager Response: Thank you for your honest review about your recent stay at our property. We sure appreciate it!  On behalf of our entire team, I would like to apologize for not exceeding your expectations. Your satisfaction is important to us and we will be using the feedback you gave us to implement improvements to ensure we offer a better experience for guests in the future. I can tell you I'm excited for your return because we have already started on our room upgrades!  More outlets, brand new furniture, new bathrooms with modern accent tile, new carpet, new Disney Artwork, new soundproof windows, and more!  I hope that you will consider staying with us again so that we can have another chance to provide you with a superior experience. Thanks for your kind words about our staff and our service! We enjoy having our groups here and hope you will allow us another chance to serve you.  All my best

Summary: This hotel was clean and we thought the breakfast was very good. However if you are looking for a quiet nights sleep don't stay on the first floor next to the breakfast room. The people above us were soo loud and since the windows are thin it sounded like the breakfast crowd was in our room with us. It made for a horrible nights sleep.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your honest review.  We sure appreciate it and look forward to your return. My apologies about the noise from above you during your visit.  While we know Many families visit here to create magical memories and have lots of fun, we understand rest and relation are important too.  We look forward to making your next visit perfect!

Summary Heading: Love,  love,  Love!!  The best place to stay in Anaheim!!
Summary: We have only great things to say about this place!!! From the rooms,  to the breakfast,  to the great staff,  to the best room prices,  this is a great place to stay.  Always clean and friendly!  Good location and easy check in!  Can't say enough good things about this place!!
Manager Response: This is an amazing review!  Thanks so much. We look forward to you return!  Thanks for recognizing the staff here!  We try every day to treat our guests special and help them in any way we can!  Thank you for acknowledging that's. We look forward to your return!

Summary: The hotel was very well kept and the staff was very friendly. The rooms were nice and comfortable and we had a fridge and microwave which helped us a lot as we stayed for 3 nights. It was quiet at night but once the morning came it was very noisy. We were on the path towards to the breakfast room so we had everyone passing by. As well as all the families getting ready to head to Disney. They charge $15 a night for parking which I didn't really like as we had already paid for our stay i thought paring should have been included. Other than that i have nothing negative to say about our stay. It was comfortable, close to Disneyland and we had many food options around us. There was alot to do and everything was close in walking and driving distance.
Manager Response: Thanks for this great review!  We sure appreciate you and look forward to your return.  I will make sure to acknowledge the entire team for their outstanding customer service and for the clean rooms.  We hope you return to keep celebrating the magic of Disney with us!

Summary: The rooms were disgusting and outdated. My shower head had green rust on it and did not work properly. There breakfast was not that great. And the parking is manadatory valet parking and they park people in front of each other so it is a nightmare when you try to go somewhere. But the hotel staff was friendly and professional! They made the stay more bearable.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your honest feedback.  We appreciate it and apologize your stay wasn't perfect!  We want all our guests to enjoy the magic of Disney and of course the hotel. We are excited to say we are improving our rooms with upgrades such as new carpet, brand new bathrooms with modern accent tile, new flooring, new Disney artwork, brand new furniture and more!

Summary: Very clean comfortable room, staff make this place outstanding, so friendly and happy to help.  Very convenient to get on the shuttle to Disney parks and next to some great restaurants, ideal location without being right outside the doors of Disney.  Quiet area, lovely maintain area, pool and other amenities are great.
Manager Response: Wow!   What a great review!  This is what we love to hear!  Guests who enjoy the entire experience from Clean rooms to great service and of course taking advantage of several options to arrive at the theme parks to enjoy the magic of Disney!  We know how valuable your time is and the hard earned money you saved to get here. We appreciate your loyalty to our brand and cannot wait for your return!

Summary: Disappointed in Parking Fee's at a Best Western. Room carpet appeared to be dirty, possibly just due to color scheme. Other features were fine, most people were there for Disneyland and were families, we were there for a convention.
Manager Response: Thanks for your 3 star rating!  We appreciate it and look forward to Your return. We hope you get excited about returning to see our new improvements and upgrades such as. New carpet, new bathrooms, new Disney artwork, new furniture, new sound proof windows, and more!

Summary: We stayed at Raffles Inn and Suites for 3 days. I chose this hotel b/c it could accommodate our large group in one room and proximity to Disneyland.   Although the elevator was broken and our room was on 3rd floor (they were able to accommodate to a 1st floor room after the 1st night of a 3 night stay) the staff portered our luggage to 3rd floor then moved it to the new room..  They are doing some renovation work, which is good as the rooms are a bit dated. The rooms are comfortable and roomy.. The staff is very friendly/helpful/ professional, they really helped make the day of our Birthday Princess. The breakfast is great, it's a full breakfast perfect to start out a day to Disneyland, breakfast includes
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your review.  We sure appreciate you!  We enjoy having our large groups stay with us and look forward to your return!

Summary Heading: Close to Disneyland nice budget friendly place to stay
Summary: We had a two bedroom suite, which included 2 bathrooms. Rooms were two queen a sleeper sofa and bunk beds. The kids loved the bunk beds and the adults enjoyed separate sleeping quarters. Has very warm pool and a spa. They offer continental breakfast, not the greatest but not the worst I've ate. I DO NOT recommend the coffee. Get tea for your initial cafeine dose and get coffee somewhere else. Rooms were clean staff is friendly I would recommend and stay again. They also have wifi which was valuable to our stay.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your great review.  We sure appreciate it.  I'm so glad the kids enjoy the suite...we love to hear that.  I'm so glad you took the time to enjoy the pool and we look forward to your return!

Summary Heading: This hotel is within walking distance to Disneyland.
Summary: I love this hotel. The bed could've been softer but it wasn't bad. The staff was friendly and was very helpful. There was a very loud and rude couple above us that had been fighting and they were happy to move us and take care of the problem. The breakfast bar was amazing.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your review and 4 star rating!  We sure appreciate it. We are glad you enjoyed the great service and we apologize about the noisy guests.  I'm so happy my staff handled it well and moved you so you're comfortable.

Summary: This was our first stop in the US & served us for 4 days. It was basic, but very clean & offered a brilliant endless breakfast & a pool. Check-in was effortless.
