It was located brilliantly for day trips to Disney, which was literally 5 minutes walking distance to the car park....we walked through the car park to collect a bus into the facility. Can not be faulted.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your review and kind words about your recent visit.  We sure appreciate it.  We are glad you enjoyed the pool, clean rooms, and our great breakfast!  We look forward to your return!

Summary Heading: Great customer service doesn't make up for disrepair
Summary: The customer service was great. Everyone was very friendly. Sadly though the hotel is in disrepair. Our room had multiple bad outlets. We had to get a powerstrip to all utilize the one decent one we had. The elevator was broken for half the stay. Spotty Wi-Fi even when it showed full strength. Not enough parking meant that they had to "valet" my $55,000 truck into the driving lane with cones around it on one night. The beds were very uncomfortable, meaning they felt like laying on a piece of plywood that had a layer of cotton placed on top. The ice makers on 2 of the 3 floors had "clean and sanitize" lights on for the entirety of the 6 night stay. The free breakfast was nice but the potatoes were very stale and chewy every time we tried them. Maybe adding bacon to the selection
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your honest feedback about your recent visit.  We sure appreciate your kind words about our great customer service and we apologize for not exceeding your expectations.   I'm happy to say we have already started to upgrade our property.  You can look forward to sound proof windows, new carpet, new furniture, more outlets in every room, new bathrooms with modern tile accents, new disney artwork, brand new upgraded elevator and more!   We hope you allow us another opportunity to serve you.

Summary Heading: Good Place for Family Disneyland Trip
Summary: The Raffles Inn is a comfortable, clean hotel within walking distance of Disneyland. They have an excellent breakfast with lots of good options and a friendly, helpful staff. We would definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your great review!  We sure appreciate you and look forward to your return.  I'm so glad you enjoyed the breakfast and clean hotel.  We appreciate your loyalty to our brand and can't wait to see you again at the happiest place on earth!

Summary: We really enjoyed our spacious family suite at the Best Western Raffles Inn. It was nice to have a second children's room with their own bathroom. The bunk bed and pull out sofa fit 4 kids comfortably. Rooms were very clean and had everything we needed. Hotel staff was friendly and accommodating. Hot breakfast was a fantastic start to the day! Oatmeal, sausage, eggs, toast, cereal, pastries, potatoes, yogurt, fruit. Basically anything you'd have at home was there.  Public transit was right in front of the hotel. Free shuttles to Disneyland were just around the corner. Disneyland was actually within walking distance of this hotel. Pool was so nice at the end of the day. It was heated and the hot tub was great for soaking tired feet in! We would absolutely recommend this to others
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your great review and kind words about great customer service, and our amazing 2 bedroom Suites!  We love our Suites too and we are so excited for your return!  We're so glad you enjoyed the breakfast and how easy it is for all guests to arrive at Disneyland by shuttle or walking!  We love to hear from families that had a great time, received great service and good value for their hard earned money! We look forward to your return.

Summary: We were traveling with a big family group to Disneyland & the pricing at this hotel was attractive, plus they have larger suites for families which was important for our group.  The staff was wonderful and hardworking.  Breakfasts were good & our room even though it was definitely dated and worn was clean.  However after spending even a small amount of time in our room our allergies went crazy!  We suspect mold and mildew.  The room also had a very strong musty scent...we just spent as much time out of the room as possible and popped the Benedryl the second we got into the room to sleep.  We just checked out and I can't wait to get home to air everything out & wash clothes.  You also may wish to plan ahead...our room did not have very many outlets & the vanity lighting was poor.
Manager Response: Thank you for your honest review about your recent stay at our property. We sure appreciate it!   On behalf of our entire team, I would like to apologize for not exceeding your expectations. Your satisfaction is important to us and we will be using the feedback you gave us to implement improvements to ensure we offer a better experience for guests in the future. I can tell you I'm excited for your return because we have already started on our room upgrades1  More outlets, brand new furniture, new bathrooms with modern accent tile, new carpet, new Disney Artwork, new soundproof windows, and more!   I hope that you will consider staying with us again so that we can have another chance to provide you with a superior experience.  Thanks for your kind words about oru staff and our service!  We enjoy having our groups here and hope oyu will aloow us another chance to serve you.   All my best

Summary: Good hotel, nothing special but everything you need. Great service - people are friendly. small pool but clean. need easier access to the top level of apartments. close to Disneyland however map makes it misleading, at least 10-15 minute walk.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your great review and kind words about great customer service, and clean hotel. We love to hear from families that had a great time, received great service and good value for their hard earned money! We look forward to your return.

Summary: We stayed in a suite which was great for our family of five our room had plenty of room, staff was friendly and helpful. The breakfast was great for getting our family started with a good meal before we went to Disneyland.  Hotel was very clean excepts the pool filtration didn't seem to be working properly.  Otherwise a great experience.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your great review and kind words about great customer service, and our location. We love to hear from families that had a great time, received great service and good value for their hard earned money! We look forward to your return.

Summary Heading: So not how I thought things were gonna go
Summary: They make you pay a parking fee and they said they have shuttle to go to Disneyland but come to find out it's a shuttle the city provides and you have to pay for it per person and since we were a group of 8 it was so much cheaper to just park and pay Disneyland a parking fee
Manager Response: Thanks for your recent review.  We appreciate your honest feedback.  I apologize for the confusion about our several different transportation options to get to be Disneyland theme parks.  While we are a walking distance property we also partenered with the city of anaheim to bring you a shuttle option that runs every 20 minutes all day until the park closes.  We also have a new "secret gem" to provide guests with another option to get to the theme parks as the toy story parking lot has now been opened right next to us!  Guests can also walk a few steps away to get on that shuttle as well!  Lastly, you're right sometimes the best option is to park right at Disneys parking lot and get ready to enjoy all the fun!  Disney and the city anaheim are all about options for our guests and we are proud to be a part of it.  We know our 2 bedroom suites are a favorite for large families of 8 like yours and we hope you will return for more fun at the happiest place on earth!

Summary: Second time staying there. Good location close enough to Disneyland. Would stay again in the future. Staff was very nice and knowledgeable. Had answers to every question I had. Love that kind of friendliness.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your great review and kind words about great customer service, and our location.  We love to hear from families that had a great time, received great service and good value for their hard earned money!  We look forward to your return.

Summary: It was comfortable. I went for my anniversary weekend and everything  was great other than th fact that we had someone knocking and opening our door at 6:30am. Other than that everything was perfect!!!
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your 5 star rating! We sure appreciate it! We are so excited you enjoyed the Hotel and we look forward to your return.

Summary: Stayed at the Best Western Raffles inn the last 6 nights. Housekeeping keeps the place neat and tidy. The two bedroom suites for families are large and comfortable. It may be cramped though if you have more than 2 children and use the sofa bed to sleep 4 children. Breakfast is served in a corner of the hotel. The breakfast is passable but you eventually want to have something else for breakfast. The staff are polite and will do what they can to make your stay a better one. Parking is limited especially during the busy times of the year like our stay over Easter. Only gripe is that the other guests can make a restful night hard due to the thin walls and anyone rolling bags on the veranda can be heard loudly.
Manager Response: Thanks for taking the time to post a review. We always enjoy hearing about our guests who enjoy the spacious rooms, great breakfast, clean property and excellent customer service. We sure appreciate you taking the time to acknowledge us. Please come back and see our new look as we are always improving! You can expect to see new carpet, new furniture, new bathrooms, soundproof windows, new Disney artwork, and more!

Summary: Great for large families to stay at for Disneyland Vacation.  Close by to Disneyland and close to transportation.  The hotel also has a good filling breakfast with a variety of foods.   The suite was big enough for my family of 7 to sleep and play comfortably.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your 4 star rating! We sure appreciate it! We are so excited you enjoyed the convenience of us being close to the Disneyland Theme Parks! We look forward to your return.  We are thrilled you enjoyed the breakfast, and our amazing family suite that sleeps 8!  Its a great value and we look forward to your return!

Summary: The rooms were big and the breakfast was good. Breakfast had everything! The hotel was always clean and staff was always friendly and attentive. Located near Disneyland and California adventure. Kids loved it.
Manager Response: Thanks for taking the time to post a review.   We always enjoy hearing about our guests who enjoy the spacious rooms, great breakfast, clean property and excellent customer service.  We sure appreciate you taking the time to acknowledge us.  I will congratulate our entire team on a job well done. Please come back and see our new look as we are always improving!   You can expect to see new carpet, new furniture, new bathrooms, new Disney artwork, and more!

Summary: Great location for Disney, just simply walk a couple hundred yards and turn right into the toy story car park.  From there you are dropped off at Disney in less than 10 minutes.   At the end of the day just do the reverse.     Complimentary Breakfast was good, small room and could be tough to get seats together in large group but that was not a problem.   Good selection and taste of food.    Staff were really helpful especially in reception.  Very friendly.   Nice pool and jacuzzi although we did not use it.    Only downside was the age of rooms and bathrooms.   Not a major problem but just something to be aware of. The rooms and bathrooms were clean although would certainly need an updated.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your great review!  We sure appreciate it and look forward to your return.  You're right the toy story parking location is so perfect for our guests looking to start off their magical Disney experience just steps from our property!  We look forward to your return.

Summary: Everyone is very friendly and very welcoming ... best breakfast of any other best western I've ever been to the staff is always around at breakfast time to make you feel very welcomed and they play Disney for the kids while you are eating which was very helpful for me having a 1 year old obsessed with Mickey Mouse
Manager Response: This is a wonderful compliment for us and we can't thank you enough!   Our staff works so hard and I will make sure to acknowledge them!! We are so glad you enjoyed your visit and look forward to your return.

Summary: Room was really in working conditon unlike the hotel we last stayed in tub was clogged and bugs infested. Had a very comfortable sleep after a long day at the park. Staff were friendly. Complimetary breakfast was good but after 3days of staying in I think they need to change the menu a little bit. I'm very satisfied with the staff.  Worth all the money I paid for.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your great review!  We sure appreciate you!  It means a lot you enjoyed the clean spacious rooms, and breakfast.  We hope you return In the future.

Summary Heading: Lovely staff, good location near Disney
Summary: We enjoyed our stay at the Best Western Raffles. The staff were lovely and attentive.  The breakfast each morning was above what you expect from most complimentary hotel breakfasts, great selection and something for everyone. Healthy selections like fresh fruit, greek yogurt and oatmeal as well as the standard make your own waffle, pastries, eggs and sausages.  Our room was very clean and well taken care of. We had plenty of space with bunk beds, a pull out bed and a separate room with a bed for husband and I.  Only a 15 minute walk to Disneyland and right on the route for resort transportation if walk is too long for little ones.  Our only complaint was that the pillows on the beds were small and awkward and the room was noisy. Try to get a room on the third floor. We were on
Manager Response: What a nice 4 star review. Thanks so much for the kind words about our breakfast, and our clean and spacious rooms. That is our highest compliment. I'm so pleased you enjoyed it! We try our hardest to make sure the breakfast is filling, plentiful, and a little something for everyone!   We love our repeat guests and can wait for you to return for more fun and magical memories!

Summary: Good value, great  breakfast with better than average hotel food.  Only complaint was the everyday noise from the parking lot was a bit excessive. Having my room by the stairs meant I had to put up with people stomping their feet and talking as the building and windows aren't super modern.  16 minute walk to the gate at Disneyland or California Adventures, and 5 minute walk to the Convention Center. Big room for the price I paid, pool nice, walk to Dennys or IHOP. bus stop out front where multiple LAX or tours buses pick up, so we did not have to rent a car.  I would stay there again in a heartbeat.
Manager Response: What a nice 4 star review. Thanks so much for the kind words about our breakfast, and our clean and spacious rooms. That is our highest compliment. I'm so pleased you enjoyed it! We try our hardest to make sure the breakfast is filling, plentiful, and a little something for everyone!  My apologies for the noise.  I'm happy to tell you we are renovating the property!  You can expect new furniture, new bathrooms, new Disney Artwork, new carpet, new custom hard wood floors, and more!   We love our repeat guests and can wait for you to return for more fun and magical memories!

Summary: I stayed here during a convention and the location is extremely convenient and about half the cost of the hotels across the street as well as being within walking distance of both Downtown Disney and the Gardenwalk
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your 5 star rating!  We sure appreciate it!  We are so excited you enjoyed the convenience of us being close to the Anaheim Convention Center and the Disneyland Theme Parks!  We look forward to your return.

Summary: Took my kids to Disneyland and the walk was 10 minutes long but it was worth it because the room was very comfortable they had a blast . The Valley parking was excellent staff is very respectful and helpful. Thank you 😊
Manager Response: What a nice 5 star review. Thanks so much for the kind words about our location, valet, and our clean and spacious rooms. That is our highest compliment. I'm so pleased you enjoyed it!   We love our repeat guests and can wait for you to return for more fun and magical memories!

Summary Heading: Best western inn raffles not so nice!
Summary: We stayed close to Disneyland and returned to the room for lunch and to lay our 1 year old down for a nap. The room was tight for a family of 6 as it is, but we started hearing a really loud sound coming from above the entry way, which was where our 1 year old was sleeping. Turns out they were doing plumbing work in the room above us and caused our room to be loud and we found water leaking through the ceiling from the entry light fixture. We also had no access to wifi during our whole stay.  When we reported the wifi problems to the front desk no one recorded our complaints. And for the leaky room, they discounted our room 50% and moved us to the next room over which was a little bigger, but this issue cut into our Disney time. With the continued issues we had we had hoped to
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your honest feedback. We want each guest to feel welcome and excited during their visit. We apologize that wasn't your experience with regard to our noise and plumbing repair.  We hope you enjoyed the resort overall while you were here and our complimentary hot breakfast buffet. I'm excited to say we are renovating and our guests will be able to enjoy new furniture, new carpet with floor soundproofing, new Disney artwork, new bathrooms, and more! We hope you return to give us another chance...Thanks for your loyalty to our brand

Summary: Nice hotel with good location. Good parking and American style unhealthy breakfast. Breakfast room can be very busy but you take away the food also. To Disneyland it is easy to walk, but with small kids I recommend to take the bus outside of the hotel, tickets can be bought from the reception. Rooms are not the most modern, but clean and spacious. We had the family room with bunk, double and sleeping couch, and no problem with 6 people. Swimming pool is small but well maintained and was appreciated by the kids.
Manager Response: What a nice 4 star review.  Thanks so much for the kind words about our pool, parking, and clean rooms.  That is our highest compliment. I'm so pleased you enjoyed our Family Suite!  We love our repeat guests and can wait for you to return for more fun and magical memories!

Summary: I was pleasantly surprised with this hotel out room was spacious, clean and had all the amenities we needed, microwave, refrigerator etc. we were bringing our daughter to Disneyland for a two day stay now remember this is a family friendly hotel and you're just a few blocks away from Disneyland expect some excited kids running around. In the am there was complimentary breakfast which was wonderful and had variety. I would definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: What a great review! We couldn't have said it better ourselves! Thanks so much for the kind words about our rooms that include frig and microwaves!  I'm so pleased you enjoyed the Hotel while creating Magical memories for your daughter.  You're right, this Hotel is all about family and good times!   We love our repeat guests and can wait for you to return for more fun!

Summary: We enjoyed our stay. The staff was great. Free breakfast was a huge savings for our family. Location was convenient, just a few blocks from Disneyland  the rooms were nice. We  would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: What a great review! We love 5 stars!!  Thank you!  Thanks so much for the kind words about our staff and our rooms!  We sure appreciate it!   We are so glad our great location worked for you and we look forward to your next visit to the Happiest Place On Earth!

Summary: awesome staff.  good breakfast. close to disney land and food outlets. bus at the gate .pool excellent for the  kids to cool of in after being at disneyland all day. we came back to hotel in the middle of the day to give the kids a swim then went back to disneyland at night for light shows and fireworks
Manager Response: Thank you so much!! We love hearing stories about our guests really getting the most out of family time while visiting us and the happiest place on earth! We can't thank you enough for allowing us to help with that! It was a pleasure having you! Upon your return, you can enjoy new carpet, new furniture, new bedding, new bathrooms, new Disney Artwork and more! We sure appreciate you!

Summary: Stayed from March 18 to 25th, 2017 to visit Disneyland with my wife, two kids aged 9 and 11 and my mom who shared our 2 bedroom suite.  The suite was perfectly suited to our situation as we had 2 queen beds in one room and 1 sofa bed and 1 bunk bed in the other room for the kids.  Each room had a 2 sink bathroom with toilet and shower/bath.  Very convenient and no line ups for the bathroom. The room had a microwave and fridge as well.  We had an issue with creaking noises when the room above us was occupied and people were walking around.  Recommend to grab a 3rd floor room (which we moved to after two nights) and no more creaking noise!  The pool was a usual size for a Best Western, ok for a group of people to be in.  The water was warmer than I had experienced and loved that
Manager Response: What a great review! We couldn't have said it better ourselves!  Thanks so much for the kind words about our team and our customer service! That is our highest compliment. I'm so pleased you enjoyed our Suites, great breakfast and location!  We love our repeat guests and can wait for you to return for more fun and magical memories!

Summary: The rooms let in way to much noise and the pictures made the pool area look a lot bigger! You could feel shaking in your room every time some one was on the stairs out from the room above you.  Need to sound prof also my friend was staying at a hotel right down the st for half the price and the quality and amenities were so much better then what this hotel offered!
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your honest feedback. We want each guest to feel welcome and  excited during their visit. We apologize that wasn't your experience with regard to our pool size and noise.  We hope you enjoyed the resort overall while you were here and our complimentary hot breakfast buffet. I'm excited to say we are renovating and our guests will be able to enjoy new furniture, new carpet with floor soundproofing, new Disney artwork, new bathrooms, and more!  We hope you return to give us another chance...Thanks for your loyalty to our brand.

Summary Heading: 2 bdrm kids suite great value for the $$
Summary: Nice having separate room for kids. Also nice having tub/toilet separate from vanity area. Staff all really helpful and quick to respond to requests. Big variety of food for breakfast. Made mornings so much nicer not having to all get up and dress and go out for breakfast. It's about a 20 min walk to Disneyland. After first day...a long day at the Park...we got the bus pass from the front desk. Cheap and the bus stop is in front of the hotel. Goes directly to Park entrance.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for this review. We sure appreciate it and look forward to your return. Disney has some amazing things happening in the future and we hope you stay with us and enjoy all the magic Disney has to offer.

Summary Heading: If you are to Disneyland stay here!
Summary: I never fill out travel surveys, but was so impressed with Shawn and her staff (a special shout out to Cruz) that I had to do it. The service was wonderful. We will only stay at BW Raffles for Disneyland in the future!
Manager Response: Thank you so much!! We love hearing stories about our guests really getting the most out of family time while visiting us and the happiest place on earth!   We can't thank you enough for allowing us to help with that!  It was a pleasure having you!  Upon your return, you can enjoy new carpet, new furniture, new bedding, new bathrooms, new Disney Artwork and more!  We sure appreciate you!

Summary: For a 3 night family trip to Disneyland, the hotel felt like it was over-run and barely keeping up with demand.  The breakfast room is too small for the facility and packed at breakfast time.  And we came during off-season.  The rooms were very basic and not the type you could lounge in, if you wanted a break from the hustle of Disneyland.  The staff, however, were very friendly and helpful.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your honest feedback.  We sure appreciate it.  We work hard to make sure our guests feel welcomed and valued.  We really Hope you return and see all the improvements we are making to the property.  We are creating new bathrooms, new carpet, new furniture, new Disney artwork and more!

Summary: The stay was great all staff members where very helpful. And the location of the hotel was great. We really enjoyed the trip being that it was walking distance from stores and Disneyland. I was really amazed by the service the staff provided.
Manager Response: What a great review!  Thanks so much for the kind words about our team and pirnustomer service!  That is our highest compliment. I'm so pleased you enjoyed our great location and enjoyed your time visiting the happiest place on earth!  We hope you return for more fun and magical memories!

Summary: Charges $15 a night for parking and $20 deposit per day and doesn't specify ahead of time. Also we did not have hot water the two nights we stayed. Valet and front desk attendant were right outside the door smoking.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your honest feedback.  We want each guest to feel welcome, excited and appreciated during heir visit.  We apologize that wasn't your experience with regard to our fees and deposits.  We hope you enjoyed the resort overall while you were here and our complimentary hot breakfast buffet.  Thanks for your loyalty to our brand.

Summary: The staff, the room delivered excellent value. Close to Anaheim convention Center, Airport shuttles. Very convenient.  I will be back to stay here for my next visit to the Anaheim Convention Center.    I saw lots of Happy Disney families at this property
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your review! We sure appreciate it and we are so glad you had a great visit! We are so proud to hear you were impressed with our staff and our location!  We are proud to be walking distance to the Anaheim Convention Center and the Disneyland Theme Parks.  We hope all our guest while visiting the Happiest Place On Earth enjoy the value of our hotel and come back again and again! Thanks for your business!

Summary Heading: This hotel has great location. Confortable rooms.
Summary: Confortable room. Friendly people. This hotel has a great location. A lot of restaurants around. It is located just a few minutes from Disneyland. They serve breakfast and all employees are polite. I definitely recommend this hotel. And when I get back to Anaheim I will stay there for sure.
Manager Response: Thanks for your great review!  We sure appreciate it!   It's so nice to hear when our guests really enjoy the hotel and all the restaurants near us, and just create some magical memories!  Thank you for letting us be a part of it.

Summary: The hotel is nice, good breakfast included. One of the reasons I picked this hotel. However, if you stay here for a Disneyland trip be prepared to walk quite a bit. We thought the hotel was going t be closer to Disneyland. Our mistake.
Manager Response: Thanks for your honest feedback.   We sure appreciate it.  Thanks for your honest feedback and about great breakfast.  We enjoy the honor of being a walking distance hotel to the happiest place on earth!!  We also have a shuttle to and from Disneyland which is amazing!  A great way to travel when times are busy!  We hope to see you back again!

Summary: Friendly staff , clean rooms and a decent breakfast. Overall good experience  and close to Disneyland.  Beds were comfertable and conveniently located near several restaurants. Only complaint was I did not expect to pay for parking.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your review!   We appreciate it and are so glad you had a great visit!   We are so proud to hear you were impressed with our staff!  I will make sure to acknowledge them!  We hope all our guest while visiting the happiest place on earth enjoy the value of our hotel and come back again and again!    Thanks for your business!

Summary: You get what you pay for.  Economy is economy; however, the room we stayed in was a bit dirty to begin with.  Hair on the bathroom floor is always delightful to walk into.  Wife received pink eye our second day there.  No way to prove as a result to the room but based upon the condition when we arrived wouldn't be surprised.  Front desk staff was friendly.  Easy walk to Disney if you happen to miss or not want to wait for the ART.  Overall it wasn't that bad but we will spend an extra couple nickels for a better room next time we go to a Disney.
Manager Response: Thanks do much for this honest feedback.  We sure appreciate it and apologize your stay wasn't perfect.  We Hope you return on a future date to see our room improvements as we are proud to be installing new carpet, new furniture, new bedding, new bathrooms, and more!

Summary: Fix the crappy electrical  outlets that won't hold plugs in, fix crappy faucets, enlarge the breakfast room that is WAY to small for the number of people using it, supply electrical outlets to be used by guest that are not buried behind bed side tables, get inflated tires for the house keeping carts that don't make a rediculous racket when the roll past your window on the tile before you wake up. That's just off the top of my head. The noise and breakfast room alone are enough that I would gladly pay double just to not stay here.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for taking the time to provide an honest review about your recent visit.  We sure appreciate it. We are so glad you stayed with us!  While this property is busy all year round, we apologize for the noise you've experienced.  I'm proud to say we are currently renovating and improving the rooms to have new furniture, new bedding, new bathrooms, new carpet, new sound proof floors, and more!    We hope you allow us an opportunity to better serve you in the future and look forward to your return!

Summary: we had a two bedroom suite for 8 people located on the corner of the 3rd floor. The hotel is dated and our accommodations were  at one time two rooms which they have combined with a connecting door. There were two bathrooms, one for each bedroom. Our bathroom door had a screw loose in the inside doorknob so worried about getting locked in. First bedroom had two double beds, the second a set of bunkbeds and a fold out couch. It was great to have all the kids in one room. Front desk staff are very helpful especially Cruz.  They assisted with organizing our outings to Universal Studios and Lego land. There was a bus stop for the Anaheim bus system right in front of the hotel and we took that back and forth to Disneyland as it was very convenient and cost effective. Be aware that if
Manager Response: Thanks so much for taking the time to send us a review. We sure appreciate it. We are so glad you were happy with our clean rooms, comfort, and breakfast! You're right, there's something in our breakfast for everyone to enjoy!  We are proud to have so many options for guests to enjoy getting to the Disneyland Theme Parks.  My apologies for the lock on the door and appreciate you allowing us to fix that quickly.  We look forward to your return!

Summary: Great breakfast very busy but was always stocked, walking distance to Disneyland shuttle. The pool was heated and warm. The Room was a little out dated.  Asked to check in early said they would call me when room was ready and never did.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for taking the time to send us a review. We sure appreciate it. We are so glad you were happy with our clean rooms, breakfast and our heated pool and spa! We are proud to be a walking distance hotel to the Disneyland Theme Parks and look forward to your return for many more visits!

Summary: We travel to Disneyland every other year.  This hotel is our favorite choice for value! The breakfast is plenty, the beds are comfy, the staff is very accommodating! We always walk 1/2 block to the Toy Story lot and ride the Disney buses to the park for free. This is our third stay at this hotel.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for taking the time to send us a review. We sure appreciate it. Thank you for your loyalty to our brand and this Hotel speicfically!  We are so glad you were happy with our cleanliness, comfort, and customer service!  We love our repeat guests and look forward to your return.

Summary: We loved our stay here. They have amazingly nice staff, there was a great breakfast everyday, very convenient location to food and shopping, VERY clean and our room was made up every day, Disney parking is right next door. The only thing I would change is the parking fee and maybe add an in room small safe. The maid even tucked my daughters doll back in to the covers how she left her.... Very cute!!!!
Manager Response: Thanks so much for taking the time to send us a review. We sure appreciate it. We are so glad you were happy with our clean rooms, comfort, and breakfast! We are proud to be in such a great location for guests to enjoy the Disneyland Theme Parks!  Thanks for the kind words about our housekeeper!  I will make sure to acknowledge her.

Summary: The split room with bunk beds was perfect for the family. Was able to wake up early without waking up the kids. Only a few blocks from disneyland with plenty of restaurants near by. Breakfast was great and easy enough to enjoy booth mornings.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your great review.  We sure appreciate it.  I'm so glad you enjoy our bunk bed suites.  They're such a great room and it does offer nice privacy and space.  Thanks for appreciating the great location we have also!   Looking forward to having you back.

Summary: Walking distance to Convention Center. ART stop right outside. Lovely free hot breakfast. Clean comfortable room with a/c, mini fridge, microwave, blow dryer, coffee maker and makings. Friendly front desk staff.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for taking the time to send us a review. We sure appreciate it. We are so glad you were happy with our clean rooms, comfort, and breakfast! We are proud to be a walking distance hotel to the Anaheim Convention center and look forward to your return for many more visits!

Summary Heading: Wonderful staff but not for light sleepers
Summary: Walls and windows were very thin. We could hear every conversation, every step our neighbors made. The sofa bed was also very noisy. When you have three kids who are all fairly light sleepers, a room like this makes for a rough day at Disneyland. The staff was fantastic though. Everywhere we turned, there was someone cleaning or refreshing the breakfast. They were always very happy to help out with anything we asked. The breakfast was decent. If you stay here, make sure to use the Toy Story shuttle. It's free and very fast. We never had to wait for one. It made the location of the hotel very convenient. When we got to the park, there was a security line just for the Toy Story shuttle and it was much shorter than the lines for everyone else!
Manager Response: Thanks so much for taking the time to send us a review. We sure appreciate it. We are so glad you were happy with our breakfast and location...Thanks for the feedback about the room noise.  We have shared oyur expeurence with the entire team.   Looking forward to your return.

Summary: About a 15 minute walk to Disneyland. Hotel was clean, comfy and breakfast was awesome! The pool is heated and the fitness center was small but just enough equipment. The price was decent compared to other hotels
Manager Response: Thanks so much for taking the time to send us a review. We sure appreciate it. We are so glad you were happy with our cleanliness, comfort, and breakfast!   Looking forward to your return.

Summary: Great rooms that are very quiet.  Awesome breakfast in morning, with some of the best staff.  All hotel staff we very professional, friendly and helpful.  Rooms are a bit dated however they are clean.  We had a room with two queens, bunk beds and a pull out sofa with tow bathrooms.  Great room for families.  Only about a 15 min walk to Disneyland.  Highly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for taking time and sending a review. We sure appreciate it. We are so glad you were happy with the service and overall hotel and you had chance to relax!  We are looking forward to your return so you can enjoy the newly renovated property!  We are thrilled to bring you new furniture, new bathrooms, new carpet, new Disney artwork, and more!

Summary: Let me start by saying that I travel quite a bit and stay here often almost every time I am in Anaheim, and have had no problems up until now when new management came on board. I got there on New Year's Day 1/1/17, checked in with a debit card for room plus incidentals on which they authorized $133.71. Later that night and then the next morning it was still a pending transaction though normally it would have been a charge to my debit card as they would have put the charge through. At least that has been my experience in the past with Best Western.   The next morning my fiancee and I decided to stay another night so I made a reservation and went to the front desk to pay cash as I didn't have time to go to the bank and put more money in my account for my debit card. I went to the
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your honest feedback.  We apologize for any confusion that happened during your visit with regard to billing.  We certainly want all guests to feel welcome and appreciated.  I hope you would consider coming back for a future visit so we can make this right.

Summary: Decent hotel, although price was a bit high. More expensive than some hotels closer to Disneyland. It was a safe place to stay for a night. Close to Toy Story parking lot.  Not a place to vacation, only a place to lay your head.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your honest feedback regarding your recent visit. We sure appreciate it and apologize your stay wasn't perfect with regard to the price. We really want all our guests to relax and focus on great memories while visiting the home of Walt Disneys original theme park. I hope you will return and see all our improvements as we are focused on new bedding, new furniture, new bathrooms, new flooring, new Disney artwork in all rooms and more!

Summary: Nice hotel, good location.  Staff very friendly and helpful.  Nice pool area for some quiet time after spending days at Disneyland. Bed was comfortable and the rooms clean.  The bathroom had a really nice big vanity which I appreciate when I travel.  I loved the big bowl of apples and oranges in the lobby.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for taking time and sending a review. We sure appreciate it. We are so glad you were happy with the service and overall hotel and you had  chance to relax in the pool!  Looking forward to your return.

Summary Heading: Excellent will stay here again when visiting disneyland
Summary: Excellent. Very clean. Close to toy Story parking for disneyland. My new favorite hotel in the area. We will definitely stay here again.  Fitness room. Pool and spa. Friendly staff. Awesome experience. Only downside was parking
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your great feedback! We sure appreciate you! Your comments about the great service and our hotel was so nice!! Thank You!  There' no better compliment than when a guest says they will definitely be coming back!  We can't wait for your return!

Summary Heading: One block from the Toy Story parking lot!
Summary: My husband and I stayed with my cousin and his family, we shared the 2 bedroom/2 bath family suite on the 1st floor, next to the breakfast room.  We were pleased and happy with the service we received.  Beds, bunks and foldout sofa were comfortable enough for everyone, plenty of hot water in the showers each morning, and the breakfast was great - especially for little ones with tiny appetites on an early park morning.  There was certainly enough space for 7 of us to stretch out!  Noise Level: During our visit (Feb. 13-16, 2017) it was low to mild, depending on the day and time.  Yes, if you are on the 1st or 2nd floor, it is undeniable that you will have noise above you; most often in the early morning when everyone is getting up and kids are excited about their upcoming day, or
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your great feedback!  We sure appreciate you!   Your comments about the great service and our rooms is so nice!! Thanks!  We look forward to your return!

Summary: We stayed here as an adult family of four. The staff were very helpful and friendly. It was within walking distance of the Theme Parks and was surrounded by lots of good places to eat and shop. We basically just slept here as we were out and about during the day. Breakfast was nice and plenty of choice. We were able to store our bags when we arrived before the room was ready and also again when we were leaving as we had a late flight out. I would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thanks for taking Time out of your busy schedule to provide a review. We sure appreciate it. I'm so glad you enjoyed our hotel and the location.  We look forward to you coming back to celebrate our hotel improvements as well as Disneylands new Star Wars theme park coming this year! There's a lot to celebrate in 2017

Summary Heading: Would have been an amazing experience but...
Summary: Everything from the quality of the room, to the helpful staff etc was incredibly good.    The hotel room is VERY NOISY. Kids walking upstairs felt like elephants, people walking out the front sounded like the door was open when it was closed, that's how noisy it was.  Also the little undersized curtain didn't block light from the front window.  Tonnes of light flooded in around the windows during the night.  Too noisy. Too lit up.   If those two factors weren't there I would have rated it Excellent.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for taking time and sending a review.  We sure appreciate it.  We are so glad you were happy with the service and overall hotel. We apologize for the noise you may have experienced and look forward to your return.

Summary: The advertising picture shows a false Victorian Front...motel is just a concrete square. No balconys.  The screens were falling off windows, chipped paint, few electric sockets (one in the bathroom). Unappetizing breakfast..round rubber eggs. When we arrived the clerk took four phone calls while waiting on us. It was overall a very poor experience...wish we would have stayed elsewhere. If you are forced to stay...stay on 3rd floor away from busy street. And they charge for parking
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your honest feedback regarding your recent visit.  We sure appreciate it and apologize your stay wasn't perfect.  We really want all our guests to relax and focus on great memories while visiting the home of Walt Disneys original theme park.  I hope you will return and see all our improvements as we are focused on new bedding, new furniture, new bathrooms, new floooring, new Disney artwork in all rooms and more!

Summary: Room service was not good. The Sofa bed was very uncomfortable, i could feel the springs. It was bad. Room service didnt change the sheets on the sofa so our first night i had to call for them to bring new sheets, second night they removed the old sheets but didnt replace them so i had to call again. House keeping was inconsistent. They would do a great job taking out garbage and dirty towels one day but not the next. Also, on the website it shows the room that includes the kids bunks has another restroom but it only had one. It was cheap and did have a shuttle for disneyland. Breakfast was good. I will not stay here again though nor would I recommend it.
Manager Response: Thanks for your review.  We sure appreciate it and hope you return.  My apologies about the sofa sleeper  I appreciate your honest feedback about housekeeping and I will share your feedback with them.

Summary: Family of 5 from NZ stayed at the Best Western Plus Raffles Inn & Suites 10 nights late January. Reception, Excellent Service, Friendly and very helpful from Checking in until even after checked out ( our flights not until evening and they looked after our bags and ensured we were all OK for our Shuttle pickup ) Rooms, Clean and comfortable, plenty of storage and had all we needed. Breakfast, plenty of choice and well stocked and the staff constantly cleaning up after messy guests and children, staff worked very hard. Location, very close to amenities, eating places, ART, walking distance to Disneyland and excellent free wifi  ( strong signal even when whole family was on and hotel seemed full )  Excellent Car Parking...... couple nights several sports teams stayed and were in
Manager Response: Thanks for taking time to post a review!  We sure appreciate it. We are so Excited you acknowledged our great customer service. You had a nice long visit with us!  We hope every time your travels bring you back the happiest place on earth you will come back.  We love our repeat guests!

Summary: The staff was very friendly and professional.  They paid attention to our needs very quickly. The hotel was well laid out.  The room was neat and clean. The hotel was close to Disneyland. The breakfast was more than most hotels.  The food was good with a large variety available.  They had eggs, sausage, and potatoes.  Pancakes, waffles, cold cereal, milk, coffee, tea, and several juices.  All in all a great variety of food for the whole family.
Manager Response: Thanks for taking Time out of your busy schedule to provide a review.  We sure appreciate it. I'm so glad you enjoyed our breakfast items and the hotel suites.  We look forward to you coming back to celebrate our hotel improvements as well as Disneylands new Star Wars theme park coming this year!  There's a lot to celebrate in 2017!

Summary Heading: Not a bad place to stay
Summary: I enjoyed staying at this hotel and would definitely stay again except that I could not handle the bed. It was way too firm for me. Other than that it was perfect, especially the staff. When I had a problem with some upstairs neighbors, they gladly moved me.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for taking the time to post a review. We sure appreciate it and look forward to your return. Thanks for the kind words about our customer service!  That is our main goal.  We work hard to help every guest and we want you to feel welcomed. Thanks for the feedback about the beds.  We look forward to your return.

Summary: Pros: Excellent service Good suites if you have small children Breakfast is a good value Close to Disneyland Small but very clean pool Internet works Clean  Cons: Noisy rooms. Beams creak when people walk overhead. Children running/jumping sound like herd of elephants overhead. Bedding is poor quality.  Pillows are horrible. Bring your own. Ask for extra blankets if you sleep cold.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your honest feedback. We sure appreciate it.  I'm glad you enjoyed your overall visit and my apologies about the noise during your stay.  I'm so glad you enjoyed the breakfast, roomy suites and great service. That is important to us.  We hope you return in the future.

Summary: Staff were great from the time we arrived. They were helpful and obliging throughout.The room was big and roomy. Walking distance to Disneyland but quiet. Breakfast was a little crowded. Enjoyed the experience.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for taking the time to post a review. We sure appreciate it and look forward to your return.  We are glad the suite worked well for your family and you appreciated our customer service and great breakfast.  .  We work hard to help every guest and we want you to feel welcomed.  Look forward to your return.

Summary: This Best Western is a tidy and well located hotel very near the Anaheim Convention Centre. It has good rates and the service was fantastic from all the staff. The room had everything we needed such as a fridge, aircon, 2 rooms and breakfast included in our room.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your review.  We sure appreciate it.  I'm so glad you were able to enjoy our great location and outstanding customer service from the entire team. We work hard to give our guests value and great amenities such as frig and microwave in every room. Complimentary.  Thanks for mentioning that!   We look forward to having you back.

Summary: We stayed here over Christmas with 3 teenage boys. Rooms are ok, clean and did the trick, mostly at parks all day and night. Best part, right next to Buzz and Woody parking....took shuttle right to Disneyland!
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your honest review. We sure appreciate it. We are sprinkling our pixie dust all around this hotel to bring you new furniture, new carpet, new Disney artwork, brand new bathrooms and more! We hope you come back and celebrate with us.  Thanks for commenting on our close proximity to the Toy Story shuttle.  We love it!  One more way to get you to the Disneyland Theme Parks!

Summary: Would recommend this hotel as it is close to the convention center and Disney land and walk able to many restaurants. There was nothing terribly wrong with the room other than it was noisy. The super flush toilet was incredibly loud and you could hear noise from the room above and on the balcony. Breakfast was included and offered a fair variety of items all of course are of a ready made variety.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your honest feedback.  We sure appreciate it. I'm so glad you were able to enjoy how close we are to the Anaheim convention center and the Disneyland theme parks.  We hope you come back to see all of our exciting hotel improvements happening this year!

Summary: For what it was I feel this motel was completely overpriced. 15$ a day to park. The bed was hard as a rock with paper then sheets. Room was clean but beat up- light falling out of ceiling, peeling wallpaper.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your honest review.  We sure appreciate it.  We are sprinkling our pixie dust all around this hotel to bring you new furniture, new carpet, new Disney artwork, brand new bathrooms and more!   We hope you come back and allow us a chance to better serve you.

Summary: One of the nicest and affordable hotels near Disneland. Retest of the trip was just wonderful. Daily room service was very prompt. Rooms were very neat and clean.  A two queen room, also accommodated a nook table and chairs, which I find mostly in King Bed rooms. The room also had a Fridge and a Microwave. All of these are really good amenities provided in room.
Manager Response: What a great review!  Thanks so much for your kind words.  It's always great to hear our hard working team is appreciated.  I will relay the information about your experience to them.  I'm so glad you were able to relax in our clean and spacious rooms and focus on creating magical memories for your family!   Come back and see us and enjoy all of our room improvements.

Summary: We thoroughly enjoyed our stay here. The room was clean and comfortable. The staff was friendly & helpful. It was close to everywhere we wanted to go. It's in a nice area close to restaurants and some shopping. I would highly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for this review! We sure appreciate you taking the time to post your experience! I'm so glad you had a great time and enjoyed how close we are to the theme parks. We are excited to make constant improvements to the hotel and we thank you for staying with us. We are always looking for ways to offer more comfort and more value to guests visits. Happy new year and we can't wait to see you again to enjoy our new carpet, new furniture, new Disney artwork, new bathrooms, and more!

Summary: This hotel is within walking distance to many restaurants. About a 15-20 minute walk to the convention center. Roughly 25-30 minute walk to Disney. The rooms are nice and clean. The staff is very helpful and polite! My only negative is that there is not enough parking. It was weird being told that the lot was full when you pulled in at 10pm. Other than that, very nice hotel. I would stay here again and would recommend it to friends and family.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for this review!  We sure appreciate you taking the time to post your experience!  I'm so glad you had a great time and enjoyed how close we are to the theme parks.  We are excited to make constant improvements to the hotel and expanding our breakfast room is a priority.  We are always looking for ways to offer more comfort and more value to guests visits.  Happy new year and we can't wait to see you again!

Summary: Breakfast was really good. Loved having a private room for the adults! The room as clean and a very convenient place to stay for Disneyland. Beds were a little hard. But overall wonderful place to stay.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your review.  We sure appreciate it. I'm so glad you enjoyed the room types we offer and you could enjoy the breakfast.  We are thankful you stayed with us and look forward to your return.  Come back and see our new look and celebrate at the happiest place on earth!!

Summary Heading: DO NOT BOOK WITH THIS HOTEL
Summary: Do NOT book with this motel.  Shoddy customer service.   Disrespectful, scamming management.  SHAME ON Best Western Corporate as well = they will not assist with the bad customer service at this location.  Beware!  Book anywhere other than Best Western location in Anaheim!
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your honest feedback regarding your recent experience here.   I know there was some confusion with the policy on cancelling your reservation and I apologize you weren't able to visit us.  I hope in the future your travels bring you back to celebrate all Disneyland has to offer.  We are excited along with Disney's changes and upgrades to be doing one of our own.  We are installing new bedding, new furniture, new Disney artwork, new carpet, new bathrooms and more!  I hope you have a Happy New Year!

Summary: The hotel was really nice and it was about a block from the toy story parking lot soy hat was great.  The only issue was with the breakfast and that was due to the fact that my husband is really into breakfast foods and there wasn't that many to choose from, but there is a Denny's in walking distance.  The hotels sells ART passes which the shuttle pick up is right outside the door.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your feedback.  We sure appreciate your loyalty to the hotel and our brand.  I'm so glad you enjoyed the ART shuttle and ease of getting to and from the Disneyland Theme Parks.  We are also glad our guests can take advantage of our complimentary hot breakfast buffet.  We have options for everyone to enjoy.  As an added bonus, we have several restaurants near by for your enjoyment as well!   Looking forward to seeing you again when your travels bring you back to the Happiest Place On Earth!

Summary Heading: Family Suite - just minutes from Disneyland.  Great Value!
Summary: Our party of 3 adults and 2 children spent 4 nights in a Family Suite, on the top floor - last November.  Everything was clean and in good working order.  We had comfy beds and 2 good sized bathrooms. The layout of the suite was perfect for us.  We had 2 large double beds in the main room plus a large bathroom, TV and work desk with chair.  The children's room in the suite was completely separate, with bunk beds, their own TV, plus their own full bathroom with bathtub.  There was also plenty of storage for clothes and luggage.  The Free Breakfast was more than adequate.  The breakfast room is on the ground floor and had indoor seating plus extra seating outside.  The food was fresh - with a choice of cereals, fresh fruit, or a smorgasbord with hot meals such as eggs, sausages,
Manager Response: Thanks so much for taking the time to send us a review if your recent visit.  We are so exited you stayed in the family suite and enjoyed it!  It really is the pride and joy of the property!  We love our repeat guests and look forward to you coming back in 2017!  We are thrilled for you to see the exciting changes and improvements happending at our already amazing hotel!  Happy new year!!

Summary: We have stayed here before, and they did not disappoint! The beds were comfy, and the rooms clean. We stayed in a family suite. Gave us plenty of towels and bedding. The Toy Story parking Lot is about a block away. The park is about a 15 minute walk.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for staying with us and taking the time to give us a review. We sure appreciate your loyalty to our brand. I hope to see you back in 2017 and see our new improvements. I'm so glad you enjoyed the family suites!  It's such a great room and the 2 bathrooms are fantastic for large families!  We are sprinkling tinker bells pixie dust everywhere! We will have new carpet, new furniture, new Disney artwork, brand new bathrooms and more! We love our repeat guests and appreciate your loyalty to our Disneyland hotel.  Have a magical new year!!!

Summary Heading: Celebrated NYE and birthday at Disneyland
Summary: LOVED the layout of our suite! Everything was great and clean.  Staff very friendly and very helpful!   Breakfast was not ideal.  Dining area was small and too cramped. Hot food quality was not great either. Hence the 4 stars.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for staying with us and taking the time to give us a review. We sure appreciate your loyalty to our brand. I hope to see you back in 2017 and see our new improvements. We are looking forward to expanding our breakfast room to offer guests more seating and more room to have a great breakfast to start your day!  Already completed is the outdoor breakfast area.  So guests can enjoy the beautiful southern California weather!  We are sprinkling tinker bells pixie dust everywhere! We will have new carpet, new furniture, new Disney artwork, brand new bathrooms and more! Have a magical new year!!!

Summary: Quick trip to Disney. Great place to stay within walking distance, right at a mile to entrance. Great breakfast. Staff was friendly and helpful. Nice sized room for four people to be in very comfortable. Reasonably priced for being fairly close.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for staying with us and taking the time to give us a review. We sure appreciate your loyalty to our brand. Thanks for your kind words about the rooms and the breakfast.  I hope to see you back in 2017 and see our new improvements. We are sprinkling tinker bells pixie dust everywhere! We will have new carpet, new furniture, new Disney artwork, brand new bathrooms and more! Have a magical new year!!!

Summary: If you're headed to Anaheim, a great place to stay is the Best Western Raffles Inn and Suites! They are a Disney good neighbor hotel that gives superb service! From a regular room to family suites they have a room to fit your needs! If you're looking for a great room with for family the Queen family suite (our fav) or the Family suites with the bunk beds are the best! It's just a short walk or trip on the ART (Anaheim Resort Transportation) to Disney! Highly recommend taking the ART vs driving your car to Disney. Another plus is the free daily breakfast buffet!!! Every staff member is  nice and helpful. Rooms are always super clean! We are definitely going to continue to make this property our Disney staycation hotel!
Manager Response: Thanks so much for staying with us and taking the time to give us a review. We sure appreciate your loyalty to our brand. I hope to see you back in 2017 and see our new improvements. We are sprinkling tinker bells pixie dust everywhere! We will have new carpet, new furniture, new Disney artwork, brand new bathrooms and more! Have a magical new year!!!

Summary Heading: GREAT PLACE TO STAY!! AWESOME STAFF!!
Summary: We checked in late and we were greeted by the nicest staff!! They were super friendly and extremely helpful!! The room was perfect for our family of 7!! The kids LOVED the bunk beds!! The room was clean and well stocked and so comfortable!! Breakfast was good...they have a huge variety and it's included in the price!!  We would definitely stay here again!!
Manager Response: Thanks so much for staying with us and taking the time to give us a review. We sure appreciate your loyalty to our brand. I hope to see you back in 2017 and see our new improvements. We are sprinkling tinker bells pixie dust everywhere! We will have new carpet, new furniture, new Disney artwork, brand new bathrooms and more! Have a magical new year!!!

Summary: Couple of Points that makes it really good choice: 1] Near Disneyland: less than mile walk. 2] Best western means decent hotel with breakfast.  Staff was good and co-operative also. Nothing much to complain.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for staying with us and taking the time to give us a review.  We sure appreciate your loyalty to our brand.  I hope to see you back in 2017 and see our new improvements.  We are sprinkling tinker bells pixie dust everywhere!   We will have new carpet, new furniture, new Disney artwork, brand new bathrooms and more!   Have a magical new year!!!

Summary Heading: Best Western Plus Raffles Inn & Suites, Anaheim Review
Summary: FANTASTIC!!  Great place to stay!!  Clean, it has wonderful features, the staff is very focused and accommodating, and great place to stay if one is disabled (or has a disabled person in their party).  My wife is disabled with mobility issues and the staff made sure we got into a room that would accommodate all her needs.  The room was great!  Clean, and good layout.  The only problem was the arrangement of, perhaps, some of the electric outlets.  On top of this, the staff (as mentioned) was very focused and accommodating making it a priority to meet one's needs.  The breakfast room also was fantastic with a great assortment of breakfast items such as waffles, cereal, fruit, yogurt, sausage, eggs, orange juice, coffee, milk, apple juice, and even guava juice.  They also had a
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your honest review. We sure appreciate you staying with us and celebrating the holidays! We look forward to your return as we will have a new look! New bathrooms, new carpet, new bedding, new Disney artwork, new furniture and more!! Thanks so much about the kind words about our staff.  We sure appreciate it!  Customer Service is extremely important to us...thanks so much for noticing!  We look forward to seeing you in 2017!   Happy New Year!

Summary: I thought it was a very good location, only minutes from disneyland.  It was within walking distance (25min) but a good walk.  Breakfast area was small for the number of people. Pool was good, and the internet slow if to many people using it.  Bed a little stiff.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your honest review.  We sure appreciate you staying with us and celebrating the holidays!  We look forward to your return as we will have a new look!  New bathrooms, new carpet, new bedding, new Disney artwork, new furniture and more!!

Summary: The only issue I truly had is the carpet it looks very old and not very clean. But overall I would still recommend this hotel to all who ask. The staff was exceptional. i truly appreciate all of the staff. from front desk, valet and service.
Manager Response: Happy new year!  Thanks so much for staying with us and for taking a minute to tell us your thoughts about the visit.  We sure appreciate your loyalty.  I'm thrilled to say for 2017 we have some exciting changes you can look forward to as you plan your next visit.  New bathrooms, new carpet, new furniture and more!   Looking forward to your return!!

Summary: We stayed at this property during our trip to Disneyland in November. It is ideally situated just down the road from Disneyland with a bus stop directly out the front or you could walk about 1.5 miles to the entrance. The hotel was clean and tidy and the rooms are well appointed and reasonably spacious. We stayed on the ground floor and had no issues with noise. Breakfast was included in the package we had and it was quite good with several options of toast, waffles, fruit, cereal, yoghurt and some hot food as well as tea, coffee and juice. The staff where very friendly and helpful. There is a coin laundry on site which was very helpful with 2 young children on holidays. There is plenty of places to eat within walking distance and several supermarkets only a short drive away.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your honest feedback!  I sure appreciate it!  I'm so glad you took advantage of the great breakfast.  thanks for acknowledging our staff.  We try so hard to help our guests create a "Magical" visit!  We look forward to seeing you back in 2017!

Summary: We stayed 2 nights at this accommodation. Our room was clean and so was the hotel surrounds. The pool and spa was heated and an excellent place to relax after a long day at Disney. Provided breakfast had a wider selection than most. Overall, we had an enjoyable stay here.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your honest feedback!  I sure appreciate it!  I'm so glad you took advantage of the pool and spa and this amazing southern California weather!    We try every day to help our guests create a "Magical" visit!  We look forward to seeing you back in 2017!

Summary: Great value, friendly staff, close to transportation, good food clean property.  Rooms were perfect for our family 2 rooms refridg, microwave, free parking. Close to convenient stores to buy supplies. Purchased ART passes right from the front desk which was very convenient
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your honest feedback!  I sure appreciate it!  I'm so glad you took advantage of the great location we have here!  You're right, we are close to many stores, restaurants, and all things convenient!  We want you to relax and enjoy the fun and Magic of Disney!   I'm glad you took advantage of the ART transportation system.  Isn't that great?  such a fun way to get around the City.    We are thrilled you allowed us an opportunity to help you create a "Magical" visit!    We look forward to seeing you back in 2017!

Summary Heading: Quality hotel at an affordable price
Summary: After having a not so great afternoon we realized that we had not booked a hotel yet. After driving around we found a framiliar name; Best Western Plus. We headed to the front desk and asked if they had any rooms available, thankfully they did. The service was great, the rooms are impeccable and the yard is beautiful. We will most definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your review...We sure appreicste your loyalty to our brand.  Please come back and see our new look!  We are proud to improve our rooms to feature new furniture, new bedding, new Artwork, brand enw bathrooms, and more!

Summary: The only gripe I have about this place is the sticker shock of the parking fee.  There is a parking lot attendant onsite, and parking passes are required to get it, so why do you need to hit guests with a $15 per day fee to park?  It's just a sneaky way of showing a lower nightly rate when the hotel comes up on a comparison site.    That being said, the breakfast had way more options than hotels of this level typically have(as long as you consider the premium that you are paying for close proximity to Disneyland and the Conv Center).  My family didn't have any problems with the room, or with noise, but I suppose much of this might depend on who happens to be in the adjacent rooms.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your review.  We appreciate your loyalty to our brand.  We hope you return to see our hotel improvements and enjoy our new rooms!  You had a good visit this time...I can't wait for your next one !

Summary: Took family on our first Christmas vacation for the year to Disneyland. Did not think twice about lodging choices. Looked up Best Western and they did it again. Great stay, great service. Bed a little hard but still comfy enough. Had stayed BW Raffles in Anaheim, Ca. before and will again. Great stay.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your review. We sure appreciate you!  We love our repeat guests and look forward to you coming back!  Here's to a magical 2017!

Summary: Stayed 6 nights.  Staff was extremely helpful, even finding a service to steam and press a costume.   Staff member created animals with the towels and delighted the kids.  Room was clean, bed was comfortable, love their pillows!  Breakfast was good and plentiful.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for this great review!  We appreciate you so much.  I'm so glad you got a chance to see first hand our customer service is awesome!  We enjoy helping our guests have a "Magical" stay!  The housekeepers are amazing and little touches like animals with the towels really enhances you visit! Thanks for noticing... Happy Holdiays!

Summary: My husband and I shared a room and my son and his family of 7 had another room. Room was clean, in great condition and comfortable. Full breakfast was popular with families going to Disneyland. We bought our Disneyland tickets at the front desk from very helpful staff, saving us a long line at Disneyland. Shuttle bus stopped in front of the hotel taking seniors to Disneyland for $1 which covered both ways and took you to the main gate.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for this great review!  We sure appreciate it!  I'm glad you were able to enjoy our spacious Suite and our breakfast!  It's so nice to have options for breakfast and boy do we have them!  Don't the waffles smell amazing!  I'm also glad you took advantage of the front desk selling the Disneyland Theme Tickets.  Those lines are long and we know our guests want to avoid all of that and start enjoying your visit to the Happiest Place on Earth!  We hope to see you back in 2017!

Summary: Stayed for 3 days Thanksgiving weekend and had a wonderful stay. The hotel is on the hotel strip and closed to Disneyland and also Little Saigon that is closed to the highway to anywhere in LA. Good hot breakfast items (included), clean room, roomy, nice décor, comfortable beds, quiet, good size HD TV, bright lighting, modern sinks, bathroom, and shower, include microwave, fridge, ironing and hair dryer, good wifi speed, good location, friendly staff, and speedy checkin and checkout process.
Manager Response: What a great review!  Thanks so much for your honest feedback.  I'm so glad you got to really enjoy how close the hotel is to Disneyland and other fun landmarks to enjoy while visiting.   We look forward to seeing you again when your travels bring you back to the happiest place on earth!

Summary: Perfect in every way.  Close enough to Disneyland to be convenient but far enough away to be quiet and enjoyable.  I would say the only issue was slow internet - other than that the entire property was well maintained and a great place to stay.  I recommend it highly for a family adventure.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for this great review!  We take such pride in our clean and friendly property!  We sure appreciate your loyalty to our hotel and the Best Western brand.  WE look forward to you coming back in 2017 to see all of Disney's exciting changes as well as our Hotel changes!

Summary: I was surprised that there are 2 separate rooms, which was nice for having privacy. The internet was fast and we had no trouble with it. The breakfast included many great options. Everything else was great.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for taking the time to give feedback on your visit!  I'm so glad you enjoyed the value of those 2 bedroom suites!  They're a great value.  We work hard to give our guests a great breakfast that's complimentary and of course fast internet so you can share all those photos and memories with those you love!  Happy holidays and we hope you Continue to come back and celebrate the magic of Disney and our hotel improvements. We are excited to bring our guests new bedding, new carpet, new bathrooms and brand new furniture!

Summary: Overall a nice hotel, comfy beds, decent breakfast w/good options, great staff. 2 room family suite is great! Enough room for 8 & 2 bathrooms; Not many family suites have this luxury! proximity to DL is good; walk or take Toy Story shuttle. I really like this BW & have stayed before so it's always an option for us.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time say how awesome the family suites are!  You're right the 2 bedroom and 2 bathrooms are such a treat!   They offer great value and comfort.  You can all be together but have space to move around!   We hope you continue to enjoy the magic of Disney and stay with us each time you come!  We love our repeat guests!  Happy holidays!

Summary: Room was ready on time, the lot was clean, people were friendly, and it was quiet. Close enough to walk to disney. Right next to toystory parking to catch a shuttle. The breakfast was good as well. Better than most hotels I've stayed in!
Manager Response: What a great review!  Thanks so much for taking a minute to tell us about your visit.  We are proud to be a part of the Disney family as a good neighbor hotel and appreciate you staying with us!  Happy holidays!   Looking forward to seeing you in 2017!

Summary: Enjoyed our stay.  It is a great location to Disneyland. Recommend either taking the bus or driving to and from the park.  We had a car and it worked great for us to and from the park. Rooms were very roomy, especially when traveling with family or a couple of families.  Room could have been updated, such as lamp shades and electrical plugs. The staff was great.  The security guys were awesome too.  Would still recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your honest feedback.  We sure appreciate it!  We hope you come back and see all of the magical things Disney is creating!  We also hope you come back and enjoy all of our hotel improvements!  New bedding, new furniture, brand new bathrooms, new carpet and more!    Happy holidays!

Summary Heading: Skeptical at first, But WOW what a room!
Summary: We had looked for a quick last night stay due to our other half of the party leaving and we only needed a small room to finish our trip. We stayed in room 329 and it was huge for a double queen bedroom!  It's close to Disney and the ART shuttle comes through their as well. The water pressure in the jetted tub/shower was amazing!  High pressure that is.  Next time I go to Disney Land this hotel will be my go to for an amazing price.  Comfy beds too!    Only two negatives, one would be they tried to make me pay for parking but hey did an "exception" for me. If you ask I'm sure they would waive the $15.00 fee.  Also, the rooms were slightly outdated. We didn't mind because we checked in late due to being at the park all day.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your great review!  I'm so glad oyu saw the value in our great rooms and our locaiotn!  We love our repeat guests so contact me before oyu arrive and we will do something special for you!   Thaks os much for your loyalty to our brand and for staying here while you enjoy the Magic of Disney!   Happy Holidays!  Shawn Director of Sales and Marketing

Summary Heading: Nice place to stay when visiting Disneyland
Summary: The hotel is nice and tidy and is a close bus ride to Disneyland.  We stayed here for 2 nights and had a good comfortable stay - the air con was a little loud but you get used to it quickly.  The rooms are basic but i Anaheim is not really the place you go to spend a lot of time at your hotel - you are there to enjoy the theme parks.   We did leave an item in our room and we called the hotel to get it back - they emailed us the lost and found form and told us to return it via email. We have done this and 2 days later we are still waiting for a reply so not very happy with that...
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your honest feedback.  We sure appreciate it.  I'm so glad you enjoyed your visit and I'm glad you took advantage of that easy shuttle ride to the Theme Parks as well!  It's always nice to hear guests say the property was clean and tidy!  thank you!  I'm glad front desk started the process to make sure you received your lost item.  I want to make sure it was returned to you.    Looking forward to seeing you back a our property. We have osme exciting room improvements coming!  New bedding, new furniture, new carpet, new Disney Artowrk and more!

Summary Heading: Nice Family Stay while visiting Disneyland
Summary: Recently we took a family trip down to Anaheim to visit Disneyland.  We had a very nice two room suite with 2 bathrooms.  2 Queen beds in one room and second room had bunk beds for our grandsons and an additional queen sofa sleeper. Two TVs, a microwave and mini fridge.  Free breakfast every morning.  It was in walking distance to Disneyland.  Our family enjoyed it very much.  A very nice place to stay while visiting Disneyland.
Manager Response: I'm so glad you enjoyed your visit!  Thanks so much for staying with us!  Those family suites are amazing right?!  I'm so glad you enjoyed our spacious room and found the  2 bathrooms amazing!  I'm looking forward to you coming back to see us!    Happy Holidays!

Summary: I really enjoyed my stay. From the front desk on check in till time to check out everyone was friendly. rooms were perfect for my family size and the cost was good. I will highly recommend this to anybody. Also breakfast was very high quality so much to choose from.
Manager Response: Thanks for your feedback!  I'm glad you had a great visit!  Our biggest compliment is our guests telling their family and friends about us!  Thank you!  Come back and see us!  We have some great room improvements coming!

Summary Heading: Great place to stay with friendly staff
Summary: Stayed here for 5 nights The rooms were average with the very basics. This place is more suited for those on a short trip in need of a place to stay.. Free breakfast was average, and the dining area is very small.. About a 15 minute walk to Disneyland, a bit over priced but that was expected for where it's located.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your honest feedback.  we sure appreciate you staying with us!  We look forward to you visiting us again to see all of our exciting room changes!  We are always looking for ways to upgrade and be the BEST-hotel in Anaheim when your travels bring you here...

Summary: We arrived here quite late at night.  I reserved a room a couple months in advance.  I booked at booking.com and found a room with a bunk bed and a soft couch with a door and a queen sized bed on the other side.
