I'm so glad most guests take advantage of this service...thank you for staying and please contact me directly for a "special rate" for return guests!

Summary: We stayed three nights here for a christmas disneyland trip. Stayed in the room that had two bathrooms and bunk beds for the kids which worked out great. Easy walking distance to a variety of restaurants and a cvs pharmacy that had everything we forgot at home. Staff was pleasant and helpful
Manager Response: Happy Holidays to you!  Thanks so much for your feedback.  I'm so glad you enjoyed the family suite.  It is the "pride and joy" of the Hotel.  Thank you for your loyalty to your Brand.  . Happy New Year!

Summary: The hotel is appropriately rated as a 2 star.  Older but okay to stay.  Parking was challenging; however, the lot attendant took care of it for us.  All of the employees were very friendly and helpful.  The room was average in condition and could use refreshing on decor and some maintenance items.  The bed was ok, but I like a more plush sleep.  The room was extra large and more then we needed.  Would be nice for a large family (a family of 6 would be comfortable.)  Unfortunately, by the time you added taxes, parking, and room rate, it was almost $300 for a less than 24 hour stay which is a little unsettling. This room would be under $100 anywhere else.  :-(
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your honest feedback!  We are so excited to be able to say our room enhancements have already started!  With a new year also comes a new property with beautifully appointed rooms.  We will continue to maintain our high Best Western standards and appreciate your loyalty!   Look forward to seeing you net year!  Happy New Year!

Summary Heading: Best Western PLUS Raffles Inn & Suites, Anaheim
Summary: Has room for improvement. Pull out bed was really unusable. Sheets stained. Rewards system was painful to use, had to fight for points/stay credits. Front desk personnel were very helpful. Even though staff seemed caring, I would not stay here again unless everything else descent was booked. Everything else seemed to function correctly.
Manager Response: What honest feedback!  Thank you so much!  We appreciate it.  We hope to see you back to celebrate Disney's 60th Anniversary and the re-grand opening of our Hotel!  We are starting an exciting journey to make our rooms more modern yet still family friendly!  You can enjoy all new rooms and the same great service and value!     Happy new Year!

Summary: This is an older, but nice place to stay.The parking gets very tight, but the parking lot attendant is there to help,  Breakfast was great! The employees were all very friendly. There is  a lot of good places to eat , as well as great shopping close by.. It would be nice if they didn't charge $14.00 a day parking. Unless you are in tip- top shape; it is a little too far to make the walk back and forth to Disneyland. You can catch a shuttle, but be prepared to pay for that.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your loyalty to our brand!  We appreciate you staying here and look forward to having you back to see all of our exciting changes!  Please join us in celebrating Disney's 60th Anniversary!

Summary: Great hotel , not overly expensive and within easy walking distance to Disneyland and restaurants in the area. We were a group of 6 adults and we would happily stay there again . The free breakfast was not amazing but it was adequate and gave you a good start to the day .
Manager Response: We love our Aussies!  Thanks so much for staying and taking advantage of all the Hotel has to offer...we would love to see you back here when you return to the Happiest Place on earth

Summary: If you are looking for a place to stay, I highly recommend this hotel.  I had to change hotels THREE times during my stay at Anaheim and I was lucky to find a room in Best Western Plus Ruffles.  I was so happy with their service that  after the first night I became a rewards member.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your comments!  I love hearing about families coming here and really creating "Magical" memories!  I'm so glad you enjoyed the visit and I look forward to seeing you again!  .

Summary Heading: Good value, and great for families
Summary: The service in the hotel was very good, and staff were all very friendly. Very close to Disneyland and very close to the ART bus stops (shuttle bus to Disneyland). Though the ART buses came rather infrequently ... more like 30 min between buses rather than the advertised 10 min.... (this is not under Best Western's control) Breakfast was excellent with good choices and very clean facilities. I liked how my child had a room of her own, and separate sleeping areas gave us parents some privacy. Be forewarned though - they charge about $14 for parking a day!
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your great feedback on your hotel experience.  I appreciate it!  We are excited to have guests like you stay here and post honest feedback!  It keeps us on our toes and allows for others to feel comfortable staying here.  We know family time is most important...you need to feel comfortable when you travel and I thank you for selecting us!    Happy New Year!

Summary: This is your average motel built probably in the 70's but since it is a BW property, the interior is clean and the decor is very nice and attractive.  The breakfast buffet could use a little help but if you like pre-made eggs, potatoes, and cereal, then you will enjoy it.  They also have a valet service - not sure why, I never saw anyone use the service and it seems unnecessary as there were plenty of parking spaces when we visited.  Maybe in the summer, he is more busy.
Manager Response: Thanks for your honest review!  Happy Holidays!  I'm so excited you enjoyed your visit and I know you will enjoy coming back to see the Hotel transformation!  We offer a free breakfast with alot of options for everyone.   Everything from healthy options like  yogurt and Fresh fruit to donuts, waffles and sausage and eggs.   I hope your travels bring you back to Anaheim to Celebrate the Magic of Disney and stay with us in the process!

Summary: The room was clean. The beds were comfortable with the exception of the pull out bed. Had a minor issue with the sinks which was taken care of. About 1.5 hrs after we checked out my son realized he left his ipad. We went back and they had it along with my daughters blanket. Will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thanks for this great review!  I'm so glad you had a great experience.  Please log onto our website from time to time to see the transformation of our rooms!  We're excited to bring you a better product with new furniture, new bedding but same great prices!

Summary: This motel was fine. Room was clean and has a fridge and microwave. You could hear everyone rolling their suitcases and talking if they happen by your room. It is about 3 city blocks from Disneyland but just walk half a block to the Toy Story parking lot and board the bus to the park, you can return this way too! Saves your feet after a long day walking around the park. They offer a free breakfast but I didn't try it. I'd stay here again if the price was right.
Manager Response: I love it when guests see the value of our property.  We know how hard you work and we want to make sure this property doesn't have high rates and lousy customer service!  We want you to have it all!  Greta rates, save money, make great memories while you're here...Thank you for taking the time to post a review...Happy New Year!

Summary: The room was clean, the beds were satisfactory.  Breakfast was fine for coffee and something quick to eat prior to walking to the Anaheim Convention Center for a conference.  The hotel was surprisingly quiet given the drive-up style structure.  Five minute walk to the convention center (basically across the street) and about 15 minute walk to Disney.
Manager Response: This is definitely a great place to stay for Conventions!  It's right across the street from the Convention center!  Thanks you for choosing this property and taking the time to let others know about it's convenience.  Hope to see you in 2015!

Summary: Best Western Plus - Raffles Inn and Suites is really a plus experience. With great quality rooms, good breakfasts prepared and displayed fresh every day, excelent value per night and an amazing service. Everything was clean, available and organized whenever I needed and could ask freely if anything was missing.  Thanks a lot! :)
Manager Response: This is awesome!  Thanks so much for choosing us!  You have so many choices here in Anaheim and I'm so happy to hear our hospitality and service worked out well for you!   This property is special and I hope we become your "home away form home" for years to come!    Happy New Year!

Summary: My family comes here once a year to visit Disneyland.  We like the family suite because this has a separate room for my teenage daughter who has a choice of a sofa bed or one of the bunk beds.  The rooms are clean, staff is friendly, parking can be tight but there is a parking attendant who is on duty to help with parking.  The rooms have a mini fridge and microwave, and you can't beat the breakfast dining room that is open from 6:30 AM to 9:30 AM.  Only thing I did mention to the front desk lady was the rooms needed more plug outlets.  Cell phone chargers, laptops, camera chargers etc.  Overall nice place to stay.  Close to Disneyland.  We have season passes, so we like to just drive around the corner and park in the Disneyland parking lot and take the Disney bus into the park.
Manager Response: I'm so excited to hear you enjoyed staying in the Family Suites!  It's a great room and you cant beat the 2 bathrooms!  It's the pride and joy of the Hotel!  Thanks for the kind words about the breakfast and the ease of getting on the shuttle.  IT's great feedback for future guests...It's great families can have a hot breakfast for free so you can focus all your time and money on Disneyland!   Her'es to a Magical Christmas and New Years!!

Summary: Clean and comfortable.  We had a suite which was fun for the kids.  Nice building and pool.  The staff was so helpful and nice.  Even the fresh baked cookies in the lobby were a fun touch.  I wish it had better mattresses, if they ever upgrade but not too bad.  I would stay here again.  Oh and the walk to the parking lot next door takes you straight to the park.  Just hop on the Disneyland bus and your there.  they even let you buy your tickets at the parking lot so there is no need to deal with lines at the park.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your review!  I love the cookies too in the lobby!   You can always count on a fresh cup of coffee, fresh fruit and cookies when you stay here!  I'm also glad to hear you found the close distance to the shuttle pick up helpful...You really do have everything close by and I'm thrilled you stayed here in one of our Suites while creating new memories for your family!  Cant wait for you to come back and see us!

Summary: Clean and comfortable. Nice complementary breakfast. Great heated pool and hot tub. Staff were wonderful. Only complaint just too far to walk to disneyland and back after all the walking we did at disney.
Manager Response: Happy Holidays!  I'm so glad you had a chance to stay here and enjoy the value of being close to the Theme Parks and a variety of rooms types available  I look forward to you coming back to see the room enhancements taking place next year!  You're in for a treat with the same great service!

Summary: I highly recommend this hotel.  From the friendly and helpful staff to the cleanliness of the hotel and overall upkeep to the affordability made this hotel a hotel we will definitely stay in again.  We have stayed in other more expensive hotels, and they did not compare to the service and quality of this hotel.  In addition
Manager Response: Thanks so much for staying with us and taking the time to post a review!   We appreciate you guys staying with us and for the great feedback!   We are excited to be "your home away from home"!  while visiting the resort!

Summary Heading: Family Suite Worked Great - Wonderful Staff
Summary: It was a family trip to Disneyland, and we decided to try a family suite instead of booking 2 rooms. We picked this hotel as their suite had 2 bathrooms, and that worked out well with 5 people. The hotel is an older one, but the rooms are clean, and clean is the most important thing. From the moment we pulled into the driveway, we were treated with courtesy. The valet, Bara, greeted us and directed us to the front desk for registration. Gary checked us in, and when I told him we had another vehicle coming in a few hours, he took the names and got everything ready for them upon their arrival. He also called twice during our 3 night stay to make sure everything was okay. I want to thank Susy, Maggie, and Cruz for all their help with a non room issue. They were all great. The
Manager Response: What great feedback!  thank you so much.  We work so hard to help each guest have a great stay and it's appreciated that you took a moment out of your busy schedule to acknowledge that!   Our family suites are such a great value because you're right there's NO need to book 2 rooms at a Hotel.  Everyone can be together but have privacy and best of all-there's 2 bathrooms!!   I hope to see you back to celebrate many more family memories here with us!

Summary: I stayed in this hotel specifically because I wanted the KidSuite, so can’t review any other room type. Our room was on the third (top) floor. There were four of us but there could have been more. There was a bed in the main room (king, I think), and then in the other room, a (super comfortable, according to my daughter) sofabed, plus the bunk beds, and then we ordered a crib. (We weren’t sure where the one-year-old would end up sleeping – crib, bunk, or in the sofabed with mommy.)   The hotel room had a microwave and mini-fridge which was great for heating up formula bottles, storing leftovers, etc. The bathroom had a Jacuzzi tub. This was great because they are deeper, so can be used like a soak tub. However as far as the jets they are all on the side which is somewhat
Manager Response: What at amazing review!!  You were so thorough and detailed!  I'm so glad you stayed here and had a great time!  I love when families utilize all the space the Suites have to offer...we hope you will continue to stay with us next time your plans bring you back to the Happiest Place on Earth!   Check out our room enhancements we will be doing in 2015!  Cant wait for you to see them!  The rooms will have a warm, yet modern & clean look to them with lots of Disney touches for all.    Look forward to seeing you again!

Summary: Great hotel, Walk to disney world 5 Minutes Plenty of  Breakfast  Staff very helpful. Plenty of eating places close by from cheap to expensive. Food at Disney world was not the most wholesome. Can catch shuttle to Universal studios from hotel Definately do VIP at Universal. well worth the cost about $160.00 each
Manager Response: Happy Holidays!  Thanks so much for your comments and feedback on your recent visit.  I'm so glad you had a chance to visit Universal Studios as well.  You're right, the tours are amazing and our front desk  team is ready to give you some great options!  We hope to see you again!!

Summary: It is not a bad walk to the resort. We got discounted ART passes and they worked really well. Breakfast is good and the staff was really nice. The beds were ok, seemed a bit small for Queen size. We got a really good rate last minute.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your feedback on walking to the Theme Parks and the shuttle experience... We're so glad you stayed here and I hope you comeback to Celebrate the Magic of Disney as we Celebrate Mickey's 60th Anniversary!   Come back and see us!

Summary: We just stayed here for a trip to Disneyland.  We had a great experience.  The rooms were plenty big enough, two bathrooms with six kids was a fantastic touch.  Beds were very comfortable.  Rooms were very clean and breakfast was fantastic.  The only down side was it was a little farther from the park than we thought but it was still close enough that we walked it.  We would stay here again for sure!!!  Staff was very friendly and everyone went out of their way to make sure everything was up to our satisfaction!!
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your great response!  We love having groups here...we are so excited you found value in the spacious suites and hope you come back to see the exciting room enhancements we are doing for 2015!  Please come back and see us!  Happy Holidays!

Summary: Our group has stayed at this hotel several times.  The location is very good because you can walk over to the Toy Story parking lot and catch the FREE shuttle to Disneyland.  The hotel is clean, friendly staff, breakfast is okay, and the price is good if you book far enough in advance and stay for multiple nights.
Manager Response: We love our group business....thank you so much for staying with us!  We appreciate it.  I'm so glad you were able to take advantage of the close location to the Theme Parks and other exciting venues here in Anaheim.  Please call one me for future group visits...we have some "very special"  perks for teams, families, or school groups.      Happy Holidays!

Summary Heading: Excellent value for a comfortable and quiet stay
Summary: The location is great, it is a 20 minute walk to Disney Gate. There is a Denny's to the left side of the hotel only 1/2 block away.  (It is opposite direction of going to Disney) This Denny's is incredible and nothing like the other Denny's we have eaten in.  The Hotel is quiet, pool is small but hot tub is great. Breakfast is fine, but the selection is the same daily. Coffee is great and juices are top notch. Usual yogurts and bread items, fresh oranges and apples daily.  Guests are a bit disorderly in the breakfast nook, to be expected with children waiting to go to Disney!
Manager Response: Thanks for a great review!  We appreciate the kind words about your visit and I'm so glad you had a chance to enjoy the spa while you were here!  You're right, the location here with the Theme Parks close, restaurants nearby, and great value for your money!  Please come back and celebrate with us again!  We have some exciting changes coming....

Summary Heading: Best for the place and money
Summary: I love this place where I was able to walk to Disney; and the breakfasts were excellent. Rooms are very clean and comfortable to stay. The only thing I don't like about this hotel is the parking fee of $14 per vehicle per night.
Manager Response: THanks for your review...I appreciate the comments about our breakfast!  We worked real hard to make sure the breakfast was filling, healthy, and enjoyable!  We feel like this Hotel is very speical and unique in Anaheim!  So glad you could come and experience it!  Looking forward to you coming back again!

Summary: Great 2 room family rooms, fifteen minute walk to Disneyland and California park, This was our 3rd time to the states and we stay here whenever we are in LA. Highly recommend this hotel when visiting LA and Disneyland
Manager Response: There's nothing better than a repeat guest!  You are proof this Hotel is truly a "home away from home"!  THank you for your loyalty!  Contact me when you're traveling here again so I can make your next visit "extra" special!    Shawn

Summary: This hotel is located between Disneyland and a shopping centre. A bus stop right out the front for both tourist & local bus. Everything is within walking distance - resturants, and Disneyland only 1km too. Plus a breakfast every day was great. And front desk staff very helpful with airport shuttle & other tourist things.
Manager Response: I love when I hear great things about the staff!  It is our main priority and goal to help our guests have a memorable stay while visiting the Home of Walt Disney's Original Theme Park!  Thank you for taking a moment to tell us about your experience...Comeback and join us for our exciting 2015 changes!

Summary Heading: Great place to stay for the price
Summary: We had a kids suite and was everything we had hoped for during our trip to Disneyland. We would definitely stay again. The staff was very helpful and accommodating. I would recommend the shuttle services to the park as walking was a little tiresome after a long day at Disneyland. Tickets can be purchased at the front desk and the pick up and drop off is right outside the hotel. We had a great time there.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for staying with us!  I'm so glad you took advantage of the shuttle to get to and from the park from the Hotel!  It' so easy...I love when guests see the value in our hot breakfast bufet, and spacious rooms...looking forward to having you back so you can create more memories!  Join us in 2015 as we celebrate Disney's 60th Anniversary!

Summary: large rooms to accomadate large family, pool, close to disneyland shuttle, friendly service, good breakfast, very clean  staff helpful, laundry room,can see fireworks from balcony set off in disneyland
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your review.  I'm glad you had a great time here and the whole fmaily was bale to relax in one of our Suites!  Please come back and see what exciting enhancements we are doing to the property!   Check out our Holidays Specials and come back and see us!!

Summary: We recently returned from a 5 day visit to Calif. Our suite accommodations more than met our expectations. The kids loved the bunk beds and we loved being able to have some privacy. Eric at the front deck went out of his way to be helpful and kind. If we return to the area, we will be back at Best Western.
Manager Response: We appreciate families like you stay here with us 5 days!  Wow!  What great memoreis for the family.  Thanks for letting us be a part of that!  How nice to acknowledge our team members for their great customer service shown to you!  Thank you.  It means alot.  There's nothing better than to hear families enjoying our property and all it has to offer...I agree with you...the Suites are great!  Cant wait to see you again at the Home of Walt Disney's Original Theme Park!

Summary: We booked the Family Suite, which had a small room off of the main room with bunk beds and a fold out couch.  2 bathrooms, 4 sinks, 2 tv's, and free hot breakfast!  This place was perfect for our family vacation to Disneyland, we will definitely be staying here again the next time we go to Disneyland!  To get to Disneyland, it's just a 5 minute walk to the Toy Story parking lot where you can get on a shuttle for free!
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your great review!  I love it when families enjoy their time here and all the Resort has to offer.  That Toy Story lot is a great hidden gem!  I also love when families enjoy the spaciousness of our Suites with 2 bathrooms!  I look forward to you coming back and seeing the room enhancements we wil be doing to our rooms!  More modern, more Disney, and still affordable!  See you real soon!!

Summary Heading: Friendly staff, very clean, excellent stay
Summary: What an excellent place to stay. Everywhere throughout the hotel is kept extremely clean. This even includes the parking lot! The hotel staff was among the nicest people I met within the southern California area. This place deserves recognition. Will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Wow!  Every single team member read this review!  Thank you...It is such a priority for us that our guests feel welcomed, appreciated, and you feel this Hotel stay was worth your hard earned money.  Thank you for acknowleding the clean rooms, and clean property....cant wait for you to come back!

Summary: We rolled in to anaheim at around 3:30 p.m. on the 18th. Every hotel was either booked or at least $250 a night. Best western raffles had one room left and gave it to my family and I at a great rate. I figuted we had 2 double beds, but when I opened the door we had a 2 room suite with bunk beds for the kids!. Needless to say I was stoked. Kids had there room and we had our own bed. Had all the amenities we needed and even a jacuzzi tub. Sure its about a 15 min walk to disneyland but I felt 12 bucks for two adult and 1 child bus tickets was def worth it. I love this place and will definitely be coming back again and again. Oh yeah full breakfast layout too. You really cant beat it!
Manager Response: Thank you for this review!   This made our day!  When we see guests who are pleasantly surprised by their accomodaitons when they check-in-it's awesome!  The bunk bed Suites are a Hotel favorite!  I'm so glad the kids enjoyed them!  I'm glad you can see the value in our hotel rooms and I'm looing forward to you coming back for years to come as we strive to improve the Hotel and our guests experience...Happy Holidays!

Summary: This was our third Disneyland visit and the third place we've stayed. It wasn't as nice as where we stayed the first time but much better than where we stayed last time. The two room suite (bunk bed/2 queen) was perfect for our family. There are only four of us, but we like to spread out, and given the fact I was sick half the time, having my own bed was great for the days I stayed back to rest. It was quiet as well, and the kids loved the pool. Breakfast was alright, nothing fancy, but it got us going. This may sound weird, but one of the best things was the laundry service. On our last day, we put our clothes in a bag, dropped it off at the lobby in the morning, and everything was cleaned and folded at the end of the day and in our room.  Overall, good experience.
Manager Response: thank you for your review!  I was so excited to see someone mention in their reviews about the laundry service!  Wasnt that amazing?   The laundry is delivered back you clean and folded!  I'm so glad we are able to offer that special service to our guests!  Thank you for relaxing, enjoying, and staying here!

Summary Heading: Not what I thought it would be
Summary: The photos show a lovely kid suite with hardwood floors and lots of space.  The room layouts of the suites shown were confusing so we thought we had a room with 2 queen beds and the separate room with bunks and a fold out couch for the 6 of us.  I asked several times for a ground floor room for my husbands bad knees but we were assigned a room on second floor.  There was only one elevator way across the parking lot so we go up to our room and it was a horrible shock; small, one queen bed, stained carpet and bedspreads and beat up furniture.  I went back down to the front desk and they told me that only some of their rooms had the hardwood floors and none of the kid suites had two queen beds although many people made that same mistake I did.  Really?  Many people make that
Manager Response: Thanks for your honest feedback!   I appreicate guests like you who know what to expect when traveling....I'm pleased to say we are doing a complete room enhancement which includes bedding, Disney Artwork, modern furnishings, and more!  I hope you would allow us the opportunity to have you back and impress you!  Please contact me directly to book your next visit!

Summary: My first “Review” so I figured to make it thorough…  Front desk and staff were very pleasant. Arrived about 2 1./2 hours ahead of check-in. Room wasn’t ready and cleaning staff had just started their lunch break. Front desk gave us the option of leaving our bags and heading to the parks or hanging out at the pool and they would make sure the room was prepared as soon as possible and they would call me when it was ready. I opted to stay at the pool so they gave us a pool key and we hung out there for about 40 mins. Pool was very small but it was OK because this would be the only time we would use it since we planned to stay in the parks every night until closing and the pool closed at 11. It was just nice to get wet and relax on the patio chairs after a long drive.  I went and
Manager Response: This has to be one of the coolest reviews I've read!  I cannot believe it was your first one!  YOu did a great job!  THANK YOU!  YOu were honest, funny, and I cannot wait to have you back...please call me direct so I can help ensure your 2nd visit is even better than your first!   What I loved the most about your comments was you read alot of our reviews good and bad BUT you made a decision to come and see the value in our property anyway!  Well done!  I'm glad you and your family sat in our outdoor courtyard and had a chance to talk and spend quality time together!   Look forward to having you back!   Shawn

Summary: Included breakfast and close to Disneyland.  2 room suite is great for families.  Walk to the Disney Toy Story car park and catch the free shuttle from there. Pay to park the car but its cheaper than most in the area. Pool and spa are great to have a relax and cool off in after a big day at theme parks and is open till 11pm
Manager Response: Thanks for taking the time to post a review...I'm so glad you had a chance to relax in the heated pool and spa...I look forward to you coming back in the future to see all the of the exciting room enhancements we are going to do!  We want this to be your home away from home!

Summary: Wife and I stayed here for two nights visiting the Disneyland Resort for our 2-year anniversary.  Room and premises were very clean, staff was friendly, professional and very helpful.  Breakfast (free) was just ok.  Wanted to try the waffles but they ran out of batter so ended up eating their weird eggs, sausage and an english muffin... good coffee.  Was able to get a gov. rate because my wife is a fed. employee so the price was good.  Overall a very good experience.  I will come back.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review!  We love our government employees!  I'm glad you were able to come and celebrate your anniversary with us!  I hope this can be an annual trip for you.  Please ocntact me directly so I can help plan something speical!    ALl my best!  Shawn

Summary: There were three of us in the room - and it had enough space for each of us and our luggage.  It had a microwave, refrigerator and a tub!  The breakfast had cold cereals, waffle machine, potatoes and eggs along with pastries.  Parking was premium so did one night on our own (there were spaces) and one night we valet (kinda depends on when you return for the night).  Our shower did not work on the last night and we were given another room to shower in.  The hotel was very busy and this is a family hotel so there were kids running around in the morning but overall pretty quiet considering the number of cars in the parking lot.  The Toy Story lot is next door.  We drove and parked as we don't like to walk if we don't have to and we knew we would get a lot of walking at the parks.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for this review...you really took advantage of how close everything is!  I know you all had a great time and we appreciate your loyalty when traveling to Anaheim!  I'm so glad the staff was helpful and we hope to see you again when your travels bring you back to the Happiest Place on Earth!

Summary: It was a good experience. Beds were comfortable. Staff were nice and accommodating. Breakfast was great. It's close enough to Disneyland to walk. The price was the best I could find in the area that would provide a continental breakfast.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review...We are thrilled you stayed with us and enjoyed the Resort.   I look forward to seeing you back for your next vacaiton to Anaheim. We will continue our commitment to value while getting great rooms!  We want you to get the most for your money!  We want you to relax and enjoy your special time with loved ones!  It sounds like you did just that!

Summary: This was a perfect place to stay for a family Disney trip.  The room was spacious for a family of five.  The price was good.  Room was clean.  Breakfast was ok.  Wish they changed it up every morning for something different.  Having breakfast at the hotel was convenient and saved us time and money.  Overall was a good place to sleep and spend the days at Disneyland.  Will probably return as it was a very family friendly place.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for this great review about your visit!  IT's customers like oyu that make our day!  I'm so glad you took advantage of the free hot breakfast buffet and saved some money to spend at the Happiest Place on Earth!  I hope your vacaiton was filled with great memoreis and I look forward to you coming back again!

Summary: Clean, caring staff. Close, but not to close to Disneyland.  Not a lot of noise.  $14.00 dollars a day to park; but guard/attendant at entering parking lot.  Breakfast at both hot and cold items; eggs, pancakes, muffins etc,  Also, apple and orange juice with good coffee.  .
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your review!  We are so glad you had a chance to visit us and hope you reutrn to check out some of our upcoming Hotel improvements!  We have some great ideas for our room enhancements!

Summary Heading: No AC in kids room of 2 room suite, coffee maker right next to the toilet
Summary: We've stayed at other Best Western locations so know what to expect but this was a complete disappointment  We had the 2 room 3 bed Suite with king bed in one room and bunk beds for kids in another.   Review in short No AC in kids room (the one with bunk beds) -- never experienced this in any previous stays with any hotel/motel  Coffee maker in the bathroom in an open cabinet right next to the toilet and at same level as toilet (not on counter)  Breakfast day 1 : Omelette was dried around the edges; Bread was dried around the edges, Dehydrated potatoes. Breakfast day 2: Better omelette and bread - no dried edges. Didn't want to take a chance with the potatoes. Same spread as day 1 Some reviews mention this hotel as walking distance. We didn't find the distance very "walkable"
Manager Response: We really appreciate your honest feedback regarding your recent visit.  I'm so excited for you to see the Interior room enhancements in the coming months...we are always tyring to refresh our property so our guests can relax and enjoy the property as well as the Magic of Disney...please contact me directly so I can help you make arrangements for a future visit...

Summary Heading: Our new "go to" hotel for Disneyland
Summary: Stayed here Oct 1-4, 2014 in room 223.  The check in and check out was fine.  Everyone was nice and efficient.  The parking ($14 fee) was a little cramped but there was always a space when we left to get dinner and came back. The property is not beautiful or extravagant but it's quaint, safe, and well maintained.  The rooms are set up where the door faces the parking lot (like a motel).  The rooms are not fancy like Sheratons or Hiltons but they are very simple, clean and big.  We had the 2 queen beds/2 bath which is perfect for families or group of friends.  Plenty of moving around space and each room had a flat screen tv. There is a microwave and small fridge which comes in handy, 2 closets, and each room had a chest of drawers. The beds were very comfortable even the bunk
Manager Response: We really appreicate your property review. I'm so glad you got to enjoy the flavor and value of our free HOT breakfast.  I'm really excited to hear that you enjoyed our family Suite!  It really is the favorite of anaheim!!!  It's huge!!  Our location allows guests to pick several different ways to get to Disneyland-either shuttle, walking, and there's even toy story parking lot nearby to transport guests over..Thanks for being a valued customer and please come back and see us!  We are gettign ready for a Magical Holiday Season!

Summary: Best breakfast at a motel. Rooms very clean. Close to Disney parking lot to catch free shuttle to park. Staff courteous. Parking fee a bit high at $14/night. Went during an off season so no problem finding a space, but was told parking during high season is back to back in parking lot.
Manager Response: hello there!  Thanks for your great review about your recent viist!  I'm so excited to see you took advantage of all of the Hotel amenities.  The breakfast is filling and of course complimentary, the lobby is newly renovated with friendly staff waiting to help you...and there's several different ways to get to the Disneyland Theme Parks...Thanks so much for makingus your "home away form home"!  We look forward to seeing you back here!

Summary Heading: Best Western Raffles Inn and Suites
Summary: Great hotel with amazing family suites that make longer vacations bearable with children. Very nice and helpful staff, they were able to answer all of our questions. Within easy walking distance to the Disneyland parks and lots of shopping and eating near by the hotel and on the way to the park. The offered breakfast buffet was enjoyed by all in the family and had many choices so everyone had what they wanted.
Manager Response: What a great review!  Thank You!  You picked a Hotel you knew would work well for your family!  It's in a great locaiton, and easy ways to get around and see all the Anaheim Resort has to offer!   So glad you enjoyed the family suites....they're the prize of Anaheim!  2 bedroom with 2 bathrooms that sleeps 8!! Amazing!  so glad it worked well for you!  Come on back and see us again!

Summary: Spent 7 nights here while visiting Disneyland and I would stay here again. Staff were very friendly and helpful. The continental was pretty good so you can save money on that meal each day and if you make yourself some sandwiches then there then you can save on lunch as well. It is about a 20 minute walk from Disneyland which is not bad, but if you don't want to walk, the Disneyland overflow parking is right beside the hotel. Jump into the parking lot and take the blue Disneyland shuttle buses to the park. A bus leaves every 5 minutes. Those same buses will take you back to the parking lot at anytime the park is open.
Manager Response: Kevin we can't wait for you to come back and visit!  I'm so glad you found the breakfast of value and the location!   I appreicate you selecting us and tell your friends to visit us during the Holidays!  It's a magical time to be here!

Summary Heading: Great place for a quick family trip to Disney
Summary: Our family of 5 stayed here for a three nights while in Disneyland.  The room we had was a family suite with the bunk beds in a differnet room.  It needed some updating, but was clean which is the most important thing.  The service at the front desk was friendly and fast.  The location is close to an ART bus stop, and a quick walk to the Toy Story parking lot to use the Disney Shuttle Buses.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your great feedback!  We appreciate you staying with us and hope to see you again!  I hope everyone enjoyed the Magic of Disney!!

Summary Heading: West Western PLUS Raffles Inn & Suites, Anaheim
Summary: Service was great.  Accomdations were good.  Some of the food in the kitchen wasn't good such as some of the hot food.  Otherwise, a very good experience overall.  The staff were prompt and attentive to any posed questions or needs during our stay.  They offered other ways in which to make our trip more enjoyable and shared some ways to save time and money which are important in a Disney vacation.
Manager Response: Your honest feedback is appreicated and welcomed!  I'm glad you had a great visit!  Please come back and enjoy the property enhancements we are doing as we celebrate Disney's 60th Anniversary for 2015!

Summary: The rooms are spacious for families, and include a mini fridge and microwave. Breakfast is included, try to ask for a room closer to the office and breakfast room. The pool and hot tub is good, open late for a dip after returning from Disneyland after a long day. You could walk to the park, but we chose to take a cab ride for about $7.00, you can also take the bus from right outside the Motel. Denny's is right next door for late night dining.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the great response...I appreciate you and the family staying with us and we are so excited to know you had a great stay!  come back and see us!

Summary Heading: Great little property with very helpful staff
Summary: We stayed as a family of four and found everything to be just fine.  We would surely stay there again. The staff were wonderful and the location was just fine.  As everyone says there is a Disney Land parking lot nearby and you can use the buses there to get to the park
Manager Response: We always love to hear about our valued guests having a great stay and really enjoying all the Hotel and the Magic of Disney has to offer!  I hope you saw World of Color while you're here...it's amazing!!

Summary: Wonderful place to stay no problems.Quit.Good breakfast.Clean.Close to disneyland which we will never do again.But I highly recommend this place we had 2 bedrooms 2 bathrooms 2 coffee makers hair dryer fridge and microwave for a reasonable price.Refilled coffee everyday just a great place especially for 4 woman 2 bathrooms what more can I say.That is hard to find.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for this great review!  We appreicate the feedback!  The family suite you had is our pride and joy!  It's so spacious for larger families and you're right-the 2 bathrooms are fantastic!  I hope to see you back to create more great memories!

Summary: We drove 8 hrs to Anahiem and arrived  at Best Western Raffles around noon - before the 3 p.m. check-in. We asked to  check-in early but were told the Inn had been booked the night before and the room may not be ready since check-out was just at 11 a.m.    The hotel clerk said she would call us if the room was available prior to 3 p.m. While getting necessities from the car  for the day planned at Disneyland,  we got a call on our cell that the room was ready.  We were thrilled!   The décor is a bit "tired" but very accommodating for our family of 5.  The continental breakfast was very good and probably saved us $50. each day from having to eat out.  Toy Story Shuttle just a block away which got us to and from the Park with minimal waiting.  I would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your review!  We get so excited to have this great feedback from our guests. We are here to help our guests have the best memories possible and we appreciate you.    Happy Fall!

Summary: This is a great place to stay when going to Disneyland. The staff is always friendly and helpful, the breakfast is one of the better ones I've had, and the room options they have (and the prices they offer!) cannot be beat.  We are return customers, and plan to return to  this hotel again, provided that it stays how it is now! No complaints at all... a very good hotel choice!

Spent a week in this hotel while visiting Disneyland and other southern California adventures. Hotel is very clean with friendly, helpful staff. Front lobby has complimentary fruits (only oranges and apples) and coffee (no tea or water). We had a suite on the first floor (would have preferred higher up so we could keep the curtains opened). Room had new laminate floors throughout, with a door to the kids suite. Kids had bunk beds, with an additional sofa bed and TV. I have few complaints about the layout of the room: Why would anyone would put the bathroom and sink on the kid's side of the suite. The whole purpose of getting a suite is so the kids can be put to bed early and the adults can take a shower or prepare for the next day's snacks / water without waking the kids. This

Summary Heading: OK Quality for the price paid
Summary: Worked out fine for a family of 5, 2 queens, fold out couch and a set of bunk beds.  Bathroom in each room was great. Walls are a little thin, but, other than that,  was clean, safe and good $ value.  We walked down to the parking area,  app 2 blocks north, and hopped on the shuttle bus for the parking lot, used it to and from Disney.  Also,  bus stop out front of hotel,  staff very good at helpling you figure out your route.

This was our 3rd or 4th stay at the Best Western Raffles.  The rate was excellent, the room was clean, comfortable and roomy.  The hotel is close to Disneyland (10 - 15 min walk), with a shuttle directly in front of the hotel (5 min drive).  The breakfast was satisfactory; nothing fancy, but good and free.  There are numerous restaurants close by (within a 5 min drive) in addition to grocery stores and department stores.  We'll stay here next time we go to Disneyland.  It's become our "regular."

The location was great. Just around the corner is the toy story parking lot with a free shuttle to Disneyland. And you don't need to park there to use the shuttle. The first night I wasn't happy about the room. You could smell bleach before you even open the door and it was overwhelming inside. My husband and I both have asthma and I was still trying to shake off a bout of bronchitis.  The only real solution offered was to have my family swap rooms with us and have them suffer it until it aired out on its own. I dread to think what could have happened in there to justify using that amount of bleach... The rooms need some TLC. They were clean but both rooms had ants show up and they just just needed to be desperately renovated. Breakfast wasn't for us. Everyone else seemed to

the staff was really helpful  it was an easy walk to Disneyland lots of places close by to eat at but make sure they hold your Disney tickets if you plan on buying them there they were sold out when we went to purchase them

We took our niece to Disneyland so had a unit with an additional bunk room for three nights.  The room and its facilities served us well.  My niece really enjoyed the pool, and my husband and I really enjoyed the hot tub.  The breakfast was pretty good, with quite a bit of choice (you need to toast the muffins!).  The staff were all very helpful and friendly.  You can catch the shuttle to Disneyland and Knotts Berry Farm at the bus stop outside.

We stayed here for 4 nights. There were 7 of us the kids loved having their own room. Was so affordable . Looks exactly like the pictures. Down the road from Disneyland . Great breakfast. Nice staff . Tidy and clean. Would highly recommend to families.

My only advise is to always check your reservation at the counter, be sure they tell exactly what room you have received before going to your room.  You don't want to be surprised with something you did not reserve.

enjoyed our stay, staff was very helpful and friendly, convenient to everything. did not eat the breakfast, but enjoyed the coffee from the dining room. In room coffee was terrible. Pool was fun and in good condition. No bugs in rooms.

It was a nice clean hotel, and Quiet. Hot Breakfast was good but need more attention, food items ran out fast and only on person restocking could not keep up with demand. Parking attendant was very helpful. The Check is was easy but my room was not ready. The front lobby was comfortable while we waited.

Due to mold and poor air quiality in the kids suit we had booked we had to leave the hotel only after beeing in the room for 3 hours. Started coughing and having trouble breathing. We were offered Another room but after checking it out realized this hotel need and allover reno. too dusty and worn to be healthy for anyone - specially Little kids! Planned a Disneyland vacation with 3 kids - so to have to spend firs night trying to find a hotel accepting 6 people same night is not easy. The sad part is that we had to pay half the ammount of the hotelrooms cost per night for the 3 hours we were there. We had another 3 nights booked also with Best Western - but cancelled + we did not want to risk it!

Grateful I found out about Best Western Raffles. The reviews were generally good and the location was perfect for our trip to Disneyland. It turned out better than I hoped.  The Queen Suite provided my family the two separate sleeping areas we required so we could all stay in one room. The third floor location was great (except the elevator was out of service on our arrival day due to a scheduled power shut down by the city). The free breakfast was a full breakfast, not one of those Continental Bkfsts you get at some of the other hotels. And the cleanliness of the property along with the friendliness of the staff made the overall stay enjoyable.   I loved the location as we were able to walk to the Toy Story Lot and get on the free shuttle. We were also able to catch the ART

The location is good, there's a bus stop which is very close to this hotel. You have to pay 5 bucks per person(go and return) to hop on the bus to Disneyland. There's plenty of restaurants close by so don't worry for no place to get food, eg. Denny's  The hotel provides complimentary breakfast buffet which is awesome!

This hotel is a good economical option for a family trip to Disneyland area.  Clean rooms and decent breakfast.  The hotel staff are very helpful, but they don't respond well to "off script" issues (ex: our smoke detector started chirping, so they came to the room and removed it--we were without a detector for two days.  Probably not the best solution).  Generally we were pleased with the accommodations.  Hotel is close to Disneyland but not really walkable.  Used the ART shuttle system to get to park--one of their stops is right next to the hotel.  Only complaint is that the shuttle service got less and less reliable as the week went on.  Pick up times went from every 15-20 minutes to 30 and event 50 minutes between cycles.  not the hotels' fault, but something to know if you

Summary Heading: Good hotel but could be better
Summary: Stayed here for a family trip to Disneyland and were relatively happy with the hotel.  There a couple of minor issues that if resolved would make it a great place to stay.   The location is walkable to the park but after a long day the ART is a must to get back. We had booked the 2 room kids suite which was as described on their website, my only complaint was the overly noisy Air conditioner which made sleeping difficult in the hot weather we experienced, it is VERY noisy, also there was a foul odour emanating from the bathroom sink which disappeared quickly enough with running water, the $14 a day parking levy I also felt was a little steep considering other hotels in the area do not charge it and am still trying to understand what the charge actually covered.  The beds in the

We recently stayed at the BW Raffles Inn and we LOVED it! I had read the reviews on this site. They were mixed reviews. I also did research else where, but no one really had good things to say about this property. So, I was very nervous about staying at this property. It was such a great experience, I can't wait to stay there again. We are Disneyland veteran's and we go a lot. We have stayed at a lot of hotels around the resort area. This is far the BEST one! It was clean, updated, and very spacious. We stayed in a 2 bedroom suite. We had so much room for our family. The daily breakfast was a HOT breakfast. That's pretty much unheard of around Disneyland! It was well stocked everyday. Plenty of room to sit inside or out. The staff was so accommodating and very friendly.Everyone!

This is my first time staying at BW. We opted for this hotel for the bunk bed my children wants to sleep in. Marriott Courtyard who also have bunked didn't have available room that day. BW family room has 2 toilets that don't flush. Oh…wait..yes, it did flush after the maintenance guy came to show us how to press the toilet knob as mighty as we could in order for it to work..lol. There was a bunch of sand in the bath tub. Carpet rug extremely dirty. Door between the other room does not close due to couch thats blocking it ): Coffee maker along with cups and condiments are 3-4 inches off the dirty floor under the bathroom sink…I find that insanely unhealthy and unsanitary. I don't get it why it's placed down there. I don't know maybe this is what BW supposed to be. That would be

I had a family suite-lots of space, clean for a good price.  There were bunk beds and an on-suite full bathroom in one room.  In the main room there were 2 queen beds and another full bathroom, plus a table.  Excellent price for a spacious room.

Thank you, Raffles, for providing our seven member family with a room that we could all fit in!   Our family (5 adults and 2 kids) spent five nights at this location during the first part of August.  We were in Anaheim for Disneyland, and chose this hotel, out of fifteen others, for its location and ability to fit us all in one room.  We would probably stay here again.  The hotel room was nothing fancy (I've stayed in other mid-class hotels that were nicer), but we were comfortable.  Our "suite" had two queen beds were in one room, and a sofa bed and bunk beds were in the other.  Each room had its own bathroom, closet, and TV.  I had no trouble sleeping on the queen, but we were all pretty exhausted from walking around Disney.  The free breakfast was also a big incentive for us.

We booked our room through my fiances' work discount. They were oversold in our room type but upgraded us to a "suite" that was right next to the laundry room which was REALLY loud and uncomfortable. Besides the fact that we got a crappy "upgrade" I check my credit card and saw that I had been charged for the peoples' room that we traveled with. I specifically told the front desk agent (James) to ONLY authorize incidentals for them but once I checked my credit card statement they charged 1 nights' room and tax. WHY would that happen? So I called back and spoke to another front desk agent (Maria) and she informed me that the person whose room I paid for needs to write a letter stating to refund MY card for their charge. First of all I did not authorize room and tax just

it's make all my family member happy , Awesome Hotel - near from Disneyland and have a great surrounding neighbourhood , easy to find this hotel , friendly staff , good value for family lea sure, we give very recommend to stay in this hotel

Our family (3 teenagers and 2 adults) stayed here for a trip to Disney & Anaheim.  It was well worth it.  Although the space was a bit small, being able to put each kid in their own bed in a single suite was great.  Breakfast was standard "waffle/sausage/egg/cereal" but fit the bill, again, with 3 teenagers...plenty of food.  The rooms were clean, service was great, and parking lot was secure.  The only thing families should be aware of is that it is a 15-20 min walk to the Disney entrance; easy for our crowd, but not so great if you have littler ones who get tired walking.

This Hotel was much better then I expected!! Staff and Service was Great!! Breakfast and Breakfast room had a good variety, hot foods and very spacious. Room were very nice and Spacious!! We stayed in a suite with 2 rooms, 2 beds and a sofa bed, the rooms were separated with a closing door which was nice!! The Sofa bed was also very comfortable. Big Mirror and double sinks! just a little narrow, but 3 of us were able to get ready at the same time. We did not here any noise from any other room except a few foot steps from above. Didn't even hear a shower which was a first from any other place we've stayed at. Did hear noise from parking lot because of rude people not being considerate to others sleeping!! I'd recommend getting the top floor. Right next door to the toy story

Summary Heading: Nice Hotel close to Disney Land
Summary: It's a nice Hotel with clean rooms and a good breakfast in walking distance to Disney Land. We really enjoyed the clean and quiet rooms and the nice Pool and jacuzzi!  Perfect place to be for families! You can enjoy the Disneyland fireworks from the Hotel every evening.

So close to Disneyland that you will be there in 10 minutes, and you are charged $5.oo to keep the park beautiful. The fireworks can be seen and heard from your room. Great price for the closeness to the park.

This hotel was amazing!!!! Half a block from the toy story parking so you could catch a free ride Disney if you didn't want to walk the 15 minutes. The hot breakfast was amazing, our 4 kids loved the waffle bar. Staff were so accommodating and helpful we never had to ask for anything, we received extra towels and pillows after our first night as they could tell our family used a lot lol. The pool is great and once the fitness centre is finished this hotel will have everything (although after walking all day in Disney I'm still puzzled as to why you would need a treadmill :) ) Our family of 6 reserved the two bedroom/bath suite, it was perfect, everyone had their own bed so no sharing issues. The rooms are a bit dated but if cleanliness, hospitality, value and convenience are

Summary Heading: Great Place for a Disneyland Stay
Summary: Awesome place, great location, great staff, great rooms.  Looking forward to staying here again.  Breakfast was great.  The kids enjoyed making their own waffles!!!  We stayed in the family suite and it was plenty of room for the 8 of us.

horrible service, bad and small rooms. front desk not willing to work with us and our situation. took too long to fix our broken A/C unit and the second room of the family suite was the size of a closet basically.

Summary Heading: Amazing addition to first trip to Disneyland!
Summary: Having Just stayed 4 nights on a family trip to Disneyland, we couldn't have asked for more! Eric and all of the front desk staff were top notch and eager to help Google map any destinations we needed and recommend great dining in the area. The shuttle ride was right outside the hotel and only took maybe 5 minutes to get either direction from Disneyland park. We enjoyed the Fireworks from the hotel itself over the park with ease. Was very quiet and the Family suite was such a fitting touch with a great price for our family. Discovered a great shop called ABC Market on walking to park with killer prices on great Disney and California merch and the breakfast had absolutely something for every taste!!! My bf is a very picky eater and he never went away hungry. The potatoes were a

I highly recommend this hotel as staff were helpful and get out of their way to ensure customers were satisfied and taken care of.  Also, excellent with the breakfast included with the daily rate of the room. If you are going to Disneyland, this hotel is very accessible and a walking distance.

Average-great breakfast and internet Staffing on entrance and exit not very good-tired to over charge me Don't like the $14 per day parking rate didn't try the pool-maybe next time breakfast was boring after you ate one day-it never changed the whole time we were registered great location-very near to Disneyland and Adventureland freeways are way too crowded never seems to be a break whether its the afternoon or late late at night

The Best Western Raffles Inn & Suites was a great deal!! Very clean and spacious rooms with a free hot breakfast, convenient location to all the local attractions and friendly staff.  They provided a parking attendant that was on duty 24/7 which made us feel very safe when walking back from late business meetings. Harbor Blvd is also very well lit at night for safety.

Summary Heading: Good stay for a Disney Adventure
Summary: Everything was good. We had a TV problem that was taken care of immediately. There was a Good staff,  and good housekeeping, good food and lots of choices. Everything we needed was there. We would definitely recommend this place for others.

The suites offered by Raffles are very comfortable and worked well with a family vaction for six people (4 adults and 2 children). Especially when traveling on a tight budget.  The brekfast was good even if the eggs were a little weird.  All in all a very good stay and we plan to go back when we go to that area again.

i have lot to express my happiness but in few words my stay was memorable. every staff member at this hotel almost went out of their way to accommodate me and not only me every guest in the hotel.very good hot breakfast, nice and clean room.good parking facilities.  when staff learned i was celebrating my wedding anniversary they upgraded my room to a suite  which was cherry on the icing. will definitely recommend this hotel.good job

Summary Heading: Older hotel, close to Convention Center & Disney
Summary: Older, updated MOTEL.  Breakfast was good.  Staff was always nice and helpful.  Room was comfortable.  Small pool onsite. They were unboxing new pool furniture when I arrived.  The refrigerator in my room froze everything so was unusable.  One of the two sink faucets needed replacement.    Nearby restaurants and Target Store very useful. I was there for an event at the nearby convention center.  This is an expensive area for hotels with lots of taxes/fees added on to the bill as well.  I would prefer a HOTEL with inside rooms, rather than a low-rise MOTEL with outside rooms.

Summary Heading: Nice, Good Location, Good Customer Service
Summary: The Hotel was good.  The breakfast was very satisfying. The 2room suite was nice.  The beds seemed smaller than a queen - almost like a double - and a bit uncomfortable.  The staff was very nice and their customer service skills were good.   The bus location was right out front for Disneyland, but the timing on the bus was a bit off due to the construction on the roads.

My family really enjoy the Best Western Plus Raffles Inn and Suites at Anaheim, California.  The staff was very nice, the rooms were well equipped, the hotel was also well situated near many restaurants and the shuttles to Disney land. The breakfast room was well stocked and staffed. Overall good hotel at a fair price.

Thanks to Eric, the front desk clerk who helped us move rooms from 1 king bed to a kids suite! We accidentally booked 1 king bed room, and upon arriving found our mistake. We had 4 people and could not possibly fir in to a 1 bed room. Eric made some last minute switches and accommodated us with a 2 room suite. The hotel was almost full, so the switch took some skill and patience! Thanks Eric. Hope you enjoyed the fruit :) .

This hotel is dated but a decent price and it included breakfast. The pool isn't great. You feel like you don't want to take off your shoes in the room but it's not bad if you want to save money for a quick sleep to get you to the parks.

The staff here is rude doesn't care and really just wants your money. They are always full due to Disney land being next door so they could care less. The suites are badly described if you aren't careful you can end up with a smaller room than needed.

This hotel was very clean and well decorated with flat screen tvs and plenty of pillows and towels. The rooms were the perfect size for our needs and the staff very helpful and friendly, going out of their way to help us. The breakfast was acceptable, though not a lot of options for someone who eats gluten free. The shuttle in front of the hotel was a lifesaver and extremely helpful. I would recommend that to those who don't want to park in Disneyland.

The room size (1 queen, fold out couch and set of twin bunk beds) was ideal for our recent family trip to Disneyland. The room was clean and staff very friendly and helpful. They delivered us a crib upon request, as well as additional requests that sometimes come up when traveling with small children! The breakfast room was clean and functioned well for the amount of people coming through there daily. The food was standard hotel fare, but provided enough options for us. The pool is clean, though small when there are a lot of people wanting to use it. We were able to access most if what we needed/wanted on foot (but as New Yorkers we are used to walking anyway). Would stay here again.

A good choice for families among the many hotels located near Disneyland in CA. The staff was friendly, efficient and professional. The bunk bed suites are a nice offering for families with kids. The rooms are large and clean. Housekeeping does a great job cleaning around typical family clutter. Breakfast offerings are solid, but the breakfast room fills up quickly during busy season. There were a lot of sports teams here during our late June dates, but they did not disturb us. Rooms are fairly quiet, except for some thumping overhead a couple of the nights. The value is good, although like many in the area, the daily parking rate is high. Know before you go! Pool area is nice, although there is a major construction project starting in the vacant lot next door. Would definitely

much more than expected from this hotel. good parking facility, careful staff and a ++attitude for their guest, excellent and well managed breakfast,couple of minutes from disneyland and restaurants.  i certainly recommend this hotel  may be that is the reason it is called a best western family rather than a hotel.

Hotel is in a good location, within walking distance to Disneyland/Ca Adventure. There is a shuttle that will pick  you up in front of hotel and drop you off at the gate of the park. Took advantage of that after a very long day of walking in the heat! Check-in was great, the staff was very helpful. We did eat breakfast the first morning, it wasn't bad, many choices from hot foods to cereal and pastries.  The only problem we encountered was the parking is  terrible. Not many spaces , we have a full size truck and spaces not made for trucks or SUV's. Overall we enjoyed our stay, the beds were very comfortable, and rooms were clean. I would definately stay here again for or next trip to Disneyland.

The stay was Good and would have been better if they had cleaned the room on the first day we were there.  I was disheartening to come back to a messy room after a long day.  The breakfast was good and the pool was really warm.  Like I said, they would have gotten a better review if not for the first day.

The check-in service was very good. We were not told about parking fees prior to arrival but the staff was friendly and waved the fee upon proof of email confirmation. The complimentary breakfast was very good and had a lot of choices. the Kids suite had a door to close off to separate the room. The queen sleeper sofa wasn't very comfortable. It was disappointing the hotel didn't provide a shuttle to Disneyland.

Oh...where do I begin? Awakened at 7am by screaming kids, pounding feet, constant vibrating wall, and extremely loud earth moving equipment from constuction site next to us! My head is pounding at the moment- so bear with me! Blow dryer doesn't work, so i'm flat ironing my hair dry ): Breakfast? The coffee looked like mud- put 3 creamers and it turned brownish gray- tossed it! Apple juice- not! Water came out ): Milk? Not! There's none left! Oh, the wonderful waffles maybe? Not! Good luck digging it out and once you do- it's like rubber and the flimsy utensils won't dare cut through ):   Room: just hoping the wobbly table top doesn't fall off before the end of our stay. The beds are hard as a brick!   I will NEVER stay at this place again!   To be fair, this hotel is at the most
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your honest feedback regarding  Your visit. I'm so sorry the construction noise next door  Bothered you.  We will be excited when it's done too!  But on the bright side so many people want to come and enjoy  Disneyland that new hotels are popping up everywhere!  It's out  Of our control but i can say the ground breaking is all done!   They have moved on to another part of building. So no one  Will have that inconvenience again. Thanks for understanding.  Our free breakfast is hearty and filling and usually  Something for everyone!  I hope you enjoyed the theme parks and  I hope you will return to see our hotel room improvements!  Keeping things  Fresh and new for our guests is important.  Hope you're well.

Summary Heading: Great place to stay and great customer service
Summary: Had a very enjoyable stay the people were nice an very good location stayed in room 322 we will stay here again and very reasonably priced I can't say enough good things about my families stay here the people at the front desk were very helpful and friendly our room was very clean and comfortable

Hotel is very clean and up to date. Staff is very friendly and caring. Room is a great value for the location. Breakfast was good and filling. The internet is a little slow but it works good. I will be looking forward to my vacation next year and will be staying there again.

Summary Heading: It's okay but worth the stay due to location
Summary: This motel is where we stayed while visiting Disneyland.  Nothing bad about it.  It's your average motel.  The nice thing was the hot breakfast.  You have to get there early otherwise the food is old and cold.  They don't refresh towards the end.  We were there for 4 breakfast mornings.  If you make it before 9am you will have a nice warm breakfast.  It's an okay breakfast.  Not much of a fruit selection but it's free so no complaining.  The rooms were average.  Not big not small.  They were clean.  The pool was okay as well.  Small sitting area.  Oh the nice thing about this hotel is definitely the walking distance to the park.  If you are in shape and walking 15 minutes isn't a big deal then location is good.  Also Denny's is right next door.  :)

Summary Heading: Great place if you are going to Disneyland - esp. w/ kids
Summary: Great location and the kids suites are perfect for families.  If you get back to the hotel late and there is no parking , they have 24 hour valet service who will park your car for you - very convenient.  The breakfast was also excellent and free.  Anytime we go to Anaheim, this qwill be our first choice for a hotel.  One last comment - the pricing was very reasonable.

This hotel was well kept and close to Disney as well. Decent breakfast and fair size rooms. Pool and hot tub were clean. Friendly staff. Mini mall located close by which was helpful too. Shuttle was also available.

I was surprised when we went into our family suite. It was much smaller than pictured. The breakfast was decent, but I expected fresh eggs, not processed ones! The balance of the breakfast was great! The service was excellent, and we would stay again, however it would be in a kids suite instead! The price difference is the difference!
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your feedback on your recent visit!  I'm glad overall you had a greta time and oyu were able to enjoy the free breakfast, and the Magic of Disney!  Look forward to seeing you back again as we make some exciting changes to the Hotel and refresh our rooms~   I know you will enjoy it and make this your Disney home away from home...  All my best!

Summary: Great room.  We had a 2 bath room.  It was very clean.  Breakfast was good but eggs and potatoes needed some help but still everything else was excellent and good especially for free.  We walked to Toy Story and took the bus.  Even my buddy on a scooter was impressed with the quickness of the buses.
Manager Response: thanks so much for your repsonse!  I'm so excited to hear you had a great visit and you were able to relax and focus on visiting the Happiest Place on Earth!   Look forward to seeing you again!    Your in Hospitalty!    Shawn

Summary Heading: Budget Family Rooms with Bunk Beds close to Disneyland
Summary: They have several configurations of rooms with bunk beds, This is great for kids that are old enough that they need their own beds.  The included breakfast has an adequate variety to get you started for the day.  The small refrigerators in the rooms are bigger than most and have plenty of room to keep lots of drinks cold.    One great thing is you are a 5-10 minute walk to the Disneyland Toy Story parking lot where you can catch the free shuttle bus into the park.  It's a small pain but well worth the cost savings of not staying right next to the park.  Plan to pay for parking but all of the hotels in the area are doing that now.  We have stayed there several times and just booked our next stay.

Summary Heading: Clean and Comfortable with Helpful Staff
Summary: The hotel was close to shuttle service to Disneyland, had good free wifi and staff that went out of their way to assist us wherever we had questions or requests. As well, the staff was very friendly and always greeted us. The room was always clean and well-stocked, with comfortable beds. The breakfast could have featured a better selection of healthy food, but was otherwise okay. Good value for the money that we spent.

This hotel was great for the 2 adults and 4 kids we had on our family vacation. It was clean, quiet and close to Disneyland. The breakfast was ok. The extra charge for parking when there weren't even enough spots for the guest was ridiculous.

We picked this place because it offered suites at a reasonable price. We were happy with the size and layout of the room. It had a door separating the bunk beds from the queen bed. It was nice and clean. The air conditioning wasn't working in the kids section, but they replaced it quickly. Breakfast was included, which was a nice option. We felt the staff was nice and professional. It was within walking distance from Disney, but it is quite a walk- maybe 15 min.  Cons- We didn't like the air conditioning by the queen bed because it blew directly on the bed & on the person that slept closest to it. The mattress itself was not the best. Overall it was a great value for the money.

I had read some negative reviews prior to our stay and they had me a little hesitant! We loved everything, room, the staff was soooo friendly, loved it! Place was perfect location, easy to go back and forth to parks in ART, breakfast was great for free, they even kept towels at the pool for guests!

We had a wonderful stay at the Best Western Raffles Inn. The hotel was walking distance and a quick ART ride to Disneyland. We had a suite with bunk beds attached to a room with two queen beds and we slept 6 people comfortably. It was nice to have two bathrooms as well. The continental breakfast was a bonus and one less meal to spend money on at the park. My son loved the pool and he swam every day.

Summary Heading: Fantastic Service - Great place near Disneyland
Summary: Raffles was our home for 6 days and was fantastic. Service was superb! Breakfasts were perfect - a great way to start the day in getting the kids ready, the adults moving and something substantial in way of food - awesome! A short walk to the free shuttle - a great way to get moving - and a great way to end the day by walking to the hotel and chatting about our wonderful Disney day - The pool was a blessing for the kids on our days off from Disney to cool off and let off energy! A great family place and affordable! The room my daughter had was facing the park so we watched the fireworks from their window each night - a great little surprise on the first night there!

Clean and tidy.  Walking distance to Disneyland  Noisy as subway run underneath or behind hotel as our room on 3rd floor shook from the vibrations. Mates on bottom floor didnt feel anything so would recommend bottom floor accomodation.  Stayed 2 nights included parking (great) but not free. Breakfast included (good).  Staff very helpful and obliging.  Very noisy outside of Hotel on the Saturday night with people exiting Disneyland we guess yelling while walking up the street. Went on for over half an hour.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the great feedback! We appreciate you and hope you return to see all  Of the exciting improvements we are doing to the  Hotel!  I'm glad you were able to enjoy how close we  Are to the theme parks whether it's walking or by shuttle! Our property is a favorite for families looking for the  Confidence in a best western, space and cleanliness  of our rooms, and great value!

Summary: Close to shuttle for Disneyland. $14 a day for parking at the hotel was a little ridiculous, but the free breakfast every morning kind of averages the cost out. Mattresses were a little uncomfortable, but room was VERY clean, especially bathroom area. Wonderful hotel if you're just looking for a place to shower & sleep after a long day at the parks. Our second time staying here, and will probably stay here again for the next Disneyland trip.

Summary Heading: great family place affordable and close to Disney
Summary: The street view of this hotel is very nice.  I turned into the driveway and was met by a well dressed valet that asked for my name.  He had me on his clipboard and directed me to the parking area.  14 dollars a day which they are very upfront about on their website.  So much nicer than the hidden surprises many hotels do.  I think all rooms have a view of the interior parking area. Not the best view, but i think a very safe layout.  It is pretty clear that this structure has a few years but my room was very nicely updated.  Good flat screen, microwave and nice sized fridge.  High Speed wifi is complimentry.  Pool and Small hot tub well maintained.  Blocks from Disney on the bus route and two long blocks to the convention center.  Place was loaded with families going to Disney.

This was my second time staying at this hotel.  Both times have been to visit Disneyland and CA Adventure.  The hotel is within walking distance to the parks, but I would recommend the ART bus pass since walking back to the hotel is one of the last things you want to do after being on your feet all day.  The Breakfast is an added benefit for anyone who is planning to spend all day in the parks.

The most friendly, accommodating staff of any hotel we have visited in the past few years.  Super breakfast, albeit breakfast  room was a bit crowded.  Room was quiet and we slept well.  Requested a room change because we were placed in Handicapped, but none were available so we had to make do.  Requested an extra luggage stand and were quickly accommodated .  Good memory, great stay.

We had a 3 night stay at this property. Upon arrival, the Front Desk Agent had an awesome attitude and was able to get us checked in right away.  The room requested was the room booked. 2 room with 2 bathrooms. The first room had 2 queen beds with the Microwave and Fridge, TV, Coffeemaker, Desk Chair and bathroom/closet. Attached was an additional room with sofa (Sofabed) and 2 bunkbeds, TV and another bathroom/closet. The room was able to accomodate 7 people in total.  Parking was a bit tight, but once you are parked, you really don't use the car to go to Disney (shuttle pick up out front).  The breakfast was a hot breakfast (scrambled eggs, waffles, muffins, cereals, juices etc). It can get busy in there with the large crowds all going to the parks at the same time. No

Had a bad experience with hotel. Pool was not clean and the door on the bath room was broken. Dirty sheets and parking was the worst I have ever experienced in my hotel life. And they charge you for that horrible parking.

We have just come back from 7 days in this hotel. I cannot fault the staff the girls and Gary on the front desk are awesome. The valet and the other staff are so friendly. We had 1 slight problem when there was a leak in the bathroom we notified Gary and he moved us within 10 minutes. The breakfast is ample considering it is included in the price and the parking is clearly stated on the website and no costs are hidden. To get to the parks you have a couple of choices you can catch the ART bus outside or take a 10 minute walk to the Disney Toy Story parking lot and catch the bus.
